1b1(1): @##// ye shes kyi snang ba yongs su gzung ba byed cing dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi drung nas song ngo // bam po dgu bcu gnyis pa/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i bshes
1b2(1): ka/ gnyen gyis yon tan gyis ni mgudage ba'i bshes gnyen gyis ni bsngags te btang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba'i byin gyis ni byin du brlabs/ dge ba shes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la ni nan tan du byed/ dge ba'i bshes
1b3(1): gnyen yid du 'ong ba ni rjes su sems/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'byung gnas tsam du lta/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ston pa yin pa'i yang dag par lta/ dge ba'i bshes
1b4(1): gnyen ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos la rjes su lta/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni sangs rgyas nam mkha' blta ba la mig tsam du lta zhing mthar gyis phyogs kyi gnas/ rgya mtsho rnam par rlab pa'i bza' shing ga ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan
2a1(1): rin po chedas pa sna tshogs kyi bags kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang / khang pa brtsegs pa brgya stong phrag bcu 'dzam bu cu klung gi giser las brtsegs pa'i bde dang ldan pa dang / gan med yang ban stong traH/ 
2a2(1): bcu ka gdung rin po che rnam par snang ba las bres pa dang rdzong pa brgya stong phrag bcu rin po che thams cad las gzhi blangs te/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi pha gus mu khyud byas pa rin po che thams cad kyi them skas btags pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi
2a3(1): stegs bus bskor ba lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi dri dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba gser gyi bye ma kun tu gram pa gzhi nor bu rin po che chu 'ding kun tu bkram pa/ phyogs bzhi nas them skas rnam par bris pa
2a4(1): lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba dang ngur ba dang rma bya dang / khu byug dang / khrung khrung dang / ka la bing ka dang / ku na la'i sgra skad snyan pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i ta la'i 'phreng bas kun nas brgyan pa
2a5(1): gser gyi dril bu'i dra bas kun nas yog pa/ rlung gis bskyod pa'i sgra yod du 'ong ba 'byung ba/ steng nas rin po che'i bla re chen po bris pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gir bas yongs su bskor ba/ rin po che'i dra bas brgyan pa'i gdugs
2a6(1): dang rgyal mtshan legs par bsgreng ba/ lu ma brgya stong phrag bcu dus dang 'thun pa'i tsan dan gyi 'das kyis mtha' 'khor b.rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog tu 'dug pa'i pad+mos yongs su khyab pa/ rin po che'i pad+mo'i 'od chen
2a7(1): bos snang bar gyur pa'i chu dri ma med pa dang ldan pa yod pa ste/ bza' shing gi ra ba de'i dbus na gzhal med khang chen po rgyal mtshan sna tshogs shes bya ba sa'i gzhi rin po che rgya mtsho'i snying po las blangs pa nor bu rin po che'i ka ba bkye ba
2a8(1): 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi lhun mngon par 'phags pa nor bu rin po che 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i spang leb bkye bas brgyan pa gzhi nor bu rin po che 'bar ba grangs med pa'i rabs bres pa rin po che'i rgyal po mi 'pham pa'i spos kyi dris gam
2a9(1): yo kun nas bdugs pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po sgra snyan pa 'byin pa'i dri'i ngad kun tu ldang ba/ rin po che'i rgyal po dri rnam par gsal bar byed pas/ dbang po rno ba'i bag chags rnam par bsgrubs pa dang ldan zhing gzhal med khang chen po rgyal
2a10(1): mtshan sna tshags der stan grangs med cing tshad med pa bting bar gyur pa 'di lta ste/ brje'i snying po can dang nor du na pa che phyogs snang bar byed pa'i bde'i snying po can dang nor bu rin po rnam par snang ba'i 'ad+ma'i skang po can dang / nor bu rin po che
2b1(1): 'gro ba yid du 'ong ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che mdzod sna tshogs kyi pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che seng ge'i shing thags parje'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che drim med pa'i bad+mo'i snying po can dang
2b2(1): bu rin po ches brgyan pa'i brje'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che sgo kun nas brgyan pa'i bad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che 'od kyi rgyan gyi pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag pa'i rin po sa
2b3(1): rnam par brgyan pa'i 'od zer kun tu 'byung ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dang nor bu rin po che rdo rje'i seng ges gnon pa'i pad mo'i stong po can dag bshams shing bting ba ste// gzhal med khang chen po rgyal mtshan sna tshogs de'i bges mang po yang
2b4(1): rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa las byas pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam par rgyan pa kha dog bsam gyis mi khyab par mdzes shing gzugs yid du 'ong ba dag go// bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas brgyan pa de steng nas bla re chen po brgya stong phrag
2b5(1): bcus khengs pa ste/ 'di ltar gos kyi bla re dang 'dri shing gi bla re dang / me tog gi bla re dang / 'phreng ba'i bla re dang / spos kyi bla re dang / nor bu rin po che'i bla re dang gser gyi bla re dang / rgyan gyi
2b6(1): bla re dang rin po che rdo rje snang ba'i bla re dang / glang po shugs dang ldan pas sprul pa'i lha mo'i bla re dang nor bu rin po che brgya byin mngon par dga' ba'i bla re dang de dag la sogs pa bla re brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas khebs
2b7(1): par byas pa'o// rin po che ridra ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas yog pa ste/ 'di ltar rin po dam pa'i dril bu'i dra ba dang / rin po che'i gdugs kyi dra ba dang rin po che'i 'bru'i dra ba dang mu tig rgya mtsho'i snying po'i dra ba
2b8(1): dang nor bu rin po che bai DUrar+ya sngon po'i dra ba dang / seng ge'i khri shing gi dra ba dang nor bu rin po che chu shel gyi dra ba dang spos kyi gzugs kyi dra ba dang / rin po che'i cod pan dang rin po che'i 'phreng ba'i dra ba dang / 
2b9(1): de dag la sogs pa rin po che'i dra ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas yog pa'o// snang ba chen po brgya stong phrag bcus kyang kun nas yog pa ste/ 'di ltar nor bu rin po che skar ma'i 'od zer gyi snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che nyi ma'i snying po'i snang
2b10(1): ba dang / nor bu rin po che zla ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che spos kyi dung pa 'od 'phro ba'i snang ba dang nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che bad+mo'i snying po'i snang ba dang / nor bu
3a1(1): rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che sgron ma chen po'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che spos kyi sprin che po
3a2(1): bdang glog gi 'phreng ba 'byung ba'i snang ba dang / de dag la sogs pa nor bu rin po che'i snang ba chen po brgya stong phrag bcus rtag tu snang bar byas pa'o// bza' shi gir ba de ni rgyan chen po'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcu'i char 'bab pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa ste/ 
3a3(1): dus dang 'thun pa'i tsan dan gyi sprin brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'brug sgra rab tu 'byung ba lha rdzas las 'das pa'i 'phreng ba dang lnga ldi'i sprin chen po kun tu mchod pas rab tu brgyan pa/ lha rdzas las 'das pa'i gos sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sprin brgya stong
3a4(1): phrag bcu'i sprin mngon par 'bab pa/ lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rgyan gyi sprin brgya stong phrag bcus rnam par klubs pa/ lha'i bu brgya stong phrag bcu mthong bar dga' ste 'og tu lta zhing rab tu 'dud pa'i phyag char bzhin du 'bab pa/ lha
3a5(1): mo'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcu sngon gyi spyod pa'i skal ba mnyam pos rang rang gi lus 'bul ba'i char mngon par 'bab pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sprin brgya stong bcus chos mnyan pas sgom zhing 'ong ba'i cher mngon par 'bab pa ste/ de ni dge bsnyen ma yid
3a6(1): bzhin gser gyi snying po'i khri chen po la 'dug cing mu tig rgya mtsho'i snying po'i dra bas brgyan pa'i cod pan thogs pa lag pa la lha rdzas las 'das pa'i gser gyi dpung rgyan dang / gdu bu thogs pa lag pa nor bu rin po che dpal gyi rang bzhin gyi 'od
3a7(1): zer gyis rnam par mdzes par gyur pa/ rna cha rin po che mthon thing dri ma med pa rab tu 'phyang ba dang / mgo nor bu rin po che'i dra bas mdzes par brgyan pa nor bu rin po che seng ge'i gdong gi rna ba'i rgyun thogs pa/ nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i
3a8(1): mgul 'khor thogs pa lus rin po che thams cad kyi drabs yog cing bde rab tu'ab nga srog chags bye ba khrag khrig gis lus rab tu bdud de/ phyag bya zhig 'dug ste/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin da'i drung du
3a9(1): la pa gtogs ba byed dang gzhan dul bye kyi gartogs pa 'am 'bru la dga'a'
3a10(1): ma narabadag ldanas dga' dun gyis du gag pa rang mam ga gas pa sa sadus chu
3b1(1): gyi ris su gtogs pa'am/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po 'an/ na rgyu/ dri ba'i dbang po'am/ dri ma'amathul dus gyi dbang po'am/ grul dum 'am/ klu dbang po'am/ kU'am lha ma yin gyi dbang
3b2(1): bo'am/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' sdang gi dbang po'am/ nam mkha'i rdzong ngam/ mi 'am tsho dbang po'am/ mi 'amatsha'am/ lto 'phyen chen po'i dbang po'am/ s+ho 'bye chen po'an/ gzhin
3b3(1): rje'am/ gshin rje'i bu mo 'am/ yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ yi dgas sam mi'i dbang po 'am/ mi yang rung / sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag 'ong ba dang / de bzhin du lho phyogs dang
3b4(1): nub phyogs dang byang phyogs dang byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs
3b5(1): nas kyang tshangs pa chen po 'am/ tshangs lha nye phan nam/ tshangs pa'i ris su gtogs pa'am// dbang byed dam/ dbang byed kyi ris su gtogs pa 'am/ mi'i dbang po 'am mi'i bar gyi sems can mang po 'ong
3b6(1): ba de dag/ nad sna tshogs shig gis btab bam/ nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyis kun nas 'khor tam/ lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogal mngon par zhen dam/ las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs pa zhig yod na'ang / de dag
3b7(1): gis dge bsnyen ma yin bzhin de mthong ma thag tu nad thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ sems can gyi nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang yang bral bar 'gyur/ lta ba'i gsal shing yang phyin par 'gyur/ sgrib pa'i
3b8(1): thams cad kyang rnam par shigs par 'gyur ma/ rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgribs pa med pa yang khong du chud par 'gyur te/ rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor de yod pas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rab tu byang bar 'gyur
3b9(1): dbang po'i myu gu thams cad kyang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyurathams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshul rgya mtsho la'ang yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur/ gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho thams cad la'ang 'jug par 'gyur
3b10(1): ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang tshul rgya mtsho thams cad kyang mngon du 'gyur/ smon lam gyi sgo thams cad kyang yang dag par skye bar 'gyur/ spyod pa'i sgo thams cad kyang rab tu 'byung bar 'gyurayon tan mngon
4a1(1): par bsgrub pa'i sgo thams cad kyang rnam par dag par 'gyur/ sems rgya chen po yang mngon par shes pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i tshul du 'byung bar 'gyur/ lus thogs pa med pas kyang thams cad du rjes su 'gro
4a2(1): ka/ bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan pa'i nang du phyin te bltas na/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin khri bzang po la 'dug pa mthong nas de dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ 
4a3(1): dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhon la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par
4a4(1): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi 'am 'tshal te 'phags ma ni byang chub sems
4a5(1): dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes thos na 'phags ma ji ltar/ byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol
4a6(1): des spras pa rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa mya ngan med pa bde ba'i rgyal mtshan thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ni de'i mthus mthong na don yod pa'o// mnyan na don yod pa'o// rim gror byas pa don
4a7(1): yong ba'o// gnas gcig na 'grogs pa don yod pa'o// rjes su dran par byas pa don yod pa'o// rigs kyi bu kho mo ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa bas bskyed pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs sum zin pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
4a8(1): sangs rgyas kyis dgongs pa rnams kyis mthong ning rnam par dmigs par mig lam du 'ong bar mi 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu kho'i mthong ba cham gyis ni sems can rnams kyang blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par
4a9(1): 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu loro'i drung du gar phyogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa dag byon cing gdan rin po che khrol bzhugs nas chos ston to// shar phyogs nas ji lta ba bzhin du phyogs bcunas kyang
4a10(1): de bzhin te rigs kyi bu de lta bas na kho mo ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba'o// chos mnyan pa dang mi 'bral ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' dang 'grogs pa dang mi 'bral ba'o// rigs kyi bu kho mo dang spyod
4b1(1): pa'i skal ba mnyam pa'i srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di na gnas pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag go// 
4b2(1): rigs kyi bu sems can gzhan gang 'din gnas pa de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung chub lag mi ldog pa phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun du gtogs pa sha sdug ste/ kho mo dang spyod pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dag go// sbas pa
4b3(1): 'phags mkhyod kyis blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lu ji srid cog nas thugs paskyed/ sbas pa/ rigs kyi bu 'o maman sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo
4b4(1): pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad ces bya ba byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa de drung na kho mos tshangs pas spyod pa spyad do// de bzhin gshegs pa de kho mos mchod do// de bzhin gshegs pa de las chos bstan kho mos yongs su bzung ngo // de'i
4b5(1): snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba byung ste/ de'i bstan pa la'ang kho mo rab tu byung ngo // chos kyi 'khor lo kho mos bzung ngo // de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa dpal zhes bya ba byung ste/ de yang kho mos
4b6(1): babyed shu'o/ de'i ro ladu bzhin gshegs pa ba pa la zhes bya babyung ngo // de' snga ros du badzin gshegs pa padra'i zhing po nyis bya byung ngo // de 'om du de bzhin gshegs sa pa nga mdzud pa byang byu'o/ 
4b7(1): 'arje mdzin na na shesas pa kun tug gas pa bya byung/ de'i ci madri ca gshegs pa zangs 'dig pani tu 'byung // de sa di bdan gshegs pa rdo rjes chu ci bya byung // de rje dzin
4b8(1): shenas pa slo nas kya chu yo des cig ciganasag tu lda padang / brnam pa cigan sa u pa sa rgya ma sa ma rdzu pa de gag ma med pa
4b9(1): ma mi badran pa byang// gabang mopo mgrong byas ti sbyin bgung ba dang / cod pa bag cwa lnga bdang / gang ga sbyin mamanas tsha khro 'gyur dang / gang gi btsun pa ma masacas pa gyud
5a1(1): po bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshed med pa'o// rigs kyi bu snying rje chen po mi khongs su 'gro ba thams cad chud pas byang chub sems
5a2(1): dpa' ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu smon lam chen pos phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi zad zad du 'gro bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu byams pa chen pos 'gro ba thams cad rgyas par 'gengs
5a3(1): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o// / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas zhing thams cad du bskal pa thams cad yongs su sdud pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o// 
5a4(1): rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i lam las phyir mi ldog pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzungs kyi stobs kyis 'gro ba thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi
5a5(1): tshul khong du chud par byed pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu ye shes snang ba'i stobs kyis dus gsum gyi ye shes kyi tshul khong du chud par byed cing yang dag par 'dzin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni
5a6(1): tshad me pa'o// rig mngon pa shes par stongs rgyam ni mams cad du sems can rnams pas pa dang / mas padzes pa pa'in du nga bye ngas pa tsha ma rang byang byub pas/ byang chu ba shesas dpa' dam pan cing ba ba'o// 
5a7(1): rigs kyi bu tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i stobs kyis tshig gcig brjod kyang 'gro ba thams cad shin tu tshim par byed pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu lus rnam par dag pas
5a8(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rang gi lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o// nor bzangs kyis smras pa 'phags ma khyod ci srid cig na/ blan med pa yang dag par
5a9(1): sngon pa byang chu bdu mngon par rdzogs par mang ba gyur sa pa/ rogs kyi dis/ nas tsun pa darigs nga gdu ba smra dang na pa rgya gyi byang chub zhe sa dpa ma gyi sa kyang rdul
5a10(1): ma can rgya byoms/ mas can stong gi kyir mtshan sem na rgya phrag stong ga byor ma'o// sems kyi bye bya mayinaganam sa byed rgya bye yin/ 
5b1(1): bye ba stong gi phyir ma yin/ sems can bye ba brgya phrag stong gi phyir ma yin te/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi don du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sems can thams cad kyi phyir
5b2(1): ma yin/ sems can khrag khrig gi phyir ma yin/ sems can gang ya'i phyir ma yin sems can ban bun gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyar phyur gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can byang bying gi phyir ma yin/ 
5b3(1): sems can nyer 'jal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyal byol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can grol yol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ldang ljod kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can khyod zim gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can
5b4(1): phyad phyed kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ltam ltam gyi phyir ma yin// sems can ya gangs kyi phyir ma yin// sems can chos ma'i phyir ma yin/ sems can khram khrim gyi phyir ma yin// sems can nab
5b5(1): nub kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can brgyud yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can btang yas kyi phyir ma yinasems can bkra yar gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bsna yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems gzhal brtag
5b6(1): gi phyir ma yin sems can mtshungs med kyi phyir ma yin sems can lam lum gyi phyir mayinasems can rab rib kyi phyir ma yin sems can thab thib kyi phyir ma yin sems can 'grib yom gyi
5b7(1): phyir ma yin sems can thes 'byo'i byor ba min sems can bsas pyod kyi byor ma yin sems can 'dram nyam gyi phyir ma yin sems can drang brang gi phyir ma yin sems can bgrod las kyi phyir
5b8(1): ma yin/ sems can rgyal 'dal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bsnga yas kyi phyir ma yinasems can zang lag gi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'phro ba kye'i phyir ma yin/ sems can rtse 'phyo'i phyir ma yin/ 
5b9(1): sems can mong zin gyi phyir ma min sems can drug g.yos kyi phyir mayin sems ranas ngasal gyi phyir ma yin sems can thang yul gyi phyir ma yin sems can snang yal gyi phyir ma yin sems can
5b10(1): nan tha byor ma min sems can med 'byor phyir ma min sems can na neb tu phyir ma man sems can khrig thams kyi phyir sa yin sems can sal yal gyi phyir ma yin sems can bgrang
6a1(1): yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can thug yal gyi phyir ma yin sems can yang yud kyi phyir ma yin sems can po ldog gi phyir ma yin/ sems can brdams kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lhub
6a2(1): kabe'i phyir ma yin sems can thag thug gi phyir ma yin / sems can khrig pa'i phyir ma yin sems can rig ya'i kye phyir ma yin/ sems can skad med kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mchog 'phreng gi phyir ma yin
6a3(1): sems can zhag 'bru'i byor ma yin sems can spu 'phyes kyi phyir ma yin sems can 'bru 'brel gyi phyir ma yin sems can brjod pos kyi phyir ma yin sems can sdong yas kyi phyir ma yin sems can brjod bu gyi
6a4(1): phyir ma yin/ sems can zhi skad kyi phyir ma yin sems can dag zim kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'phyo 'gyur gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can nyar nyer gyi phyir ma yin sems can phyag phyig gi phyir ma yin/ sems can
6a5(1): zal thul gyi phyir me yin/ sems can sa la sul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can g.yo ldeg gi phyir ma yin/ sems can phan phun gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can brnang ya'i phyir ma yin/ sem can rem 'drol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rdzi nged kyi
6a6(1): phyir ma yin/ sems can rdzi rdul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phun yol gyi phyir ma yin// sems can 'ol 'ol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can dang dad kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang brtsi'i phyir ma yin te sems can zab
6a7(1): bgrang gi phyir ma yinasems can dga' rgyang gi phyir ma yin// sems can bgrangs mtha'i phyir ma yinasems can phyod yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'ol khyod kyi phyir ma sin sems can gdab yas kyi
6a8(1): phyir ma yin sems can bcal yas kyi phyir ma yin// sems can bgrangs yad kyi phyir mi yin/ sems can gyis du byo 'i phyir ma yin/ sems can yam mra'i phyi phyir ma yin/ sems can sbrul yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lngab ldeb kyi
6a9(1): phyir ma yin/ sems 'bar chad kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phan phung gi phyir ma yin/ sems can mtha' rdul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rgyud lding gi phyir ma yin/ sems can yun 'gyangs kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mkha' yal gyi phyir ma
6a10(1): yin/ sems can bun lob kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lam lom gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bsnyad yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lang ling gi phyir ma yin/ sems can lngab ldib kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mi brtsal gyi phyir ma
6b1(1): yind sems can 'byam las kyi phyir ma yin/ thams can nga 'grang gi phyir na yin// sems can spos yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bkra tshal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lo rgyas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'bum rdib kyi phyir ma yin/ sems
6b2(1): can le lo'i phyir ma yin/ sems can phya ma phyam gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang 'a phyos kyi phyiran ma yin/ sems can bgrang 'phyos las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can dpag yas las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can yal 'phyong gi
6b3(1): phyir ma yin/ sems can yal 'phyong las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can mu yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mu yal las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang yol gyi phyir ma yin/ semam can bgrang yol las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ 
6b4(1): sems can mi 'jal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mi 'jal las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bsam phyod kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bsam pyod las bslus pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can mtha' 'byam gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mtha
6b5(1): 'byam las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can dang gzag gi phyir ma yin/ sems can dngag thag las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod du med pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod du med pa las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod du med
6b6(1): ba'i yang brjod du med pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa rnams kyi phyir ma yin pa nas/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'jig
6b7(1): rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin
6b8(1): tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
6b9(1): rten gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin pa nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
6b10(1): su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du 'di lta ste/ yongasu smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin gyi/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa/ lhag ma med pa mtha' dag thams cad gtogs pa'i
7a1(1): @# sems can rnams kyi don du yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye'o// 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas gcig bsnyen bkur ba dang / mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim
7a2(1): ka/ gror bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems/ byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa dang / sangs rgyas bcu bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa nas/ brjod du med pa'i lo brjod du med
7a3(1): rdzog rgya gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i
7a4(1): sangs rgyas kyi rgyud bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gtogs pa'i// de bzhin gshegs
7a5(1): pa'i rgyud bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig yongs su dag par bya ba'i bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub
7a6(1): sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub
7a7(1): sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub skye ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi bstan pa yongs su gzungs pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas
7a8(1): kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phrad snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sangs
7a9(1): rgyas gcig rab tu zhugs pa'i smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa la 'jug pa'i phyir/ byang chub sem dpa' r-I kyi sem byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sang+yas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi/ 
7a10(1): sadus kyi rab tu zhugs pa'i smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sem dpa' nAM kyi sem byang chub tu skye ba ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gis ng+yas kyi zhing gi rgyan la 'jug par bya ba'i
7b1(1): phyir dbyang chub sems dpa' rnam kyi sems byang chub du skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sang+yas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdub shin du tha ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyun la 'jug par bya ba'i
7b2(1): phyir dbyang chub sems dpa' rnas kyi sems byang chub tu sdebs yin/ sang+yas kyi gcig gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par bye ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub se spang par du kyises byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ rgyas kyi zhing
7b3(1): brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi chos kyi 'khor
7b4(1): lo yongs su gzung ba'i phyirarabyang chub se bra dpar nI kyi ses byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su gzungs pa'i phyir/ 
7b5(1): byang chub sem dpa' d+h+r-i kyi sI byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ semA can gyi sapa rgya mtsho gcig khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sem dpa' NAM kyi sem byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du bad ba'i rdul
7b6(1): shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sem can gyi sem rgya mtsho khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' hUM kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sems can gcig gi dbang po'i 'khor lo yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sem dpa' dzA kyi
7b7(1): ses byang chub tu skye bab yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sem can gyi dbang po'i 'khor lo yongasu shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub se par rje kyis sa byang chu tu skye bar
7b8(1): yinan/ sem can gcig gi dbang po rgya mtsho khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' hUM kyi sem byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sang+yas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sem can gyi dbang po
7b9(1): rgyams pang du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sa spad par du gyises byang chub tu skye bas yin/ 'jig rten gyi khabs gcig gi bskal pa das gcig tu badrud pal 'bru bar bya ba phyi byang dub badrud pa byis byang chu byebs yin pa nas 'ang
7b10(1): kyi ning brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems
8a1(1): byang chub tu skye ba ma yin na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba la 'jug
8a2(1): ka par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangasang rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu
8a3(1): phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
8a4(1): rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug
8a5(1): par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu
8a6(1): phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
8a7(1): kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub
8a8(1): sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su
8a9(1): gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig
8a10(1): rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu
8b1(1): skyeb mdzin nas sangs rgyas kyi ning brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul sbyin du phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi
8b2(1): pa rgya mtsho thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu smra ba ma yin gyi sems can gyi khams ma lus pa/ lhag ma med pa
8b3(1): mtha' dgo thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye'o// sangs rgyas ma lus pa thams cad bsnyen
8b4(1): bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye'o// 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams
8b5(1): cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud bsnyen bkur zhing mnyeso par bya ba'i phyir/ mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
8b6(1): smon lam la mngon par mos pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa brtan
8b7(1): par 'byung ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ma lus pa thams cad yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba 'byung ba yin/ de bzhin
8b8(1): gshegs pa rab tu zhugs pa'i smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa ma lus pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi/ sems kyi shugs
8b9(1): drag po skye ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan ma lus pa thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
8b10(1): kyi yi dmo brtan pa skye ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho ma lus pa thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
9a1(1): rnams kyi mngon par mos pa 'byung ba yin/ 'gro ba'i sems rgya mtsho ma lus pa thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems
9a2(1): dpa' rnams kyi smon lam yongs su skye ba yin/ sems can gyi ba'i po'i 'khor lo ma lus pa thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par
9a3(1): 'dod pa skye ba yin/ sems can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho ma lus pa thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spro ba skye ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams
9a4(1): cad kyi bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa skye ba yin/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i
9a5(1): bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yongs su gcad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams brtson 'grus yongs su skye ba yin/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad
9a6(1): las dang nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho bskam pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes chen po'i kau ma 'char ba yin/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi spyod pa yod/ 
9a7(1): su shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi snang ba 'byung ba yinasems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi ma'i phung po rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i
9a8(1): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje'i sprin chen po kun nas 'du ba yin/ rigs kyi bu mdor na de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshul
9a9(1): dang ske grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu dgabyang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su bsgrub par bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'di lu ste/ byang chub
9a10(1): sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ni ye shes khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ni yongs
9b1(1): su dag par bya ba'i phyir zhing thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'o// rigs kyi bu de lta bas na khe mos ni bdag gi smon lam nam mkha'i dbyings rnam par dag pa'i
9b2(1): mtha' gang du thug pa de'i mthas klas par shog shig/ bdag gi smon lam 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa'i mtha' gang du thug pa de'i mtha' klas par shog shig
9b3(1): bdag gi smon lam sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba dang bgal la ba'i mtha' gang du thug
9b4(1): pa de'i mthas klas par shog shig ces de ltar smon lam btab bo// smras pa'aphags ma rnam par thar pa 'di'i ming ci'i zhes bgyi smras pa/ 
9b5(1): rigs kyi bu rnam par thar pa'ang ni nyon mongs pa med pa bde ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba ste/ rigs kyi bu kho mos kyangabyang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa de gcig
9b6(1): pu shes par zad na/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par 'dzin pa'i phyirasems rgya mtsho dang ldan pa lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa'i
9b7(1): byirari rab dang 'dra ba/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nang rab tu sos par byed pa'i phyir sman gyi rgyal po mthong na legs pa lta bu sems can thams cad kyi sa
9b8(1): rig pa'i mun pa sel ba'i phyiranyi mar gyur pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsum pa'i gnas su gyur pas/ sa lta bu'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi don
9b9(1): byed pa'i phyir/ rlung du gyur pa sems can thams cad la ye shes kyi snang ba 'byin pa'i phyir/ mar mer gyur pa/ zhi ba'i sgras sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi yachar yang dag pa
9b10(1): rje lta ba bzhin du/ 'bebs pa'i phyir sprin du gyur pa bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa'i phyir zla ba lta bu 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsrung ba la zhugs pa'i
10a1(1): phyir/ brgya byin lta bu de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa smos pa 'am/ byang
10a2(1): kachub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi rnam pa mtha' dang / dpung med pa yongs su bstan par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi rgya mtsho rnam par rlob pa 'di na/ yul chu
10a3(1): ba gtsang ma zhes bya ba yod de/ den drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la dris shig/ de rigs kyi bu te khyod la byang chub sems
10a4(1): dpa' spyod pa ston par 'gyur ro// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis// dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bros phyag 'tshal te/ dge bsnyen ma
10a5(1): yid bzhin la lan brgya stong du ma r+ra/ g.yas phyogs su bskor bu byas nas/ yang dang gang bltas te/ phyag 'tshal nas/ ngo mtshams gang bar dras te
10a6(1): byang chub mchog tu dkon pa/ rje su sems shing dge ba'i bshes gnyen rim gro byeb dkon par rjes su bsam pa dang / skyes bu dam pa dang 'phrad pa dkon pa
10a7(1): rjes su bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po thob par bya ba rjes su bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa dkon par rjes su bsam pa
10a8(1): dang / skal ba mnyam pa'i bshes gnyen dang 'phrad pa dkon par+ya rjes su bsam pa dang / byang chub du yang dag pa ji lta bu bzhin du mngon par mos shing sems nges par gzhog
10a9(1): pa dkon par rjes su bsam pa dang / mi mnyam pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul rjes su bstan pa'i sbyor ba dkon par rjes su bsam pa dang / sems dri ma med cing mi 'phrogs pa
10a10(1): sbyor ba yang dag par bsgrub pa dka' bar rjes su bsam pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du shugs drag po rnam par spyod pa'i chos kyi snang ba dkon par rjes su bsam pa byed cing / dge bsnyen me yid bzhin
10b1(1): gyi drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs// byang chub sems dpa'i gdams ngag gi rdza su song ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpadi spyod pa yongasu dag par bya 'di rjesu song ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems
10b2(1): dpa'i bsod nams kyi stobs rnams par 'phel bar bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas blta ba'i shugs drag pos rab tu snang bar byas pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos kyi gter 'thob par byal shugs drag po skyes pa'i sems dang ldan pa
10b3(1): sngon lam chen po mngon par bsgrub pa'i shugs drag po rab tu 'phel ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad kyi phyogs la mngon du lta ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rang bzhin gyi 'od kyis snang bar byas pa'i
10b4(1): sems dang ldan pa/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings la mun pa med par lta ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ rdo rje rin po che mthu
10b5(1): bo ches mi tshogs pa ltar dri ma med pa'i sems dang ldan pa bdud thams cad kyi dpung gis brgal bar dka' ni thub par
10b6(1): bka' ba'i sems dang ldan pa de/ mthar gyis yul chub gtsang ma ga la ba der phyin nas/ drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs tshol tshol ba las/ 
10b7(1): de'i tshe drung spong 'jigs mchog dbyangs/ dge ba sbyangs pa'i gnas shing dang shing phrin sna tshogs grangs med pa'i nags tshal mdangs dga' ba lo mas rgyas
10b8(1): pa'i shing gis kun nas 'grigs pa/ rtag tu me tog rgyas pa dang ldan pa'i shing sna tshogs can/ rtag tu shing tog mang po dang ldan pa'i shing tog gi shing dang ldan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs
11a1(1): kyin zung / dang bu na pa 'isapa me kyi ta dru gzhibs pa dang ldan pa/ da da dpa pa shi kun rnas pa bres pa/ nag su mi tshung ba'i ni pas so na tu byung ba thun pa/ 
11a2(1): bzhi nas shing ba tA la'i rnam par mdzes par skyes pas yongs su brgyand pa/ nya gro ta'i shing dbyibs yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ 'dzam bu'i shing las rtag tu shing tog sbyin pa 'phrul pa/ me tog gi 'tshal pad mo dang / ud pa la gsang tu skyes pas
11a3(1): rab tu brgyan pa zhig na 'dug 'dug ste/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis drang srong mjigs mchog dbyangs/ drang srong stong phrag bcus bskord cing / tsan dan gyi yal gshin tu 'bralang pa'i bya skyibs shig na nor tshugs kyi brjod
11a4(1): pan can/ pags pa dang cha'i gos gyon pa shing shun gyi smad yogs can rtswa'i stan la 'dug pa mthong// mthong nas kyang dra srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ yang dag pa'i
11a5(1): dge pa'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa'i bsam pas/ dge ba'i phashes gnyen ni yang dag pa'i lam ston/ pas/ thams cad mkhyen da pa nyid 'byung ba'i sgo yin par yang dag par lta/ thams cad mkhyen
11a6(1): pa'i sa la gzhog pas thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ni dge ba'i bshes nyenani gdams ngag la rag lus par yang dag par lta/ stobs bcu 'i ye shes rin po che'i gling du skyel bas/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ni/ 
11a7(1): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi sgron mas snang bar bya ba yin par yang dag par lta/ nyam nyes myed par thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi grong du phyin par byed pas/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid las ni dge ba'i bshes nyan yin par yang dag
11a8(1): par lta/ mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa yongs su bstond pas thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi mar me ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta/ g.yangs sa'i 'jigs pa thams cad myed par byed pas thams cad mkhyen/ 
11a9(1): pa nyid kyi sngags ni dge ba'i bzhes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta/ byams pi chen po'i stobs kyis sim pa yongs su skyed pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi gdugs ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag
11a10(1): lta/ snying rje chen po yongs su bskyed pas thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi shugs drag po// ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta zhing / chos kyi rang bzhin gyi tshul rab tu snang bar byed pas thams cad
11b1(1): mkhyend pa 'di la gas la pad mthong ba ni dge ba'i bzhes gnyen la rag las par mthong nas lus thams kyis phab ste phyag byas nas langs te/ drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyi/ lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas nas
11b2(1): mdud tu 'dugs ste/ rdul mo sbyar nas/ yid du 'ong ba'i tshul gyis yid du 'ong ba'i tshig brjod de 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sem/ 
11b3(1): bskyed na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i pyod pa la bslab par dgye ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag rjes su bstand pa mdzad do zhes
11b4(1): thos nas/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i baspyod pa la ji ltar slob par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol// de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog
11b5(1): dbyangs kyis bram ze'i byis pa stong phrag bcu po de dag la ltos te 'di skad ces smras so// byis pa dag rigs kyis bu 'dis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems snyed do// 
11b6(1): sems can thams cad 'jigs pa la 'gror du gnyer ro// rigs/  kyi bu 'di ni sems can thams cid la phan pa dang bskyed pa/ 'i don tu sta gon du gnas pa ste/ ye shes rgya mtsho la mngon du gyur
11b7(1): pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa tham sa cad kyi chos kyi sprin gyichar btud pa 'dod pa'o// / chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par 'dod pa'o// ye shes kyi snang ba chen po gnas
11b8(1): par 'dod pa'o// snying rje chen po'i sprin bsdu bar 'dod pa'o// chos kyi char chen po mngon par dbab para'adod pa'o// ye shes chen po'i zla ba 'jig rten du shar bar byas ste/ nyon mongs pa'i gdung
11b9(1): pa thams cad rab tu gzhil par 'dod pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i za ba rnam pa 'brel par 'dod pa'o// de nas bram ze'i byis pa stong phrag bcu po de dag gis/ me tog dri zhim pa
11b10(1): bing du 'ong zhing / kha dog snga tshogs dang ldan pa mang pos tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la gtong to/ mngon par gtor to// rab tu gtor to// mngon par phyag 'tshal te// de ltar btud de phyag
12a1(1): bcam sa 'byags su 'o byas te/ zhig 'did kyi dzad // 'di ni sems can thams can yongs su skyob par 'gyur ro// sems can dmyas pa'i drus sgrub thams ca rab tun
12a2(1): bur 'byin par 'gyur ro// byas song gi sde gnas kyi las kyi rgyud bams cad rnam par gcod par 'gyur ro// gshin rje'i 'jig rted kyilas kyi rgyud thams can nam par thog par gyung / skyen ba pa'i tho thams
12a3(1): gcod par 'gyur ro// sred pa'i rgya mtsho yongs su skems par 'gyur ro// sred pa'i 'ching pa gcod par 'gyur ro// sdug sngal gyi phung po rnam par zlog par 'gyur ro/ ma rig pa'i mun pa selang par 'gyur ro// bsod nams
12a4(1): 'khor yug gis 'jig rten yongs su stong par 'gyur ro// ye shes rin po che'i 'byung gnas yongs su bstod par 'gyur ro// ye shes kyi nyis ldan par bgyid par 'byed ro / chos kyi dbyig rnam par srung
12a5(1): bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten rnams la mnyam pa dang phyi mnyam pa'i yang dag par stonod par 'gyur ro// de nas la yang ni ga'ad pa brgya lon//  ba snyam/ sa la ska lang 'i myo lon pa snyam/ kha 'ang ni ga'ad
12a6(1): pa brgya zag stong lon pa snyam/ la lang ni ska lad pa bye ba lon pa nyam la lar ni bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya lon pa snyam/  sa lang ni ga ya pa bye ba phrag stong pon pasnyam/ la sa bzhin
12a7(1): pa bye rgya phrag stong lon pa snyam/ la la di ska lad pa bye khrag khrig brgya stong lon pa snyam byed pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zhabs kyi drung du ni skal pa brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed pa snyed lon par gyur pa snya byedade
12a8(1): de bzhin gshegs pa la kha'i zhabs kyi drung du ni skald pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rtul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lon pa snyam byed pa nas/ skald pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lon pa snyam byed par gyur / 
12a9(1): de nas drang srong 'jig mchog dbyangs kyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu nod bzangs btang ba dang / des yang bdag drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyi mdun na 'dug pa shes par gyurard to// de la drang srong 'jigs mchog
12a10(1): dbyangs kyis smras pa rigs kyi bu dran mong/ smras pa 'phags pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi byin kyis rlabs kyis dran no// smras pa rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par tha dad pa gzhan
12b1(1): rgyas kyi ma pa'i rgyas gas pa / byang chub sems pa' 'tshal sa na pa shes pa napa
12b2(1): gan sa rgyas kyi sangan dang rtse shes bdon pa sgrub pa la salas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa byung ba'i nyim lanas pa dmyigs pa'i can ra tu god pa/ chus gsus kyi yum na
12b3(1): gi ye shes su yang dag pang baspyad pa/ 'ji rten gyi khams thams can tu lus shin tu nam pa byas pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams can sa ye shes snang ba'i nga bzhin du rnan pa/ sems can thas/ 
12b4(1): cad kyi bsam pa dz+ri lta ba bzhin du mngod gsum su mngon par langs pa// sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du myod pas rnam par dpyad pa dang / thun pa'i tshul ldan pa/ 
12b5(1): bzhin du kun tu snang zhing dris myed la 'od dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi/ dkyil 'khor nam par dag pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa 'am/ smon lam kyi
12b6(1): khyad par grol pa 'am/ zhing gi mngon par 'du bya ba shes pa 'amalegs kyi yul la 'jug par bya ba 'am / ti 'dzid kyi pyod yul kyi rjes su 'khrang bar bya ba 'am
12b7(1): du 'phrul da pa 'phru ba yA su bskya da/ dad pa'i ga bcu lung bdang/  la
12b8(1): ma brgyad par bya ba 'ang/ dbyings kyi dkyis 'khor napa pa da pa brjod pa 'ang/ segs kyi snang ba rab tu bstad pa nus me rgan/ mang dgas kyi bu sa phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ sul
12b9(1): stsatshol ba zhes bya ba yod de/ den zab pa rgyal babyod kyi med byer bya ba jug gis/  ga rdzo 'dzi 'ang byang chub se pas rgya sems dpa'i sgyu sa byu / 
12b10(1): ji ltar nan tan tu bya ba dris shig/ de nas yod dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dgal rangs te mgu zhing nyams bdel la chib zhing yid bde' bskyes nas/ drang srong 'jigs mtshon dbyings kyi rkang pa
13a1(1): 'phags pa sangs rgyas pas po zhes bya ba/ shin tu brgyas pa'i mdo'o// / bam po gnyis pa'o// // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor pa zangs/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par tha dad pa'i gzhan gyis
13a2(1): byi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi ye shes kyis snang bar byas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa la mngon sum du 'apyod par spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par tha dad pa bsam
13a3(1): gyis kyi khyab pa mngon gsum gyi ye shes kyis mngon par shes pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzind bsam kyis kyi khyab pa'i ye shes kyis sems snang bar gyur da pa/ dus thams cad du yang dag par 'jug
13a4(1): pa'i ti nge 'dzin kyi ye zhes sdang bar rab tu thob pa/ 'du shesag kyi rnam bya thams cad la yang dag par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyi yul gyis snang bar gyur pa/ 'gro ba thams cad la
13a5(1): khyad par 'phags pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes sna ba thob pa thamad kyi rjes su song ba'i khyod yul la rnam par khyod pa mngon du byu pa gnyis su rgas par rtog pa byed pas mnyam
13a6(1): nyid du su nad pa'i ye shes sur len pa/ dbyigs pa thams cad la rab tu 'dal pa'i ye shes snang ba dang ldan pa/ mnyam pa thams cad la mngon du gyung da pa'i bzod pa rnam par dag pa pa mos kI
13a7(1): mdzad la mkhas pa rang bzhin gyi chos la bzod pa khong du rung ba'i ye shes mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rang bzhin sgom pa dang myi bral ba'i sems dang
13a8(1): ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi thugs drag po las phyir myi ldog pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ stobs bcu'i ye shes snang ba'i 'od rab tu thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings marjod pa la mngon par mos
13a9(1): pas ngoms par myed pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la rnam par pyod pa'i pyod yul la 'dug pa'i khong du chud pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyan mtha'
13b1(1): sras pa la yang dag pa rgyu dang / 'di/  rten gyi lams kyad nas pa me pa sa yas pa mang dag pa lta pa dang/ 'dig rten gyi khams nas par bye sa shA chogs sa tha kham pa sa da pa pa/ 
13b2(1): 'jig rten gyi khams rnas par bye ba'i rna tshogs mtha' yas pa la yang dag par lta ba dang / yang 'jig rten gyi khams mtha'ags pa dmyigs pa phri ba dang / yangs pa'i khongs su chud par bya ba dang sang dag par lta ba dang / 
13b3(1): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gzhi mapa' yas pa'i phying gi dra ba sna tshogs yang dag pa lta pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su rnas par myong nga ba nam par gdags pa sa'ang yas pa'i kun rdzob nam pa la dad pa la yang / 
13b4(1): dag par lta ba dang / sems can gyi mos pa sna tshogs mtha'/ yas pa yang dag par lta ba dang / sems can gyi nam pangabye ba'i nye ba sa dad pa mtha' yas pa la yang dag par lta ba dang / sem
13b5(1): can mtha' yas pa yongs su smyind par bya ba dang / 'dul pa kho da du chud par bya ba la yang dag par lta ga dang / sems can dang phyogs dang dus mtha' yas pa'i bying gi rnam par sna tshogs pa yang dag pang lta ba dang / 
13b6(1): dge ba'i bshes gnyen mngon tu bya ba myed cing mthar kyis yul tshol ba dang ldan pa gang na ba dang / bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched gang la ba der phyin to// de'i tshe bras ze rgyal la'i drod kyi skye mched thams cad mkhyen
13b7(1): pa nyid sgrub pa'i gzhir byas shing dka' thub drag po la myod de/ de'i phyogs bzhi'i nas mye'i phung po ri tsam du che ba bus pa dang / ri shi nad tu mthob pa'i g.yangs sa'i lam gyi rgyud spu kri'i so so bshibs pas 'khod par
13b8(1): snang ngo // / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ bras ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi rkang pa gnyis la ba spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mdun tu 'dug nas/ phal so sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so// 
14a1(1): 'phags pa bdag gis bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la khyad pa dang / ji lta na tan du bgyis ma 'chas te
14a2(1): pags pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnams la gdams dag dang / rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ya/ bslab pad gyi ba dang / ji lta nan tan gyi bgyis
14a3(1): ba bshad du gsol// des smras pa rigs kyi bu song la spu gri'i so dadang pa'i ri 'di la 'dzegs te me'i 'obs 'dir mchongs shig dang nya/ des khyod kyi byang chub sems dpa'i pyod pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ro zhes thos nas/ tshong dpon gyi
14a4(1): bu nor bzangs 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ myi khom brgyad las rnam par ldog pa yang shin tu dkon/ myir gyur te khom pa phun sum tshogs shing / rnam par dag pa yang shin tu dkon/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba
14a5(1): yang shind tu dkon/ dbang po nyams pa myed pa yang shi na tu dkon/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thos pa yang shi nad tu dkon skyes bu dam padang phrad pa yang shin tu dkon/ yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen yang
14a6(1): shin tu shod/ yang dag pa'i chu rjes bu pas legs pa mas pa shin kya god/ yadag par 'tho bya la nga shin tu bya dod/ phyi'i 'ag rte so das nyen ma ma ba dad da byed pa
14a7(1): shi nang tu dkon/ de skad zer zhing bdag gi dge ba'i bar chad la zhugs la/ de ltar bdag gi srog gcad par brtson pa 'di/ bdud dam cig ma yin nam/ bdud kyis byin gyis rlabs pa'im bdud kyi ris su rtogs pa 'am
14a8(1): dge ba'i bshes gnyen lngang rdzus pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' la myi gcags pa byed pa zhig ma yin grang / de bdag gi thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la gegs byed par 'dod pa zhig ma yin grang / bdag las gol ba napa
14a9(1): zhugs par 'dod pa zhig ma yin grang / bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos khong du chud par bya ba'i chos kyi sgo la gegs byed pa zhig ma yin dgrang snyam nas/ de de skar sems shing yid la byed pa'i che/ tshang sa pa stong phrag bcu
14a10(1): steng gi bar snang la gnas te/ 'di skad ces zer to// rigs kyi bu de lta bu'i rang sems myi brtan par ma byed cig/ rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzin rdo rje 'od ze'i snang ba rab tu thob pa ste/ brtson grus
14b1(1): ldog pa byed pa'o// brtsams pa chen po mthar 'byung ba la zhugs pa'o// 'gro ba thams cad kyi sred pa'i rlan bskam pa la mngon par brtson pa'o// lta ba'i rnam pa dang dra ba thams cad gtub pa la mngon par brtson pa'o// 
14b2(1): nyon mongs pa'i lcag lcig thams cad zad par skrag pa la sta gon tu gnas pa'o// myi khom phyi shes pa'i bas mtha'i dgon pa thams cad snang bar bya ba la brtson pa'o// sems can kye thams cad kyi rga shi'i g.yangs dang / 'jigs
14b3(1): pa rnam par zlog pa la yin dam brtan pa'o// dus gsu kyi mun pa gas lad pa la mngon par brtson pa'o// chos thams cad kyi 'od ser dge po kha bzhugs pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gtung ba
14b4(1): mdzad pa'i tshe/ tshangs pa ci snyed cig mkhan po dang dbang ba spyar pa dang / 'jig rten gyi thams cad kyi gtso bor rang rang rlom zhing sems pa lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par zhen pa de dag thams cad 'phags pa 'di dka' thub
14b5(1): dang / brtul zhugs kyi thugs dam gyi mthus rang rang gi gnas na bag dga' ba myed cing / de dag bsam rten gyi ro rga ba myong ba myed pas 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dod do// de dag phyin pa dang / 
14b6(1): 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi byin dang drag shul gyi dka' thub dang / brtul shugs kyis zil kyis mnan te/ lta ba'i rnamapa thams cad rnam par zlog pa dang / nga rgyal dang rlom sems thams
14b7(1): cad rab tu spang ba'i phyir chos ston to// 'gro ba thams cad la byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen pos khyab par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi bsam pa brtan par bya ba dang / byang chub tu sems sbyad
14b8(1): pa shi nad tu yangs par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad par dag par lta ba la mngon par brtson par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor thob par bya ba yongs su rdzogs par bya dang / thams cad
14b9(1): grags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dbyings la thogs pa myed cing bsgribs pa myed cing bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// bdud stong phrag bcu yang steng gi bar snang la khod nas/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu mi/ na pa che mngon pa sa gtor te
14b10(1): 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe// 'od phro ba'i phung po 'di las snang ba chen po 'byung zhing kho bo cag gi khyi ma dang / lus rgyan gyi longs spyod thams
15a1(1): cad ni lad kyis nond to// de'i phyir kho bo cag kyang so so'i gnas gnas na// bag dga' ba skyed pas 'khong dang bcas te 'phags pa'i drung du 'dong ngo // kho bo cag 'di'i drung du byin nas kyang / 'phags 'di'i
15a2(1): kho bo cag la ci nas kyang / rang rang gi sems sor chud nas/ byang chub tu sems skyed de/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos ston to// 8/ dbang spyad gyi lha'i rgyal po stong phrag bcus/ 
15a3(1): kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog gis mngon par gtor te 'di skad ces 'dzerd to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba byed pa'i tshe kho bo cag kyang rang rang gi gnas gnas na dga' ba myed de/ de ltar bdag cag kyang
15a4(1): rang rang gi skye bo'i 'khor dang bcas te/ de'i drung du 'dong ngo // bdag da cag gi drung du phyin pa dang / 'di ni bdag cag la rang rang gi sems la dbang sgyur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// nyon mongs
15a5(1): pa thams cad la dbang spyad ba thob par bya dang / bsam pa ji bzhin du skyeb la dbang spyar ba thob par bya ba dang // las kyi sgrib pa/ thams cad rnam par dag pa'i dbang rab tu thob par bya ba dang / las kyi
15a6(1): ma ga pa dasalas tu tho bang bang/ par 'phrul sanas dang lta sa thob par bya / byad ba pa'i byin mos su ga par bya ba dang / 
15a7(1): bzhid byertse pa dang byung ba thos mang bya ba'i phyi tsho thong // ras sa dga'i bu'i dbang ni rgyam tho song phrag bcu ying steng gi bar ldang ga 'dod de/ rdzas kyi bu yang dag par srung ba'i nga nyan pa'i dbyangs brnags sems
15a8(1): pa dang na shin tu yar 'gyu ro// rgyad zhid dang / 'i bu po 'di ga byang nam mang dan cidags lad la 'od shi tu dang par gyu'o// debs na bdag cag kyang ba'i bu dang // 'i dum tshogs kyi pa dang cam pamang
15a9(1): bdag na mthod pa med de/ sa pa bde bsas na pa gan ga byed pas susang/ mem ga mis 'ar rgya mas/ 'phags pa 'di'i nga du 'a ba nyid te/ blabags pa don padag ga de sar byin parnams sa semasas
15b1(1): ba sa kya bston to// sems kyi mang bya ba dang / sem shin tudag par byab dang / sems pas su par bya ba dang / sems kyi / la gos su babyed pa / thos pa chen
15b2(1): rnam par dag par bya ba dang / chos kyi thugs chen po rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku tshad byed pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir lus rnam par dag par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung thob par bya ba'i phyir ngag
15b3(1): nas par dag par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyend pa nyid rab tu thob par bya bar sems rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// rag dga' ldan gyi lha'i rgyal po stong phrag bcu'i lha'i bu dang / lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas/ 
15b4(1): bdag kyang sted kyi bar sngang 'khod nas spos sna tshogs kyi bye ba'i sprin gyi char mngon par khab pas mdzad pa byas te/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces 'dzid to// rigs kyi bu labags pa 'dzid pa 'grub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdza
15b5(1): pa'i tshe/ bdag cag kyang rang rang gi gnas na dga' ba myed de/ de ltar dga' ba myed pas 'di'i drung du 'dong ste/ bdag cag phyin pa rnams la/ 'phags pa 'di ni yul thams cad la ltos pa myed par bya ba'i phyir
15b6(1): chos stond to// mchog shes pa'i sems su bya ba dang / dge ba'irtsas pa yang dag par skyed pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed/ pa rab tu thob par bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su
15b7(1): rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// rab che ba'i ka'i rgyal po so phrag bcu lnga'i bu dang / sna'i bu la'i tshogs kyi 'khodan dang ba se ba dag gis kyang bla rdzas me tog man dAng ba'i can gyis mngon par lab ste
15b8(1): skad ces 'dzin to// rigs kyi su 'phags pa 'di dka thub sas yongs sun chu ba mnas na/ bdag cas kyang klas rjes kyi sku ldan lal dga' ba byed de/ des ga ba myed pas lags pa de'i rgyu tu 'do / 
15b9(1): bdage cig kyi mas sapa pa 'di don pa'i dag sa mas yan ba nog pa bya bdang /  rgyas kyi rnams ba tuzab par bya ba mo ma byed pa// rji na sa tu byed kyi ma 'tshu chos
15b10(1): nye ba'i dbang po sum bcu pa gnyis dang / lnga'i bu dang / sna'i bu mo'i tshogs kyi 'khod dang bcas pas spardzas kyi gos dang / rin po che'i rgyad dang / me tog gi srin gyi ma mngon par 'phab ste/ 'di skad ces 'dzid to// rim
16a1(1): zhi lus dang pos su rgyas sas tu rgyun gyi 'as / ye shes la sa mas kya
16a2(1): sna 'i bya can to// ga kham pa dasal ma ni te phyi gan sa par 'gyur macananand// dregs pa thas byed pa gal me pos sngam gas tha
16a3(1): byang chung du slob badren pa'i byed ldan to// rigs kyi bu gzhanasagang 'di mas partsas gyis ni rab kyi rtse mo thams cad kyang gso pa gyud te/ des bdag cag gzigs pa sa sems slo ba gabyar nas/ 
16a4(1): rnaman pa byed pa'i sems san phas la sa langs gyes pa'i shes su smon lam ma na 'a sgrub bo// bu'i rtsel ba sa na dang / dag po / na pa/ ngos gyogs brab tu
16a5(1): bar lab ste/ 'di skad ces 'dzed to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ phye'i phung po chen po 'di las 'od chen po 'byung ste/ des klu'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas nas/ 
16a6(1): bye ma'i chang dang / nam mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa yongs su se lad to// khro ba 'byung ba yang zhi bar byas te/ lus sim byas nas yid shi nad tu mos par byed do// de ltar sems shin tu mos par gyur nas/ 'phags pa
16a7(1): 'di ni bdag cag la chos stond to// 'di ltar klu'i lam gyi brgyad ngan pa rnam par smad pa dang / sgrib pa'i lus thams cad rab tu spang ba'i phyir nyes pa chags su btsud cing bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
16a8(1): sems skyed du btsud de/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la rab tu 'god do// gnod sbyin gyi bdag po stong phrag bcu' namakha'i dbyings la khod do// mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched dang / 
16b1(1): tshong dpon gyi rlong pa'adas la mchon pa byas nas 'di skad ces 'jed to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba ma dad pa'i de/ kho n+do cag gi 'khod kun cing phyirnams sa byams pa'i sems skye ba du du
16b2(1): gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang / yul 'bum thams cad kyang byams pa'i sems dang ldan pan 'gyur ro// de dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan ning rtse babyed pa sa zhugs pa'i sems kho bo cag gi rlung tu rjo / gakho bo cag kyang ngos
16b3(1): byams pa'i dbang gis zil kyis non pas rang rang gi gnas de dang de dag na dga' ba myed de/ de ltar bdag cag kyang rang rang gi skye bo'i 'khor dang bcas te 'phags pa 'di'i nang du 'dong ngo // 'phags pa bdag cag de ltar 'ongs
16b4(1): rnams la/ 'phags pa 'di'i sku nyes byung ba'i 'od kyis lus thams cad snang bar byas shing bda' bas khyab par mdzad de/ de ltar bdag cag lus dang sems bde bar gyur nas/ 'phags pa 'di ni ci nas kyang bdag cag la gnod/ 
16b5(1): sprin dang / srin po dang / grul bum dang / lus srul po mang po byangachub tu sems skye bar 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston to// dri za'i dbang po stong phrag bcu dag kyang steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas 'di
16b6(1): ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu kho bo cag kyang rang rang gi gnas mkhod/ pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung na/ mdzad pa'i me'i phung po 'di las 'od byung ste/ bdag cag gi gnas snang bar
16b7(1): 'gyur ro// de ltar bdag khyod des phog ste bde' ba bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang ldan par gyurd pas 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ste/ bdag cag drung du phyin nas kyang 'phags pa 'di ni bdag cag ci nas kyang
16b8(1): bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par 'byung la de ltar chos ston to// / lA ma yin gyi dbang po stong phrag bcu dag kyang rgya mtsho'i nang nas mngon par thon te nam mkhal la lus mo g.yas pa'i lda
16b9(1): ra btsugs te/ bral po spyang nas phyag 'jal zhing 'di skad ces len to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dag shub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad de/ ma go cag gi rna ma yin gyi 'jig rten mya tsho da nga bas pa'i sachen po'i dkyil mgang
16b10(1): rab tu g.yo' bar gyur te/ bdag cag kun gyi nga rgyal dang / rlom sems dang / dregs pa thams cad rtul shugs dang / dka' thub kyi zil dkyis non te/ 'phags pa'i drung du 'dong ngo // der byin nas kyang / 'phags
17a1(1): ba 'di ni bdag cag la mo smra thams cad rab tu spang ba dang / chos zab mo'i mdod pa la gzung ba dang / myi gsor ba'i chos nyid la rab tu 'god pa dang / stobs bcu'i ye shes yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir/ 
17a2(1): chos ston to// nam mkha' lding gi dbang po shugs chen po 'dzin pa la sosogs pa nam mkha'i gyi dbang po stong phrag bcus kyang bram ze'i bu shin tu gsug gu'i gzugs su mngon par sprul te 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di
17a3(1): dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ mye'i phung po chen po 'di dag las 'od chen po 'byung ste/ bdag cag gi gnas snang bar byas nas yongs su g.yo' byed do// des bdag cag kyang 'jigs shing skag se skyo pa'i yid dang
17a4(1): ldan par gyur nas/ 'phags pa 'di yang bdag cag la chos stond cing byams pa'i chen po la yang dag par spyod par mdzad do// snying rje chen po yangadag par 'god par mdzad do// 'khod pa'i rgya mtsho'i 'jug pa la'ang yang
17a5(1): dag par spyod pa mdzad do// 'dod pa'i 'das tu bying ba'i sems canamangon par gdon par bya ba la yang yongs su spyod pa mdzad do// // skrag pa'i bsam pa'i sgo rnam par dag pa'i bya ba yang rab tu spyod pa mdzad do// 
17a6(1): shes rab dang thabs shi nad tu gsal ba la yang dag par spyod mdzad do// rnam pa ji lta bar yongs su sbyin pa'i sems can rnams 'dul par bya ba la'ang rab tu sbyor ba mdzad do// myi 'am ci'i dbang po stong phrag bcwa
17a7(1): yang steng gi bar snang la khod de 'di skad ces ze dad to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdu pa mdzad pa'i tshe/ kho bo cag gi gnas na 'khod pa'i shing ta la'i phreng ba las dril bu'i dra ba rin po me'i srad
17a8(1): bus lnga lding rgyas pa'i si snyan dang / rol po'i yoyo byad dang rin po che'i rgyan dang / khyim gyi longs bapyod gams cas las sangs rgyas kyi sgra 'byung ngo // chos kyi sgra dang / phyir phyi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge' btsun gyi
17a9(1): swA dang / byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa'i smon lam gyi sku 'byung ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams kyigrangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni byang chub sems dpa'i phying dang 'di zhes bya zhig byang chub tu smon lam 'debs so// 
17a10(1): 'di rkyen gyis mams ci nas su na le che ge po zhig na ni byang dub sebs da pa'i phying dadu 'di zhes bya ba ga dag ga yongs su gto 'a byed do// 'di rnyed kyi khams kyi thangs su bya'i tshig mo gage da'i bya dum
17b1(1): zhig snying po byang chub tu 'gro'o// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni byang chub seMs dang dpa' phying dang 'di zhes bya ba zhig dpung dang gnon par brnyas pa'i bdud rab tu phas par byas ste/ bran byed pa yang dag par
17b2(1): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan dang 'di zhes bya ba zhig chos kyi 'khor lo bskor pa mdzad do// 'jig rten gyi khams su grangs su
17b3(1): bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan dang che ge mo zhig sangs rgyas kyi phrin las ma lus par mdzad nas/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mdzad do zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byind te
17b4(1): rigs kyi bu 'dzam bu'i gling gi tha dang / shing dang / yal ga dang / de lo ma dang / 'dag pa thams cad rdul shin tu pra ba'i chang blags da pa'i mu thug pa ni rung yang srid kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan dang
17b5(1): byang chub sems dpa' dmas kyi smod lam dang / byang chub sems dpa'i phyi la la 'jug pa'i khyad par gang kho bo cag gi gdag sa yod pade gling rta'i phreng ba las so mar po byed dang / rin po tsho'i rgyan dang / khyis kyi
17b6(1): longs spyod drung gis bskyod pa'i sgra 'byung ring ngong / 'byin pa dang / nalam tu grag pa'i mtha' ni thug par gyi rlungango // de ltar bdag cag kya sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / dbyang chub sems dpa'
17b7(1): rab tu 'jug pa'i smon lam dang / pyod pa dang mtshan gyi chu klung gi sgras dga' ba chen po'i shugs drag pos nyams bde' ba skyes te/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo // de ltar bdag cag phyin par gyur nas kyang 'phags pa 'di ni/ bdag
17b8(1): bcag la ci nas kyang kho bo cag gi 'khor kyi sems can tu ma zhig bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir gyi la ldog par 'gyur ba de lta bur chos stond pa mdzad do// 'dod pa la spyod pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag dpag tu
17b9(1): byed pa kha dog shi nang tu mdzes pa dag kyi nam mkha' la khod cing yid kyis skul pa'i mchod pas mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces ze dad to// 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ kye'i phung
18a1(1): po 'di dag las/ rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'od byung ste/ 'od des maran mnar myed pa yan chad du/ sems can dmyal ba rnams snang bar byas nas/ sems can dmyal pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sdug sngal rtse zild
18a2(1): par byas te/ 'od de nyid kyis 'phags pa 'di bdag cag gi dbyig lam du snang bar bstand pas/ de'i phyir kho bo cag kyang 'phags pa 'di la sems mos par gyur nas/ 'dod pa la pyod pa'i sgra'i'adis nyams su bde dang
18a3(1): skyes so// de ltar bdag cag kyang 'phags pa 'dis mdzad pa la drin du bzo zhing mthong bas myi ngoms pas/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad yongs su spangs te/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dod do// der bdag cag phyin nas
18a4(1): kyang 'phags pa 'di ni ci nas kyang sems can tshad myed pa rnams byang chub tu smon lam 'debs par 'gyur ba de ltar chos stond pa mdzad do// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ chos kyi tshul rnam pa 'di lta bu thob nas
18a5(1): dga' rangs te mgu' zhing nyams bdel la tshim zhing yid bde' ba skyes te// bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched la yang dag pa'i gshes gnyen du 'du shes skyed de/ bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi
18a6(1): bos phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa de ltar bdag gis dge' pa'i bshes gnyen gyi bka' dang 'gal par bgyis pa'i nongs pa la nongs par bshags so// de nas bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi
18a7(1): skye mched kyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig rjes su bstand dang 'thun byed cing / dran pa nye bar bzhag ste bla ma'i ngag gcog myi byed na/ 
18a8(1): de phyir de'i don rnams thams cad mthun par grub par 'gyur// mthun pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes byang chub drung du 'tshang yang rgya/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis ri'i g.yang sa'i lam spu gri'i sos gshibs pa la 'dzegs
18a9(1): ste me'i phung po chen po dang mchongs so// de de ltar mchongs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba thob par gyur to// bye nges reg nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzidad pa du zhi ba'i bder bar gshes
18a10(1): ba zhes bya ba thob par gyur nas de skad ces smras so// 'phags pa mye'i phung po la de ltar reg na bde' ba dang / ra'i lam spu kris btams pa 'di yang 'di ltar reg na bde ba de ni ro mtshar che'o// des smras pa rigs kyi bu kho bo ni
18b1(1): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par tha rad pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su myi zad pa thob ste/ rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par tha dad pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su myi zad pa 'di shes par zadan/  kho zos byang chub
18b2(1): sems dpa' byed pa'i phung po lta bu 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / lha ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa yongs su 'ang bar bya ba'i smon lam can/ chu mtshan gyir gyi ldog pa dang ldan pa/ sems sa thub pa myed cing / sebs/ 
18b3(1): dpa' ba myed pa dang ldan pa/ yid zhum pa myed pa can/ rdo rje'i snying po dang ldan pa'i mthu'o che lta bu bathams pa/ chen po mthar phyind par bya ba la sgyid yug pa byed pa/ sbyor ba lhod pa myed pa/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor lta bu 'gro ba thos
18b4(1): cad kyi don du brtson pa/ brtson grus phyir gyi ldog pa dang ldan pa/ pyid myi ldog pa'i go tsho gos pa de dag gi pyod pa zhes pa 'am/ yon/ tan brjod par nus rerga na// song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi brgyud
18b5(1): 'di nyid na grong khyer seng ge rnam par dbyings pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na rgyal po seng ge'i dpal gyi bu mo byams ma zhes bya ba/ bu mo lnga bcu'i 'khor dang 'dug gis/ de'i gan du songs
18b6(1): ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slab par bya ba dang ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi rkang pa gnyis la
18b7(1): spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched dang / lan rgya stong tu mang g.yes phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang ltas te/ bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon/ 
18b8(1): gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim 'gro bsam gyis kyi khyab pa la zhugs pa/ mos pa rgya chen pos rnam par dag pa/ theg pa chen po la mngon tu phyogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mngon par mos
18b9(1): pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la yang dag par zhugs pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang ba spro ba chos kyi rim 'gro la rnam par spyod pa/ chags pa myed pa'i ye shes la mngon tu gyur pa/ yang dag pa'i mahA/ 
18b10(1): shind du rtogs pa/ ye shes kyi mthul la gnas pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ tus gsum skad cig gi cha shas la khong du chud par byed pa/ nam mkha'i mtha' gnyis su myed pa mngon tu gyu rad pa/ myi gnyis pa'i mtha' rnam par gdon
19a1(1): khyi ma par chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' pa rnam par myi rtog par gnas pa/ bsgribs paskyed pa'i mang gtul la/ 'od rlud pa bya ba la zhugs pa/ ros kyims da kyi gal par byas pa gzhos pa/ 
19a2(1): de bzhi gshegs pa'i mtha' lam par byed par 'od du drud pa/ sangs rgyas mams cad kyis par la nam par gyi rtog par gnas pa/ sems can pams cad kyi 'du shes kyi drab nam par gtong ba'i seshes pa gnos bzhidang pa mdod pa gas pa/ 
19a3(1): thams cad dang bral ba sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la chags pa myed pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba la gnas pa myed par myod pa/ sems can thams cad la bdag myed pa dang
19a4(1): sems can byed pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ sgra thams cad cig gi lam lta bur khong du chud pa/ gzugs thams cad gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan mnyam par rnam par rig par bya ba la gzhol ba de ma thad kyis seng ge rnam par dbyings pa'i grong khyer
19a5(1): gangad ba der byid te/ bu mo byams ma mol zhing yongs su med rjed pa ngas/ rgyal po seng ge'i dpal gyi bu mo lnga brgya dang ldan pa de yang ba nas rabar snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i dang ma khri man dun sbrub kyi snying po'i rkang pa can
19a6(1): gser gyi lug bod kyi dra bas legs par byas pa/ lha rdzas kyi bstan/ bting ba la 'dug cing chos stod to zhes thos nas/ seng genas par dbyings pa'i grong khyed du song ste/ rgyal po seng ge dpal gyi gnas gangan pa des / 
19a7(1): phyi nang nas rgyal po'i phyi sgo'i sgo gang na bu mo byams ma mthong bar dga' ba 'i phyir sdod cing 'dug 'dug pa dang / des deng srog chags brgya phrag du ma dang / srog chags stong phrag du ma dang / srog chags stong phrag du me 'dod pa
19a8(1): mthong nas khyed gang nas 'ongs/ dgang tu 'dong zhes dris pa dang / de dag de na nged ni bu mo byams ma'i drung du chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dong ngo zhes nas/ des bsam pa/ 'dir ni su 'gro yang bkag pa myed pa lta zhig snyam ste/ de yang nang du phyin to// de ltar/ 
19a9(1): byin te ltas na khang brnam par snang ba'i snying po can de yang bzhi shel tu 'dug pa'i sa las blangs te be cu t+ya'i bka' ba bkye ba/ rtsig pa rdo rje las byas pa/ 'angs su chu klung gi gser gyi kun dang ldan pa'i bags rgya brag stong gis brgyad pa/ nor bu
19a10(1): rin po che grangs skyed pas nam par bris pa rin po che stong gi snying po'i me lor gyi dkyil 'khor gyis shin tu spang par byas pa/ nor bu rin po che 'gro ba'i yid du 'ong pas rnam par brgyand pa/ rin po che'i shing gtags grangs myed pas yongs su bskor ba/ 
19b1(1): gser gyi dril bu brgya stong shin tu grol pa'i sgra snyan pa bsas kyis kyi khyab pa'i rgyan dang ldan par 'dug pa mthong ngo // bu mo byams ma' yang dbyig dkang nag 'byes pa/ skram thon zing du 'dug pa mdog gser gyi kha dog ltar 'jug pa mthong ngas/ des de'i
19b2(1): rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbyar te mdun tu 'dug 'dug nas 'di skad ste smras so// 'phags ma bdag gis bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems/ 
19b3(1): bskyed nas/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par dgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdam ngag rjes su bstand pa mdzad do zhes padag
19b4(1): gis thos nas/ 'phags ma ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan tu dgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol// smras pa rigs kyi bu kho mo'i gnas kyi rgyan
19b5(1): la ltos shig ces gsungs nas/ des kun tu byul te ltas pa dang / cig pa re re dang / ka ba re re dang / me long gi dkyil 'khor re re dang / rnam pa'i bye brag re re dang / dbyibs re re dang / nor bu ring po che re dang / 
19b6(1): bu nga/  na nga/ dz+ra mam pa da na pa pazu khye pa/ mal brtsod pa dang/ 
19b7(1): slod lam gyi yul dang bcas pa 'byung ba'i gyan dang u pa/ mngon par 'tshang rgyu ba'i rnam par 'phrul dang bcas pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo bsod pa dang bcas pa/ yongs su mya ranapas 'das pa ston pa dang bcas par gzugs brnyas kyi
19b8(1): tshul kyi mthong bar gyur to// dmyigs pa de dag de re las je lta ba bzhin du dmyigs pa thams cad las kyang mthong bar gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na rgyas yongs su gang pa'i dzi dang / shing rtog pa myed pa lanas bdags la pa la nim mas
19b9(1): nying+ga dang skar ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du yongs su snang ngo // de bzhin du khang pa rnam par snang ba'i snying po can dbyigs pa re re las kyang chos kyi dbyings kun na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzug/ 
19b10(1): rnyan gyi tshul du yongs su snang bar gyur te/ de ni bu mo byams ma'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu'i phyir te/ des de ltar rnam par ltas nas/ sangs rgyas mthong ba'i rgyand kyi mtshan ma de yongs su bzung ste/ thal mo sbyar nas bu mo byes/ 
20a1(1): ma'i gdong du bltas pa dang / des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i sgo'i rgyud kun nas rnam par rgyan pa zhes bya ba thob pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i sgo'i rgyud 'di ni/ 
20a2(1): khakho mos de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung 'ga' sum bcu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed las yongs su btsal ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rob tu phyind pa'i sgo'i rgyud kun nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di sgo sna tshogs kyi khong du chud
20a3(1): par bya bas rtogs par mdzad de// gcig gis gang gsungs pa de yang gnyis kyis ma gsungs so// smras pa 'phags ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i bsgo'i rgyud kun nas rnam par brgyand pa 'di yul ji lta bu zhig mchis// 
20a4(1): spras pa rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i sgo'i brgyud nas rnam par rgya nad pa 'di la kho mos mngon tu byed cing sems dpa' dang / rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / rnam par spyod pa dang / rjes su sems dpa' dang / dran par bya ba dang / 
20a5(1): yongs su gzung bar bya ba dang / rnam par rtag pa dang / mngon par sgrub pa dang / yang dag par brgyand par bya ba dang / rab tu rnam par dbye byed depa'i tshe/ gzungs kun nas sgo zhes bya ba yongs su skye ste/ gzungs
20a6(1): kyi dkyil 'khor der ni chos kyi sgo brgyad stong grangs myed pa phrag bcus yongs su 'dra'o// khong du chud do// mngon par gyur to// mngon par 'du'o// 'khongs na med do// 'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi zho dang / ngas
20a7(1): sangs rgyas kyi sgo dang / chos kyi sgo dang / sems can gyi sgo dang / 'das pa'isgo dang / ma 'ongs pa'i sgo dang / da ltar 'byung ba'i sgo dang / gnas pa 'i mtha'i sgo dang / bsod nams kyi sgo dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs
20a8(1): kyi sgo dang / ye shes kyi sgo dang / ye shes kyi tshogs kyi sgo dang / smon lam gyi sgo dang / smon lam gyi rnam pa'i sgo dang / spyod pa'i sgo dang / pyod pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo dang / myod pa yongs su 'byung ba'i sgo dang / myod pa yongs su
20a9(1): rdzogs par bya ba'i sgo dang / las kyi sgo dang / las dang myi 'gal ba'i sgo dang / las kyi rgyun gyi sgo dang / las mngon par du bya ba'i sgo dang / myi mnyam pa'i las yongs su spang ba'i sgo dang / yang dag pa'i las la nan tan du bya ba'i
20a10(1): sgo dang / las la dbang sbyar pa'i sgo dang / legs pa khyad pa'i sgo dang / legs par spyad pa yang dag par blang ba'i sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang / ting nge 'dzind la rnam bur sbyar pa'i sgo dang / ting nge 'dzinas
20b1(1): kyi pyod yul gyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzind las ldang ba'i sgo dang / mngon par shes pa'i sgo dang / sems rgya mtsho'i sgo dang / sems kyi rnam grangs kyi sgo dang / sems kyi rgyud yongs su dag par bya ba'i sgo dang / sems kyi thims po snang bar byed
20b2(1): ba'i sgo dang / sems kyi tshod dang par bya ba'i sgo dang / sems 'byung ba'i sgo dang / sems rnam par rgyu ba'i sgo dang / sems can kun nas nyon mongs pa rgyu ba'i sgo dang / nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi sgo dang / nyon mongs pa'i spyod pa'i sgo dang / 
20b3(1): mos pa'i sgo dang / sems can gyi dpyod pa'i sgo dang / sems can gyi 'apyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten 'byung ba'i sgo dang / sems can gyi bsam pa'i sgo dang / sems can gyi 'du shes kyi sgo dang / phyogs kyi sgo dang / chos kyi phyogs
20b4(1): kyi sgo dang / snying rje chen po'i rno dang / byams ba chen po'i sgo dang / zhi ba'i sgo dang / ngag gi lam gyi sgo dang / tshul kyi sgo dang / khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang / rnam par bye ba'i sgo dang / yang dag par 'dra ba'i sgo dang / chags babyed dri
20b5(1): sgo dang / kun gyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sgo dang / nyan thos kyi chos kyi sgo dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi chos kyi sgo dang / 'jig rten 'byung ba'i chos kyi
20b6(1): sgo dang / 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sgo dang / 'jig rten kun nas gnas pa'i sgo nga / 'jig rten gyi 'ams rnam par dag pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi'os kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi 'bas kun nas nyon mongs
