20b7(1): zham par dag pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa la kun las nyon mongasapa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu rnam par dag pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi zhes
20b8(1): gzhi mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams snrel bzhi'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'u tshugs su rgyu ba'i sgo dang / myig 'phrul tu 'jug pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi sgo dang / gnas kyi btu shes kyi rnam par
20b9(1): 'gyur ba'i sgo dang / phra ba rgya chen por khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang / rgya chen po phra bang khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas mthong bar bya ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku rnam pa tha dad pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer gyi dra ba rnam pa pa dad pa'i sgo dang / 
20b10(1): sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par bye ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos 'khor lo tha dad pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo la khyi dad pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi
21a1(1): ba'i sgo nga / sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzid kyis rnam par 'phrul ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par myod pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku'ang pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas
21a2(1): kyi sems can pha ro la gyi sems thugs su rung ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par phul pa'i sgo dang / dga' ldan gyi pho bra ban bzhugs pa'i sgo nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar stanang pa'i bar gyi sgo dang / sems can gyi dor
21a3(1): chad byed pa'i dzad pa'i sgo dang / chos kyi zab mo'i tshul gyi sgo dang / chos sna tshogs kyi tshul gyi sgo dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi chos kyi rnam pa'i sgo dang / byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba'i rnam pa'i chos kyi sgo dang / byang chub kyi tshogs kyi rnam pa'i sgo
21a4(1): dang / smon lam gyi rnam pa'i sgo dang / dpyod pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / mngon de par shes pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / 'byung ba'i rno ba'i sgo dang / gzungs nyid rnam par dag pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i
21a5(1): rnam pa'i sgo dang / shes rab yongs su dag pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / byang chub chad byed pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / dran pa rnam par dag pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dag ste// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mos shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyinan
21a6(1): ba'i sgo'i rgyud dran pas kun nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di shes rabar zad no// kho mos byang chub sems dpa' sems nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/ bla gos chos kyi dbyings ltar sangs pa/ rgyud pa sod rnams kyi tshogs kyis brtan pa/ 
21a7(1): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam tu zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos yongs su myi rgyu ba/ ye shes snang ba'i dmyig rab rib myed pa rab tu thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad mun pa myed par khong du chud pa/ blo nam mkha' ltar tshad myed pa dang ldan pa
21a8(1): dbyigs pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i dmyig can/ chags pa myed pa'i sa snang ba'i snying po dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad kyi don rab tu dbye' pa la mkhas pa/ thi lad kyis gnon la/ 'jig rten kun gyi zi lad kyis myi gnon pa
21a9(1): 'jig rten gyi dpyod pa'i tshul la rnam par spyod pa/ 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad khan ma tho ba skyed pa/ 'jig rten kyi don byed pa la brtson pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi ngag gi tshul dang
21b1(1): rnam pal la sa 'gro ba bas cad du gnas pa'i bsas dang 'das/ bsam la bu bzhi sa pa myigs pa stod pa/ rgyas kyi ma tho bsas pad sa dbang byung ba de dag gi spyod pashes pags/ 'od tan brjod papa
21b2(1): nus re gan song rigs kyi bu 'o phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na yul dmyig gsum pa zhes bya ba yod de/ den dge slong stan sdug pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la ji ltar bya bachub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la ji ltar
21b3(1): srab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor pa 'das kyis bu mo byams sa'i klad pa gnyis sa spyi bos phyag 'tshar te/ bu mo byams ma la lan brgya stong tu mngag sa phyogs su bskod pa byas nas nga
21b4(1): dpa yang lhas te su so byams sa'i chung ngas mngang // de nas tshod dbang kyi nong pangs byang chub sems dpa'i seshes kyi rnam par spyod pams mo rjes su bsas pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhib rab mo khong brdud par bya ba rje
21b5(1): su bsam pa dang / sems can gyi ye shes gi nang tu phra zhing bab pa brjes su bsam pa dang / 'jig rten gyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa thab mo rjes su bsam ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / 
21b6(1): sems kyi rgyud kyi dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / rang bzhin gyis/ dben pa'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi rnam
21b7(1): par 'apyod pa'i bden pa'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / chos kyi dbyings rgyun pa'i rgyan gyi dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam par dang / lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi shugs kyis 'khor ba'i dbyings bab mo rjes
21b8(1): su bsam pa dang / las kyis sna tshogs su gyur pa'i dbyings pas pa rjes su bsam pa byed ning mthar kyis yul dbyigs su ba gangan pa des / byin te/ yul gyi 'khor dang / grong khyer gyi 'khor dang / tshor lus kyi
21b9(1): khror dang / grol nas kyi 'khod dang / rnga yul klu'i 'khor dang / lhas kyi 'khor dang / drang srong dke' ba spyod pa'i gnas kyi 'khor dang / yul dang phyogs kyi 'khor dang / chu'i rgyud kyi 'khor dang / ri'i yul gyi 'khor dang
21b10(1): dgas 'amam chen pa'i 'khor dag tu dge slong bstan sdug pa yongs su sa chos pasas/ des dge slong lta dkrug pa nags 'tshal sug pa zhis/ bzhod zhing dngas bab pa/ gzugs mdzes shing stan sdug pa
21b11(1): decing tu 'ong ba 'thor nyi ga sa phyogs su kyiya bdang ldad pa/ mgo gdugs ltar 'jugs/  kyi kyi bcad/ snrel gangs pa/ bye ga da 'byer ma sas/ rnam pa 'jos nyi 'dug pa
22a1(1): lag pa 'i pa/ dra bar 'breb pa'i mang momad/ gas sa lang mos brgya pa/ paga'angam zhing bshos gas rgyas pa/ matud ni chu mtho pa/ 'jig zhug pa/ sa sa/ 
22a2(1): po mtshan gsang ba'i sbubs su nub pa/ byin pa'i dgas me ne ma'i phyin ga ltar 'jug pa/ ma ma ring ba// rkang pa'i ting pa yangs pa/ 'di dos gang ba dang ldan pa/ mdog gser gyi ladog ltad chug pa/ 
22a3(1): ba sA re re nas g.yas phyogs su byed tu gyi lang pa/ shing nyagro d+ha'i rgyal po/ lhung chu zheng gab pa/ lus mtshan ma dang dpe byed bzang pos shin tu brgya pa/ dmyig bye 'gebs shing gyi rgod pa drang pa nye bar gnas
22a4(1): ri'i rgyal po kha ba can ltar ma rang nags tshal dang / smad dang / shing phran sna tshogs kyis brgyand pa/ blo ga nang tu yangs pa ye shes kyi spyod yul dang yul la thub pa byed pa/ dbyangs kyi dkyis
22a5(1): 'khor gyi rgyan sprin gyi sgra lta bu dang ldan pa/ g.yo ba dang rlom sems dang g.yeng ba dang / spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i sems dang bral ba/ ye shes kyi spyod yul ma 'dres pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po'i snang ba thob pa/ 
22a6(1): sems can thams cad yongs su sbyin par bya ba dang gtul ba'i bsam pa'i rgyan gyi chad pa/ snying rje chen po 'dakyil 'khor shi nad tu yangs pa skyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul yongs su gzung ba dang / sems can
22a7(1): thams cad kyi ye shes kyi snang ba yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i chul rjes su dran zhing // 'gro ba thams cad kyi don tu 'chag pa la bzhugs te drag dpa byed cing / bad rab byed de shin du mdzes par 'dzag pa/ gnas
22b1(1): gtsang ma'i kwa'i gos dang ldan pa/ gA dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lha phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / nangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'gon
22b2(1): po dang / myi dang kyi yin pas skrod cing 'jug pa mthong ngo // dge slong ldan mdzes pa de 'chag pa'i tshe phyogs mngon tu gyur pa'i phyogs kyi lnga rnams dang / phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su bsgrub pa byed do// rkang gis 'gro'i lharnams ni
22b3(1): rin po che'i pad mos gom pa dor ba'i tshe yongs su blang ba byed do// me'i lnga snang ba'i dkyil 'khor zad myi shes pa rnams kyang mun pa dang rab rib rnam par sel to// 'dzam bu rgyal mtshan gyi nags tshal gyi lnga rnams kyang me tog mang po'i chang
22b4(1): mngon par 'bebs so// sa'i lha myi g.yo pa'i snying po can rnams kyang rin po'i 'byung gnas mang po ston to// nam mkha'i lha kun nas snang ba'i dpal dang ldan pa rnams kyang nam mkha'i dbyings yongs su rgyan pa byed do// rgya mtsho lnga dpal
22b5(1): kun nas 'byung ba rnams kyang rin po me dam pa mang pos mngon par 'thod ngo/ nga mi rab kyi sgra drim byed pa'i snying po can rnams kyang 'al mo sbyar te phyagad 'tshal lo// rlung gi sgra thogs pa byed pa'i stobs can rnams kyang / spos dang
22b6(1): gtug spom dang / me tog 'thor pa'i drung rab tu 'byed do// mtshan mo'i lda nas par byed pa lus shinang du byud pa nas kyang sus shin tu btud cing byag 'tshal so/ nyin mo'i gtag tu bad par byed pa'i dkyil 'khod ca na
22b7(1): kyang nong bu rid po'i phyogs sdang bar byed pa'i rgyal mtshan thogs zhing spang ba skyed pa'i phyir rnam ma'i'i dbyings la 'khod / de nas tshang dpon kyi bu nong ba 'angs dge' slong stan mug pa gangan pa ded byi nas dge slong kan thug pa'i
22b8(1): tha tha'i pon gnyis pa gyi bos btugs te phyag 'jas nas dge slong stan sdug pa'i rkang khri grol gnyis la bzhin bsgyu te/ legs par byin nas/ mdun tu 'dugs te/ bal mo spyad nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'bags
22b9(1): ba bdag ri brar byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su chos pa zhig lags te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa la gang bas pa dang / rje du bsta pa
22b10(1): ma sa kya sa ma 'i kyid ya / des bye pa pas la/  la
23a1(1): lal ji bo rkyang kha la bdes stong du/ sa yang ni lo brgya phrag stong du/ la lang ni lo bye bar/ sa yang mi'o bye ba khrag khrig d+hA/ sa lang ni lo brjod du byed pa'i yang brjod du myed par/ la yang ni sa lad pa bar mar
23a2(1): la khang ni skal ba phyed du/ la yang ni skalang bar/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zham ring du ni ska lad pa/ brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed par tshangs pa'i pyod pa byad do// bska khang pa 'grang ba'i chub
23a3(1): 'di nyid kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las chos bstand pa thos date/ pad ma ngag dang rjes su bstand pa yang dag par blangs so// desmon lam kyi rgyan yongs su sbyangs so// yang dag par bsgrubs
23a4(1): ba'i yul la zhugs so// spyod pa'i dkyil 'khod yongs su sbyangs so/ pa mo ba tu phyin pa rgya mtsho'i yongs su rdzogs par byas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su
23a5(1): shes par byas po/ de dag gis chos kyi 'khong po 'a'ong ba man dunam / 'dres pa nas kyang yongs su gzung ngo // de dag gi stobs mnyam pa nyid kyang 'o rdu par byas so// de dag gi spya dang pasar dam pa'i chos pas
23a6(1): 'i mthang zug gi bdu thongs su gzung /  thos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams can kyi smon 'am rnams kyang na pas kyid kyi tuti 'a ma na par sgrubs pa'i rlobs kyis gisas rgyas kyi'i
23a7(1): yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrubs bo//  thos de banyi gshegs pa de dag pasus cad kyi sngon gyi bya bcub sems dpa mi myod pa rnams spyon pa mams dang ga pa'i ting nge 'dzi thob pa'i stobs kyis / 
23a8(1): grong po yongs su dag par bya ba'i phying ma na par bsgrubs po// mabs de 'azhidi gshegs pa de thams ca kyis rod sa byin pa rnam par dag pa la kun tubabang po'i byed pas/ 'byung ba'i stobs kyis bdod pa
23b1(1): pa'i sang 'arjod du byed pa das kyang byang dub sems dpang su tu b.rang ba'i ston pa dang / smon lam sa na pa grubs pa'i gobs kyis/ ngas su'i banas sa sog myongs kya 'odas su bgyuro// ses sa
23b2(1): rgyas brjod du byed pa'i 'arjod du byed pa mthong ba rnam par dag padas kyang sa phyi'i de zhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa'i smon lam mngon par sgrubs pa'i stobs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du byed pa'i yang brjod du skyed pa'i
23b3(1): dul shin tu phra ba snyed la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur dang rim 'gro bya ba'i byin de mngon tu 'gyur ro// sems skyed pa cig la de bzhin gshegs pa brjod du byed pa'i chos kyi srin gyi char rnams kyi 'khong mo yongs su 'dzin
23b4(1): pa'i gzungs dang / smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis chos kyi tshul grangs myed pa rnam par 'tshang rgya bzhir khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir bsam pa la mngon par 'bab bo// sems skyed pa cig la byang chub sems dpa'i
23b5(1): dpyod pa rgya mtsho brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed pa rag kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i dpyod pa myig 'phrul lta bu yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i
23b6(1): phyir mngon tu 'gyur ro// sems bskyed pa gcig la ting nge 'dzin rgya mtshol brjod du myed pa dag kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo gcig tu ting nge 'dzin kyi sgo thams cad yang dag par 'du bar bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis
23b7(1): ting nge 'dzin myid kyi 'a'akhor thams na 'ongs su rab par byaba'i phyi mngon du 'gyur ro// sems skyed pa gcigs dbang pob rgya mtsho brjod du byed pa'i yang 'dod du byed pa nas kyang kun pa'i mabar byin pa'i dbang po pob bar bya ba'i smon lam mngon par
23b8(1): bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis dbang po'i khong lo dang / lus kyi 'khor lo thams cad kyi nges su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir mngon tu 'gyur ro// sems bskyed pa cig la tus kyi 'tshar lo brjod du byed pa'i yang brjod du byed pa dag kyang sems can zang byin
24a1(1): shing bos par 'gyur ba/ 'gro ba bams cad kyis dong lta ba/ rnam thams cad kyi sprin gyi 'byung dus su srungs pa/ phyogs kun tu rnam par spad pa'i mi thams can nam par gtor bas stan mdzes pa/ kyi dge ba'i rtsab thams pa
24a2(1): gagad tu 'joms pas/ gan tu dpa' par snang ba/ dge pa'i rgya chen pa'i bya bathu pa la gyur bas stan sugs/ 'byung ba bzhi d+hA ka' zhing dkon pas me to/ u dul bA rA sa bu de dag gi spyong pa shes pa 'am/ yod tan
24a3(1): bar nus re rkan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na yul dge sbyong gyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ban grong khyer sgo bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug ces bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan tu so
24b1(1): la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slab par bya ba dang / ji lta ma nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa dang / nan tan rnams yang
24b2(1): dag par bya ba la brtson pa byang chub sems dpa'i stobs snang bas sems shin tu snang bar gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtan pa gzhan gyis kyi thub cing bzhal zag chad pa'i snying dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon
24b3(1): lam gyi go cha bzang pos sems zhum pa myed pa/ byang chubab sems dpa'i bsam pa brtan pas kun tu gnas shing yongs su 'phel bar 'gyur pa la brtson pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i srin gyi char yongs
24b4(1): su 'dzin pa'i bsas pa dang ldang pa byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi srin gyi char gyis yongs su phyi rogs pa'i rgyung dang 'das/ byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan thams cad la 'dug pa'i smon lam la mngon tu srungan pa/ 
24b5(1): pa thams cad kyi kha lo sbyar bas yongs su srung bar bdag nyid 'ongs su gtang bar 'dod pa/ 'gro ba thams cad 'khor ba'i bsam pas dam pa' dgon pa chen po las 'azla bar 'dod pa/ dge' ba'i bshes gnyen
24b6(1): la lta ba dang / mnyan pa dang / bsnyen bkur bas yongs su myi ngos/ sa pa/ chos kyi rim 'gro tshad myed pa skyed pa dang ldan pa/ des dang spong lta na sdug pa de'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge slong
24b7(1): ltan sdug pa la khan rgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su spong ba byas nas/ yang dang yang ltas te/ dge slong ldan sdug pa'i drung nas song ngo // / 'phags pa sangs rgyas phal po zhes bya ba/ shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i
24b8(1): mdon / tum thu banis bam po gsus pa'o// / ded pa tshong pong rtso dang pangs dge song gan gug padi'i gad sa dag rjes su ba bcing sdel pa dang / bdud pa dang / ma byed pa dang / bshad pa dang / 
24b9(1): tho song dam par sgom pa dang / brjod pa yang dag par bstan pa dang / brjes su bsas pa dang / mngon par 'dug par bya ba dang / bkur ba dang / khong badrud par bya ba dang / yang dag par gos par bya ba dang / yang dang yang sras
24b10(1): dang / shin tu rtogs par bya dang / rab tu bstan pa dang / snang bar bya dang / nges su rnas par zla babyed cing / lha dang / grwa dang / gnod pa sbyin dang / dri ba'i 'khod dang bcas pa de sa par kyis sul dge slong gi dkyil 'dzur gyi/ 
25a1(1): byug ni/ chu krung kyi chu 'dus dang nye ba zhig na/ byis pa stong phrag bcu pa tsam gyis bskor te/ bye ma la rtse bas rtse zhing 'dug go zhes nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nong bzang sa k+She rko bzang po dang nye ba'i chu zung gi chu 'dus gangan pa re po / 
25a2(1): byin pa dang des khye 'u dbang po'i dbang byug byis pa tong phrag bcu tsam gyis bskor cing bye ma la rtse bas rtse ba sa bong ngo // mthong nas kyang khye'u bzang po'i dbang phyug gang na ba der stong ste/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gi nang pa gnyis
25a3(1): pa spyi bos phyag 'ams nas/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug la yas rgya stong tu mang g.yas phyogs su sor ba byas nas/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gis rgyan tu 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyang nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa
25a4(1): bdag gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ra bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod/  ba la slab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan tubagyi bas 'tsha
25a5(1): 'phags pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstand pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'as byang chub sems dpa'i dpyod pa la slab
25a6(1): bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan tu bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gso la// smras pa rigs kyi bu kho bo ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur de pas yi ge dang grangs dang / brda' dang / zis kyi tshul bslabs te
25a7(1): bzo thams cad mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i mi shes kyi bskor bcug go// de ltar rigs kyi bu kho pos ni 'jig rten na ye ge dang / mying gi rnam pa dang / grangs dang / bis dang / bda' dang / shod 'bas shes pa / 
25a8(1): bya ba dang / bzo sna tshogs shes par bya ba dang / khams kyi mchog ga dang / tug bso ba'i thabs dang / bskam pa dang / brjed byed dang / 'byung po'i gdon gyis btab pa gso' ba dang / grong dang grong 'khyer dang / tshong dus dang / 
25a9(1): bza' shing ki ra ba dang / dka' thub kyi nags 'tshal dang / nags rnam par dgod pa shes par bya ba dang / ra ba dang / khang pa dang / skar khur dang / khang pa rtsegs pa'i tshad shes par bya ba dang / 'khrul 'khor dang / shing ta stsam/ 
25b1(1): ban thun na byang byung // byang gyur byar srung sa ga sdig go/ lhag sdig sa gcigs kyang kying byang byi na ses ches so// chem ches ces des dgra rgyabya tshul so// rgyas thos byar byosas ma gyu ro// ban zus a kyi
25b2(1): nayang zer ro// thar mer zer zer na zab khrob bo// thab khrib zhab zhib na la gas po/ la gangs sa gangs chosa'o// tsham chom samam khris so// wal yis tham rmis nan banub bo/ nas du sa nab tus na sang sang ngo // sangs
25b3(1): yang sa ngan brgyad yam po/ bzung las rgyu pas na gta yas so// gtangabs gtang pas na bkras do// bam mang bkra 'a nags 'ayas so// gsangams gsa' mas na 'argya ba byed do// chus byed cu pa phred ngas rtse
26a1(1): 'thug nams 'jug / pal yang la la na shing phrag go// 'ding phrag 'ayi tsag med bya'o// yid byo byo pa deb bo// dasas de sa thog
26a2(1): namal sas so// yal lal las na bzang la po// 'azang bas 'azang u thugasal lo/ thug pas thug pa sa dag gang ngo // ga ga gang shadang/ yag lag go// lag lag lag sa gdasas zim tho
26a3(1): tham thim pam thim na chos bskal lo// rlos pasdub zlos pas/ dan gzhal 'byos so// gzhal 'byos gzhal 'byos na gzhas yas duso// gzhal las gnas yas na gzhal myed do// gnapa byed pa
26a4(1): byed na gnas la to/ gzha' 'khor gaka' 'kho nags khrim mo// gzhapa bis gsapa ri min gang gzhas 'o// gagan gang gags nagan pasangs sa/ gzhas sangs gnas sangs dpa
26a5(1): thag zo/ gzhal bag gzhal thag na gzhal phul lo// gzha phul gzhas phul na gzhal 'phrul 'azhi'o// gzhal bzhi gzhal bzhi'i na byo 'gyur ro// 'byo 'gyung 'byo 'gyum na nyar nyer ro// nyar nyer nyar nyer na
26a6(1): phyag byig go/ phyag phyig phyag phyis ma bal thul lo// bas thul ral thul nas bsal lo// sal sal sa las lan g.yo ldeg go// g.yo ldeg g.yo 'breg na 'ad bud no// ba phun pan kun na pa nang ma'o// 
26a7(1): banang yang banang yang na rem 'drol lo// rem 'drol rem 'drol na rdzi dang // rdzi dang na rdzi rtul to// rdzi tshul rdzi rtul na phun yol lo// phun yol phun yol ma ngang dad do// rang ngang rang rangan bzang btso'o// bgrang brtsi bzang
26a8(1): cin zab 'brang ngo // za ba bgrang zab bgrang zab bgrang na dga' rkyang ngo // dga' rkyang dga' rkyang na gzhug 'dal lo/ gzhung 'dal gzhung 'dal na 'khrug phyed do// 'khrug byad zhug phyad na thol pyod do// 'ol byod 'ol byed
26b1(1): bgrang yos kyang yol la bsgres pa'o// bzang lol la sres pa bslong sol la bsgres na gyi 'angs to// gyi 'angs kyi 'angs na gyi 'jal la bsgres pa'o// kyi 'ams bkres pa bya'angasas parnyes na bsus kyo da / ma brtsod
26b2(1): bsam gyod la bsres pa'o// bsam pyod la bsgres pa bsam pyod la bsgres rnam pa' 'byas mo// mtha' 'byas mtha' 'byam na dpag lag go// dpag zag dpag bgan/ dpag zags bsgos pa'o// dpag bags
26b3(1): bsgres pa dpag bag la bsres na brjod du byed pa'o// brjod pa byed pa marjod du byed pa na brjod pa la spes pa'o// brjod du byed pa la bsgres pa brjod du byed pa la skyes na/ brjod du byed pa'i yang brjod du byed pas bsgres pazhin
27a1(1): brjod du myed pa la bsgos pa 'di snyed cig yod do zhes bya bang rab tu bye nas/ grangs bgyis te grangs su 'ad do// des bye ma'i bung pa de kyis kyi bdang pastan pas zhin tu bstan nas 'dind ces smrab so// rigs kyi rtsa
27a2(1): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi grang ba'i tshub 'di ni 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu rgyun bstan pang / byang chub sems dpa rnams ni bzang ba'i tshul 'dis// gang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi mas dbyas pa
27a3(1): ba dag kyang bgrang brtsi'o// de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang ga gyi phyogs mtshabs dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshabs dang / sgo rub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs rnams/ 
27a4(1): dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs mtshams su yang byang chub sems dadapa' rnams bgrang ba'i tshul 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas dab dag bgrang zhing ci'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi/ 
27a5(1): bgrang ba'i tshul 'di ni/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi byid d+ha bya ba cig nas cig tu rgyud pa/ bstan tu yod pa thams cad na'ang yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bgrang ba'i tshul 'di/ 
27a6(1): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyir gcig nas cig tu gyud pa 'grang zhing bci'o// ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams kyi myid cig nas cig tsha tu chud pa stan tu yod pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i skas pa'i phying cig nas
27a7(1): cig tu rgyud pa stan tu yod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan cig nas cig rgyud pa bstand tu yod pa dang / chos kyi myir gcig nas cig tu brgyud pa stan tu yod pa dang / sems can gyi mying cig nas cig tu brgyad pa stan tu/ 
27a8(1): yod pa dang / las kyi mying cig nas gcig nas rgyud pa stan tu yod pa kun la'ang 'jug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bgrang ba'i tshul 'di nyid ni/ phyogs bcu'i na mying du bya ba cig nas cig tu brgyud pa stan tu rung ba ji snye/ 
27a9(1): ba thams cad la'ang 'jug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bgrang ba'i tshul 'dis/ phyogs btsun myir cig nas cig tu brgyud pa ji snyed yod pa thams cad kyang 'grang zhing brtsi'o// de ltar rigs kyi bu kho bos ni
27b1(1): mas sa'amabyasas za lta rab tu b+hag d+ha kla ba sta ma
27b2(1): ting nge 'dzig byad par smos pa 'am/ shes pang pa'ang chun pa dus shen/ 'a gas kyi su na tshogs kyi rgyan 'di nyid kro kye/ dmyam cho btadan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ ded ge bsnyenas su tu thu
27b3(1): gi gru ga zug na tu sa/ deng bya chub / bya sa sem la gyod pa la bathab par bya ba dang / de tha nga tan gyum khris shA// mcho
27b4(1): dge ba'i bas pa nyid kyi tshig po'as 'jug so te/ dka' bachen ze mo shugs skyes napar tu dga' ba'i yid dang ldan par 'byung bcokyi phasam pa na ba chi dun donamamang/ 'gromam mo da/ 
27b5(1): sems dang bsam pas 'byung ba/ mangs rgyal skyes pacig nas cig tu brgyad par 'thob gyu ba/ sa kyid kyi 'dadas par dag pa tho thos pa na pa/ bamam kyis du ba la kho blan tha par bye
27b6(1): 'byung ba bstan pa la brtson pa 'i dus gsum gyi dbyings su ma 'dres pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi snang ba chen po la dbang sbyar ba// khams gsus kyi khyib cu sdug pa'i sgog nad tu gcog pa des
27b7(1): khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gi rkar pa gnyis la gyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug la yun stong tu mar g.yas phyogs su skor ba byas nas yang dang yang ltas te/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gi drung nas song
28a1(1): de nas tshong dpong kyi bu nor ba'angs dge ba'i bzhes gnyen gyi gdas ngag gi sprin gyi char yongs su 'dzin par byed cing / gang chen mtsho ltar sprid chen po'i chan gyis ngoms kyi shes pa/ dge' ba'i bzhin
28a2(1): gnyen gyi hrI ma'i le shes kyi 'od zer gyis dge ba'i yongs su sbyind par byas pa'i sa'i gzhingasas/ dbang po'i myu bu 'bon cing skyes pa/ dge ba'i bzhes gnyen gyi tha ba nya zhing sangs rgyas pa'i gdams rag gi 'od zer gyi dra bas sus
28a3(1): dang bems shi tu tshim par byab pa/ dbyed kyi nyima'i 'od kyis gdungs pa'i nidags kyi tshogs gsal zhing gangs su ga zud par 'dod pa gan dge ba'i bshes garten gyi gdams dag gi tshul phung bar 'dod pa/ byung bsang zo rje/ 
28a4(1): zhing lding bu ba rgyas par gyud pa'i bad po dang ldan pa'i ba mo'i mamo dge ba'i bzhes garten gyi gdapa sa dag gis sems kyi kyi stog bud dadaka 'byeb rin pa kyi chosas kyis yongs su rgyam pa'i rin pa 'i sring kya dge ba'i
28a5(1): bzhes gnyen gyi gdams ngag rin po che 'phel ba'i sdang bas sems dang shin tu sdang bar byas pas 'jas bu'i shing chen po ma tog dang /  nga 'bral bu'i tshogs chen po dang ldan pa snar dge ba'i bzhes gnyen gyiganas
28a6(1): na 'thod dpa pa dang mishes phyotshogs su mun pa kun gsus tshogs su pa dang ldan pa bu'i dbang pochen pa nyid modam pas ches mi 'byung ba'i rnam pa'i brid chen pa byar dge ba'i shes sa rten gyi gangs pa/ 
28a7(1): thos pa'i tshogs su mu ngad pa'i na bzhin su che ba ra sum bcu gsum pa'i 'jig rten gyis brgyad du pa'i snga tshogs kyi sngo ltar dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag las 'byung ba'i chos drim myed pa snga tshogs
28a8(1): brtsegs pa'i spor gyur pa gsum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyi 'khod kyis bskod pa'i rgya byin pa lA ma yin gyi dbang po'i tshogs rab tu 'jom pa ltung dge ba'i bzhes gnyen gyi gdams ngag las byung ba'i yon tan drim byed/ 
28a9(1): chogs kyis pangs sa pa nas ni me kyis byon pa man byas po rnye tu tsha tan kun pade ci ste/ mas la smras tshal pas skye sa sgobos pos bta / sa kyis
28a10(1): dge zhen sa sub tu 'byung ba de khrod khyer gyi dbus kyi rang gi lci sa na 'dug go zhes nas / rmong dpon gyi bu nor ba 'das dge bsnyen sa 'phur du 'byung ba'i gnas gang na ba der song ste/ zas po srung nas / zho da / 
28b1(1): dang 'o ba dang / des dge snyed pa su rba byung ba'i phyi dgag me yangs shing / rin pa ci nyib yongs su pas+hos/ phyogs pa dun gshi su mamal/ rab turtse / de rkyenas/ 
28b2(1): byed pa'i rgyan kyis brgyad du pa bsod nams kyirnam par sbyin pas/ mngon par grub pa mthong nas de khyim der po se kun tusmras na/ ge zhin pa su du byung ba/ drug ci shid tu gzhon pa / thog da
28b3(1): sra bab pa/ gzugs mngon zhing mdzes pa lta na sdug pa kha dog dam pa bri ya ba shin tu rgyal po dang ldan pa/ sA phye mar bzhag pa/ lus la rgyan byed pa/ gos dang smad g.yogs dkar po bgo ba/ rin po che'i khrig la bdug
28b4(1): ba mthong ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs par/ de'i lus bsam/ sems kyi dbang ras/ gzi' brjid dam/ kha dog gis zild kyis myi non pa'i sems can ni khyim de na gang yang myed de/ 
28b5(1): lnga 'am gyi yang rung ste/ sems cad gang gis dge sminas 'a rang phul tu byung ba mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang dge bsnyen ma sul tu 'byung ba la ston pa'i 'du shes su bsas pa zhig ring/ 
28b6(1): bro che'i khril 'dug pa mthong ngo / gzhan yang khyim den stan/ khwa rdzas dang / myi'i rdzas las shin tu 'phags pa byang chub/ sems dpa'i las kyi rnam par sbyin pas yongs su grub pa
28b7(1): bye ba stong phrag bcu bting ba dang mdun tu phra ba cig cig bzhag pa las kha zas dang sbom gyi ba gam/ gos dang rgyan gyi songasakhyod kyi bag gzhan ci yang kyi snang / bud myed stong phrag bcu tsam
28b8(1): zhag mdun na 'dug par mthong na yang de dag thams cad kyang lha'i bu mo'i kha dog dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo gzugs dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i nus dang ldan pa/ kwa'i bu mu'i spyod pa dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo
28b9(1): longs bapyod dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i tshul du shes pa dang ldan pa/ lA rdzas kyi gos yid bzhin gyon pa/ lha rdzas kyi skab grub kyis shind tu klubs pa/ lnga'i bu mo'i ska lta bu'i dbyangs bsnyand pa dang ldan pa/ 
28b10(1): lha'i bu mo'i tu zheng 'dzes pa dang ldan pa/ shastag ste/ de'i tsharang kyi bud byed kyang des ji sgo ba bzhin du byed cing matan de 'ad/ ris 'gro byed do// bkur ba sti byed do// kong du lta'o// ci sgo ba nyam
29a1(1): zas khyab par 'dug te/ sems can gang gis ci cho par gyudad pa de dag bams can kyang gnon sems byed pa'i sems dang / gang gnyen byed pa'i sems dang /  babyed pa'i sems dang / brag dog dang 'jus pa
29a2(1): bral ba'i sems dang / spu dang / g.yo' myed pa'i sems dang / chags pa dang / khong khro ba myed pa'i sems dang / zhum pa dang gzeng mtho' ba myed pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems
29a3(1): dang nasdom pa la gnas pa'i sems dang gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba la re ba myed pa'i sems su gyur te/ gang gis de dag gi skad thos pa de dag thams cad kyang dka' ba dang / mos pa dang / rtul ba'i chos
29a4(1): dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gang gis de dag mthong bar 'gyur/ dpa de dag kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba tsam du rang rang gis shes par 'gyur ro// de ltar mthong nas tshong dpon bu nor bzangs kyis dge snyen
29a5(1): ba 'gul du 'byung ba'i rkang pa gnyis la gyi thos phyag 'tshal te/ dge snyen ma phul tu 'byung ba la lan stob tu mar gas sa phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ mdun tu 'dugs ste bas mo spyad
29a6(1): nas 'di skad ces smras so// ka' phags ma bdag gis tha na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed na/ ji ltar byang chub seMs dpas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i pyod pa la slab par bgyi
29a7(1): ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis bos na/ 'phags ma ji ltar byang chub sems dpas
29a8(1): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad bya gsol// spras pa rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par tha rad pa bsod nams kyi mdzod kyi rang
29a9(1): ba'i rgyan ces bya ba thob ste/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ni phru ba cig po 'di las mos pa sna tshogs can rnams kha zas ci la dga' ba bzhin du/ tshod ma sna tshogs dang / ro sna tshogs dang / kha zas sna tshogs dang / drisna tshogs
29b1(1): sems can bye sa zag tu dang / sems pad bye ba zag stong dang / sems can kyi sa rgya zag stong dang / sems sad bye sa kha khrig bcwa phra ga so sa/ sems pan 'od du byed mi pa 'dod du byed pa/ 
29b2(1): thos pa sna tshogs cad rnapas kyang ci la dga' ba'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshis par byed do// yongs su bston par byed do// yongs su dka' bar byed do// yongs su ma kur bar byed do// yongs su spro bar byed
29b3(1): shin tu chis par byed do// yid bder byed do// 'on kyang phru ba 'di las dgod par 'gyur ba skyed do// 'grib byed do// dam bar gyi 'gyur ro// zad par gyi 'gyur ro// bri bar gyi 'byung ngo // sa bcabs yod par gyi gyur ro/ 
29b4(1): zar 'thug par gyi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhung de dang 'dra bar sems can langs bu'i gling gi bcul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang // de bzhin tu gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stod gi 'jig rten gyi las
29b5(1): kyi chul shin tu phra ba ged dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi/ tul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /  stong sum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sems can mos pa snga tshogs can
29b6(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i rul shin tu phra la snyed cig 'ongs kyang rtsis dga' pa'i kha zas chod ma sna tshogs dang / ro sna tshogs dang kha dog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs kyis yongs su tshim par byed do/ 
29b7(1): yongs su dga' bar byed do/ nyams bde bar byed do// shin tu tshim par byed do// yid shin bdel bar byed do// 'on kyang phru ba 'di las 'god par 'gyur ba byed do// 'grib pa byed do/ dpa' bar myi 'gyur ro// bad par gyi
29b8(1): da 'i tshogs pan babs pa 'das par yad yang / dedag pams ma ci dga' mi sa kyis pas su rtsom pached panas di des kyi 'jigs cad //  sa
30a1(1): rdzogs dang / rgyal pa sa da/ pa dang /  sa nam gas sa par byed panasag yang sa cad// 
30a2(1): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams cig na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sku'i mkha sa 'dzin pa gang ji snyen cig bzhugs pa de dag thams can kyang kho bo'i khags las gsol cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang
30a3(1): chub kyi 'bras bu rnyed par mdzad do// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi ra khams cig na ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams brgya na dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phran
30a4(1): stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba 'argya phrag rgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya brag stod dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye
30a5(1): pa khrag khrig brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzam bu'i gling gi rtul shi nad tu phra ba snyed dang / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnyed dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shi nad tu tha
30a6(1): ba snyed dang / tong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ras/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams shinang tu phra ba snyed nas de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i
30a7(1): brjod du byed pa'i rdub shin tu phra ba rnyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sku'i tha ma 'dzin pa ci snyed cig bzhugs pade dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs
30a8(1): rgyas kyi 'bras bu skyes par mdzad do// nga/ shar phyogs na bzhugs pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyog pa sems dang / shar lhor phyogs sams dang / spo rub kyi
30b1(1): phyogs tshams dang / nub byang kyi phyogs rnams dang / 'og dang / steng gyi phyogs tshims na ci snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams can kyang de bzhin no// rigs kyi bu shar phyogs ni 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na/ sku che cig
30b2(1): gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang ci snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho so'i khabs la gsol cing / snying po byang chub tu bzhugs nas/ bdud sde dang bcas pa 'pham par mdzad do// bla na myed pa
30b3(1): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams cig na bzhugs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams brgya dang 'jig rten gyi khams stong dang / 'jig rten gyi
30b4(1): khams brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
30b5(1): bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'jadam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal shind tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi
30b6(1): khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gnyis kyi 'dzi rten gyi khams kyi rdul shi nad tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
30b7(1): nas shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i rdul shind tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe cig gis thogs pa ci snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams
30b8(1): cad kyang / kho mo'i kha zas gsold cing snying po byang chub la bzhugs nas/ bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par mdzad de/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang brgya'o/ 
30b9(1): shar phyogs na bzhugs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs tshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs tshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs tshams dang / 
30b10(1): nu pa byang gi phyogs tshams dang / 'og gi phyogs dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gcig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs ci snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag
31a1(1): / cad kyang kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing / snying po byang chub tu zhugs te/ bdud sde dang bcas par rab tu pham par mdzad nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang brgya'o// 
31a2(1): shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na bzhugs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong dang / 
31a3(1): 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba rgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi
31a4(1): khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shi nad tu phra ba snyed dang / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shinan tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi
31a5(1): khams kyi rdul shind tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jigarten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gsum gyi/ stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dul shin tu phra ba snyed nas
31a6(1): rigs kyi bu steng gi 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod ru ca du myed pa'i yang brjod du byed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed na/ byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe cig gis ltogs pa ji snyed cig bzhugs
31a7(1): pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing snying po byang chub tu zhugs nas/ bdud sde dang bcas par pham par mdzad de/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang
31a8(1): brgya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis kho mo'i khor bud byed stong phrag bcu po 'di dag mthong ngam/ smras pa 'phags ma bdag gis mthong ngo // smras pa rigs kyi bu/ bud byed 'di dag la thogs pa/ brgya stong grangs byed pa
31a9(1): stong phrag bcu/ kho mo dang skal ba mnyam par pyod pa/ smon lam gcig pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig pa 'byung ba'i rgyan gcig pa/ mos pa'i las rnam par dag pa gcig pa kho mo dang skal ba man
31a10(1): bar dran pa rnam par dag pa skal pa mnyam pa/ blo rnam par dag pa skal ba mnyam par blo tshad myed par 'gyur ba/ skal ba mnyam par dbang po rab tu thob pa/ skal ba mnyam par sems kyis rgyas
31b1(1): par 'gengs pa skal ba mnyam par spyod yul gyi yul dang ldan pa/ skal ba mnyam par chos kyi tshul la zhugs pa/ skal ba mnyam par don nges par rtogs pa/ skal ba mnyam par chos kyi don stond pa
31b2(1): skal bar mnyam par gzugs rnam par dag pa/ skal ba mnyam par stobs tshad myed pa/ skal ba mnyam par brtan pa gzhan gyis myi mthub pa/ skal ba mnyam par chos kyi sgra sgrogs pa/ skal pa mnyam par dbyangs
31b3(1): rngam par dag pa chad byed pa'i yon tan brjod du yod pas nam par 'aspyod pa/ thams cad laskal ba mnyam par yon tan rnam par dag pa/ las kyi rnam par sbyin pa la kha na ma ma'o ba byed cing rnam par dag pas gal pa mnyam
31b4(1): bar las kyi rnam par sbyin pa rnam par dag pa 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pas skal ba mnyam par byams pa chen pos rgyas par 'gengs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su sbyin par byed pas myi skyo ba'i phyir skal pa
31b5(1): mnyam par snying rje chen pos rgyas par 'gengs pabasam pa rji ngalbu ba bzhin du sems can thams cad sim par byed pa'i lus yongs su ston pas skal ba mnyam lus kyi las rnam par dag pa chos kyi
31b6(1): dbyings kyi nges pa'i tshig gi tha snyad la skal ba mnyam par ngag gilas rnam par dag pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du/ ge/ skal ba mnyam par 'dod pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod cing
31b7(1): rim 'gror bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skal ba mnyam bar 'gyur ba/ chos thams cad kyi tshul khong du chud par bya ba la skal ba mnyam mar mngon gsum du gyur pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa
31b8(1): byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad thob par bya ba la skal pa mnyam par spyod pa/ rnam par dag pa sha stagacig kyang yod de/ rigs kyi bud byed stong phrag bcu po 'di dag kyang / gad cig cig tu 'azhi lta ste/ 
31b9(1): byang chub sems dpa'i spem cig gis thogs pa rnams la zhal zas yongs su dbul ba'i phyir phyogs bcu rgyas par 'dong ngo // zla ba 'di nyid nas kha zas blangs shing srid pa'i mthar ma pa dang / nyan pos dang / rang sangs
31b10(1): rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams la bsod snyoms dbul ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcur rgyas par 'dong ngo // phru ba 'di nyid nas kha zas blangs shing phyogs bcur rgyas par bkang ste/ yi dgas kyi tshogs thams cad kha zas kyis
32a1(1): 'ongs su mim byed do// rigs kyi bu de skyer lo mo ni zla ba 'di nyid nas lharnams ni ka'i khabs kyis yongs su tshim par byed do// klanams ni klu'i khabs kyis// gdod sbyin rnams ni gnod sbyin gyi
32a2(1): kyis dri ba rnams ni dri ma'i khams kyis/ snga ma yin rnams ni lA ma yin gyi khams kyis/ nam mkha' lding rnams ni nam kha' lding ki kha zas kyis/ gyi 'am ci rnams ni kyi 'am ci rnams ni khabs kyis/ lto bya chen po rnams/ 
32a3(1): ni g+ho phye chen po rnams kyi khams kyis/ phyi rnams ni myi'i khams kyis/ gyis yin pa rnams ni gyi ma yin pa'i khazas kyis yongs su tshim par byed do// rigs kyi bu sud tsam zhig snod dang de'u mngon tu 'gyur ro// dge' snyen pa 'bul tu
32a4(1): 'byung ba des tshig de brjod pa pag tu ne'i yod la 'di lta ste dge' snyen ma phul du 'byung bas sngon gyi smon lam gyis bos pas sems can grangs myed pa zhig shar phyogs kyi sgo nas nang du 'ongs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du 'di lta ste dge snyen ma bul tu
32a5(1): 'byung ba'i sngon gyi smod lam kyis bos pas sems can mangs byed pa zhigang sgo phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs kyi sgo nas nang du 'ongs rang bar gyur te/ de ltar 'ongs pa de dag dge snyen ma sul du byung bas stad de dag
32a6(1): la bkod da/ so so nas ci dga' ba'i kha zas sna tshogs dang // ro sna tshogs dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs dang ldan pas / yongs su tshim par byas so// yongs su bstand pa byas so// yongs su dga'
32a7(1): bar byas so// yongs su mgu' bar byas so// yongs su spro bar byas so// shin tu tshim par byas so// yid bde' bar byas so// kha dog sna tshogs kyis ji lta ba de bzhin tu/ btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / ro rnam pa
32a8(1): sna tshogs dang / stan sna tshogs dang / mal cha sna tshogs dang / gzhon pa sna tshogs dang / gos sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs dang / 'phreng ba sna tshogs dang / spos sna tshogs dang / bdug spos sna tshogs dang / byug pa
32a9(1): sna tshogs dang / bye ma sna tshogs dang / rin po che sna tshogs dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i shing rta sna tshogs dang / gtugs snga tshogs dang / rgyal mtshan sna tshogs dang / lnga'i ba dan sna tshogs sna tshogs dang
32a10(1): yo byad kyi yul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis tshim par byas so// yid dga' bar 'gyur ba'i bar du byas so// lha rnams ni lha'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byas so// klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang
32b1(1): nam mkha lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto phye chen po dang / myi dang mI yin pa rnams kyang myi ma yin pa'i khazas kyis yongs su tshim par byas nas// yid bde' ba'i bar du byas so// 'on kyang zla ba las god par gyudad pa byed
32b2(1): 'gribs pa myed/ dmas pa myed/ zad par 'gyur ba myed/ sa 'tshams su 'gyur ba myed/ mthar thug pa myed/ mur thug pa myed do// de nas dge snyen ma phul du byung ba des tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// 
32b3(1): rigs kyi bu kho mos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par tha dad pa bsod nams kyi mdzod myi zad pa'i rgyan ces bya ba 'di shes par zad na/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams chen po'i rgya mtshor gyi zad pas/ myi zad pa'i bsod nas
32b4(1): dang ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya chen po shin tu bsngags pas nam mkha' lta bur gyu ra pa/ 'gro ba zhes cad kyi smon las yongs su rdzogs par byed pas/ nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po lta bu 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge'
32b5(1): ba'i rtsa ba yongs su srung bas bsod nams chen po'i 'khor yug dang ldan pa ra'agro ba thams cad du rin po che snyim pa nas mar ltar thor bas/ bsod nam sa chen po'i sprin du gyur pa/ chos kyi grong khyer gyi sgo byed pas bsod nams
32b6(1): chen po'i mdzod la mngon gsum du lta ba/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bor / ba sa pa'i mun pa sel pas bsod nams chen po'i sgo mar gyur pa / de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am yon tan brjod par nus renan
32b7(1): song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer 'byung ba rjes po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na khyim bdag mkhas pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpal byang chub sems dpa'i
32b8(1): dpyod pa la ji ltar slab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi nor bzangs dge snyen ma 'phul du 'byung ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge snyen ma yul du 'byung ba la lan brgya stong
32b9(1): bum ngagayas phyogs su spong ba byas nas /  yang dang yang ltas te dge sten// bul du byung ba'i drung nas skabs ngoms pa bzhin du song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nong bsangs bsod nams kyi mdzod kyi bangad pa'i brgyan kyi rnam par bad
32b10(1): ba'i sdang ba rab tu thob pa deg bsod nams kyi rgya mtsho'i de la ni rjes su sems bsod nams nas 'kha' de lta ni kun tu lta bsod nams kyi phung po de ni yongs su 'dzind/ bsod nams kyi ri bo la ni mngon par 'dzeg
33a1(1): gnaso pas kyi chog pa de'i yang dag pa su pa' bas dpas kyi chu bde la ni mongs su babod// bsod nams kyi ngogs kyi su stegs pa pa ni btu sa/ bsod napas kyi kyis 'thad de ni yos ru nga/ 
33a2(1): dab bsod nams kyi gter de la ni yang dag par lta/ bsod nams kyi tshus do na rjes su dran par byed/ bsod nams kyi chos de ni yongs su 'dzin/ bsod nams kyi rgyud ni yongs su sbyong ba byed cing mthan gyis grong khyer 'byung ba chen pogan ba dang / 
33a3(1): phyin nas nam dge ba'i bzhes gnyen 'dod cing / dge ba'i bshes gnyed ltas pas spros pa'i sems kyi rgyud dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis byin gyis rlabs pa'i bsame pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la 'ogs pa byed pa'i spyor ba dang / 
33a4(1): dge ba'i bzhes gnyed pa ril 'gro bya bas skyo ba skyed pa'i btson mus dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag lus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / dge' ba'i bshes gnyen gyis nges par gyur da pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad
33a5(1): dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis rnam par spel ba'i thabs mkhas pa'i smod pa dang / gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog par dge ba'i bzhes gnyen ris 'gro bya ba la mkhas pa dang / rnam par 'phel ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
33a6(1): thams cad dang / nas par dag par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems ra ba'i lhag pa'i bsas pa dang / yang dag par 'phel ba'i byang chur sems dnga'i dbang po dang / yongs su sbyin par 'gyur ba'i dge ma
33a7(1): rtsa ba thams cad dang / yang dag par 'phel ba'i smon lam chen po mngon par sgrub pa dang / shi nad tu yangs par 'gyur ba'i snying rje chen pos bdag nyid thams cad mnyend pa nyid du nye bar gyur pa yang dag par mthong nas/ sangs rgyas
33a8(1): thams cad lal byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i khyod pas chos kyi sdang ba yang dag par blang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsnang ba rnam par lel bar byed cing / khyim bdag bakhas pa 'ongs su chol tshol
33a9(1): pa las grong khyer gyi dbus las gyi bzhi sa do zhig na/ rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu zhig la/ rin po che grangs khyod pa las byas pa'i waM/ nor bu rin po che'i rkang pa rdo rje dang / in 'dra ni la sna tshogs kyis spras pa
33a10(1): gser gyi lcags bod kyi dra bas legs par blas pa/ nor bu rin po che dri ma myed pa'i snying po can/ rin po che lnga brgya tsam gyis gzugs legs par rgyan pa lha rdzas kyi stan sna tshogs bting ba/ gams
33b1(1): nas sa rdzas kyi gos kyi rgyal mtshan dang / bdan mang po sbed pa/ rin po che du sa'i drabs kun nas gsogs pa/ rin po che'i bla res chen pos bres pa/ branas gser dang rin po che'i me tog gi lnga rdzi mang po bye bzhin sa bdun
33b2(1): cing 'dam bu'i chu klung gi gser gyi gtugs u ba dri ma myed pa/ bye du rgya las byas pa ni drung nas sbeng zhing bzung / g.yab thim skyed pa'i gdul yab dang pa'i rgyal po lta bus ni legs par g.yob/ spos kyi nim 'gro'i 'byed/ 
33b3(1): sna tshogs kyis ni gdugs shing bsangs/ rol mo chung ba dang / dgrob pa lA rdzas kyi dbyangs las 'das par sgra 'byin pa lnga brgya tsam gyis ni g.yas g.yon nas brdungs shing dkrolan/ grong khyer 'byung ba chen po na 'khod pa'i sems
33b4(1): can rnams shi nad tu dga' bar bya ba'i don tu lha rdzas kyi me tog gi sprin gi char ni kun nas 'bab par gyurd pa/ g.yog srog chags stong phrag bcu btsam sngon dge ba'i cha ba skal pa mnyam par pyod spyod pa/ ngag nyan cing ci dga'
33b5(1): bar byed pa lnga rdzas las 'das pa'i rgyan pa'i shi nang tu rgyan pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa yongs su grub pa/ lnga dang phyi'i gzugs las shin tu 'das pa sha stag gyis kun nas bskor cing 'dug pa
33b6(1): mthong nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs khyim bdag mkhas pa gang / na pa der song ste phyin nas/ khyim bdag mkhas pa'i rkang pa gnyis sa spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ khyim bdag mkhas pa la lan brgya
33b7(1): stong du mar g.yas phyogs nas bskor ba byas nas mdun tu 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa dag ni 'di lta ste sems can thams cad kyi sdug sngal zhi bar bgyi ba dang / 
33b8(1): sems can thams cad bde' ba la 'god pa dang / sems can thams cad 'khor pa'i rgya mtsho las mngon par 'don pa dang / sems can thams cad chos rin po che'i gling du yang dag par bskyal ba dang / sems can thams
33b9(1): cad kyi sred pa'i rlan shin tu bskam pa dang / sems cad thams cad kyi snying rje'i rlan yang dag par skyed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang / sred pa rnam par rlog pa dang / sems can thams cad
33b10(1): sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mos shing sgrub par bgyi ba dang / sems can thams cad 'khor bas mtha' dgon pa las yang dag par bzla ba dang / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / chos la dka'
34a1(1): h+ya/ zhing mos pa yang dag par skyed pa dang / sems can thams cad khams gsum gyi krob rdal nas gdon pa dang / sems can thams cad pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i pho brang du gzud par sems thams cad/ 
34a2(1): kyi don tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs kyis kyang ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du dbyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni
34a3(1): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstand pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slab par dbyi ba dang / ji ltar
34a4(1): labs na byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa bdag la bshad du gsol/ de skad ces smras pa dang / khyim bdag mkhas pas/ mad dpon gyi bu nor bzangs pa 'di skad
34a5(1): ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so/  legs so// rigs kyi bu sems can gang bla na myed pa yang da/ 
34a6(1): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / byang chub semadapa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol pa dang / dge' ba'i bshes gnyen lta bas myi ngoms pa dang / dge' ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro bas/ 
34a7(1): myi skyo ba dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim 'gro bya bas sgyid lug pa byed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsas pas yid kyi bdel ba myi skyed pa dang / dge' ba'i bshes gnyen btsal ba las phyir
34a8(1): gyi ldog pa dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mos shing dad pa'i yid las rnam par phyir myi ldog pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi don lta ba lar phyir phyi rtogs pa dang // dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gi
34a9(1): tshul la zhum pa myed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim 'gro dang snyen bkur bya bas myi skyo ba de lta bu ni shin tu dkon no// / rigs kyi bu khyod kyis kho bo'i 'khod 'di dag mthong mod/ smras pa rigs kyi bu 'di
34a10(1): dag kun kyang kho bos bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dag ste/ 'di dag ni kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su bskyed pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos pha rold tu phyin pas bsdud de gsos
34a11(1): pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos chos dkar po thams cad kyis bskyed pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la rnam par bskyed pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos 'jig rten gyi rigs las gyon du bskyod
34b1(1): kha'o/ 'di dag ni kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la bkod pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos 'jig rten gyi lam gyi 'khor lo las bzlog pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos chos kyi 'khod lo la btsun pa'o// 'di dag ni Na com
34b2(1): ngan mong gsus kyi drung babyung ba sas yongs su gzung ba'o// 'di dag ni ma mam mam nyid dung rdung bar bya ba sa bkod pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de sa na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can bsas na ci byangasu
34b3(1): byang da ba 'ad // rigs kyi bram mda' kyi mdzod nas byang ba'i bayod namam mang thotho ba'i ste/ de'i mabus lab sani la ba 'dod pa namapas sa kyi sbyin babyed do// dung bsod parnams lus dang / sod pa pa
34b4(1): 'dod pa rnams la ro'i dam pa dang / bza' ba 'dod pa rnams la bza' ba dang / bca' ba 'dod pa rnams la bca' ba dang / bldag pa 'dod pa rnams la ldag pa dang / mur 'dod pa rnams pa mur ba dang / gos 'dod pa rnams
34b5(1): gos dang / me tog 'dod pa rnams la me tog dang / 'phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la 'phreng ba dang / spos 'dod pa rnams la spos dang / 'dug pa 'dod pa rnams la bdug pa dang / byug bu 'dod pa rnams la byug pa dang / 
34b6(1): bye ma 'dod pa rnams la phye ma dang / rgyan dang ldab sgrub 'dod pa garnams la rgyan dang lbab lbub dang / rin po che 'dod pa rnams la// rin po che dang / gser 'dod pa rnams la gser dang / tshul 'dod pa rnas
34b7(1): sa rtsub dang / mu tig 'dod pa rnams la mu tig dang / rten 'dod pa rnams la rten dang / stan 'dod pa rnams la stan dang / mal rtsa 'dod pa rnams la mal cha dang / na ba'i bsos sman 'dod pa rnams la ni
34b8(1): na ba'i bsos sman dang yo byad dang / gzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la gzhon pa dang / dgal ba 'dod pa rnams la dkal ba dang / glang po dang / ta dang / shing rta dang / ba lang dang / bong bu dang / ma he dang / ra lug drod pa
34b9(1): rnams sa grang po dang / ta dang / shing dang / b.lang dang / brang bu dang / ma rke dang / dgrag dang / rgyal mtshad dang / gdugs dang / zhan 'dod rnamasapa/ rgyal bcan dang / gdugs dang pad dang / 
34b10(1): tho dang / zang po 'dod pa rnams la mang po dang than mo dang /  phyil pa 'ad pa rnam ma rgya dang / lung byar yo ma nga me pa gram gan cu ga pa rnams bum shi nga du dang
35a1(1): cod pa da dang / drug gi rid ba chi 'dod pa rnams brtsod pan dang gtsug ga rinapa dang /  bkadams pa'i kang+gA gangan ba yod pa dmas thong ba kadang bcas pa'i garba garin pa dang / 
35a2(1): swa bon ting dris byed pa'i dkyil 'khor byin pa byed pa nas/ yo byad sna tshogs thams cad 'dod pa rnams la yang yo byad sna tshogs thams cad kyi sbyin pa byed do// rigs kyi bu yud tsam cig sod dang / ne'u re mngon gsum
35a3(1): tu mthong bar 'gyur ro// de skad tu khyim bdag mkhas pa des tshig de brjod pa thag tu/ de'i mod la sems can grangs byed pa zhig khyim bdag khas pa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis bos pas/ phyogs pa dad pa dang yul dang gnas
35a4(1): tha dad pa dang / grong khyer tha dad pa dang / grong rdal tha dad pa dang / tshong dus tha dad pa dang / ldongs pa dad pa dang / 'dod kyi grong khyer tha dad pa dang / khyim tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi rgyu tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi rigs
35a5(1): tha dad pa dang / sems can rnam pa myi mthun pa pa dad pa dang / ra las kyi rgyun pa dad pa dang / gnas kyi rnam pa dang mying du bya ba da ngang ba dad pa nas/ sems can skye mjed dam par dag pa snga tshogs dang gang
35a6(1): khams su rtson ma don tu gnyer ba/ kha cos sna tshogs 'dod pa/ bsas pa pa dang pa/ bza' ga dang / gtung ba gtsang pa 'dang pa dang / ga'adod pa dang / khams rnam pa bdad pa sna tshogs don tu gnyer/ 
35a7(1): ba dang ga sa lam gyi rgyud rnam pa sna tshogs kyi khyad par du skyes pa'i skye mched la gnas pa 'di lta ste/ myi'i nang nas 'bras can dang / sran can dang / khur ba dang / skyo ma dang / nya dang / sha la brtogs pa
35a8(1): kham gyis bza' ba'i kha zas sna tshogs don tu gnyer ba dang / myi'i nang nas ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro gI mas cad na rnam par spyod pa dag las kyang kha zas dang / btung ba sna tshogs don tu gnyer ba dag de ltar byang chub sems
35a9(1): dpa'i mthu' dang byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa thogs pa myed par gtong ba'i rnga'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis bos pas kun kyang 'ongs par gyur te/ 'ongs nas kyang khyim bdag khas
35a10(1): pa la spongs mo 'debs so// gong du lta'o// sdod do/ gsol ba 'debs so// de nas khyim bdag mkhas pas spong ba de dag kun nas 'dus par shes nas// yud tsam du bsam ste/ nam khal la ltas
35b1(1): ba dang ga nam mkha'i dbyings nas khams dang / gtung ba nam pa sna tshogs dang / ro spa tshogs dang ldan pa/ kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ dri sna tshogs dang ldan pa mang po 'bon te/ lag bil tu 'ong bar gyur to// des de
35b2(1): yongs su spangs shing de ltar kun nas 'dus pa'i spongs so pa mos pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa de dag ci 'dod pa'i zas dang / btu pa'i rnam pa dang / yo byad kyi khyad par thams cad kyis yongs su tshig par byas so// ci 'dod pa yongs
35b3(1): bu sbyin no// rab tu dga' bar byas so// shin tutshim par byas so// dka' bzhin tu skye bar byas so// nyams shis tu bder bar byas so// yid rab tu dga' bar byas so// de ltar de dag shin tu tshig par byas nas des kyang bcog ce
35b4(1): de'i 'og tu chos bstand pa 'di lta ste/ ye shes kyi tshogs rgya chen po bsags pa'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa de chos bstan to// phongs pa thams cad 'byung myi srid pa'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / skyid pa chen yongs su grub par 'byung
35b5(1): ba'i sku yongs su brjod pa dang / chos kyi ye shes kyi tshul phob pa 'byung ba'i brgya yongs su brjod pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya chen po ra brtsegs pa'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa'i dga' ba za ba'i zas rab tu thob
35b6(1): rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / bla na byed pa'i kha zas yongs su shes thob pa// 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / bdud kyi dbu thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i bsod nams kyi stobs myi zad pa rab tu thob pa'i rgya
35b7(1): yang yongs su brjod pa byas te chos ston to// des kha zas don tu gnyer cing 'ongs pa rnams la nam mkha'i dbyings nas/ kha bas rnam pa sna tshogs blangs shing tshim par byas te/ de dag la tshe dang / mdog dang spobs dang / 
35b8(1): bde ba dang / sros pa kun gsum tshogs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to// des btung pa don tu gnyer cing 'ongs pa rnams la btung ba mang po zhis pa lanas mo ba byed pa/ yin gin tu dga' par byed pa dag gis/ 
35b9(1): tshim par byas nas/ de dag la 'khor bas skom zhing 'khor ba la dga' ba las rnam par zlog pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la dga' zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos pa yongs su skyed pa'i phyir chos bstan to// 
36a1(1): des ro'i mchog don tu gnyer cing 'ongs pa rnams la ro'i mchog sna tshogs dang ba dang / sbyar ba dang / lan cha dang / tsha ba dang / kha ba dang / bskrang ba rnam pa pa dad pas yongs su nis par byas te/ de'i 'og tu skyes bu/ 
36a2(1): chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog thob par bya ba'i phyir chos stand to// des zhon pa don tu gnyer cing phyogs kyi rgyud sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa rnams la gzhon pa sna tshogs kyi sbyin pas yongs su bsdud de de dag zhig pa chen po la gnas par bya
36a3(1): ba'i phyir chos bstand to// des gos don tu gnyer cing phyogs sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa kun nas 'dus par shes nas yud pa tsam cu bsams te/ nam mkha'i dbyings la ltas pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings las gos sna tshogs
36a4(1): sdong po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shes gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa la dog sna tshogs can/ 'a dog bu mar rnam par dag pa dag yon cing lag pa'i nyis du 'ongs pas/ des de dag gis slongs
36a5(1): zo ba dag la 'ongs su bsrud pa nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chushes pa dang / khrel 'od pa thun byed pa dang / mdog gamed kyidrogs bu thob par 'gyur ba nas par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos snyan to/ 
36a6(1): de zhi byad chogs thams cad kyis ji ltar 'ongs pa'i spongs so/ pa rnams la skud pa byas nas/ ci rigs su chos bstan to// de ltar khyim bdag mkhas pas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par bdadas
36a7(1): sam kyis kyi khyab pa'i yul snyand pa byas nas/ tshong dpon kyi bu nor 'a'adas pa 'di skad ces smras so// deshes kyi bri 'os ni 'ad kyi ma ngonas 'byung ba bdon sa khyenam pa bsasam
36a8(1): shes par 'ad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' yo byad la dbang 'ob pa/ rin po ze'i lag pa thob par gyu pa/ 'jig rten gyi khamasas lus pa thams cad lag pas las su kyebs par byas shing / sangs rgyas kyi
36a9(1): 'thong pa lnga tshogs bsgrub pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa 'ams cad kyi 'khor byed kyis 'khor tu rin pa che sa chogs kyi sbyin gyi na rab tu 'bebs pa/ de bzhin rgyan 'dog su chogs kyi sprin dang / cod pan 'dog sna tshogs kyi drin
36a10(1): dang / dam pam kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / sba rdzas kyi rol mo gtung ba dang / dkrol ba dang / klu yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs snyan pa sna tshogs kyi phrin dang / me tog kha dog sna tshogs kyi phrin dang / spos kha dog lnga
36b1(1): bstan te/ de'i byed kyis rlabs kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma sa tham na thob par 'byung ba ljongs su lta shing bams can pa byed/ banyi tu rag sus pa lta pa dang / dge 'i shes nyen cen
36b2(1): bar ses sa rab rgyad byin par byed pa dang / dge ba ma nyen kyi ba zhin tu sbyin pa'i ses pa dang na pa bstad pa ge ba'i shes na gyi dpa thas pa 'is bu na
36b3(1): dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdam sa ngas dang / tshig nyan par bya ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyed kyis byung ba'i dad pa'i dbang po sa bsam pa byed cing dge ba'i bzhes gnyen gyi btams te btam pa de
36b4(1): pa'i bshes gnyen bsnye cing btung ba dang / rjes su 'drung bar bya ba'i sems kyis khyis bdag mams pa'i rkang pa gnyis sa kyi sa byag sas te/ khyis bdag mkhas pad la san 'an spyong dub dag gyongs su rgo
36b5(1): ba byas dang / yang dang yang snyas te/ khyim bdag pa'as pa'i drung nam mong ngo // de nas tshong dpod kyi bu nor babangs bsod nams kyi chu yo de la ni min ches par sems/ bsod nams kyi zhing de sa ni sang dag par sa
37a1(1): bsod nams kyi po deni yongs su spyong / bsod nams kyi mu stegs de la ni yang dag par 'jig/  bsod nams kyi mdod de ni rnam par 'byed/ bsod nams kyi gted de ba ni nin tu / bsodan ma
37a2(1): kyid kyil 'khor de ni yongs su spyon pa bsod nams kyi phung mo de la ni yang dag par men 'asod rnams kyi stobs de ni yongs su babyed/ ma'od rnapas kyi grags doni nam par sel par byed cing / mas kyis thong byor
37a3(1): seng ge'i gzugs gangan ba deng byin te/ chos kyi tshong dpon rin cen gtsug phud yongs su chol chol ba las/ tshong dus kyi srang zhig na 'jug pa mabong nas des/ de'i rkang pa gnyis la gyi bos phyag 'chas te /  g.yas
37a4(1): phyogs su skor ba byas nas/ mdun tu 'dugs te/ bal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'as/ 
37a5(1): byang chub sems dpa'i dpyod pa srab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma las gang gisad bdag bla na byed pa mkhyend pa nyid tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i byang chub sems
37a6(1): dba'i mun ngag legs par myi sa lad tam/ de nas chos tshong dpon / rin cen gtsug phud kyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi lag nas bzung ste/ rang gi khyim gang na ba der khrid de/ khyim de bstand nas 'di
37a7(1): smras so/  ka rigs kyi bu kho ba'i khyim la ltos shig ces nas so/ des lhas na khyim de dag cing gsal la/ 'dzas bu chu klung gi gser yas byas pa ste/ yangs shing mtho' brgyal kyi rabs sor bas/ shes kyi
37a8(1): cig pas shi nad tu legs par brtsigs te/ mdzes par byas pa/ bye dUr+ya'i phung po brgya phrag stong gis rab tu rgya nad pa/ mu sa la gal ba'i bka ba bkye ba/ pu tig dmar po las byas pa'i seng ge'i khri shind tu bsham
37a9(1): wa~M ga nor bu ring po che rang bzhin snang ba'i seng ge'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba/ nor bu rin po chenam par sdang ba'i bla res bres pa/ gser gyi dra ba yid bzhin gyi nor bus rgya dad pas kun nas g.yog pa/ nor bu rin po ches
37a10(1): tshogs grangs myed pas rab tu brgyan pa/ a swa gang ba las bgyogs pa'i rdzing bu chu gsil bas gang ba dang ldan pas/ rin po che thams cad kyi shing gis skor ba/ rgya che zhing yangs pa/ rim pa bcung brtsigs pa/ 
37b1(1): shin tu mabor ba/ sngo brgyad dang ldan par 'jug ma mthong das/ des khyis de'i nang tu phyin te kun tu smras nas/ rim ma'ang mnga' sa'i 'gan na ba' ba dang / dud brlab pa songs su gzong ba mthong / rim 'draganyis pa'i
37b2(1): nang dgos kyi rnam pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba 'thong ngo // rim khar gsum pa'i nang na rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan dang / skab srub yongs su gtong ba mthong ngo // ris khang ba ni pa'i nang na btsun po'i 'khor dka' ba 'il rgyad rtsa
37b3(1): bya ba bud med rin po che'i chen po'i steng na bzang bya ba bya ba yongs su gtong ba mthong ngo // rim khang lnga pa'i nang na sa lnga pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chos yang dag par 'gro ba sa mos pa/ 'jig rten la phan pa dang / 
37b4(1): bder ba'i sems kyi spyod pa dang ldan pa/ gtsug lag thams cad mngon par sgrub pa / gzungs kyi tshul dang ting nge 'dzind kyi phyag rgya dang / ting nge 'dzin las rnam par ldang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin las rnam par spyad pa/ 
37b5(1): ye shes kyi snang ba mngon par sgrub pa 'dus shing 'khod pa mgo dang ngo // rim khang drug pa'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab dkyi pha rol tu phyind pas rnam par spyod pa rab tu thob pa/ shes rab gin du
37b6(1): zab pa rab tu zhi ba'i chos thams cad mngon par shes pa/ ting nge 'dzind dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / snying po mang pos sgo kun nabyung ba/ bsgribs pa byed pa'i spyod yul can/ myi gnyis pa la yang dag par
37b7(1): khyod pa/ chos yang dag par grol ba la rnam par 'phrul pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang zhing rnam par dbye' ba dang / rab tu gsal bar byed pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i sgom
37b8(1): dmang po yang dag par 'gro bar byed pa rnams kun nas 'dus shing 'khod pas mthong ste/ 'di ltar zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo zhi ba'i snying po zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa'i sgo 'gro ba thams cad du le zhes
37b9(1): rnam par bye ba zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rolang tu ba'i sgo myi g.yo ba'i grong zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa'i sgo chub dang bral ba'i 'od ces bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i no thub par dka' ba zhes
37b10(1): bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i sgo 'gro ba bams cad mos par byed cing rjes su 'brang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i sgo phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i tshul gyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba dang / 
38a1(1): mdzod dang ldan pa zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i sgo chos thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa'i sgo 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha ro
38a2(1): tu phyind pa'i sgo 'ogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i sgo chos kyi sprin la dmyigs pas rim pas myi dmyigs pa'i gnas zhes bya ba dang / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i sgo de dag la sdogs pa
38a3(1): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa grangs myed pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang par yang dag par 'gro ba byed cing brgyan brjod du byed pa shin tu rnam par bye ba'i 'khord kyi dkyil 'khor na 'khod pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// rim khang bdun pa'i nang na byang chub
38a4(1): sems dpa' sgra brnyan lta bu'i bzod pa rab tu thob pa thabs dang / ra ye shes rnam par gdon myi za ba la shin tu 'byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yang dag par 'dzin pa sha stag 'dus shing 'khod par
38a5(1): 'thong ngo // rim khang brgyad pa'i nang na byang chub sems dpa'am nyams par 'gro ba'i mngon par shes pa rab tu thob pa/ 'jigarten gyi khams thams cad tu rnam par 'gyur ba/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
38a6(1): thams cad du gzugs rnyan rab tu 'byung ba chos kyi dbyings thams cad du lus shin tu rnam par phye ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi rlung nas gud du myi 'phag pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku
38a7(1): la yang dag par gzhol ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du sngon du brjod pa'i gtam gyi skyes bur 'gyur bag stag/ kun nas bsdus shing 'khod pa mthong ngo // rim khang dgu pa'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' stsa
38a8(1): tshe cig gis thogs pag stag 'dus shing 'khod pa mthong / rim khang bcu pa'i nang na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thog ma byang chub tu thugs skyed pa dang / spyod pa dang / 'byung ba dang / smon lam rgya mtsho dang / sangs rgyas
38a9(1): kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / 'khor kyi da kyil 'khor thams cad dang bcas pa dang / chos kyi khor lo rab tu sgrog pa dang / bcas pa dang / sems can 'dul bar mdzad pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / 
38b1(1): sa pa mthas yogs ma bya yan / ga sung ba ni na na sgru /  / 
38b2(1): thu shis byung bar ba ma nga/ dgra ba ma pa ni gzhig pa sa pa bsnang byungs sa po rigs kyi bu po sa yi shA kyig pa nga rgyas kyishing shing zhin tu zla she sa pa'i bcogacishin yi
38b3(1): khams 'khor lo sna tshogs zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings 'od zer mtha' yas pas yongs su brgyan pa'i chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba mkhyend pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyend pa tha na
38b4(1): byed par skyes bu 'dul ba'i khabo sbyar ba/ swa dang phyi rnams kyi bston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'i shes rnam par snang ba la sogs pa/ nyan pos bye ba phrag rtsa
38b5(1): dang / oM shes nyi ba'i bzi brjid la sogs pa byang chub sem das dpa' bye ba brgya phrag stong dang babs gcig tu rgyal po chos kyi dpa dbug rgyal thos kyangan drangs nas bama' shing gi rab chen po rin cen rgyang
38b6(1): mtshad rkyed kyis mdzes pa zhes bya bar gshegs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de grong khyer du gshegs nas tshor 'dus kyi srang nasabazhud pa'i tshe/ kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa de dang / byang chub sem
38b7(1): dpa' dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi bcas pa la mchod pa byas 'i phyir/ bsil bstan dang / rol mo'i sgra zhig kyang byung / slob tu dril bu cig kyang bsregs ste/ bdug spob kyis bsangs so/ 
38b8(1): thos kyi dris bu cig po de snang sregs papa/ zhag btud d+ha la ma bu'i gling bas pa pa kyang gos kyi dbud kyi smin gyi 'dog sa rdzogs dang 'ad pas/ sems can 'ams pan kyisus dang 'dra thos yongs su phyebs par 'gyur / 
38b9(1): rje tsan drangad po de de dag pas kyang sna 'dri ga du brjod de/ de bzhin gshegs pani bsam rjes kyi byab ste/ cub gsum mim byed pa'i rishes kyi phung po dang ldan pa'o// mams pad pabyedan pa nye skye bya ba bams cad
38b10(1): byam nga ba'o// gnyon mongs pa'i bgacag pa thams can yongs su byung ba ste/ de 'azhin gshegs pas yod bus pa bams cad cang babs cad pa byed pa don chen pongon byed pa sgrub par 'gyur ro// thamasas
39a1(1): dbun gyi sprin re las sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sgra'i rnam pa de lta bu byung ngo // rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang kho bos gnas gsus
39a2(1): du yongs su bsngos te/ gsum gang zhe na 'di ltar phongs pa thams cad shin tu rgyun chad pa dang / dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang / myi 'bral pa dang / dge' ba'i bshes gnyen sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
39a3(1): thams cad mthong ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngos so// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par tha dad pa smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor thogs pa myed pa'i rgyan ces bya ba 'di

39a7(1): nyid la zhugs pa/ bskald pa thams cad tha myi dad par yongs su gnas pas myi skyo ba/ kun tu lta ba ba myi dad pa'i yul gyi sa la gnas pa/ de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re rkan// song rigs
39a8(1): kyi bu sngo phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na yul sA'i rtsa ba zhes bye ba yod de/ de'i grong khyer kun nas sgo zhes bya ba na/ tshong dpon spos chod kun tu lta ba zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song ya/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub
39a9(1): sems dpa'i spyod pa la srab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan tu bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi nor gzangs kyis/ chos kyi tshong dpon rin cen gtsug phud kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos kyi tshong dpon
39b1(1): cin cen gtsug pud la lan rgya stong bya mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dag pa ltas te/ tshong dpon rin cen gtsug phud kyi rkang pa gnyis la s+ye bos phyag 'tshal te// chos kyi tshong dpon rin cen gtsug phud sa lan
39b2(1): rgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang ltas te/ chos kyi tshong dpon rin cen gtsug phud kyi drung nas song ngo // dum bu bzhi pa / bram po bzhi'i pa'o// 
39b3(1): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs pa/ sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa mthong ba la zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa dang 'grogs pa rab tu thob pa byang chub sems dpa'i lam mtha' yas pa'i tshul gyis
39b4(1): sdang bar gyu pa chos kyi tshul mtha' yas pas mngod par dran pasazhin rtogs pa'i sems dang ldad pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i thos pa mapa' mas pa'i las kyirnams par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po
39b5(1): mtha'asas pa'i sdang ba rab tu thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsas pa/ dmapa mas pa'i stobs pa gnas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i byodadabs pa mas ma'i rjes su ma ba'i sems dang ldan pa
39b6(1): byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam mtha' yas pa'i stobs yongs su skyes ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzhan gyis thub pa myed pa ma ba' yas pa'i rgya'i mtshan can/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes

42b1(1): kyis spongs nas/ grong nas grong dang / sul nas yul du tshol zhing grong nas ta ya'i rgyal mtshan gang na pa der phyi nad te/ rgyal po mye gad na bzhugs zhes dris na/ de la 'gro ba gzhan dag gis 'di skad du bstan te/ rigs kyi bu de re

43a10(1): tsu n+ya drim byed pa'i yu ba can/ rin po che'i gar bu brgya phrag bcus rnam par 'beb / 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi bra gas can/ nor bu rin po che skra snang ba nas par dag pa'i snying po cad/ rin po che'i dril gyi 'breng ba lam hA
43b1(1): snyan cing yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ba/ nor bu rin po che'i 'od phyogs kun tu 'phro ba can/ cung nas bzung zhing bsgreng ba/ rgyal po'i gzi brjid dang dbang po ched po gnas pa/ srid la gzhan gyi 'khod kyis gtse ba byed pa

43b6(1): chad pas gcod par 'os pa'i sems can chad pas gcod pa la brtson pa mthong /  /  // de na srog chags rku ba/ gzhan gyi nor la phrog pa/ sem// / sa can gyi long spyod chud brtson pa/ sam skugs shing srog pa
43b7(1): dang grong khyer dang / grong bdas dang / rnas pa me gtong bkrod dunam tha byed pa/ khyim sugs 'debs pa/ sdig sdig smrar byed pa/ cag kug pa/ thugs pa byed pa/ nga kyi byed pa/ byibo byed pa/ 
43b8(1): thog par zhugs pa/ gnod par sems dpa'/ 'dod chen che ba/ sdig pa lnga tshogs kyi las phyi bad pa byed pa/ brgya stong mang po banings pa/  dam po lngas bcings shing / rgyal po phye'i drung du khrid pa dag kyang mthong ngo // 
43b9(1): de dag la'ang rgyal po byes ci rigs par chad pas gcad par 'gyur ba mthong ngo // des de na rgyal po mes bsgo zhing lasas de na lag bcad/ ya la ni na pa dang sna bcud/ pa la ni dbyig byung / sa la ni yan lag dang / nyin pag dang / 
43b10(1): bko' bcad/ sa la ni lus thams cad mes btang / la la ni ba tsa'i chu khol mas yus la gtod cing pags pa brnyil ba las batshogs pa de lta bu'i chad pa sna tshogs tu sa myi zad pa drag pa/ brlang ba yid du kyi 'ong ba srog brog pa
44a1(1): dpagacan gsum tsam du gzabs su zab pa/ chu zhing tu dag ma du pa yod pa sang mthang/ de na ni ba'i gang dus yan lag dang / rkyen tug dang / mgo dang tharab rgya ci pa 'akyang ci / dang/ 
44a2(1): khyi dang / bya rog dang / bya rgod dang / wa dang / spyang ku ra ra mang pos gang ste/ 'drad cing phog pa mthong ngo // de la 'ang la la ni kha dog 'gyur te/ sngon por gyurd pa tsam/ la la nin bas patsam/ la la ni bam ba tsam/ a sa ni 'du
44a3(1): zhugs pa tsam tu gyur da te/ shin tu skyi ya zhing 'jigs 'jigs pa ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo // gsad pa de dag gsod pa'i tshe myi stug tshe dgur byas pas na/ 'jigs 'jigs dang / snying rje rje skad du sgra 'byin cing / cho der 'debs pa'i/ 
44a4(1): spra chen po mabos na/ skyil shing myi dka' ba chen po skyed pa/ sems can dmyal ba chen po res gzhom pa'i sgra lta bu yang bos so// des de ltar kha btags te btangs pa dang / shinan tu 'jigs pa'i drag gus mthong nas/ 
44a5(1): 'di snyam du gyur to// bdag ni sems can thams cad la bdang ha dang / bde ba'i phyir bran byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngod par zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i khyod pa yongs su mo ba nis
44a6(1): 'bad de/ dge' ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la dge' ba ni ji zhig bgyi/ phyi dge ba ni gang zhig spang zhes 'dri drin/ rgyal po bye 'di la ni dge ba'i chos kyang byed de/ kha na ma tho ba chen po'i las la pyod pa'i yid kyi
44a7(1): yongs su rtog pa/ shin tu tum pa dang ldan pa/ sems can sa rol gyi srog gcod pa la zhugs pa/ sems can pa ros shin tam nad pa la brtson pa/ tshe byi ma la lta ba byed pa/ dad song gig yang sa'i gang na 'dug pa zhig
44a8(1): na 'dug/ 'di ltas dri zhig byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang thos par 'gyur ram snyam ste/ de ltar sems shing yid la byed de// sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa la mngon par brtson pa/ snying rje rgya chen pa'i som
44a9(1): dang ldan pa de la/ steng gi nam mkha'i dbyings las lha mang pos bos pa/ rigs kyi bu drang srong rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi/ dge' ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams rag tu bya ba myi dran nam/ des gyen tu nam mkha'i
44b1(1): dbyings la lhas nas dran no zhes brjod do// blarnams kyis spang pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod dge ba'i bzhes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la de skad be cos ma skyed cig/ rigs kyi bu dge ba'i bzhes gnyen nams ni yang dag pa pa no
44b2(1): khyod kyi logs ma yi no// rigs kyi bu byang dub sems da'a' rnams kyi babs ma'as pas spyod pa'i mishes ni bas pa kyis kyi rgyab po// ma pa dun songs btsun pa'i ge sani bams kyis byi / 
44b3(1): sems cad 'an 'dogs pa'i ye shes bsam gyis kyi khyab bo// sems can tshad gcod pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis myi khyab bo// sems can gzeng sod pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis kyi khyab bo// sems can yongs su
44b4(1): sbyong ba'i ye shes ni bsam gyis byi khyab bo/ sems can yongs su spyod ba'i ye shes bsam gyis kyi khyab bo// sems can 'jud pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis kyi khyab bo// sems can yongs su sbyin par byed pa'i yeshes pasam
44b5(1): kyis myi khyab thod sems can 'dus pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyi myi khyab bo// song rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i pyod pa dris shig ces nas/ tshong dpon gyi nor bzangs kyis kwa'i rag
44b6(1): da te/ rgyal po bye ga nga 'de 'ong te/ byin nas rgya bye'i rkang pa kenyis pa su khos phyag 'tshal te/ rgyas gyilen brgya hod tu bdagapas phyogs song 'byab sa/ 
44b7(1): byebs po phur nas 'di skad ces byas so// bsags pa bdag gis bu da byed pa yang dge yar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sa bslab par
44b8(1): mabye ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams pa gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzan do zhes bdag gis sos na/ 'phags pa ri ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i
44b9(1): myod pa la ji ltar slab par bya ba dbyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bka' sa la par gsol/ de nas rgyal po phyis rgyal po'i bya ba byas te/ seng ge'i khri la sa langs dam / tshong dpor gyi bu nor sazangs kyi sag
44b10(1): po nas bzung ste rgya mazar po blang ta la'i rgyal mtshad du khrid do// des ba kyis dang gi gnas su byin nas tsha dpyod kyi bu nong mangs btsun pa'i labang kyi nang dukhrid de/ khril bzhag tas 'di gad ces smras so// rigs kyis
45a1(1): gangs kyib dang ma byed pa gapa zhesan/ des pas dkyis de phye me meng las rin ba'i bdud byer bas 'ongs su sor ba nor pa rin po che mchogs kyipang sa ni tu mam par byab pa/ 
45a2(1): re'i khang pa brtsegs pa/ brgya stong du mas rab tu brgyad pa/ nor bu rin po che bsam gyis kyi khyab pa'i 'od shin tu 'bar bas/ bzing brjid rab tu 'bar bar byas pa/ nor bu rin po me snga tshogs kyis nas pa pa dad par na
45a3(1): bar bye zhing bris pas rnam par mdzes par byas pa/ mu tig dmar po'i ka ba bkye ba/ nang du seng ge'i khri mu sa ra gal pa las byas pa/ rin po che brgya stong du mas rnam pa sna tshogs su brgyan pa/ shin tu bshams pa
