45a4(1): nor bu rin po che skar ba sdang ba'i seng ge'i rgyal mtsha shin tu bsgreng pa nyed nas nor bu rin po che snga ma par snang ba'i bla res bres pa/ 'di bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che snga tshogs kyi dra bas kun nas g.yogs pa/ nor bu rin bro ches tshod
45a5(1): grangs byed pas rab tu brgyan pa'i ba gam gi rgyan dang ldan pa/ a s+pha gar ra pa las byas pa'i rdzing bu bsil pas gang ba dang ldan pa/ rin po rje sna tshogs kyi shing gis 'khor bar 'dug pa mthong ngo // 
45a6(1): de 'khor bud myed bzang zhing mdzes pa ldan bsug pa kha dog brgyas pa// bzang pa'i yul du bya ba dang ldan pa/ smra bal thams cad kyis/ tshul la mkhas pa sngon du snang ba/ phyi nas nyam pa/ 
45a7(1): byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa /  ci spo ba bzhin du byed cing / rag nyan 'bye brag bcu yang 'khor par mthong ngo // de nas rgyal po chen po skyes tshong dpon gyi nor bzangs pa 'di skad ces smras so// 
45a8(1): rigs kyi bu ji snyam du sems/ jig sdig pa byed pa rnams la las kyi rnam par sbyin pa mngon par grub pa 'di lta bu yod dam/ lus phud gsum tshogs pa 'di lta bu yod dang/ 'khor phun gsum tshogs pa 'di sa
45a9(1): chu 'od dang / nga bached po sun gsum tshogs pa 'di sa du yod dam/ dbang phrug dpang chen po spun gsum tshums pa di lta bu yod dang / smras pa 'phags pa ni smra ba ni ma ma po// des byas ba/ 
45a10(1): rigs kyi bur ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par bdad pa smra ma'i rnam pa thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'i su lan gnas pa'i sems can 'di dag kyang sa la nir ldog gcod par byed pa sa byin par yod pa/ 'dod pa
45b1(1): na lon par g.yem pa/ thun tu smra ba/ pra ba cad/ tshig badrang por sla ba/ byang rgyal bus yod pa/ chags su san pa/ gnod sems can/ log par lta ba/ sdig pa'i las byed pa/ khro zhing btum pa/ ra
45b2(1): rgyal canamyi dge ba'i las kyi bya ba snga tshogs dang ldan pa dag ste/ de dag ni rnam pa gzhan gyis sdig pa'i spyod pa las bzlog pa dang / dkag pa dang bstan par gyi nus te/ de ltar rigs kyi bu da ni sems cad 'di
45b3(1): dag 'dul ba dang / yongs su sbyin par bya ba dang / shin tu 'dul bar bya ba dang / phan par la 'god par bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po mdun du byas te/ gsod pa'i gshed pa sprul par rnams la bsod du gzun pa
45b4(1): dang ga chad pas gcod pa'i mye sprul pa rnams myi dge ba'i las kyi kham la 'apyod par 'khru lad pa'i myi rnams la chad pa sna tshogs kyis gcod du gzud pa dang / rga lag dang / sna dang / na ba dang / sman lag dang / nyin lag
45b5(1): dang na 'go gcod pa las byung ba'i sug sngal gyi zad pa nyams bu tshor bar ra 'gyur ba lta bu dag kyang yongs su stond par byed de/ de mthongs dpa'i 'bas na gnas ba'i sems can de dag nyes pa gtong na/ 
45b6(1): skyo ba'i shugs thob par 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa skye zhing bag tsha ba s+ye/ bar 'gyur ro// de dag sdig pa'i las byed pa rnams gtong ba zhing bag byed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de ltar na nga ni/ 
45b7(1): thams cad 'di dag dang thabs des nyes pa gtong zhing 'jigs pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / spro ba'i yid dang ldan par shes nas/ phyi dge bcu'i las kyi lam las bzlog te/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi las dang na
45b8(1): par byas nas dga' zhing bde ba'i thar byin pa/ sug sngal bams cad rgyun cad pa'i thams cad ma byind pa'i nyid kyi bder ba la 'dod par byed kyi/ rigs kyi bu ngani lus dang / shakas/ yid kyis kyang
45b9(1): bes pa dums pa bye ni/ zo gyi 'jam sa sa kyi bur dan phyi ma'i mama'i bad byen pa'i bklun kyi ba sa 'o byas pa gi ste gnas sbyin pa'i 'phags s+hos sa lus kyang ca na
45b10(1): chog gas pacu ga sa yang sesas bskyed pa gcig sa ca'ang smras pa rgyang byab byed pa da / ning kya kyang zhi dgi ba sa khyo pa byed pa dus pa'i gyi zhig gci 'o/ 
46a1(1): zung dkyi sa na yang bye dge 'tshas yongs su rgyab rje byedad/ na 'asams ten gzi dang/ rigs kyi bu de gang sa byang chub sems da pa napa pa bsdu ba'i rna di sa
46a2(1): na/ 'angs byang chub sems dpa'i phyi skye ba'i chos kyi ba'od pa thob pa/ srid pa dang lam gyi rgyud thams cad sgyu ma'i rnam pa khong du chud pa/ grub pa lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas 'byung ba/ gzugs rnyed
46a3(1): lta bu'i 'jig rten thams cad rnam par rig pa/ phyi lam lta bu'i chos nyid khong du rud pa/ thogs pa skyed pa la na chom kyi dbyings kyi nus 'arjes su zhugs pa/ byug 'brub lta bu'i spyodan pa'i dra ba togs par gyur pa/ 
46a4(1): zhes bsgribs pa myed pa'i spyod yul gyi yul dang ldan pa/ kun du yang dag par gzhol pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi lam gyis 'byung ba/ klor kun tu/ 'gyi lad pa'i rgyud kyi gzungs la dbang sgyur ba/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod
46a5(1): sul gyi yul payang du chung ba rnams kyi rtsod pa 'azhes pa 'am yod ta brjod par du dang / ma darigs kyi bya dophyogs kyi kyad 'de nyi na myo byer 'di babang pozhes bya tsho 'ad do/ 
46a6(1): deng rgyal po 'od chen po zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song du// de ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i khyod pa bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan na bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong
46a7(1): dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ rgyal po me'i rkang pa gnyis la gyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ rgyal po mye la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su skor ba byas te/ yang dang yang ltas te/ rgyal po phye'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon
46a8(1): kyi 'u dong pa'angs/ legs skya 'i rjes su drad par byed nga / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'dadapa/ smra ba'i rnam pa de la bsas pa dang / chos nyid sgra ma das pa de larab tu bdag padang / mas kyi stsal pa che
46a9(1): 'ja btud par bya ba dang / chos nyid smras mnyam pa de la rjes su bsam pa dang / chos kyis yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i 'al pa mnyas pa de 'o dudun par bya ba dang / ye shes las 'byung ba'i bsnang ba bsam kyis kyi khyab pa
46a10(1): de'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / spong lab kyi smra ba'i rnam pa mtha' yas pa mngod par bsgrub pa de mngod par smrab par bya ba dang / spyod pa yul pa'i chos nyid chags pa myed pa rme pa par spang bar bya ba dang / cus na
46b1(1): mal khol dang / ri dang / de yul dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong brda ba dang / ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i gnas thams cad du yongs su spro ba byed pa'i sems dang / lus latub pa byed pa col tshos te/ grong khyer ched za'i
46b2(1): 'ang tu kyi du lab na can thogs pa sa na/ des mo ma bas pa'an pa/ ris kyi mi ning dzin thang byi 'das shes kyapa srin te/  ga po 'atsun pa
46b3(1): nas ga de na la tshong dpon gyi bu nong bzangs / grong khyer ba'ang po kan ba ning phyind nas/ grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyam sa 'di la/ cis zhing srid bde ba skyes nas/ 'di snyas
47a1(1): bdun gyis kun nas yongs su bstod pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi tal phreng ba rim pa bdud kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba/ rdo rje rin po che'i ra ba bdud gyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba/ 'di lta te seng ge yi du'o
47a2(1): pa'i rdo rje bu dang / rorje gzhon byes thub babyed parang ba dang / gathug pa'i da rgyas kyi dordo'i ba dang / bub pa dga' ba'i nga chus byin rjeri ba dang / daji btad bcags pa byed pa'i ba dang / 'ji 'od ra dra ba'i na po rab
47a3(1): tshul dang bral ba'i kha dog gi rgyan du kyi rdo rje bas yongs su bsnos pa ste/ rdo rje'i rin po che'i ra ba de dag thams cad kyang nor bu rin po che grangs byed pas yongs su sbas pas 'dzam su na krung gi gser gyi sA kun dang / bso ma
47a4(1): kha bkye ba 'acub rin po che'i ba so'i phreng ba mdzes pas brgya dad pa rin po che byed dU r+ya'i ba sol 'phreng ba mdzes pas rgya dad pa/ ring po che'i shel gyi ba mo'i 'phreng ba mdzes pas brgyand pa/ rin po re'i bye ru'i kha so'i phreng bas brgyan pa/ 
47a5(1): mu tig rin po che mtsho'i snying po pa se'i 'phreng ba mdzes pas brgyand pa ste/ grong khyer chen po de'i sgo chen po brgyad kyi ber bar na yang dpag tshad bcu bcu dayod do// sgo de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun las sna tshogs byur byas pa ste lnga
47a6(1): yid du 'ong ba'o// khrod khyer chen po de ni de ltar rgya che zhing yangs nga / yan lag parnam pa brgyad du rnam par byed/ byed bya sngon po'i sa la gnang sa pa ste/ grong khyer chen po 'di'i deng na yang srang chen po bye ba phrag bcu yod de
47a7(1): nga ngo broganyis ras kyang kyis ched po brgyad phran mang stong 'thos seshes pa 'gribs pase ku tu dzin po cis chogs pas byas pa dag go// 'dam po'i tun 'jogs kyi rab tu rgyan pa dag go/ ri poso gas
47a8(1): dang pa rgyal mchad basbeng ba dang / ba dang che bra dang ldad pa dag go/ g.yo byad thams cad phun gsum tshogs pa dag go// sems can khrag khrig tu ma gnas pa dag ko/ grong khyer chen po de yang nor bu rin po che ba dog grangs byed pa'i 'ang pas yes
47a9(1): par byas pa ste/ 'jas bu chu krung gi gser gyi khang 'artsegs pa la rin po che'i bye bu t+ya'i dra bas kun nas khebs pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i ringan po che'i rgyan gyis rgyadad pa grangs phyed pa dag dang ldan pa'o// dpral gyi khang pa stegs pa wa mu tig
47a10(1): dbang po'i dra bas kud nas khebs pa bsas gyis kyi khyab pa'i rin po de'i rgyand kyis rgyand pa grangs byed pa dang ldan pa'o// bye ta r+ya'i khang pa legs pa la rin po che mchon snga tshogs kyi dra bas kun nas khebs pa bsam gyis gyi khyab pa'i ri
47b1(1): na na pa tsho gro ra ma gas pa dzin ma sakyi khyab yin kyi skyed
47b2(1): nala'i 'a sa legs pa la/ rin pagyid pas kyi sto pa 'ad zer gyi thabs ku das 'bas pa bsas kyis kyi byab pa dzin po 'i rdzun kyis byad pa grungs myed pa dang bla pa'o// na pa ro'i du tsuslobargya ma pa
47b3(1): 'dzin pa tsho'i rgya po 'das 'od bye bye d+hA sa can dpa 'bas pa bsas kyis kyi khyab pabadzin pa 'i ldan gyis kya pa grangs byed pa dang na pa'o// de btsardo rje'i 'a sa theg pa badzin pa'i rgyal logagan kyis kyi thub / 
47b4(1): babs ma byis bye khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyun kyis rgyan pa grangs byed ba dung ldan pa'o// spos kyi rgyas po chungs pa skyed pa'i khar pa legs pas/ gardzas kyi me tog snga tshogs kyi dra bas grad nas thes
47b5(1): bas bsam byis kyi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i grang byed pa dang ldan pa'o// rin po che'i khang pa legs pa de dag re zhing yang / rin po che'i ba kun dums btsun pa/ rin bzod ste/ 
47b6(1): bu ri bdud kyis skod pa/ rin po rje'i d+ha la'i phreng ba'i rim bdun gyis 'khor par gribs pa'o// rin po che'i lan kan de dag dang // rin po che ba la de dag thams cad bya'ang phan tshun du rin po che'i srad bus sbrel pa'o// rin po che'i
47b7(1): srang bu de dag thams cad kyang gser gyi dril bus phreng bas brgyan pa'o// gser gyi dril bu 'phred pa de dag thams cad kyang// rin po che'i dun po'i lnga sna sna tshogs kyis rnam par bris shing spes pa'o// rin po rje rjen zam
47b8(1): lnga sI de dag thams cad las kyang rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba mngon par spyad pa dag ste/ de ltar grong khyer chen po'i dra ba grangs myed pas kun nas byebs pa'o// rin po che drig bu'i g.yer ka'i dra ba grangs myed pas/ 
48a1(1): nas phyebs pa'o// ro rje'i bu de grabs skyed pas kun nas byebs pa'o// rin po che'i bu de grangs byed pas kun nas byebs pa'o// rin po che'i gdugs kyi bla re grangs byed pas kun nas byebs pa'o// ri po rje'i khang pa chen
48a2(1): pa'i bu grangs byed pas kun nas byebs pa'o// gos rin po che'i bu grangs byed pa la spyad napa byegs pa'o/ mye tog gi phred pa'i bla re grangs byed pas kun nas byebs pa'o// ri po 'i'i gdugs dang / rgyas bcad mtshanas
48a3(1): btsugs shing bsgreng pa ste/ grong khyer chen po'i 'od bzang ba mdadabus su rgyal po bzhugs pa'i pho brang bzigs pa 'bod kun tu dang /  na pani yod pa ste/ rin po rje lnga brgyan las byas pa'o// rin po chen modas
48a4(1): kyi stegs bu rib pa bdud kyis yongs su bkor ba'o// rin po rje/ 'i dril bu yid du 'ong ba'i sgra sman par 'grol ba'i dra ba'i ba bdud / byes kun 'byung ba'o// rin po che sna bdun gyi ta ma'i 'phreng ba ris pa
48a5(1): bdun gyis kun nas bskor ba'o// rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa rtsegaso pa'i rgyan brgya tor bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang ldan pa'o// rdzing rin po che sna tshogs tu ma las byas pa/ gser gyi gam bu kun tu bkram pa
48a6(1): yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang ba/ swa rdzas kyi ud pa la dang / pad mo dang / ku mun d+ha dang / me tog pun d+ha ri kas chu'i steng kun tu g.yog pa/ rin po che'i me tog dang / 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs kyis rab
48a7(1): tu brgyan pa/ phyogs bzhi nas rin po che'i pha gus bzigs pa'i them spras rnam par bkyel ba can gyis shin tu mdzes par byas pa dang ldan pa/ lnga rdzas kyi sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba 'byin pa'i bya bran sna tshogs kyi sgra shin tu
48a8(1): 'byung ba yod pa/ lha'i dbang po'i pho brang dang / 'gran pa ste de'i dbus na/ rin po che 'gro ba la snang ba'i khang pa chags pa/ shin tu bzang la mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba/ rin po che grangs myed pa'i rgyan bsam gyis kyi khyab pa'i
48a9(1): gya nom par brgyad pa ste/ de'i nang na rgyal po 'od chen po'i dam pa'i chos gces pa'i dbyig tu bya ba bzhags so// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs rin po che'i 'obs de dag la ni chags pa'i sems byed/ rin po che'i ra ba
48b1(1): de dag la ni ngo mtshar du 'dzin pa'i yid byed/ rin po che'i ta kha'i phreng ba de dag ldi 'dod cing chags pa byed/ 'u rin po che'i dril bu dra ba'i sba la ni ro byong bar byed pa byed/ wA rdzas kyi rol mo'i sgra dang / glu ro snyan pa'i dbyangs
48b2(1): ni chags pa myedarin po che rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzhal myed khang dang / khang pa tshogs pa'i sna tshogs kyi longs spyod ni yid la bya ba myed par shin tu dga' bar 'gyur ba'i skyes pa dang / bud myed kyi tshogs kyi dga' ba'i
48b3(1): thim pas shin tu dga' zhing gzugs dang / sma dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg la dga' bas dben pa'i sems dang ldan pa chos nges par brtag pa la shin tu mos pas/  sems can gang dang phrad kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen rtag tu 'dri zhing
48b4(1): mthar kyis grong khyer gyi lam gyi sum 'do'i drung zhig tu byin nas kun tu ltas na/ grong khyer gyi lam gyi sum mdo'i dbus kyi mchod rten gyi khang pa nas ha cang yang myi ring ba zhig tu rgyan chen po dang ldan pa'i khri rin po che bye dUr+ya sngon po'i rkang
48b5(1): sa pakyer ba bye du t+ya dkar po'i seng ges blangs pa/ 'dzam bu chu krung gi gser gyi lugs bod kyi dra ba legs par btags pa/ lha rdzas dums kyang 'das pa'i rin po che'i stan sna tshogs bting ba//  rin po che'i 'bru grangs byed
48b6(1): pas h+yan par btsun pa/ nor bu rin po che'i rgyan bsam gyis myi khya ba bI/ dra bas kun tu khyebs pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi snam bu lka dardzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi gur shin tu sba bar bkye' ba'i gnam sol bres
48b7(1): ba nga no bu ring po che 'de bzhin kyi rgyal po'i snying po dang ldan pa des bu'i chos kyi 'i chen po la rgyal po ched po rgya chen po'i mtshan sus sa cu rtsa gnyis kyis sus shin tu byan pa dper byed pazang po sa chogs
48b8(1): brgya bcu tham pas lus shin tu mdzes pa/ gser gyi ri bo ltang rin po che sna tshogs nam par dkod pas rnam par mdzes pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar gzigs ma dngas rab tu 'bad ba zla ba nya zhing rgyas pa'i dkyi/ 
48b9(1): 'khor ltar lta na bzad pa tshangs pa'i 'khor gyi nang na rnam par mdzes pa/ rgya mtsho ltar zab mo'i chos dang yon tan mtha' yas pa'i rin po che'i tshogs dang ldan pa/ sprin chen po ltar chos kyi rang bzhin gyi 'brug sgra
48b10(1): sgrog pa namakha' ltar chos kyi tshul gyi skar ma'i tshogs kyis brgyand pa/ ri rab ltar kha dog bzhi po'i sems can rgya mtsho'i sems la gzugs rnyan rab tu snang ba/ rin po che'i gling ltar gzhi ye shes sna tshogs rin po ches
49a1(1): yongs su gang ba de skyil mo krung du 'dug pa mthong ngo // de'i mdun na yang gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / be ru n+ya dang / rung dang / man shel dang / byi na dang / sa le swApa dang / 
49a2(1): dngul rin po che'i phung po dang / lha rdzas kyi kha dog snga tshogs kyi phung po dang / kwa rdzas kyi rin po che'i rgyan snga tshogs kyi phung po dang / kha zas dang / rgyan gzigs sna tshogs kyi phung po dang / zhim pa'i mchog byad par cu 'phags
49a3(1): banas pa sna tshogs kyi phung po dgod pa dang / dngar pa'i thabs sna tshogs kyi yus tu bkod pa mthong ngo // sna rdzas kyi shing rta rin po bye ba brgya stong du ma dang / sna rdzas kyi bsi'i snyan bye ba brgya stong du ma dang / lha rdzas kyi spos
49a4(1): kyi rnam pa brgya stong du ma dang / nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad khyad kya bar thams cad kyi phung po spyad du rung ba'i khan ma tho ba skyed pa sad ra po sems can rnams ci dka' bar 'apyod du bzud pa'i phyir bgasas te
49a5(1): bkod pa dang / ba bzhon gser gyi ru rmyig can stong phrag tu ma blas// 'jam pa mang po yang sems can phongs pa rnams yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir bkod pa mthong ngo // bu mo rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya
49a6(1): stong bzhin ba mangs pa zhig tu 'dzes pa lta dbug brgyad thamams cad kyis das yang klubs pa/ rnardzas kyi gos rin po che gyod 'i thams kyisan dang 'phrug kyi snying pos lus byugs pa/ gyu sa tshwa// 
49a7(1): bcu na bzhi'i tshul shes pa 'dod pa'i dpyod pa dang cho ga thams cad la mkhas pa de dag kyang tshogs shing bkod pa mthong ngo // de'i 'dun na ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams yongs su bsdu ba dang / sems can
49a8(1): nams su gzung ba dang / sems can dga' ba skyed pa dang / sems can rnams skol bskyed pa dang / sems can rnams kyi yid dang par bya ba dang / sems can rnams kyi sems shin tu bde' bar bya ba dang / 
49a9(1): sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa rnam par zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can rnams chos kyi rang bzhin gyi don la yongs su 'god pa dang / sems can rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du do ma nyams par bya
49a10(1): pa dang sems can rnams gzhan la khu ba rnam par zlog par bya ba dang / lus dang dag gis ngan tu spyod pa thams cad rnam par zlog pa dang / sems can rnams kyi lta ba'i zug rngu yang dge par dbyung ba dang / 
49b1(1): sems can rnams kyi las yongs su sbyar ba'i phyir snang dang / las kyi gzhi la mdo dang / las gyi sum mdo' dang / sgo dang / khyams dag na'ang de bzhin te/ srang re re'i ngos gsas g.yon nas kyang sogs bu bye/ 
49b2(1): ba nyi gu nyi shu tsam la yo byad thams cad yongs su spangs te bkod pa mthong ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ rgyal po 'od chen po la lus thams cad kyis phapa nas phyag byas te/ rgyal po 'od chen po/ 
49b3(1): kha bang rgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su skor ba byas nas/ mdun tu 'dug ste/ phal mo gyur nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gis bra na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ 
49b4(1): ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i dpyod pa la slab par dbye ba dang / ji ltar nan tan tu dkyi ba ma tshul te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rjes su stan/ 
49b5(1): pa mdzad do zhes/ bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par dgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan tu dbyi ba bdag la blas lang tu gsol/ 
49b6(1): smras pa rigs kyi bu nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa byas/ shes pa chen po'i rgyal mtshan yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su/ rdzogs par byed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu ngas byang chub sems dpa'i
49b7(1): spyod pa byams pa chen po'i rgyas macan 'di yang sangs rgya brgya phrag tus dang / sangs rgyas nyid drug tu sa da sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag tu 'dang / sangs rgyas bye ba ldan
49b8(1): khrig brgya stong tum nas brjod du byed pa'i sang bar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las yongs su dris po/ yongs su zhus so// rnam par sbyangs so// yongs su byangs so// rnam par bkod do// 
49b9(1): rnam par ltas so/ rnam par byed do// rjes su bcal to// yongs su btags so// rnam par sris so// rgya cher byas so// rigs kyi bu de ltar na ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa byams pa chen po
49b10(1): 'i rgyas mtshan 'dis gnas shing chos dang mthun par khams skyo zhing bson to// chos dang mthun par 'jig rten na phan par byed do// chos dang 'thun par 'jig rten na rdzas su spyod do// chos dang mthun par
50a1(1): sems can bcos pa byed do// chos dang mthun par sems cad rnams yA na de byed do// chos kyi dkyil 'khor la sems can rnams yongs su 'dzud do// chos kyi tshul sems can rnams pa
50a2(1): bar smra ba po/ chos dang mthun par sems can rnams la yongs su bsgo ba byed do// chos kyi nan tan la sems can rnams yongs su spyosbyor ro/ chos kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa la sem sa rnams rab tu 'god do
50a3(1): byam sa la'i sems dang / byams pa chen po'i dbang dang /  byams pa'i stobs dang / phan pa'i sems dang / bde ba'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / phan 'dogs pa'i sems dang / songs su srub pa'i
50a4(1): sems dang / sems can yongs su 'dzind pa myi gtong ba'i sems dang stug sngal thams cad nam pa de zlog pa'i smon las rgyun gyi gcod pa'i sems dang / bde ba'i sgrar phyin pa la rab tu 'god par yang
50a5(1): dag par pyod pa rgyun myi gcod pa la sems can rnams rabatu 'god do// bag yangs kyi bde ba yang dag par bskyed pasasems can de dag gi lus kyang shin tu bde bar byed do// de dag gi nga
50a6(1): pa'i bde ba la shed pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyang rnam par thog par byed do/ de dag gi sems kyi rgyud kyang chos kyi dgal ba dang mos pa la som kyis su gzhol bar byed do// nyon mongs pa'i drim thams cad las
50a7(1): rnam par spyod pa byed do// byi dge ba'i chos thams cad las yongs su spyod pa byed do// 'khor ba'i rgyun las rnam par ldog pa byed do// chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho la yongs su gzud par byed do
50a8(1): de dag gi srid pa'i lam kyi rgyud du skye ba thams cad rgyun gtad pa'i phyir/ sems can gyis rig pa yongs su sreg par byed do// thams cad ma byedad pa nyid kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir/ de dag gis sems
50a9(1): kyi myi gu yongs su bskyed do// myi 'brogal ba'i dad pa'i stob sa yang dag par skyed pa'i phyir de dag gi sems kyi rgya mtsho yang rab tu dang bar byed do// rigs kyi bu de ltar na dade byad chub sems dpa'i dpyod pa byas/ 
50a10(1): pa ni pa'i byas mdza pa gnas te/ ram dang 'bur par 'jig den myong zhi ba'i stan to// tshigs lnga 'i mas na gnas pa'i sems can nams pa 'dreg gi no pa 'ang /  can da rgya'o
50b1(1): rigs kyi bu sems cad gang 'dongs shing po byed sngardzogs kyim bres pa/ bab pa 'dod pa 'am/  btud pa 'dod pa la gos 'dod pa nas po byed ma rdzogs dmas pad gang 'dod kyang tu skye zun rdzo/ 
50b2(1): de dag 'ang ngas snga nas banam bsham pa'i mdzod sgo bye zhing ci 'dod pa khyed cig ces bstabs te/ gang gi don tu khyed sdig pa'i las la dpyod par 'gyur cing / srog gcod pa 'am/ ma byin par lend pa 'am
50b3(1): 'dod pas ldog par g.yem pa 'am/ brdzun tu smra ba 'am/ phra ma 'am/ rag rtsub mo 'am/ tshig khyas pa 'am/ chags sems sam/ gnod sems sam/ log par lta ba 'am/ de ma yin pa'i lta ba'i rnam pa/ 
50b4(1): sna tshogs la mngon par zhen par gyur pa/ de thams cad kyang grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po 'di'i sgo dang / srang dang / khyams dang / sam gyi sum mdo dang / bzhi mdo kun tu srungs te snga nas ldan pa yin gyis/ su ci 'dod pa/ 
50b5(1): kun kyang khyer cig ces bslabs zhing byin no// rigs kyi bu grong khyed na 'od bzang po 'di ni sems can ji snyed cig gnas pa de dag thams da cad ni byang chub sems dpa' ste/ theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i
50b6(1): de bas na grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po 'di yang de dag la bsam pa ci lta bung dag pa'i tshul bzhin du snang ste/ la la ni dog por snang // la la ni yangs par snang ngo // la la ni gni sa sa gnas pa bsnang ngo // 
50b7(1): so la ni gzhi rin po che byed bya las blangs pa sdang ngo // a la ni sa'i ra bas skor bar snang ngo // ba la ni ring po mo rdo rje gzhan gyis kyi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyisar pas skong bar snang ngo // khas ni mig ma dang gyi mos
50b8(1): gang zhing thag thug dang grog po dang // g.yang sa mang po can du sdang ngo // la la ni nor bu rin po che dam pa grangs myed pa sa gzhi'i rgyan cing yongs su bkram pa dang / lag thil bzhin bzhi mnyam par snang ngo // kha la ni sa
50b9(1): las byas par snang ngo // la la ni rin po che grangs myed pa'i khang pa dang / gzhab myed khang dang / khang bzhag dang / khang pa tshogs pa dang / khang stengs dang / ba gam dang / skad kung gi shar bu dang / zla gam rin
50b10(1): bopo che seng ge 'dra bas brgyan par snang ngo // grong khyer gyi phyi rog na gnas pa'i sems can sngon ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongs su bsdus pa/ bsam padag
51a1(1): dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa sangs rgyas mang po la snyen bkur ba/ thams cad ma khyend pa nyid la mngon par mos pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du rab tu zhol ba/ de dag la yang rin po che las byas par snar
51a2(1): de ma yin pa gzhan dag sa ni sa las byas par sdang ste ga/  rigs kyi bu nga'i khams na gnas pa'i sems cad yul dang / 'phyogs dang / grong khyer dang / grong bdab dang / ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dag na
51a3(1): rtog pa lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi dus kyi rang bzhin gyis dkrugs te myi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam zhig byed par 'dod par 'gyur na'ang de'i tshe de dag la phan par bya ba'i sems kyis byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
51a4(1): 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i glong zhes bya ba byams pa chen po sngon du 'grong pa la snyoms par 'jug ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar nga ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / de nyid kyi mod la sems can de dag
51a5(1): dang /  de bdedag dang / klung gnyeng bdedag dang / khab po dang bsod pa de ga dang / sems kyi drug pa de ga dang / skye rig pa'isems sa cang kyang chub se pa pa'i ti de 'dzi
51a6(1): nga po'i thang byas pa'i na po'i thong du 'gro ba tshob nyid pa tu skye ba gyung // nye bdun par gyugyur/ ras da ya ud ro/ 'gas pas gyus ses sa sangasapa
51a7(1): mngodag sus ca na mu dedapa rgyal po 'byed pos de'i'i byang dub sems dpa 'dong de 'di byamapa pathed pa'i med pa 'thob 'a de rje ma pa'i spos rgyab pa g+sa / 
51a8(1): rdod pa na po'i khyis dang / ni po ma'i ga sa dang / ring po'i'i gnas byed 'ad dang / na pa'i'i 'ang brtsigs pa dang / 'ad pa ci'i lags dang / rin pa'i ga dang / rin pa ga gra dang / 'an bco
51b1(1): bu dang / ring po che'i rta ba'as dang / rin po che'i bu ka' dang / rin po che'i seng ge'i dra ba dang / rin po che'i lan kan dang / rin po che'i 'bru dang / rin po che'i bla re dang / ring po che'i srad bus brgyus pa'i dril bus
51b2(1): kaseng ka'i dra ba dang / rin po che'i dril dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i ba dan dang / rin po che'i ta sa de dag kyang rab tu g.yos te/ sgra 'byin to// rab tu 'khod do// de dag de ltang sgra
51b3(1): 'byin cing yid du 'ong ba la snyan pa dang / mnyan dga' ba'i dbyangs brjod cing rgyal po'i 'od chen po gang na ba der 'dud de phyag 'tshal lo// grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po'i nang na sems can ji snyed cig gnas pa de dag
51b4(1): thams cad kyang dka' ba dang / rangs pa'i sems kyis yongs su rgyas nas/ rgyal po'i 'od chen po kangan pa de logs su mngon tu ltas ste/ lus thams cad kyis lab cing phyag 'tshal lo// de'i khabs kyi grong
51b5(1): dang / grong khyed dang / ljongs dang stsal dang / khams dang / rgyal ba'i po byung 'khor na gnas pa de dag thams cad kyang lus dang sems pade bar gyur te/ dka' zhing das pa skyes nas rgyas pa 'od med pa/ ca/ 
51b6(1): gang na ba de logs su phyag 'tshal lo// byol songs kyi skye gnas sra rtogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang cig la cig byis/  pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems su ldan par gyur da nas
51b7(1): rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba de logs su lta zhing mngon par 'dud do// ri dang skad yon po'i sa phyogs thams cad kyang rgyal po'i 'od chen po gar na ba der mngon par 'du do// me tog gi shing dang / 'bras
51b8(1): gyu rad to de'i khams na mtsho dang / su ma dang / steng ka dang / 'bab chu dang / chu rlung dang / rdzing dang / rngon pa ci snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba de logs su mngon par gzhol zhing rlabs/ 
51b9(1): kyi sga 'byin par gyur da to// klu'i rgyal po song blag bcu ya ra a ga ru nag po'i bdug spos kyi dud pa na pun du 'grigs pa'i sprin las glog sna tshogs 'gyu ba'i 'od kyis snang bar byed cing 'brug sga sgrogs pa dang / 
52a1(1): spos chu'i char gyis rgyun shin tu phra ba mngon pa 'bebs par gyur to// brgya byin dang / rab ches dang / rab dka' ldan dang / rab 'phrul dga' dang / dbang spyar kyi lha'i dbang po la sogs pa/ lha'i bu stong grag bcus
52a2(1): kyang seng gi bar sAng la 'od de nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad lnga rdzas kyi rol mo'i bsil snyan gyi basprin bye ba khrag khrig/ brgya stong gi sgra 'byung bas dbyangs snyan pa rgya cher ched bsgrags pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ lha'i bu mo grangs myed
52a3(1): rma'i kwa'i gru snyan pa len pa'i srin gyi spa spags pa'i dbyangs snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i rgyad kyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyi sprid grangs myed pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan kyis brgyad ba dang
52a4(1): sA rdzas kyi spos kyi 'asrin kha dog gA tshogs kyi sprin grangs byed pa'i char rab tu nga 'bab pa'i rgyad kyis brgyad pa dang / lA rdzas kyi rin po che'i phreng ba da sna tshogs kyi 'dren grangs byed pa'i tshan rab tu 'bab rtse ba'i rgyan gyis
52a5(1): brgyad pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs myed pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan kyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyirin po che'i skab sbub sna tshogs kyi srin grangs myed pa'i char rab tu
52a6(1): ga pa'i rgyan kyis brgyan pa dang lnga rdzas kyi gos sna tshogs dri ma myed cing 'jam pa kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa'i srin grangs myed pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i gtu
52a7(1): rnam par bye ba sna rdzogs kyi sprin grangs byed pa'i char rab tu 'phalta ba'i rgyad kyis brgyan pa dang / wa rdzas kyi rin po che'i seng ge yid du 'ong ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin grangs byed pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rkyen gyis brgyan pa dang // 
52a8(1): rdzas kyi rin po che 'brar ba'i sde shin tu 'phro ba'i rin po che'i ba dan gyi sprin grangs myed pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par / rgyal po'i 'od chen po la mchod par bya ba'i phyir byin gyis rlabs so// glang po'i rgyal
52a9(1): po chen po shugs 'dzin gyis kyang glang po'i dbang po'i khyu mchog gi mthu' 'byung ba/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthus nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs pad mo'i srin grangs myed pas kun nas
52a10(1): g.yog par byin kyis rlabs so// lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che'i me tog grangs myed pa rab tu 'phyang ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i snam bu'i ldalnga ldi dang / chun po grangs myed pa rab tu 'phyang ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rin
52b1(1): bo che sna tshogs kyi 'phreng ba'i rgyud grangs myed pa mngod par 'phyang rgyan kyis brgyan pa dang / lnga rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi snab sub dang / 'phreng ba grang myed pa mngon par 'phyang ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang
52b2(1): rna rdzas kyi rin po che 'tshogs kyi me tog gi lnga rdzi grangs myed pa mngond par bres pa'i rgyan kyis rgyan pa dang / skardzas kyi sos kyi rgyal po ma dog sna tshogs phyogs thams cad tsu tshwa zhim pos rgyas par 'gengs pa'i sred grangs kyin
52b3(1): bas kud nas khyebs pa'i rgyand kyis brgyan pa dang / lA rdzas kyi rin po me'i gos kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs myed pa'i tshad rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis rgyad pa dang / lA rdzas kyi gdug spos kyi rkun pa na bun tu
52b4(1): 'dresas bya'i sbyi grangs byed pa sa rarabatub pa pa'i rgya kyis byan pa dang / drus kyi phyem 'dag chogs kyi yin grangs byed pa'i bar phra ma ba tubs pa'i rgyan gyis can dang kwa'i bu ga 'i cog pa/ 
52b5(1): sras kyirob mo byed pa dang / gru bstan pa'i dbyangs 'di 'ong ba nga min ci stong pa'i phrin gyis su nas yog pa'i cha man su sebs pa'i rgyun kyis rgyan gdapa pa'i dbyings byes kyis rlabs/ 
52b6(1): so// srin po'i dbang po brgya stong grangs myed pa rgya mtsho'i la gan/ pa dang / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rten gyis ban la gnas pa'i khabs sug dang khrag dung zhing zab tshul spyod pa dang / 
52b7(1): ri dgas dang / phyugs dang / bya dang ba sang dang / rta dang / glang po che bong bu dang / skyes pa dang / bud byed kyi tshogs kyi mdangs 'phrog pa/ zhe sdang ba'i yid kyi rnam par rtog pa dang ldan pa/ 
52b8(1): rtag tu 'gro ba la 'cha zhing tho mtsham pa la zhugs pa/ rnams kyang byams pa dang ban pa'i sems dam pa dang / ldan zhing bzhin gyi mdog gind tu dang ba dang // 'gro ba thams cad la myi che zhing 'gro tsam pa myed pal zhugs/ 
52b9(1): te 'jig rten pha rol la lta bar gyurd nas lal mo sbyar zhing shin tu dga' ba'i sems kyis rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba der logs su btud nas phyag 'tshal bar gyur te/ lus kyi sems kyi bde ba rgya chen po 'tshungs
52b10(1): ba myed pa yang myong bar 'gyurd to// gnod sbyin dang / grul bum dang / sha za dang / 'byung po'i dbang po brgya stong du ma yad byams pa dang / phan pa'i sems dam pa dang ldan zhing bzhin gyi mdog shin tu dang ba dang // 
53a1(1): tho ba 'grus ca m+b+hi 'i she po bya byed pa nugs te/ 'jig rtes pa 'o nga gyusmra nas/ nas sa ba'i rgya bro byed klu na
53a2(1): 'chal bar gyur te/  lus dang sems kyi bde ba rgya chen po mtshungs pa byed pa yang myong bar gyur to// de ltar gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can kun gyi 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / myi na tha~Md
53a3(1): shar gnyer dang / thab mo dang / bzod pa dang // sems kyi 'khrug pa dang / 'tshe ba'i sems khams can rab tu zhi bar gyur to// rnam par zhi bar gyur to// rnam par ldog par gyur to// 'gags par gyur to// kyir do// 
53a4(1): bar gyur da to// gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khabs 'dir ji lta pa de bzhin ra cu/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas rdzogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i/ 
53a5(1): bar gyi sems can kun gyi 'jigs pa rA/ gnod pa dang / myi bde' ba dang // shar gnyer ba dang / zab mo dang bachod pa dang / sems kyi/ 'khrug pa dang / 'tshe ba'i sems thams cad kyang / byang chub seMs
53a6(1): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin byams pa'i chen po sngon du 'gro ba/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i klong gi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir rab tu zhi bar gyur to// rnam par zhi bar gyurd to// rnam par log par gyur da to
53a7(1): 'gags par 'gyur to// phyir ldog par 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po 'od chen po ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu ngas byang chub sems/ 
53a8(1): dpa'i dpyod pa'i ye shes snang ba'i sgo byams pa chen po'i rgyal mtshan 'di shes par zad na/ ngas byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bde ba'i bsam las rgyas par 'gengs pas/ byams pa/ 
53a9(1): chen po'i gdugs tshad myed pa dang ldan pa/ 'khor myi phyed pa dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad 'khor du gyur pa rab 'bring dang / tha ma'i sbyor bas/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa la bzhugs pa// 
53a10(1): 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bzung ba la bzhugs pas byams pa'i sems lta bu dang ldan pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi 'od zer 'gro ba thams cad du 'byung bas b+hA bany+dza zhing rgyas pa lta bur gyur pa/ shes bya/ 
53a11(1): thams cad ye shes kyi 'od kyis snang bar byed pa'i phyir nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gyur da pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi mun pa thibs por rab tu ba si yad pas sgron ma chen po lta bur gyur na pa/ 
53b1(1): sems can 'ams cad kyi sems kyi mtsho'i g.yor su'i rtog pa dang par byed pas/ nor bu rin po che chu dang dang 'drab 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsas pa dang / smon sum yongs su rdzogs par byed pas nor bu rin po che ri
53b2(1): bzhin gyi rgyal po dang 'dra ba/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i/ khang pa dang / thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi pho brang chen por gzhog pas rlung dmar chen po dang 'dra bas pa de dag gi pyod pa/ 
53b3(1): shes pa 'tha/ yon tan brjod pa 'am/ bsod nams kyi ri bo gzhal ba 'am/ yon tan gyi skar ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i nam mkha' la lta ba 'am/ smon lam chen po'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor la sa mtshas
53b4(1): rtsa pa 'am chos mnyam pa nyid kyi stobs la tshad gzung ba 'am/ theg pa chen po'i rgyan gyi sngags pa brjod pa 'am/ kun tu bzang po'i pyod pa'i tshul gyi khyad par brjod pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i
53b5(1): ting nge 'dzin chen po spros pa'i sgo dbye ba 'am/ snying rje chen po'i sbyid yongs su smos par nus re rkan/ sor rigs kyi bu lho nyesang phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ rgyal po gnas brtan pa zhes bya/  tu rtsa
53b6(1): pa yod de de na dge snyen ma myi g.yo' ba zhes bya ba 'dug gis / de'i gang du song la ci ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sa slab par bya ba dang / ji ltar
53b7(1): nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang sa kyis/ rgyal po 'od chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bosaphyag 'tshal nas rgyal po 'od chen po la lan brgya stong du mar ga
53b8(1): phyogs su bskor ba byas te yang dang yang ltas nas/ rgyal po 'od chen po'i drang nas song so// / 'phags pa sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdor// dadum bu ba ni
53b9(1): ba bam po lnga pa'o// / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po nas byung ste ud tsam du lam gyi ma byi 'go kha tsal nasa?/ rgyal po 'od chen po'i gdams
53b10(1): ngag de la rjes su bsam pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i tshul byams pa chen po'i rgyal mtshan de rjes su dran par bya ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i glong gi snang ba chen po de yongs su/ 
54a1(1): bsgom pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus rnam par dag pa bsam gyis myi khyab pas brgyan pa'i skyed ge'i khri brgyan rnam par phye ba/ rnam pa sna tshogs de dag mngon par bsgrubs pa
54a2(1): byang chub sems dpa'i spong sapa dang / bsod napas kyi dbang dngamapas bsam kyis kyi khyab pa de dag rjes su spel pa dang /  sems dpa'i sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i mi shes kyi la bsam byis kyi phyag
54a3(1): pa dro gan du badra par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yong spyod kyi bdag nyid che bzun mong du gyur pa/ lasas kyis kyi khyab pa de la rjes su bsam pa dang / byang chub sems pa'i gnas rnam pa par// 
54a4(1): byas pa kyis kyi khyab pa de dag kyang mchad par bya ba dang / byung ta rang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi sems can yongs su skyend par bya ba nas yar dag pa lasas kyis kyi khyab pa de rjes su dran par bya ba
54a5(1): dang byang rnab segs dba'i khong bu gsum tshogs gang yongs su dag pa de la rtag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i so/ can gyi don bsam pa snang ba'i tshul b.las kyis kyi khyab pa de sa
54a6(1): med rnas pal byed byed 'am/ sebs dga' zhing mos pa'i dra sa dang / sems kyi nyams bde ba dang / sems shin yid kyi ba pa dang / sems pa nas dga' ba dang / sems s+ho
54a7(1): byed pa dang / sem pa 'od dang ba dang / sems btung ba dang / sems rgya che ba dang / sems myi zad pa thob ste/ de de lnga ste dge ba'i bshes gnyen rjes su dran zhing med pa byed pa la brtson pas
54a8(1): gdong mas ga da rjes bu sems pa/ hUM rgyun bye dge bar 'ashes pa nyid pa 'ang gA ming 'od do ri pa'i mams can kyi byu gnas pa stsa / bya chub pom pa'i phyi sa
54a9(1): dag pa dang / yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i rgyur gyu dad pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa 'ams nad rnam par dag par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'ongs/ 
54a10(1): su spyod pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'don gyi snang ba thams cad yongs su bskyed pa'o// sangs rgyas khams can mthong bar 'gyur ba yongs su sgrub pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos khams pad kyi
54b1(1): srid kyi sam ba tu 'bebs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam kyi tshul thams cad rab tu brjod pa'o// shes rab dang / ye shes kyi snang ba bsam gyis kyi khyab pa yang dag par skyed pa'o// byang chub sems
54b2(1): dpa'i dbang po brtan pa'i b+ha ga skyed par byed pa'o// dge ba'i bzhes gnyen rnams de/ bdag ngad ma shigasangs thams par nas spyob pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen napas ni bdag chol mnyam pa nyi kyi lce
54b3(1): khong du chud par bya ba la gzhog pa'o// dge pa'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la lam bde ba dang / myi bde ba btond pa'o// dge bo'i bshis gnyen rnams 'di bdag la thag pa chen po yongs su btond ma'o// 
54b4(1): dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i dmyong ba'i gdapas ngag gis bdems pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer gyi
54b5(1): lam smon pa'o/ dag pa'i bzhis gnyen nems ni bdag lams rang chud ma byedad pa'i gnas su phyi nang byung skyes pa'o// dge' ba'i yang bshes gnyen nams ni bdag chos kyi dbyings kyi chub rgya brjor/ 
54b6(1): 'jug par byed pa'o// dger ba'i bshes gnyen rnams de bad sa dus gsum gyigs kyi'i rgyas ci'i chub rab tu bstod bya'o// dge ba'i bshes pa nyid rnams du nag sa 'asregs kyi
54b7(1): tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu stonang pa'o// dgel ba'i bshes gnyes rnams ni bdag gi dkar po'i chos thams cad na bar 'phel bar byed pa'o// zhes de de ltar du zhing smre sngags
54b8(1): 'don pa'i tshe/ rnam mtha'i dkyis pa 'dod pa'i chu'i tshogs dang / brtag tu hUM bzhid 'brang gling yang dag par bstsal ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi bo nya ltar byur da pa'i byang chub sems dbang rnams 'di skad sa
54b9(1): zer to// garigs kyi bu dge ba'i bzhes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang thugs shin tu dgyes par 'gyur ba
54b10(1): dge' ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig dang / myi 'gal bar gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tu 'ung shin tu snyen bu yin/ dge' ba'i bzhes gnyen gyi tshig sa be tsom gyi za ba'i
55a1(1): byang chub sems dpa' sna dge ba'i bzhes gnyen rnams kyang nye bar bsnyen pa yin/ dge ba'i bzhes gabyed 'das bya ba dang kyi bras bu'i byang rgyub sems dbya la ni do byas bya 'o
55a2(1): katu gyurd pa yin gyis pa rigs kyi bu rgyal po'i pho brang brtan par dge' snyen ma myi g.yol ba gang na ba dang song shig dang / de las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thob par 'gyur ro// de nas rkyong dpon gyi bu
55a3(1): rlong ba blangs ting nge 'dzid kyi ye shes bsdang ba las langs nas/ ma bdad kyis rgyal po'i ba brang brtan pas/ dge snyen ma gyi gsol ba gang na ba der song namo// dge' snyen ma myo gsol pa yongs su tshol zhing med nid
55a4(1): ro 'gro ba mang pos spyod do// rigs kyi bud daste sbyin pa sku gsor ba de ni rang gi khyisadapa pa dang bkrogs shi chadagan dung byung da pa ste/ rang kyi gnyen shes kyi tshogs kyi ma kyi
55a5(1): god cing skye bo'i tshogs chen po lachos stod to// de nas tshod/ dpon gyi bu nor ba 'angs dga' ba chen po dang / mos zhing spos pas yongs su rgyas pa'i sems dang ldan pa de/ dge snyen ma
55a6(1): gyi g.yor ba'i khyim gang dra ba deng song ste/ byin nas dge stengs skye gso ba'i khyim kyi sgon smod pa'i tshe/ des khyim de 'ams cada'adi sus dang sems nyind tu bde' bar byed pa/ gser gyi 'dog tu// tsam
55a7(1): 'dug pa zhig gis khyab cing gsal bar gyur nas/ 'od des tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la phog par gyur ma lag tu/ tshor ba thams cad la dbang spyar pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyi sgomang po dang / zhi ba'i gnas
55a8(1): kyi ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo mang po dang / 'gro ba thams cad dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyi sgomang po dang / kun tu lta ba'i btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo mang po dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod
55a9(1): kyi ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo mang po la sogs pa ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo lnga brgya tsam la zhugs par gyur na te/ yongs su skyes so// de dag kyang shin tu phra zhing gzhon pa ste/ 'di ltar dper log pa mngab tu zhugs pa'i dpa
55a10(1): bar shes pa sa bu ste/ ting nge 'dzin de dag kyang shin tu phra zhing gzhon par skyes par gyur to// des drizhe po zhig rjod na'ang de n-i lha la 'ang byed/ lha'i bu mo la 'ang byed/ klu bar byed/ klu'i bu po la 'ang byed/ 
55b1(1): gdod sbyin pa'ang byed /  gnod sbyin gyi bu mo la'ang myed dri ba la 'ang byed/ dri za'i bu mo la'ang byed/ snga ma yi sa'ang byed/ lnga ba srid kyi bu mo la'ang byed pa rnam mkha' zhi la yang byed
55b2(1): na' bal snying gi bu mo la'ang byed/ byi 'am ci la'ang byed/ phyi 'am ci'i bu mo la yang byed/ sgo phye chen po la'ang byed/ go byi chen po'i bu mo la'ang byed/ rgya la'ang sbed/ phyi'i bu mo la 'ang myed cing myi srid pa de lta bu'i
55b3(1): dri zhim po tshong par gyur to// bud byed de'i gzugs dang / mnyam pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na myed do/ lhag pa lta ga yas 'od kha dog dang mdog de lta bu sang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdog dang / kha dog dang / 
55b4(1): byang chub sems dpa' dbang skur pa'i kha dog dang / mdog ma rtogs par de'i kha dog dang mdog tu mnyam pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na myed na/ lhag pa lta ga las 'ong / lus kyi chu zheng dang dbyibs de lta bu'ang
55b5(1): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i 'khrun nu zher dang / dbyibs dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang sbyar ba thob pa'i lus kyi chu zheng dang // dbyings ma rtogs par de'i lus kyi chu zheng dang / dbyibs su mnyan
55b6(1): pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na myed na/ lhag pa ltag la 'od// 'od kyi rgyan de lta bu'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi rgyan dang / de byang chub sems dpa' dbang skur pa'i thob pa'i 'od kyi rgyan ma rtogs/ 
55b7(1): par/ de'i 'od kyi brgyan dang mnyam pa phyogs bcung 'dzi rten kyican byed de/ sdug pa ltag las thong /  de'i kha kyi kyi zhes po dang gnyas la ci de lta bu me phyogs pacu'i 'jig rten gyi lnga'i
55b8(1): gnas sas/ klu dang gdod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / yAm yid dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi'im ci dang / s+ho phye chen po dang / mye dang myi yin pa'i gnas na myed na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong / khyim
55b9(1): rgyan dang / longs spyod de lta bu'ang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i longs spyod dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dbang skur ba thob pa'i longs baspyod ma rtogs par de'i khyim byi brgyad dang / longs 'apyod mnyam pa yang
55b10(1): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na myed na/ lhag pa lta ga las 'ong / g.yog 'khor phun su tshogs pa de lta bu yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor phun gsuM tshogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor phun bcu
56a1(1): / tshogs pa ma rtogs par/ de'i g.yog 'khor phun gsum tshogs pa dang mnyam pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na myed na/ lhag pa wA ga las 'od te/ dge snyen ma myi gsol ba de la 'dod
56a2(1): chags dang ldan pa'i sems kyis lta bar nus pa'i sems can de lta bu 'ang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi sems can gyi ris na myed do// dge snyen ma myi g.yo' ba de bzod ma thag tu nyon mongs pa zhi bar myi 'gyur
56a3(1): pa de lta bu'i sems can yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten ni sems can gyi ris na byed de/ 'di lta ste dper na 'tshangs pa chen po stong phrag brgyar la dbang sbyar ba la/ 'dod pa la pyod pa'i nyon ngos pa rnams myi bya'o// 
56a4(1): de bzhin du dge snyen ma myi g.yol ba de mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa myi rgyu'o// dge snyen ma myi gso' ba de la lta bas ngoms par 'gyur ba'i sems can de lta bu yang shes rab kyis ngoms pa ma rtogs
56a5(1): par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rted kyi khams kyi sems cad kyi ris na da byed do// de nis tsho dpon gyi bu no pazangs kyis/ dge na snyen ma phyi gsor ba'i lus kyi byin pas sa kyis kyi khyab pa dang / 
56a6(1): gzugs dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs dang chu zheng bsam gyisamyi khyab pa dang / sa bzhi dang grong khyer dang / ri chen po bems cad la sogs pa myed pa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i rgyan pas ma phyis kyi
56a7(1): khyab pa dang / sems can gyi don bsam gyis myi khyab pa sgrub pa mthong ste/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas byung ba'i dri zhim po tshor nas khor rgya mtsho phun gsuM tshogs pa mtha' yas pa mthong ste/ khyib
56a8(1): dang gzhal myed khang gi rgyan phun gsuM tshogs pa myi phrogs pa mdong nas/ yon tan rgya mtsho'i' tshad myed pa khong du chud de/ dge snyen ma myi gso pa la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis stod do// / khyod kyis rtag tu tshul
56a9(1): khrims dri myed yongs bsrungs te/ bzod pa shin tu yangs pa'ang yongs su bsgo mdzad cing / btson grus brtan pa rdo rje lta bu bsgrubs pas na/ ri bo'i rgyal po lta bur 'gro bar 'phags shing 'bar// de nas tshong
56a10(1): dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ dge' snyen ma myi g.yo ba la tshigs su bcad pa des mngon par stod de// 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags ma bdag gis bla na myed pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
56a11(1): bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa slab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du dgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang
56b1(1): rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes/ bdag gis thos na/ 'phags ma ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la srab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltam nan tan du dgyi ba bdag la bshad tu gsol/ 
56b2(1): de nas dge snyen ma myi g.yo' bas// byang chub sems dpa'i rag 'jam zhing yid du 'ong la/ nyams su bde bas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la dga' bar 'gyur ba'i tshig tu brjod nas 'di skad ces smras stso rigs kyi bu
56b3(1): de ltar khyod kyis bra na byed yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par tha dad pa thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po thob pa
56b4(1): cig byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo yi das btan pa la slob pa chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi sa'i gsungs kyi blo thob pa'o// kha mo na spobs pa'i se shes snang bachos kyi gzhi sums pan snang par brjod pa na/ 
56b5(1): pa'o// kho mo ni chos thams cad yongs su btsal bas byi skyo ba'i rgyud da kyi ting nge 'dzin kyi sgo thob pa'o// smras pa 'phags ma byang chubarang sems dpa'i rnam par tha rad pa thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying
56b6(1): bo de'i su ba ni ji lta bu zhig mchis/ yi dam brtan pa'i byang chub ses da pa'i spyod pa'i sgo dang / chos sgra nyam pa nyid kyi sa'i gzungs / kyi sgo dang / chos kyi gzhi' thams cad snang bar brjod pa'i brlobs
56b7(1): pa snang ba'i sgo dang / chos yongs su btsal las kyi skyo ba'i rgyad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo'i yul ni ji lta bu zhig mchis/ smras pa rigs kyi bu gnas 'di ni yid ches par dka'o// spras pa 'phags pa btan
56b8(1): tu gsol/ sangs rgyas kyi byin dang / dge' ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzub na yid ches par 'grang / rtogs pa dang 'tshald pa dang / rnam par rtogs pa dang / rjes su rtogs pa dang / rig pa dang
56b9(1): dmyigs su 'phebs pa dang / goms pa dang / myi 'gal ba dang / rnam par myi rtog pa dang / sgro 'dogs pa ma mchis pa dang / mnyam par bgyid par yang mchis 'grang / de nas dge snyen ma myi g.yo bas chod
56b10(1): dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras po// rigs kyi bu sngon 'das pa'i dus shig na/ dri ma myed pa'i 'od kyi skal pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rab tu kyang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ kho bo 'a de'i
57a1(1): tsu rgyal tho klog gis byin pa'i bu cig sa zhig tu gyurd nas/ de'i tshe nub mo myi nyal tsam zhig na/ rgyal ba'i sgo yang bcad/ pa dngas yang nyal/ skyes pa dang bud byed dag kyang gnyid lon / rol mo bzung ba dang / 
57a2(1): dkrol ba'i sgra ya bzhi/ lhan cig skyes pa'i bud myed lnga brgya tsam dag kyang nyal bar gyur pa zhig na/ kho mo mal gyi steng na 'dug cing nam mkha'i dbyings la rgyu ba'i skar ma'i tshogs kyi phreng ba rnam par bkod pa
57a3(1): lha lta ba las/ steng gi bar sdang la bcoM ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcoM ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyag rab tu rkyang ba/ ri'i dbang po ri rab sbyar/ rna dang / klu dang / gnod snyed dang
57a4(1): tha dang /  ba yin dang / dpa mkha' ldi dang / kyi 'ab ci dang / ko byi chen po'i 'khod mang pos ston pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs grangs byed pas yongs su na pa phyogs bams can du 'o
57a5(1): zer gyi dra ba thogs pa byed pas rgyas pas khyab pa'i sku bzhugs pa mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spu'i ba su'i bu ga/ thams cad nas kyang dri zhim po rnam pa 'di lta bu byung ste ka des
57a6(1): za'i lus dang sem pa nyid tu bde bar gyur / yid shin tu dga'ang bar 'gyur te/ mal gyi steng nas langs dag/ song mo bgyid kyalal mo rAng ti ma la thabs nas bco ldan 'das ro banod
57a7(1): gshegs pa byas rang tu rkyang ba de sa phyag 'chal te de'i spyi mug la smras na'angam tham thug par ma rung / g.yas g.yos tshad zin par ma rung / mchad dang dpe' byad kun gsu tshogs pa sa bsams na yang robs
57a8(1): bar ma rung ste/ de'i tshe kho mos 'di ste du bsams so// las ci lta bu zhig byas na lus phun gsuM tshogs pa 'di lta bu ni thob par 'gyur/ mtshan dang dpe 'byad bzang po phun gsu tshogs pa ni skye bar 'gyur/ 
57a9(1): 'od kyi brgyad phun gsu tshogs pa ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'khor phun gsum tshogs pa ni yang dag par grub par 'gyur/ yid kyi rang bzhin gyi gnas dang / longs spyod phun gsum tshogs pa ni 'byung bar 'gyur
57a10(1): bsod nams phun gsuM tshogs pa ni skye bar 'gyur ba ye shes phun gsum tshogs pa ni rnam par dag par 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsas kyis myi khyab pa phun gsum tshogs pa ni yang dag par thub par 'gyuraro/ 
57b1(1): gzhungs sun gsum tshogs pa ni yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ spobs pa phun kasuM tshogs pa ni dbang du 'gyur snyam pa dang / rigs kyi bu de nasabacoM ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rab tu brkyang pa des/ 
57b2(1): kho mo'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'di skad ces bka' saHsad to// bu mo khyod kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir thub pa myed pa'i sems skyed cig/ mngon par zhen pa thams cad bsal ba'i phyir pham
57b3(1): ba myed pa'i sems skyed cig/ chos zab mo'i tshul khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir zhum pa myed pa'i sems skyed cig/ sems can bsam pa myi zad pa dang ldan pa'i rgya mtsho'i klong du ltung bas myi skul ba'i sems skyed
57b4(1): cig/ srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad du skye ba'i skye mched du mgo rmongs pa myed pa'i sems skyed cig/ sangs rgyas thams cad lta bar mos pa/ rgyun myi chad pa'i phyir ngoms myi shes pa'i sems skyed cig/ 
57b5(1): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yongs su gzung ba'i phyir chog byi shes pa'i sems skyed cig/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos dkyi tshul bsnang ba rtogs par bya ba'i phyir nges par rtogs pa'i
57b6(1): sems skyed cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bzung ba'i phyir yang dag par gzung ba'i sems skyed cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas byung ba shes par bya ba lta spos kyi/ 
57b7(1): chung ngun brdar bya ba tsam la yang 'khrul pa myed pa'i sems skyed cig/ bu mo khyod kyis sems can rnams bas pa ci lta ba bzhin du chos rin po che rnam par dmyo pa'i phyir na par dbye ba'i sems skyed cig/ ces byung ste de ltar rigs kyi
57b8(1): bu kho mos/ bcoM ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btso pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyag rab tu rkyang ba las kyi tshul gyi gdas ngag gi sgo rno pa de lta bu dag thos nas/ thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes la ni mngon par mos
57b9(1): bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung la ni mngon par dad par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi brgyan ni yongs su spang bar dga'/ sangs rgyas kyi sku phun gsuM tshogs pa ni yongs su smrab par dga'/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang dpa'
57b10(1): byad bzang po rno par dag pa la ni mngon par mos par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi 'khor phun kasuM tshogs pa la ni mngon par smon par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nam yang dag pa la ni mngon par dad par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi dpyod lam
58a1(1): kun gsu tshogs pa lani mad par mos par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi su rje'i chen sun gsus tshogs pa la ni sadod par dag 'a das rdo rje ltar mcho mangs pa kyi mthus thub par dga' pa'i le zhes nyod mam / 
58a2(1): cad dang / nyan thob dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis myi phyed myi tshugs par skyed de/ rigs kyi de nas nye bar ba bur ba tshun tshad tu sos skyed pa de'i mthus/ skal pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rtul shin tu phra ba snyed cig tu yid kyi dgu las kyang 'dod pa lA/ 
58a3(1): pyod par myi dran na/ gnyis kyis gnyis 'brug lta ci smos// rigs kyi bu de nas nye b.ra'i btud pa tshun chad du rang gi gnyen bshes la bang khong khro ba'i sems ma skyed na/ de ma yin pa'i sems can mnyes pa gzhan lta la ci spo// de nas te shA
58a4(1): gzung ba chun chad du bdag lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa cig cas yang skyed par myi dran na/ des yin pa'i yo byad gzhan la bdag gir bya ra te/ mngon par chags pa sta ci spos/ shi bo ba dang gang san gnas pa'i chesang/ 
58a5(1): sems rmongs palaM/ 'du shes sna tshogs/ sam/ lung du ma gtan/ ba'i sems kyang 'byung du myi dran na/ legs par bsam shing lta ci spro/ sa/ bskasad pa de snyed cig tu/ sangs rgyas cig kyang chung ngu na rmyi lam du mthon
58a6(1): pa'i rnam par dbyigs par rjes su ma dran na/ byang chub mos dpa'i dbyig bcus mthong bar gyur pa lta ci smos de nas nye bar gzung ba rgya cad du de bzhin gshegs pa mas cad kyi chos kyi yi pa dag par yin kyang chung na/ 
58a7(1): bying du bya ba'i rnam pa tsam gyi chos kyi tshig dang yi ge gcig kyang brjed par gyi dran na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi mdzod nas byung ba lta ci smos/ de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du chos kyi rgya mcho de snyed cig 'thung 'thur yang / chung ngu na 'jig rten pa'i
58a8(1): chos rnams la tshig 'ga' 'angam pasas ma rtags par myi dran no// de nas nye bar gzung ba tshun chad du de snyed cig gi chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho las byang chub du na 'jig rten pa'i bzo'i rgyus dang / tshul yang rub ste chos kyi sgo gar la ang kho mos ting nge 'dzin
58a9(1): mdod par ma sbubs pa de lta bu byed do// de nas nye bar gzung ba tshun chad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa de snyed kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bzung ba yang ji ltar yongs su gzung pa las sems can gdul ba'i dbang du bya ba ma rtogs par chung tu na rjes su
58a10(1): brgyud pa'i rgyus tsam gyi tshig dang yi ge 'gal yang bor bar myi dran no// de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho de snyed cig mthong bar chud ngu na/ spru bad pa'i sangs rgyas kyi smon las kyi rgyud kyang rung ste/ smon lam 'gal yang
58b1(1): kho mo'i sems card bya masol 'ams cad nam yang dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par ma srubs pa myed do// de nas nye gar bzung ba tshun cad du/ sangs rgyasu mamod snyed cig gi snod kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya masor las byang rngub
58b2(1): sems dpa'i pyod pa 'ga' tsam yang kho mos/ bdag gi spyod pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par ma sgrubs pa de lta bu myi dran no// de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad tu/ sems can gang kho mos bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
58b3(1): pa'i byang chub tu ma skus pa de lta bu cig kyang dbyig lam du 'ongs pa myi dran no// de nas nye bar bzung ba tshud can du nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang ldan pa'i sems sbed pa cig kyang mdod par sbubs su kyi
58b4(1): drad no// rigs kyi donas nye bar bzung ba tsun chad bskald pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig yon yang tshig dang yig 'ga' la yang be com bskyed pa 'am/ gnyis kyi 'du la zhes sam/ ni par rtog pa'i 'du shes pa// 
58b5(1): sna tshogs kyi 'du shes sam/ rab kyi 'du shes sam/ bzang ran gyi nga 'du shes sam/ sdug kyi sdug gi 'du she sa bskyed du myi dran no// ra rigs kyi bu kho mo de phyin chad bu sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang ma bral pos
58b6(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdos dang ma bral so// byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ma bral lo// yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bzhen gnyen rnams dang ma zab lo// sangs rgyas kyi smon lam mos pa dang
58b7(1): ma bral yod byang chub sems dpa'i dpyod pa thos pa dang ma bral lo// byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i tshul thos pa dang mabral lo// byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang ba'i tshul thos pa dang sa
58b8(1): bral lo// byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs ting nge 'dzin gyi sang pa'i mdzod dang gted 'os pa thob pa dang ma bral s+ho/ mtha' dang dpung myed pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba la 'jug cing 'od du chud par bya ba'i chul thos pa dang ma
58b9(1): bral lo// mtha' dang dpung byed pa'i sems can gyi khams 'byung ba'i rgyu thos pa thob pa dang ma thal lo/ 'gro ba pas cad kyi nyod mongs pa'i dra ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su zad par bya ba'i ye shes snang ba dang ma bral lo// sebs/ 
58b10(1): can thams cad kyi dge ba'i zla ba 'byung ba'i du'i leshes thob pa dang ma bras lo// sems can thams cad kyisas pa'i rta pa bzhin du yum longs su gon pa dang ma thas po/  sems can tha bad shes par byed pa'i dbyis kyi
59a1(1): 99( sasasasad du sa than nas sas ka ta ka Tha nadag tas mtshamamam
59a2(1): dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa dang ma bralnga'o// rigs kyi bu kho mo byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'dad pa'i sgo bub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po 'di dang / chos thams cad yongs su btsal bas rkye na
59a3(1): ba'i rgyad kyi ting nge 'dzin byin 'di goms par 'jug te/ byang chub chems dpa'i byed pa'i na 'das la bdan pa 'di rnam par byeb d+ha/ Tas kyi sgos 'ams nas kyis zhi dang ba / 
59a4(1): 'ashes babyung ba'i / rgyas kyi gni bsapa cad ldang bar 'arjod pa 'din par sde ba dang 'grum masas gyis gyi khyab pad/ rigs kyis kya mdon gsus cas par 'a dang /  pams/ 
59a5(1): de nas dge nyen sa bya gsol ba de ni de yang 'dug pazhin du/ rdzu sems dpa'i rnam par snad pa'i ga thub par dka' ba'i se dashes kyi nying rol stsogs pa dang / dri 'di kyi smra ma rnams
59a6(1): cad btsal bas myi skyo ba'i brgyan las stsogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzi nad kyi sgo don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan pa spogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo stobs bcu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor
59a7(1): mngon tu gyur pa la mtshogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi de rigs myi zad pa'i mdzod la sogs pa/ ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo brgya stong phrag bcu lan par lta ba dang / na bar spyad pa dang / 
59a8(1): rjes su 'jug pa dang / nges par rtogs par byas so// de ltar dge snyen ma myi g.yo ba snyoms par bzhugs ma thag tu/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams// sangs rgyas kyi zhir
59a9(1): brjod du phyed bu stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rdo pa drug tu g.yos pa dang / bye du r+ya yongs su dag pa'i rgyu las gyur da par gnas par mthong ngo // 'jig rten gyi kham pa re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya rgyas
59a10(1): du/ de bzhing gshegs pa bye ba sdug rgyabargya brlags pa dra mthong ste/ la bani dag la lan gyi gnas bzhugs pa das/ mas ni mongs pa mya ngan las ngan rab mngan pa'i bar blalangs ma // deyar / 
59a11(1): rten gi khams bye dUr+ya'i rang bzhin yongs su dag cing sgrib pa myed pa'i phyir te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dgas so so nas 'od 'ad dang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas pa/ khyab pa mnga' ba dang / 
59b1(1): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag so so'i 'khod kyi dkyil 'khor shi tu rnam par bye ba rgya sor yang mthong bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag re re'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor chos kyi 'khong lo thams cad brjod pa/ sems
59b2(1): can thabs cad kyi na lam tu rnam par thag pa'ang thos par gyur to// de nas dge snyen sa gyi g.yo ba ting nge 'dzidad de las langs nas/ rgong dpodan gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis mthong
59b3(1): dam/ thob sa pa shes sas smras pa 'phags pa mthong ngo // zos so// rig go// rigs kyi bu kho so ni de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i pyod pa yinas brtan pa la slob par chos thams cad yongs su bcas pas/ 
59b4(1): byi skyo ba'i rgyan kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po la gnas nas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi sa'i gzungs
59b5(1): tu chud pa dang / spobs pa'i ye shes sdang ba chos kyi gzhi thams cad ra srung bar brjod pa la mkhas pa'i legs par bshad pas/ seg can thams can yongs su chim par byed pa pa dang / khams kyang
59b6(1): chub sems dpa'i yon tan tshad byed pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang ldan pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings la 'dab chags khyu mchog 'khodapa stu gnas myed par dpyod pa/ nam mkhab ldi ba ni dbang po
59b7(1): chen po gar yongs su phyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gdon pa'i phyisems can thams cad kyi rgyas mos lag pa/ thong ba sa grosas pa rgya tho gas 'ad pa mi mdod par 'di na sems cad panyidapa/ 
59b8(1): nyid kyi rin po che'i gling du rgyu ba/ mthu' dang ldan pa'i nya ba ltar snyid du 'ong ba'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor gi rgya dang ldan pa'i lag pas sred pa'i rgyu las 'byung ba'i sems can yongs su sbyin par mngon don pa'i phyir gyi
59b9(1): kyi mya mchongs na ba rgyab/ lha'i dbang po ltar nyon mongs pa'i lhas yin gyi yul chen po rtul ba bzlog pa'i phyir khams gsug gnas yongs su bkang zhing rnam par rgyu ba/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar sems cad
59b10(1): gyi med pa'i chu dang / nyon mongs pa'i mdas shin tu bskam pa'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings kyi mkha'i dbying sa pas bdag par 'phags pa/ tha ba nya zhing rgyas pa ltar 'phrul ba ma yin gyi me tog sman du rnam
60a1(1): sa ga saN ka sa gamag da ga na can rtan ta Sha rma tA ma
60a2(1): oM pang 'a bye ba'i phyir le shes kyi nam mkha' la mngod par gan la sa'i gzhi ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi dger pa'i dbang po'i m-i gu skyed ci rnam par es pa'i phyir/ byams kyi byam sa dang / mthod dang
60a3(1): myed par 'jig rten na mnyam par gnas pa/ rlung dmar ltar sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / lta ba'i shing dang / shing phran gyi nags tshal dang / kun dga' rtsa ba nas gdon pa'i phyir chags pa myed par phyog
60a4(1): thams cad du rnam par rgyu ba/ 'khor los sgyur ba sngar bsdu ba'i dngos po'i yo byad dang / rkyen kyis 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir 'jig rten na rnam par spyod pa de dag gi spyod pa/ shes pa 'am/ yon tan
60a5(1): brjod par nus re rkan/ song rigs kyi bu ste phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyidar kyi yul dga' 'dzin tshad myed pa na/ grong khyer dga' ba mdzin pa da zhes bya ba yod de/ de na kun tu rgya thams cad du 'gro ba zhes bya 'dug
60a6(1): gis de'i gang du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang/ chub sems dpa'i dpyod pa la srab par bya ba dang / ci ltar/  nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor ba zangs/ 
60a7(1): kyis/ dge snyen ma myi gsol ba'i rkang pa gnyis pa spyi bos phyaga'atshal te/ dge snyen pa myi gsol pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su skor ba byas nas yang dang yang ltas te/ dge snyen
60a8(1): ma myi gso' ba'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge snyen sa kyi g.yol ba mngon tu byas ste/ dge snyen sa myi g.yol ba'i gdams ngag rjes su dran par byed cing / dge bsnyen pa byi gas/ 
60a9(1): bas pas nad pa dang / yang dag par gnad pa dang / bsgrags pa dang / bshad pa dang / brjod pa dang // yang dag par brjod pa dang / bzhag pa dang / rnam par phye ba dang / mos pa dang / rgya cher stan pa de dag pas
60a10(1): cad la gdon gyi za' bar yid ces shing rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / rjes su bsam pa dang / khong du chud par bya ba dang / bsgom pa dang / yongs su sgo ba dang / gzhan du myi 'gyur ba dang / rtogs par bya ba dang / sdang bar bya
60a11(1): ba dang / mnyam par bya ba byed cing mthar kyis gnas na/ gnas dang / yul nas yul du rgyus te/ rgyu zhing seng song nas// yul dge' 'dzin tshad byed pa gang na ba der phyin nas/ grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa med ci
60b1(1): chol tshal te nyi me nub tu cha ba zhig na grong khyer dka' bar 'dzin par byi nad nas/ grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa'i nang du song se grong khyer gyi kham byi bzhi'i mdo'i dbus zhig tu byin nas/ srang gi smonas srang gi sgo dang / lam kyi dran/ 
60b2(1): mdo' nas laM gyi gzhi dang / grong phrag nas grong phrag du kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba tshol zhing rmed rmed pa dang // tshan mo myi nyal tsam zhig na grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa'i phyogs logs na/ ri shin tu myod pa zhes bya ba zhig
60b3(1): yod pa de'i rtse mo ma dang / kel ba dang / sman sna tshogs 'ga' 'ga' ltar skyes pas brgyan pa 'od chen po dang ldan pa ya/ nyi ma shar pa lta bur gnas pa mthong ngo // des snang ba de mthong nas dga' ba'i grags chen po skyes te/ 
60b4(1): 'di snyam du bsams so// bdag gis dga' ba'i bshes gnyen ri'i rtse mo 'di la gdon myi za bar mthong bar 'gyur ba lta zhig snyam nas/ grong khyer de nas byung ste/ ri shin tu mod pa gang na ba der phyind pa dang / ri shin du
60b5(1): mod pa de la mdzeg pas/ ri'i rtse mo sdang ba chen po can gang na ba der phyin pa dang / rgyang yang ring po zhig nas/ kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba/ tshangs pa chen po bas kyang lhag pa'i kha dog dang ldan pa/ dpal gyis shin tu 'bar ba
60b6(1): nig tshangs pa stong phrag bcus kun nas bong te 'chags 'chag nga / 'dug pa mthong nas/ de'i drung du phyin te nang pa gnyis la gyi yos nan 'jas nas/ des lan brgya hong tu mar galas phyogs su skor ba byas
60b7(1): te/ mdun tu 'dug nas thal mo spyad nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu semaskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i pyod pa
60b8(1): pa slab par dgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i gdams drag dang / rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis zos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang
60b9(1): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la srab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ba shud du gsol/ smras pa rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod bran myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa legs so legs so// 
60b10(1): rigs kyi bu kho bo ni thas cad tu 'gro ba ste/ thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa'o// sgo thams cad du rnam par dpyod pas/ snang ba'i ting te 'dzi nad kyi sgo dang / dngos po myed pa sa
61a1(1): sbed kyi mig rten gyi chung thams cad dang / sems nan gyilas kyi rgya bams ca dang / sems kyig pa'i sgothams cad dang / sems can gyi spyi pa'i sgobs pa pad dade/ na pa'i las kyi rgyan gyid pa samam pa da dang / 
61a2(1): skye ba'i skye mched sna tshogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ni bdu la dad pa dag gis sems can kha dog dang / chu zheng rna ba sna tshogs dang snyan pa/ skye ba kun tu 'brel pa/ sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ spyon pa snga tshogs dang ldan pa/ 
61a3(1): mos pa sna tshogs can 'di lta ste/ lha'i lam gyi rgyud du rtogs pa dang / laklu'i lam gyi rgyud du rtogs pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyud tu rtogs pa dang / dri za'i lam gyi rgyud du rtogs pa dang / lha ma yin gyi lam gyi rgyud du rtogs pa dang / 
61a4(1): dam mkha' lding gi lam gyi rgyud du rtogs pa dang / myi 'am ci'i lam gyi rgyud du rtogs pa dang / lto mye chen po'i lam gyi rgyud du rtogs pa dang // / sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud du rtogs pa dang / byol yongs kyi skye gan/ 
61a5(1): kyi lam gyi spyad du rtogs pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi las kyi rgyud du rto nyes pa dang / myi'i lam gyi rgyud du rtogs pa dang / myi ma yim pa'i sa kyi rgyun du rtogs pa dang / lta ba'i rno ba gA tshogs la gnas pa nyan thos kyi reg
61a6(1): pa la mos pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mos pa dang / theg pa chen po la mos pa'i sems can rnaMs kyi don 'bas sna tshogs dang / ye shes kyi tshul dang spyor pa sna tshogs kyis byed de/ 'di ltar sems can las ni bzo'i rgyus pa dad pa'i/ 
61a7(1): thams cad dang ldan pa'i gzugs sdang bas 'jig rten gyi bzol sna tshogs bslabs shing don byed do// seMs can la la la ni 'di lta ste thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes bstabs pa'i phyir bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongs su bsdu ba'i thabs kyis don
61a8(1): byed do// sems can la khI 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyend pa'i nyid du 'gyur ba'i ye shes kyi sgo sdang pa yongs su skyes pas/ pha rold tu phyind pa yang dag par brjod cing don byed do// sems can la ya ya ni 'di lta ste/  byang chub kyi sa bon chud byi za bar ban/ 
61a9(1): cing yongs su bskyed pas byang chub sems dpa'i sems yongs su brjod cing don byed do// sems can la la ni 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i smon lam yong su
61b1(1): bskyed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnaM ba thams cad du yang dag par brjod pas don byed do// sems can la la ni 'di lta ste ngan du spyad pa'i rnam par sbyin pa dang mthun pa'i rgyus/ sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud kyi sdug sngal gyi/ 
61b2(1): tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba yongs su bstan pas skyo ba yongs su bskyed cing don byed do// sems can sa la ni 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la skyed pa'i yon tan thams cad ni gdon myi za bar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'bras bu'i mthar/ 
61b3(1): thug par 'gyur bar brjod pas/ dga' ba chen po skyed cing don byed do// sems can la la ni 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / sku la mngon par mos pas thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi smon lam 'debs par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs
61b4(1): pa thams cad kyi yon tan dang bsngags pa yang dag par brjod pas don byed do// sems can la la ni 'di lta ste myi zlogs shing lhun gyis grub pa dang / rgyun chad pa myed par sangs rgyas kyi phrin las nan tan du mdzad pa'i mthu' dang ldan
61b5(1): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku thob par mos pa'i skyed pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyasadakyi bdag nyid che bas don byed do// sems can sa la ni 'di lta ste/ dachub zil gyis non pa pas ris kyis myi gnon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku/ 3/ 
61b6(1): yun gsuM tshogs pa thob par mos bskyed pa'i phyir sangs rgyas mda'ab chen po yongs su brjod cing don byed do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang kho bo ni grong khyer dga' ba rje 'di'i gzhi mdo la'i 'phongs thams cad dang / 
61b7(1): srang thams cad dang / lam gyi su mdol thams cad dang / gros mtshams thams cad dang / khyim thams cad dang mthun par 'dus pa'i grong dpe thams cad dang / grong thams cad dang / grong gi rgyud zhes cad dun pa'i
61b8(1): ltar tshogs shing 'dus pa'i bud myed dang / skyes pa dang khye'u dang / bu mo rnaMs kyi bsam pa ji lta ba dang / sbyor ba ji lta ba dang / mthu 'ji lta ba dang / rna bar spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du de dag dang mthun pa'i lus kyi chu zheng dang / 
61b9(1): dbyibs mngon par sgrubs shing chos pa stond kyang sems can de dag gis de sus pas nad pa dang / de ga las 'ongs pa myi shes te/ gzhan du na thos nas/ ma nor par nan tan du byed pa ni myed pa 'ang ma yin no// gzhan
61b10(1): rigs kyi bu 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na zhags pa thub pa lta ba sna tshogs la mngon par zhend pa/ dgu bcu rtse drug 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyi nang du snang sems can lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la chags pa rnams sbyin par
62a1(1): byalam gyi mams na dang can pa gnas te/ nas kyi thamam pa zang kyi na mdzin pazhin pa na cad byed mi lun de ban/  na da/ 
62a2(1): yul dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad na'ang sems can gyi dod byed do// 'dzam bu'i gling na ji lta ba de bzhin du gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi thams cad dang / de bzhin du stong dang / stong gnyis dang / stor gsugi hod chen po'i/ 
62a3(1): 'jig rten gyi khams dang / de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sems can gyi rten du bya ba thams cad dang / sems can gyi gnas su bya ba thams cad dang / sems can gyi gzhir bya ba thos can dang / seMs can gyi khams su bya ba'i mying du
62a4(1): gtogs pa thas cad dang / sems can yongs su rgyu ba thams cad dang / de sems can yongs su 'du ba thams cad dang / sems can rgya mtshor gnas pa nga thams cad dang / sems can gyi rgyud gnas pa thams cad dang / seMs can
62a5(1): gyi phyogs su bya ba thams cad dang / seMs can phyogs mtshams su byapa thas cad dang / sems can gyi spyod pa'i gnas thams cad dang / sems can gyis 'apyod pa'i gnas thams cad du'ang / thabs sna tshogs dang/ 
62a6(1): tshul sna tshogs dang / sgo sna tshogs dang / rigs pa sna tshogs dang / 'brad pa sna tshogs dang / thabs kyi tshul sna tshogs dang / bya ba sna tshogs kyis seMs can rnams kyi don byed do// gzugs dang / kha dog sna tshogs yongs su
62a7(1): bstand cing mos par bya ba dang / tshig gi l-i sA rdzogs brjod pas kyang seMs can rnams kyi dod byed do// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub ses dpa'i dpyod pa 'gro ba thams cad du 'gro ba thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i shes par zad na/ kho bos
62a8(1): byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad kyi mnyam pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ bdag dang sems can gyi lus su thi nad pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ 'phrul pa'i 'khor lo rgya chen pos srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad du khyab pa/ 'jig rten ltab
62a9(1): thos cad rang gi sus la rjes su gyod pa 'gro ba thams cad kyis lhan dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba'i skul da pa'i 'khor lol brtson pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi rigs dang / rgyud dang cher skye ba rab tu ston pa/ bka'an pa sems cad du
62a10(1): gnas pa sa thogs pa myed pa'i smon lam gyi 'khor lo dang ldan pa/ myig phrul lta bu'i pyod pa rnam par bye ba'i bsdang ba rab tu thob pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi don byed kyang gos pa byed par gnas pa la bzod pa/ ces gsuM phyi ban+dan/ 
62b1(1): dbyings mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa/ ye shes kyi dbyings bdag myed pa dang ldan pas snang bar byas pa'i snying rje chen mo ba' yas pa'i snying po dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i ma pa yongs su bskyed pa la mngon par brtson pa de dag gi byad
62b2(1): ba shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re nad// song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ yul khams chen po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na spos tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod mud pa la zhes bya ba 'dug gis ka de'i gal du songs ji lta
62b3(1): byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la srab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi los phyag 'tshal te/ 
62b4(1): kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba la lan rgya btod du mar g.yas phyogasu skor ba byas nas/ yang dar yang smras te/ kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor pa zangs lus dang srog la ni myi lta/ 
62b5(1): sri 'a'i spyod dang yongs su zin pa dang / nye bar blangs pa mngon par chag sa pa'i gnas thams cad la ni gyi ste/ sems cad kyi yul gyi dga' ba thams cad la ni myi sta/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya thams can
62b6(1): la ni myi lha/ g.yog 'khor dang / longs spyod dang / nye bar longs pyod pa// thams cad la ni myi lta ste/ rgyal srid dang dbang phyug gi bde' ba thams cad la ni myi swA la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bla na myed pa yang dag pa
62b7(1): dag pa mngon par bsgrubs pas sems can thos cad yongs su smin pa bya dang / gdul ba dang / yongs su dag par bya ba la lta ba la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur dang / rim 'gro bya bas myi ngoms pas
62b8(1): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lta ba dang / rang bzhin byed pa'i yongs su shes pa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad la lta ba yon tan thams cad la lta ba la yon tan rgya mtshol thams cad kyi don tu
62b9(1): nad tan bya ba las nye ba myed par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan thams cad la zha ba dang / bzhal pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yang dag yang gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub ses dpa' tshas
62b10(1): cad kyi thon pam chen po la lta ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khod kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad tu 'jug par bya ba sa na gting nge 'dzin kyi no nir byang chub las da'i ting nge 'dzi grangs byed pa thams ca gzungs na
63a1(1): par 'phrul bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin kyi sgo thams cad la swA / de bzhin gshegs pa thos cad kyi chos kyi 'khod lo yang dag par gzung bas tshu ngoms par bya ba'i cing
63a2(1): chos kyi ye shes snang ba'i 'khor lo thams cad la lta ba de/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan 'di dag dang gzhan dag kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen las byung ba te/ dag pa'i bshes gnyen
63a3(1): ni de dag thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyurd pa yin par yang dag pang ga zhing mthar gyis yul khams chen po gangan pa der byin nas/ gros song gi tsho dpon gyi bu mang pyod mu pa la yongs su med pa'i chos ros pa las mthong nas/ 
63a4(1): spos tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod skud pa la gang na ba der phyi dang te/ drung du song nas spos chod longs 'apyod srud pa' la'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ spos tshong gi tshong dpon khongs spyod ud pa lnga brgya stong
63a5(1): kum gams phyogs su skor ba byas tas/ blos tsho gi tshong dpon po shes khyod mun pa la'i mdun tu 'dug ste/ bral mo sbyar nas 'dis ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag sangs rgyas 'ad pad dang mnyam pa'i
63a6(1): sang ba rgyas thas bdan kyi shes kyi sku'i 'ongs su rgyas pa sagyi bar yang dka'/ kyang chub sems dpa'i byed padi kyi 'khor bams can yongs sudag par 'artse bar yang dga'/ byang chub sem pa pa'i ci re brjin kyi kyi
63a7(1): 'bar thams cad snang bar kyi gagang dga'/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor bsas dang yongs ma rtag pa snang dka'/ sdib parjid kyil 'khong mams cad rnam par gtong pa yang sha'/ ni gi tu
63a8(1): thams cad du rnam par rgyu ba yang 'tshal nas/ bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i dpyod pa la srab bar dgyi ba dang / 
63a9(1): ji ltar nan tan dubakyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ba ma 'tshas to// smras pa rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis blan myed pa sang dag par rdzogs pa'
63b1(1): rgya chub tu sems babyed pa gnas ma pas// rigs kyi rnam lan ma /  ma da/ gdu don d+hA/  'os snang kun dang / zlu shAn
63b2(1): byug par spyad pa thams cad dang / phye ma thams cad dang / phye bar skur pa thams cad dang / spos dang byug pa dang / phye ma'i rnam pa thams cad kyang shes te/ lha'i spos kyang shes so// klu dang gnod sbyin dang / drin dang / lha ma yin
63b3(1): dang / nam mkhal lding dang / byi 'am ci dang / lho phye chen po dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa'i spos kyang shes so// nad so ba'i spos dang / yid myi bde ba la bas lan pa'i spos dang / 'jig rten gyi dga' ba yongs su skyed pa'i spos dang / 
63b4(1): nyon mongs pa 'bar bar bya ba'i spos dang / nyon mongs pa'i bar bya ba'i spos dang / 'dus byas kyi dga' ba dang bde' ba sna tshogs yongs su bskyed pa'i spos dang / 'dus byas thams can 'askyo ba yongs su skyed pa'i thos dang / 
63b5(1): bag bya ba'i gnas thams cad se lad pa'i spos dang / sangs rgyas ded yid la bya ba'i rgyud yang dag par 'byung ba'i spos dang / chos kyi tshul khong du chud par bya ba'i spos dang / 'phags pas spyad pa'i spos dang / 
63b6(1): byang chub sems dpa'i spos ne ba tha dad pa dang / byang chub sems / dpa'i sa thams cad kyang rnam par 'god pa'i spos kyang shes par nyite/ kho bos spos de dag thams cad nam pa ji ltar bu 'ang rab tu shes so//
