63b7(1): 'byung ba dang / skye ba dang / grub pa dang / yongs su rdzogs pa dang / yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su spang ba dang / rab tu sbyar ba dang / yongs su spyad pa dang / yul dang mthu' dang / zas dang rgyal b.rab tu shes
63b8(1): garigs kyi bu phyi'i 'jig rted na smos grang po'i snying po zhes bya ba/ klu longs su 'khrug par byed pa 'od de/ de'i ris bu nyis kyi 'brus kyis kyang sub khams chen po thams cad dgos kyi phrin gyi shing
63b9(1): tu sdug pas kun nas khyabs par 'gyur da te/ zhag bdun du spos chu'i rgyun shin tu phra bi'i chang mngon par 'bab bo// de'i tshe sems can su'i lus sam/ gos la spos chu'i rgyun de dag gis 'bab par gyur
63b10(1): pa ka re dag thams cad kyang me tog gser gyi kha dog du 'dug pas/ rnam par brgyan pa'i gos dang // / lus su 'gyur ro// khang pa dang / gzhal myed khang dang / khang pa tshegs pa gang du 'bab par 'gyur ba de dag
64a1(1): thams cad kyang me tog gser gyi kha dog lta bras na par rgyan par gnas so// sems can gyi khyim kyi nang ni gnas kyi gang gis sos kyi sprin gyi dra ba de la rlung gis mdad pa'i dri tsho par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad
64a2(1): kyang zhag bdun du dga' ba dang / mos pa chen pos yongs su rgyas par gyur te/ lus dang sems pa bdel ba dang / dga' ba rnams sna tshogs kyang rab tu myong par 'gyur ro// de dag gi lus la yang khams lazhugs pa sas
64a3(1): gyu da ga'am 'a gzhan gyis gnod par byas pa la' byur na pa'i nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur da ba myed de/ sems kyi sdug sngal dang / yid kyi bden pa 'ayang gyi 'byung ngo // 'jigs pa 'am/ skang g.ya/ lag ca ba le/ 'di khrug
64a4(1): 'amag gdong sems kyang kyi rgyu te/ de dag mas cad zhag brgyad tu dka' ba dang / bdang ba skyes te/ gcig sa gcig byams pa'i sems su 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu kho ba ni/ de dag de ltar dka' ba
64a5(1): nyes pa de'i ba skyes pa rnams la bas pa dag par bya ba'i phyir/ na ci nas kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tun nges par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston to// gzhan snang rigs kyi bu
64a6(1): ri ma la ya las byung ba'i tsan dan ma stengs dam pa zhes bya ba ya di/ de lus la bsdus na se'i 'obs su rmongs kyang cig pa skye do// rigs kyi bu rgya mtsho'i mtha' nas byung ba'i chos gzhan gyis thub pa
64a7(1): byed pa zhes bya ba yod de/ des ra'am cung la sras na de'i sgral gzhan gyi 'khor thams cad 'pham por 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu mtsho'am dros pa'i dogs nas 'byung ba'i ma ga tu nag po pad mo'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 
64a8(1): de'i ril bu til kyi 'bru tsam cig gi dris kyang 'dzam bu'i gling zums cad kyang sdig pa sprod cing / snos pa'i snyems rab tu thob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu ri'i rgyal po kha ba can las byung ba'i spos kyi rnam pa 'od dang ldan par
64a9(1): mas cad rgyas po gang bsre gyur te/ so mas can gang gis smos kyi dri tseR+sha pa ded
64a10(1): zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i dri tshong nas sems can de dag 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems su 'gyur te/ kho bo ni de dag la ci nas kyang rdul dang bral ba'i dkyis 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston
64a11(1): to// rigs kyi bu srin po'i 'jig rten nas 'byung ba'i 'phos kyi rnam pa rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de// de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i longs spyod kyi don tu 'byung ste/ des bdugs ma thag tu 'khor los spyad pa'i rgyal po'i
64b1(1): dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa yang nas mkha'i dbyings la gnas so// rigs kyi bu lnga'i 'khor chos pa'ang po nas 'byung ba'i spos kyi ni bar 'byed pa zhes bya ba yod de/ des bdugs pa thag tu lha rnams sangs rgyas kyi dri shin
64b2(1): po dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu lnga'i rgyal po rab rje ma'i gnas na spos kyi rnam pa dag pa'i mdzod ces bya ba yod de/ des bdugs su thag tu mtshe ma'i lha'i bu thams cad lnga'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma'i drung du 'dong ngo ngo// de dag deng
64b3(1): phyin nas kyang / lha'i rgyal po rab tshems chos kyi gtam bya'o// rigs kyi bu dga' ldan gyi gnas na spos kyi rnam pa srin du pA ra re zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i spos kyi dud pa byang chub sems dpa' che cig gis thogs pa chos
64b4(1): kyi sad la 'dug pa'i mdun tu 'dug na spos kyi sprin chen pos chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par gang shing de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams can tu rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang snyan pa'i chos kyi sprin chen po// 
64b5(1): char rab tu 'bab bo// rigs kyi bu lnga'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dag 'i gnas na sos kyi ne ba yid phrog pa zhes bye ba yod de/ des lnga'i rgyal po rug 'phrul dga'i gnas su bdugs na/ zhag bdun du chos kyi sbed gyi char pas
64b6(1): gyis myi khyab pa 'bab par 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni so// sbyar bshes su zad na/ kho bos byang chub semasu skyon gi tri myed pa// 'dod pa'i 'jig rten thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa/ nyon mongs
64b7(1): ba'i bdud kyi zhags pa dang bral ba/ srid pa'i las kyi rgyud rnamam cad las shin tu 'das pa/ ye shes smra ma'i rnam pa dang gzugs kyis rnam par spyod pa/ 'jig rten thams can kyis gos pa myed pa/ 
64b8(1): chags pa myed pa'i ngang tshul can/ sgribs pa myed par ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rno bar dag pa/ thogs pa myed pa'i ye shes kyi dpyod yul dang yul du ldan pa/ kun bzhi'i gnas thams cad la myi gnas parasrid pa'i
64b9(1): kun bzhi' dang / gnas thams cad du rgyu ba rnams kyi spyod pa shes pa/ 'am/ yon tan brjod pa laM/ khrims kyi spyod pa rna bar dag pa'i sgo yongs su spros pa 'am/ kha na ma tho ba myed pa'i spyod pa brjod pa 'am
64b10(1): gnod par dpyod pa myed pa'i lus dang / rag dang / yid kyi rgyud snyan par nus rend/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na ma/ grong khyer kha pa rigs bu zhes bya ba sod de/ den mnyan pa dpa'o zhes bya ba cu
65a1(1): gis/ de'i drung du song la ji ltar byang chub seMs dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi grwa nor ba zangs kyis// 
65a2(1): spos tshong gi tshong dpon sor dpyod skud pa la'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ spos tshod gi tshong dpon longs spyod sud pa la la/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su stor ba byas nas/ yang dang sar stas te/ 
65a3(1): spos tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod srud pa la'i drung nas song ngo // de nas rdzong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs grong khyer khang pa zegs par 'gro ba'i laM bu 'jug pa'i tshe/ lam gyi gyen thur dang / lam mnyam pa dang / lam gyi bug bu ga dang / 
65a4(1): lam rtul yod pa dang / lam brdul myed pa dang / lam bdel ba dang / lam che myi bdel ba dang / sam dog pa dang // yaM 'gegs myed pa dang / laM 'khyu ga pa myed pa dang / rnam par myad de ltas nas 'di snyam du bsams so// 
65a5(1): 'di ltar bdag bge' ba'i bshes gnyen de'i drung du 'gro ba 'di ni byang / chub sems dpa'i lam gyi nan tan gyi rgyur gyur pa'o// pha rolan/ tu phyind pa'i lam gyi nan tan gyi rgyur gyur ro// sems can phan 'das
65a6(1): ba'i lam gyi nan tan gyi rgyud 'gyur ro// sems cad thams cad byam sa sdang dang bon man du 'gyur ba'i sangs sa las na par bzlog padang / sems can thams cad kyi mnyam pa'i nan tan las sbyar ba dang / 
65a7(1): sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i rdul kwi bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi myi dge' ba'i lta ba sna tshogs kyi sdong rgyam dang / cher ma dang / gyo mo dang / gseg ma la khad pa dang / chos kyi dbyings sgribs pa myed pa
65a8(1): la gzhol par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyend pa'i pho brang du thogs pa myed par sprul ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi 'byung gnas so// dge ba'i bshes gnyen
65a9(1): la ni thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi ngag lus so zhes de de ltar sems shing yid la byed pas dpyod pa thub par dka' ba de/ mthar kyis grong khyer khang pa legs pa der phyin nas mnyan pa dga'o yongs su med cing cho latshad
65a10(1): pa las grong khyer ched po zhig gi sgo rgya mtsho chen po'i ngogs na/ mnyam pa dpa'o dang / tshor ba brgya phrag sor tsan dang / srog chags brgya' son nA swa gtam sna nogs nyan par 'dod pa na rtag cig gis kun
65b1(1): nas bkod cid rgya mtsho gtam yongs su brjod pas/ sangs rgyas kyi yod tan sumathod/ sems can rnams la tshas ston cing 'jug pa mthod do// gam thong nas kyang mnyan pan pa 'o gang na pa derang song ste/ ldan nas
65b2(1): mnyan pa dpa' bo'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mnyan pa dpa' bo la lan rgya song du mar g.yas phyogs su skor ba byas nas/ mnyan pa dpa' bo'i mdun tu 'dugs so/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces spral/ 
65b3(1): so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par dgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba
65b4(1): pa 'tshal te ma 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams gdams ngag dang // rjes su bstand pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i dpyod pa
65b5(1): bslab par dbyir ba dang / ji ltar dad ta dubagyi ba la dka' sa ya tu ra gsol/ spras pa rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bra na byed pa yang dag nga par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ ye shes ched po thob pany+dzan+da
65b6(1): 'byung ba'i sgra dri ba dang / 'khor ba'i bug pa la sna tshogs kyi rgyud 'byung pa'i rgyud dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong gi gnas su tho ba 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / dbyer byed pa'i theg pa chen po 'byung ba'i rtsa
65b7(1): dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyisar ltung las 'jigs pa dang / bral bar 'gyur ba'i lam gyi nan tan 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / zhi ba'i ti nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / thun sna tshogs khong du chud par bya ba'i seshes kyi/ 
65b8(1): sam gyi 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i pyod pa thams cad du 'gro bas rnam par spyod pa'i smon lam gyi shing rta'i 'khor lo thogs pa myed pa'i lam du 'byung ba dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang / 
65b9(1): byang chub sems dpa'i pyod pa ga'i brjid kyi dpal rlabs kyis nam yang brgyad pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang / tshul gyi zhum gyi 'brung ba dang na mang dag pa'i rgyu dang / chos kyi phyogs dang / sgo thams can kyi phyi ma'i mtha'i
65b10(1): lam 'byung ba dang / naM bar dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang / thams cad mkhyend pa'i rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i lam 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / ni pa dag yang rgyu ba'i dri ba legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni rgya mtsho
66a1(1): cig sa na kyi na yongs su na sa kyi na bdag kyi ma
66a2(1): thos nas/ de dag gi don tu dka' ba spyod de/ de dag gi spyod pa rdzogs par bya'o// 'jig rten gyi zeng zing gis yongs su bsdu bar bya'o// chos kyi longs spyod kyis de dag yongs su rim par bya'o// de dag la rgod
66a3(1): nams kyi tshogs kyi lam man ngag du bas nad par bya'o// ye shes kyi tshogs rnam par spel bar bya'o// dge ba'i rtsa pa'i stobs yongs su sel bar bya'o// byang chub kyi sos skyed par bya'o// byang chub kyi bas bre rnaM par dag pa
66a4(1): bya'o// snying rje chen po'i stobs nye bar brtan par bya'o// 'khor ba'i sdug sA la rnaM bar zhi bar bya'o// 'khor ba'i spyod pas yongs su myi skyo ba'i stobs shin tu rten par bya'o// sems can rgya ba chos su pa
66a5(1): 'didag sung da bya'o// yod tad mam pa'i dad da kyi sgol 'dongab byo/  'di dag pa chos bya mtsha'i ye shes snang ba nye bar spya bar bya'o/ ses rgyas rgyamatsho thams cad kyang didag gis yod
66a6(1): bar mthong bar bya'o// thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi rgya mtshol sa 'dre 'di dag bzung bar bya'o// zhes de lta bu'i bas pa dang / yid la byed pa la brtson par kho bo rgya mtsho'i ngogs kyi grong khyer khang pa chags pa 'di na gnas
66a7(1): so// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni de ltar 'gro ba la phan pa dang / bde la 'du brtson pas rgya mtsho chen po'i rin po che'i gling thams cad kyang shes so// rin po che'i 'byung gnas thams cad dang / rin po che'i rigs thams cad dang / rin po che
66a8(1): bcos thams cad kyang rab tu shes so// klu'i gnas thams cad dang / klu'i 'khrug pa thams cad dang / gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad dang / gnod sbyin 'khrug pa thams cad dang / srin po'i gnas thams cad dang / srin
66a9(1): po'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po'i gnas thams cad dang / 'byung po'i bar chad thams cad rnam par zhi bar bya ba yang rab tu shes te/ glob yod pa thos cad dang / grong thams cad bkol ba dang / 
66a10(1): dpa' rlabs thams cad yongs su spas pa dang / chu'i d+h+r-i pa pa dad pa 'ang ra ba tu shes so// nyi zla dang gza' skar gyi tshogs yongs su bskor ba dang / nyin zhag dang / skad cig dang / yud tsam dang / thang cig kyang rab tu shes so
66b1(1): phan tshun du 'gro ba'i shos 'dums dang / bde' myi bde' dang / klu'i khrul 'khor brtan par bya ba dang / gru zur bya ba dang / gru 'phul pa dang / rlung rdo ba dang / rlung bskyed pa dang / gru sbyang zhing zlog pa dang / gru brtod pa dang / 
66b2(1): gru btang ba dang rab tu shes so// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bo ni shes pa de lta bu dang ldan pas/ rtag tu sems can gyi don dang / dgos pa byed de/ tshong pa'i tshogs gru brtan pos la bde' zhing nyes zhor gyi 'gyur la/ kyi
66b3(1): ba nas chos kyi brtam gis dga' ba dang / spro ba bskyed cing bsam pa ci lta ba bzhin du rin po che'i gling du phyin par byas nas/ de dag rin po che thams cad kyis chog ste/ phun gsu tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / bying sang 'dzam bu'i
66b4(1): gling du 'gyed kyang / rigs kyi bu kho bo'i gru ni nam yang bub pa 'am nyes nor gyur na pa ma myong ste/ sems can gang gis kho bo mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can gang gis kho bo'i chos stand pa thos pa de dag kyang 'khon
66b5(1): masasad tu nyimanor rgya pa'i 'grus pa da dpa par 'gyu'o// rab mkhyen pa da kyil /  pa'i gas kya bsos
66b6(1): bsdam pa'i don tu'ang rab tu 'jug par gyur te/ dus gsum / rgya mtsho'i ye shes snang ba 'ang rab tu thob bo// sems canathams cad kyi sdug sngal rgya mtshol zad par bya ba'i phyir yang mngon
66b7(1): khang thos par 'gyur ro// sems can thos cad kyi sems rgya mtsho'i rnyog pa dang par bya ba'i phyir yang rab tu brtson par 'gyur ro// zhing rgya mtsho 'thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yang rab tu bzod par 'gyur ro// 
66b8(1): zhing rgya mtsho' thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yang brtson grus bcom par 'gyur ro// phyogs rgya mato thams cad rgyas par dgang pa las kyang phyir gyi ldog par 'gyur ro// 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po rgya ngom tshal ba dang
66b9(1): 'ang khong du chung bar 'gyur ro// sems can thamacad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho'i rjes bu'ang 'brang bar 'gyur ro// 'gro ba'i bsam pa rgya mtsho ji ltar ba bzhin du'ang gzugs partan 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu
66b10(1): kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rno bar tha dad pa mthong ba dang thos pa dang 'grogs pa dang / rjes su dran pa'i chu glung gi dbyangs shes bya ba thob par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i rgya mtshol thams cad du
67a1(1): rnam par spyod pa/ nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho'i thams cad kyis gos pa myed pa lta ba'i rgya mtsho'i thams cad kyi chags pa'i chu srin gyi 'jigs pa dang bral ba/ chos kyi rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang / ka ni las na/ 
67a2(1): par rgyu ba/ 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i thams cad 'dug pa'i dngos pos yongs su bsdug pa'i rgya mtsho'i dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtsho dang / 'grogs pa/ sems can myingon par chags pa'i rgya mtsho' dzas cad rab tu srub
67a3(1): pa/ dus rgya mtsho'i thams cad dang tha myi dad pa/ rna bar spyod pa 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i thas cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i dmyigs shes pa/ 'gro ba rgya mtshor thams cad kyi 'dul pa'i 'brel pas myi 'dre ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa
67a4(1): 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re rkan// song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer dga' ba'i phreng ba zhes bya ba yod de// de na tshong dpon rgyal ba daM pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du songs ni ltar byang
67a5(1): chub seMs dpas byang chub seMs dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ kyis/ mnyan pa dpa' bo'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas/ mnyan pa dag
67a6(1): bo la lan brgya stong du mang g.yas phyogs su gong pa byas te/ yang dang yang smras nas/ gdong mchims gang nye du zhing dge' ba'i bzhes gnyen smras pas ma ngoms bzhin du/ mnyan pa dpa' ba'i drung nas song / 
67a7(1): sangs rgyas phas po che zhes bya ba shi nad tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo'// / dum bu bzhi pa/ bam po drug pa// / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ byis pa chen pos sems can
67a8(1): gyi las tshad byed pa rgyal par dgang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ snying rje chen po'i rlan gyis mngon par dran pa'i rgyud can/ bsod nams dang / ske shes kyi tshogs rgya chen po'i rgyan shin tu baphags pa/ nyon mongs pa'i rdul dang / mun pa
67a9(1): dang dri ma dang / 'di thas cad dang bral ba/ chos mnye ba nyid kyi khong du chud pas/ thos cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi lam gyen thur myed pa la zhugs dang / dge ba'i chos tshad myed pa pa 'jug pa'i sprong zhugs pa/ gyi dge' ba thas cad kyis myi shigs pa'i
67a10(1): brtson grus brtan pa'i mthul ba sngon du gtor ba dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin pas kyis myi khyab pa rab tu byang ba rgya chen po'i bdel ba thob pa/ shes rab kyi nyi ma'i 'od gzer snang bas ma rig pa'i mun pa ma us par 'alan pa/ 
67b1(1): thabs kyi ser bu bde' zhing bsil pas bsgrags pa'i ye shes kyi me tog gis rgyas pa/ smon lam chen po rgya mtsho'i 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi tshul dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du thogs pa myed par rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ye shes
67b2(1): dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi pho brang du thogs pa myed par 'grol ba la mngon tu gyur pa/ byang chub sos dpa'i lam la mngon par mos pa/ de grong khyer dga' ba'i phreng ba gang na ba der byin te/ tshong dpon rgyas pa'i di pa yongs
67b3(1): su rmed cing cho la tshol ba las/ grong khyer dga' ba'i phreng ba'i shar phyogs logs kyi 'dab cig na/ shing a shau ka'i nags tshal rgyal ma tshan sAmatshan sna tshogs shes bya ba 'dug pa de'i nang na khyim bdag stong phrag du ma zhig gis skor te/ 
67b4(1): grong khyer gyi bya ba sna tshigs yongs su 'gro zhing de las brten te/ bdag tu bya ba thams cad yang dag par gzhom pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa'i thams cad yongs su gtad pa dang / dngos por 'dzin pa thas cad rab tu spang ba dang / mngon par zhen pa
67b5(1): nges cad shin tu zhig pa dang / sred pa'i 'ching ba thas cad gcad par bya ba dang / lta ba'i rnaM ba thas cad kyi sgo glegs gcag pa dang / the tsom dang / yid gnyis dang / nair nur gyi rab rib thaMd cad rno bar bsam lang ba dang
67b6(1): g.yo sku'i rnyog pa shin tu gdang ba dang / pra dog dang ser sna'i drim lo sa su spyang ba dang / sems kyi mchog shinang tu gsal bar bya ba dang / sos rtog pa myed pa la seMs can rab tu bkod pa dang / dad pa rnyog pa
67b7(1): byed pa'i stobs bskyed de/ sangs rgyas lta bar mos bskyed pa dang / byang chub seMs dpa'i stobs bsngags shing / sangs rgyas kyi chos nang dag par phrad pa dang / byang chub ses dpa'i smod pa mos te/ byang chub
67b8(1): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs yongs su skyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs yang dag par brtan cing / byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa'i stobs rno bar dag pa'i mthar phyin par bya ba'i chos kyi gtam byed cing
67b9(1): 'dug pa mthong ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ gti de'i rjes chad chad du bsad nas tshong dpon rgyal ba daM pa'i rkang pa gnyis sku phyag 'tshal te/ ring mo zhig tu 'dug nas chos la shin tu gus pa'i bas bas tshig 'di skad ces brjod
67b10(1): do// 'phags pa bdag ni nor bzangs nor bzangs zhes bgyi ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol na/ ci nas kyang bdag byang chub ses dpa'i spyospyod pa la slob par 'gyur ba dang / srabs nas kyang ci nas sems can
68a1(1): khams can yongs su sbyi par bgyis dang / gdus pa'i zhon pa mdon tu mas par 'byung ba dang / sang rgyam po sadu kyinas skams kyi 'bang ba dang / sangs rgyas ma na kyi chos go mer 'gyung ba dang / 
68a2(1): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi snying gi char yongs su gzung ba dang / sangs rgyas rjes cad kyi chos kyi tshul la nan tan du ba bgyi ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang chub ses dpa'i spyod pa spyad pa dang / bag 'a dag thams cad
68a3(1): du gnas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas yongs su myi skyo ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su btsal bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi drabs yang dag par mnod pa dang
68a4(1): de bzhin gshegs pa thas cad kyi stobs la bsnang ba thob par 'gyur pa/ de ltar 'phags pa bdag la bshad du gsol// de nas tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor pa zangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de ltar
68a5(1): khyod kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par sima?/  bskyed pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni 'di lta ste/ dngos po myed pa la gnas pas/ mngon par du bya ba byed pa'i rdzu 'phrul thob pa'i// 
68a6(1): bcus byang chub semapa pa'i spyod pa'i rnathamasas tu 'tshu ma / de skar lo po byang chub mos dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag go sems pad ca thob 'dis gnas ning rtsong cu kyi chen pa'i 'dzin
68a7(1): rten gyi khams kyi/ sum bcu pa ka suM gyi lha'i 'jig rten thams cad/ rtse ma'i lha'i gnas pas cad dang / dga' ldan gyi lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / 'phrul dga'i lnga'i 'jig rten thas cad dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed
68a8(1): kyi lnga'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / bdud kyi gnas pas cad dang / 'dod pa'i khas kyi lha'i ril su gartogs pa thams cad dang / lha'i gnas thas cad dang / klu'i 'jig rten pas cad dang / klu'i gnas rnams cad dang / 
68a9(1): gnod sbyin gyi 'jig rten thams cad dang / gnod sbyin gyi gnas thas cad dang / srin po'i 'jig rten thams dang / srin pa'i gnas thas cad dang / grul 'bum gyi 'jig rten thos cad dang / grul 'bum gyi gnas
68a10(1): bas cad dang / yi dgas kyi 'jig rten thams cad dA/ yi dgas kyi gnas thams cad dang / dri za'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / dri ba'i gnas thos cad dang / lha ma yin gi 'jig rten thams cad dang / lha ma yin gyi gnas
68b1(1): thams pad dang / desa'a' zhing gi 'jig rten thams can dang / nam mkha' lding gi gnas thams cad dang / rgya'o ci'i 'jig rten thams pad dang / byi 'ab ci'i gnas bams can dang / ko phye chen po'i yig rten thabs cad dang / 
68b2(1): lho phye chen po'i gnas thams cad dang / myi'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / phyi'i gnas khams thams cad dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / krod brdal dang / ljongs dang // las dang / rgyal po'i bro brang 'khor dang / 'dod pa'i khaMs
68b3(1): u rtogs pa'i sems can gyi rgyud thas cad ni chos stond to// chos ma yin pa ni zlog go// brtsod pa ni zhi bar byed do/ 'thab pa ni rnam par zlog go// 'khrug pa ni nye bar zhi bar byed/ g.yul du lhags pa ni rnaM bar zlog go/ shags
68b4(1): 'byed pa ni zhi bar byed do// 'dud par 'dzin pa ni rab tu sel to// ni ba thas cad ni yongs su gcod do// ba tson ra zas cad ni mngon par 'das so// 'jigs pa ni rje bam brog go/ myi dge' ba'i las kyi 'du byed ni rgyan gcod do// srog gcod
68b5(1): las ni/ sems can rnam par zlog go/ myi bya ba thams cad ni sems can byed du myi 'jug go// dge ba'i chos thal cad ni byed du 'jug go// seMs/ can thos cad ni bzo thams cad la slob du 'dzud de/ 'jig rten pa rnams rab tu
68b6(1): dga' bar bya ba dang / seMs can yongs su sbyin par bya ba dang / zhags pa zhes cad la gong ma ye shes khyad du 'phags pa brjod pa'i phyir rjes su 'dra bar bya ba dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad rna bar zlog pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
68b7(1): chos thams cad brjod cing bstan pa'i phyir/ 'jig brten la phan par 'gyur ba'i gtsug lag thos cad kyang nyond to// rnam par 'god do// rab tu gsal bar byed do// brjod do// de bzhin du tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du gzungs khams kyi lda na
68b8(1): cad mi lad kyis mnan te chos stond to// stong gsu gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du phyogs bcud yang 'jig rten gyi las sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du byed pa'i yang brjod du byed pa'i chu bzhin/ 
68b9(1): tu phra ba rnyed dag tu chos bston to// sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / nyan thos kyi chos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ston to// sems can dmyal ba yang ston to// sos can dmyal bar 'gro ba/ 
69a1(1): sas dang / sems can dmyal bu'i myi byede ba'ang yod to// byol song gi skye gnas kyang ston te/ byol song gi skye gnas kyis kyi sdud pa dang pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas kyisamacu zla la'i lam dpa/ 
69a2(1): mthoris kyi 'jig rten gyi 'gro ba'i po dang / mthangs kyi 'jig rten gyi dga' ba spyod pa dang / 'angs byed kyang ston to/ kyi'i 'jig rten yang nyon to// phyi'i 'jig rten gyis pa sa rgyan tu 'gro la'i ya dang / rdzi 'dri rten gyi de ba dang / 
69a3(1): sdug sngal nyams su myong ba sna tshogs kyang btond te/ de ltar rigs kyi/ bu kho bo ni 'jig rten gyi chos kyang stonod to// 'jig rten kun 'byung ba dang // 'jig rten nub par 'gyur ba dang // 'jig rten gyi kha na ma tho ba dang / 
69a4(1): 'jig rten las 'byung ba yang stod te/ de yang 'di skar byang chub sems byed pa'is yang dag par bas dad pa dang / 'khor pa'i ston napas zlog pa dang / shes cad mkhyen pa'i tid kyi yon tan yang dag par badz+ra/ 
69a5(1): pa dang / srid pa'i las kyi myang du bzhi 'kho pa dang / mug sngal du sus ba yang dag par bstan pa dang / sgrib pa myed mam chim nyid brjod pa 'dzin byed sgru bya ba yongs su bstan pa dang / 'jig rten 'grang
69a6(1): dang ldog pa'i bdel ba dang / sug sngal thos cad mos pa dang / 'gro ba thas cas kyi gnas byed du bya ba rna par bsgom pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gnas myed pa mngon par bstan pa dang / las dang nyon mongs pa'i 'khong sa sa
69a7(1): zad na par zlog pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khong po 'khor ba zhin tu brjod pa'i phyir chos yond to// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa na pa dag pa'i rnathas pan ca tho nga/ rab po byed la gnas pas man
69a8(1): par 'du bya ba byed pa'i chu 'bral gyi mthas rgyan pa 'di shes par 'ad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'don par shes pa/ zhing gi dbyis gams cad du smras lta bu'i seshes kyi pus kyis rgyab 'ad 'ashes bkun du ltaba'i ye shes kyi
69a9(1): sa rab tu thob pa/ tshig gi lam dang sgra thas cad rnaM par dmyigs pa la shin tu gzhol ba'i rna ba dang ldan pa dus su rgyas par 'gengs pa'i chos kyi snang ba la dbang rab tu thob pa chos thas cad la yang dag par zhol ba'i ye shesas dpang gis dbang skar
69b1(1): ba'i skyes su 'o// sems pan can byed pa/ bams kyis kyi khyab pa'i khasas pa dag pa bzhin can pa dbyigs par byab sa pa 'dres pa'i rgyal gyi kyis 'kho nga yin pa rtsims nyi bra pa zhi thong nga napa/ 
69b2(1): bsam pa'i tha dad pa'i sems can rgya mtho yid du 'ong ba'i kha dog dang dbyibs su ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams can dang mnyam pa'i lus sbrum lta bu dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams can dang myi gnyis la/ 
69b3(1): spyo sa kyis kyi khyab pa'i sras pa gnos pa/ rgyas gsus 'ams can du rjes su 'brang pa'i rishes kyi phus dang ldan pa/ nas mapa dbyings gang dan byed pa'i spyod yus dpag tu byed pa'i sub dang ldan pa de dag ni spyod pa shes pa
69b4(1): nga po chul pa dag pa'i nang pa gnyis byams cag 'am te/  nga pon rgyas pa dpal sun brgya song pa sa/ ra pa rgyas dang/ nga du na / ma
69b5(1): pa'i dru ba nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs sapar phyi bya bul shum phyi ma'i mtha'i grong khyer ying 'ga'i nags tshal gang na be der song nye phyin nas/ dge slong ma seM dris rnas par byings pa yongs su
69b6(1): chos zhing sems can kun la rmed pa'i tshe gar nas gang tu song ba de rang der dogs pargya phrag tu ma dang / bu mo brgya phrag du ma zhig srang dang lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / yaM gyi ma suM mdo dag nas tshogs te rjes su 'brang ngo // skyes pa brgya phrag du ma dang / 
69b7(1): bud byed pa rgya phrag du ma zhig gis kyang / rigs kyi bu de re/ dge slo sing ge rnam par spyings pa ni/ grong khyer ka ling 'ga'i nags tshal 'di nyid kyi bza' shing gi ra ba chen po rgyal ba'i 'od kyis byin pa/ nyi ma'i mdog na sems can tshad byed pa'i don / 
69b8(1): chos ston cing 'dug go zhes ston to// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ bza' shing gi ra ba nyi ma'i mdog der phyin nas/ kun tu btsal te ltas naM/ bza' shing gi ra ba de na shing zla ba gar ba zhes bya ba khang partsegs pa'i dbyibs sngar 'dug pa/ 
70a1(1): 'a rdzogs kyi'o// da kyisadog nga na pa/ 'ad tu gan kya khyo An+dan kyi rgya par zhengs pa mar rjodang / gna' dang sos su shegs shes kyis na sbyin pa sha kyis 'dun
70a2(1): mdab mas kun byebs pa/ bye du n+ya sngon po'i kha dog sbyar 'dug pa'i sprin gyi mdog dang ldan pa mang po dang / me tog gi shing me tog gi mdzod ces bya ba/ ri'i rgyal po kha ba can ltar mdangs dga' ba'i dbyibs sna tshogs dang ldan par kha dog tshogs
70a3(1): kyi me tog myi zad pa'i char rab tu 'bebs pa/ gsuM bcu pa gsuM gi sku'i pho brang gi rkyen gyis kun nas 'du ba dang / sus kyang myi gags pa sta bu mang po dang / shing tog gi shing rtag tu sbyin pa'i ro dpe byed pa'i 'bras bu'i tshogs shes bya ba gser gi ri bo'i
70a4(1): kun ltar 'dug pa'i// rtag tu shing tog phun gsuM tshogs par gnas pa mang po dang / rin po che'i rgyal po'i shing rnam par snang ba'i mdzod ces bya ba rin po che'i dpe' rang myed pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i phreng ba dang / se mo do dang / 
70a5(1): rgyan rin po che bzhin gyi rgyal po'i mdzod nas byung ba ltar phun gsu tshogasapa dang ldan pa rin po che'i kha dog grangs myed pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa mang po dang / gos kyi shing dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba lha rdzas kyi gos rin po
70a6(1): 'dog snga tshogs kyis chog pa rab tu 'byed cing 'byung babazhin du brgyan pa mang bya po dang / ros so ging dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba na rdzas las kyang ldag pa'is 'ob mo yid du 'ong ba'i smra snyan pa byin pa mang po dang / sa kyi zhing kun tu zhim pa/ can
70a7(1): brgyan pa zhes bya ba phyogs thams cad tu thogs pa myed par rnaM pa thams cad du yid du 'ong ba'i spos kyi ngad 'byung ba mang po dag kyang yod par mthong / mtshe'u dang yu ma dang / sdeng ka dang / rdzing bu rin po che bdun gyi ba gus mtha' brtsigs/ phyogs
70a8(1): bzhi' nas rin po che'i them spras btsugs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi khri 'phar du sa dang 'thun pa'i can d+han gyi dri zhim pos bskus pas kun nas bskor ba gzhi rin po che'i rgyal po bye tu r+ya sngon po las legs par blangs pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi
70a9(1): gamed kyi kye ma bdas pa yan lag dang ldan pa'i chu/ Tha rdzas kyi ni mid du 'ong ba can gyis khongs su gang ba/ rin pa ni'i bar mo dang / ud pa la dang / kumra d+ha dang / me tog sun da rig lnga tshogs kyi dardzas kyi gsung dang snyan pas chu kun nas gsodang / 
70a10(1): bya bran sna tshogs kyi chu na rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i gzugs rin du long ba dang ldan pa/ hA snyan pa 'byin cing brjod pas gang 'i/ gardzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi zhing gi brel pa legs par bkye na/ yongs su go pa brgyan pa dang ldan pa
70b1(1): shing sna tshogs de dag gi drung thams cad du 'ang / rin po che'i seng ge'i khri sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan pas kyis myi khyab pa du mas brgyand pa/ lha rdzas kyi san rin po che sna tshogs spel ba bting ba
70b2(1): lha rdzas kyi spos dang / bdug spos kyi rnam pa thams cad kyis btugs pa/ lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i dar rin po che mngon par sbyangs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi bla re bkye ba/ rin po che sna tshogs dang / 'dzam bu chu klung gi grwa ser gyi dra ba snga
70b3(1): tshogs kun las bres pa/ rin po che'i dril gyi dra ba yid du 'ong zhing bstan pa'i sgra 'byin pa mas pos brgyan pa/ la'o d+ha lnga rdzas na po mamacan brgya stong nus gting zhing dgams pa mthong / rin pa chi shi dus sa yang ni seng gi'i waM chen pan/ 
70b4(1): bde mo'i snying po can bshes pa mthong ngo // la lan ni seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che'i spos kyi rgyal po'i pad mos snying po byams pas bshams pa mthong ro// khaM lar se ge'i khri nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po klu'i rgyan gyi pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mtho
70b5(1): ngo la par ni seng ges bri dang bu na pa ci byes na 'a ge bya ba'i ma skyeng po byis pa bshams pa mthong ro/  ni med de 'dzi rje bye ponas smra sna ba'i da mos ste sa byas pa brnams pa mayod do// 
70b6(1): kha lar ni ser ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po phyogs na me bar snang ba'i pad mosasnying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ro/ de la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'irgyal po dbang po'i rdo rje pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo // la sang/ 
70b7(1): ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba'i yid du 'ong ba'i pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo // rin po ni'i shing drung la lar ni seng ga'i khri rin po tshwa'i rgyal po mdog dkar po'i pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthon
70b8(1): ro// bza' shing gi ra ba de bzhi thas cad kyang / rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang zhing rgya mtsho chen po// ltar rin po che'i gling gis yongs su gang ba mthong ngo // bye ru mya sngon po pad mos smras te pa/ rin po thas cad kyis brgya nad pa'i sa phyogs
70b9(1): ka tsa yi 'da' ltar regra na bde'i zhing 'jam yang 'gom pa bor zhing bdeg pa'i tshe mthon mnan myed pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i mchog gi pad mo yid du 'ong bar zhi pa zhing reg na bde' ba'i si la ma kun tu bkram pa/ da rur dang / ma bya dang / khrung
70b10(1): khrung dang / kun d+ha la dang / ka ya byir ka dang / ko ki la dang / 'dri ba na 'dzi pa ka sma snyan cing yid du 'od pa'i ra ro 'byin pa mang pos gang ba/ sta rdzas kyi rin po che'i tsan dAn gi shing mang po'i nags tshal shin tu legs par
71a1(1): 'phrigs pas mdzes par brgyan pa/ rin pa che sa tshogs kyi pad mo'i ljin gyi nar dang / rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyi gad pa'i 'ang rgyun tu la pa kra 'dres pa gzhags cam las kyang kyan pa na/ 
71a2(1): pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang bu chegs rgyan rab tu bkod pa'i nang nas spos kyi rgyan pa'i bdug spos ring phrang myed pa hA/ tsa bus zhing zhes pa/ gA'i 'du sa chol pams po'i rgyan las mas margyan tra/ d+hangs pas/ 
71a3(1): kyang 'das pa'i rin po che'i dra ba sna tshogs kyis kun tu bres pa/ mu tig rin po che'i me tog gi phreng ba dang / snga ldi kun nas bres pas rab tu brgyan pa/ rin po che'i dril bu rna ba sna tshogs su rnam par bkye ba'i gser
71a4(1): gyi dra ba 'bar bas kun nas bkrigs pas/ rol mo'i shing dang rin po che ta la las dril bu'i dra ba rlung gis legs par bskyod pas yid du 'or reng pa'i sgra snyan pa'i dbyangs 'byung ba dang ldan pa/ dbang sgyur gi lha'i rgyal
71a5(1): po'i lha mo'i dpe' tshul shin tu 'azang ba rnaMs kyis glu snyan pa'i/ sgra rab tu yid du 'ong ba blang ba/ lha rdzas kyi yid bzhin gyi gos mdog sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pas rnaM bar mdzes pa/ 
71a6(1): rgya mtsho chen po snang 'dog dang / mdog snga tshogs su ldan pas kun gtad kyi bra ba/ khang pa tshigs pa rin po che'i rgyun dang na pa/ sku brgyas su kyi na'i bo brang stan stan pra/ rin po che ga tshogs
71a7(1): rnam par phye bas/ rna ba thas cad du rgyan pa'i gdugs shin tu legs par rnam par zhing bkram pas kun nas lha na mdzes pa dbang po chen po'i 'jig rten ltar shin tu mdzes pa'i de'u sna tshogs kyis rgyan pa/ yid du bong ba'i sna tshon
71a8(1): snang ba chen po rtag par 'byung ba/ tshangs pa chen po'i gzhal myed khang ltar nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba yid du 'ong ba'i 'od kyis 'bar pra ste/ bza' shing gi re ba chen po nyi ma'i mdog ces bya ba de dge slong ma ser
71a9(1): ge d+hi par snyings pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthul stobs dang / byin gyi rlabs che zhing bras kyis myi khyab las/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs myed pa'i gnas su gyur da pa'i nam mkha'i dbyengs ltar yangs shing tshad myed de rgya chen po dang ldan par
71a10(1): mthong ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis de ltar yon tan tshad myed pas kyis myi khyab pa tshogs pa'i bzla' shing ki ra ba'i brgyan byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi rnam par sbyin pas yongs su grub pa/ 'jig rten las
71b1(1): 'das pa'i dge ba'i sa brgya chen po las skyes pa sangs rgyas pa mngon patanam 'grod bya ba'i sku mthun pa/ zas kyis kyi khyib bcas 'byung ba 'jig rten gyi kham pa mams cad na yod pa'i dge ba'i mal pa thas sa ga
71b2(1): bachos kyi rang bzhin sgyu ma'i rna ba lta bus grub pa dge ba'i bsod nams dri ma myed pa/ rgyas chen pos sgrub cing 'byung ba dge slong ma seng ge rnam par sbyangs pa'i sngon gyi pyod pa bzang po legs par byas pa dang zlu mthun pa'i
71b3(1): stobs dang / shugs kyis 'byung ba/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad thun mong ma yin pa/ mu stegs can dang / phas kyis rgol ba thams cad kyis myi 'phrogs pa/ bdud kyi yongs su rgyu ba thas cad kyis ni
71b4(1): tshugs par byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis stang myed pa mthong ste/ shing sna tshogs de dag gi rlung gi seng ge'i khri chen po de dag la'ang dge slong ma seng ge rna par sgyings pa stun shin tu mdzes pa/ spyod lam zhi
71b5(1): ba/ dbang po zhi ba/ yid zhi ba dang/ shin tu dben pa/ dbang po thul dab/ glang po ltar shin tu dul ba/ mtshol ltar dang zhing gsal ba/ rnyog pa myed pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po yid bzhin
71b6(1): gi nor bu ltar 'dod pa zhes cad sgrub pa/ pad mo la chus myi cha gas pa ltar 'jig rten gyi chos kyis ma gos pa/ seng ge snyas 'jigs pa dang spyi yang ba myed pa myi 'jigs par rnam par dag pas
71b7(1): ri'i dbang po chen po ltar myi 'gul ba tshul khrims rnam par dag pas/ 'di du 'ong ba'i spos kyi rgyal po ltar 'gro ba'i seMs tshim par byed pa/ kha ba'i tsan dan ltar nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba zhi bar byed pa/ smon la/ 
71b8(1): gyi rgyal po lda na bzang ba ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug sngal rnam par zhi bar byed pa/ mu lnga'i zhags pa ltar lta na don yod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od ltar lus dang / sems kyi bag sangs pa de la skyed/ 
71b9(1): ba/ tshangs pa chen po ltar 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba'i rin po che'i rgyal po nor bu chub dang ltar nyon mongs pas rnyog pa can du gyur pa'i sems can gyi sems rab tu dang bar byed pa/ 
71b10(1): zhing gshin pa ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par phel bar byed/ pa 'dug pa mthong ngo // 'khor da kyi satan de dag la'ang 'khor sna tshogs 'khod par mthong ste/ 'khor gyi stan la ya la ni lha'i bu dbang po chen po la tshogs pa gtsang ma'i
72a1(1): gnas kyi ris su rtogs pa'i lha'i rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par spyings pas chos kyi sgo rnam par tha rad pa myi zad pa yang dag yang 'byed pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong / 
72a2(1): ro// 'khod kyi stan ga la la ni tshangs pa yid du 'ong ba las tshogs pa/ tshangs pa'i ris su rtogs pa'i lnga'i bu rnams 'khod cing dge slong ma seng ge rnam par sgyings pas dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rno bar dag pa gzhi kun nas byed
72a3(1): pab zhes bya ba yang dag par snyan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni lci rgyal po dbang sgyur ba las logs pa gzhan 'phrul dpeng byed kyi lha'i bu/ lha'i bu mo'i 'kho da dang bcas pa rnaMs 'khod cing / dge slong ma ser ge dzI par
72a4(1): springs pas chos kyi sgo byang chub sems dpa'i' bsaM pa rnam par dag pa 'i dbang gis rnam par rgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par snyan pa mthong ngo // 'khor da kyi stan la las ni lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrus dga'i lnga'i bu/ g+ha'i
72a5(1): bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge d+h+waM/ par sgyings pas chos kyi sgo chos thams cad dge bas rnam parabargyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par snyan pa ma thong ngo // 'khor kyi canra
72a6(1): la la pa ni rgyal po rab dga' ldan las tshogs pa dga' ldan gyi ris su sa rtogs pa'i lha'i bu/ sna'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par sgyings pas chos kyi sgo rang gi sras
72a7(1): kyi mdzod kyi glong zhes bya ba yang dag par snyan pa mthong ngo // 'khor kyi san sa la la ni lha'i rgyas po rab tshem la/ sogs pa lnga'i bu/ lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rno bar sgyings pas chos
72a8(1): kyai sgo rgyad 'tha' yas pa zhes bya ba yang dag par snyan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la wa ni gA'i rgyal po rgya byin la btogs pa suM btsun su byi ris su rtogs pa'i wa'i bu/ lnga'i bu mo'i 'khong dang bcas pa rnaMs 'khod cing dani
72a9(1): slong ma seng ge rnaM bar sgyings pas chos kyi sgo skyod pa'i sgo zhes bya ba yang dag par snyan pa mthong ngo // 'khor kyi stan la ga sa ni klu'i rgyal po gar chen mtshol la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po 'od brgya pa dang / dga' bo dang / snyen dga' bo/ 
72a10(1): dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / shugs ldan dang / ma dros pa la sogs pa'i klu'i bu mo la 'khor dang bcas pa/ klu'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnaM ba 'khod cing / dge slong pa seng ge naM par sgyings pas chos kyi sgo sangs rgya
72a11(1): kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / yul gyi 'od kyi rgyan ces bya ba yang dag par stan pa mthong ngo // 'khor kyi stan ya sa la ni rgyal po chen po ral bso bo la sosogs pa gnod sbyin gyi dbang po gnod sbyin gyi bu mo dang / 
72b1(1): gnod sbyin gyi byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong sa ser ge rnam par sgyings pas chos kyi sgo 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i mdzod ces bya ba yang dag padastan pa mthong ngo // 'khod kyi stan la
72b2(1): ka la ni dri za'i rgyal po gnas srung po la sogs pa/ dri za'i dbang po bu mo dang / dri za'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rna bar sbyangs pas chos kyi sgo dga' ba myi zad pa'i char rab tu 'am/ 
72b3(1): ba zhes bya ba yang dag par snyan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan la sotogs pa lha ma yin rjes/ lha ma yin gyi bu mo dang / lA ma yin gyi byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnas
72b4(1): 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par sbyis pas chos kyi sgo chos kyi dbyings shes pa'i tshul gyi shugs kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par snyan pa mthong ngo // 'khod kyi stan la la la ni nam mkha' lding gi dbang po shog
72b5(1): 'dzin chen po la tshogs pa/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po nam mkha' lding gri bu mo nang / nam mkhar snying gi byis pa'i 'khor da gnas pa rnamalakhrod cing/ dge slong sa seng ge rnam yang sgyings pa sa chos kyi rdo sri pom
72b6(1): rgya bapo rigs pa dra zhes bya ba yang dge ba sma pa mthong / 'khod kyi spyad pa gas ni rgya 'byo rgyal bsdod pa sa sogs pargya zhidabang do// bye 'gro mo dang / byi gro'i 'a'od dang bcas pa rnas
72b7(1): 'khod cing / dge slong ma ser ge rnam par sgyings pas chos kyi sgo/ sangasargyas kyi pyod pa snang ba zhes bya ba yang dag par snyan pa mthong ngo // 'khor kyi tand la la sa ni lto phye chen po'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa
72b8(1): rnams 'khod cir / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par spyings pas chos kyi sgo sangs rgyasu la dka' ba skyed pa zhes bya ba yang dag par snyan pa mthong ngo // 'khod kyi stan sa la la ni skyes pa dang bud myed dang / khye'u dang bu mo brgya stong mang po 'od
72b9(1): cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnaM par springs pas chos kyi sgo khyad par du 'gro ba zhes bya ba yang dag par snyan pa mthong ngo // khod kyi stan las swa ni srin po'i dbang po rtag tu mdangs 'phrog sngon po'i rgyal po la sogs pa/ srin b+h+rUM
72b10(1): dbang po'i/ srin po'i bu mo dang / srin po'i byis pa 'khor dang bcas pa nas 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rno par sbyangs pas chos kyi sgo snying rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba yang dag paru sman pa mthong ngo // 'khod kyi rnyan la
73a1(1): ga padi sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa gsos pa nas 'khod ci dge slong ming ge na par springs pa dang gyis kyi sgo 'i shes khyad par du sngags pa'i mthu zhes bya ba yang dag par nyan pa mthong / 'khod kyi stan las na
73a2(1): sems can dang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa sa mos pa rnaMs 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnaM par sbyangs pas chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi sngon tan rgya mtsho chen po'i 'od ces bya ba yang dag par snyan pa mthong ngo // gakhor kyi tan la pa la ni semasas
73a3(1): na len pa chen po mos parnams pa 'od ci dge zongam be shi na par skyes pas/ ci de dzin gyi zhes gasnang ba'i sgogan tu bya ba yang dag par ma nya pa mang / latshad kyi nyan pa las byang chub thams ma tsha ma sems skye
73a4(1): dge slongs me gen pang tshu las/  de 'an kyi nas rnas papas kyin me byab nag pa nga /  rang sa kyi 'ad nga na bye nu las das gnyi la gan
73a5(1): pa nas khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge na par sgyings pas ting nge 'dzin gyi rdo d+ha/ sa dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yang dag par san pa mtho/ latshad kyi snyan pa las ni byang chub sebs dpanas bzhi pa ras gnas
73a6(1): rnam 'od cing / dge slongs med shen par rnyings papa nyid yin nad byen pa na mya 'byung ba zhes bya ba sa dag na pas dzod 'o kyi nyid da ni byang chub sems pa' mar
73a7(1): pa nanas rnaMs 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rde bab sgyings pas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sems kyi rgyud me tog gi snying po zhes bya ba yang dag par snyan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi nyan la sa ni byang chub sems dpa'as drug pa la gnas pa ni/ 
73a8(1): 'tshad cing dge slong ma seng ge rnaM par sgyings pas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnam par sdang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yang dag par snyan pa mthong ngo // 'khod gyi stan le la sa ni byang chub sems dpa' sa bdun pa sa gnas pa rnaMs pa 'od cing/ sing ge rnam par
73a9(1): sgyings pas ting nge 'dzind kyi sgos kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par snyan pa mthong ngo // 'khor kyi stan las la ni byang chub sems dpalas brgyad pa la gnas pa rnaMs 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnaM bar sgyings pas ting nge 'dzin
73a10(1): kyi sgo chos kyi dbyings su lus shin tu na par phye ba'i yul zhes bya ba yang dag par snyan pa mthong ngo // 'khor kyi stan ya sA la ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgung pas gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong snying ge na par sbyangs pas
73b1(1): chos kyi sgo myi dmyigs pa'i stobs kyis gnas kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par snyan pa thod ngo // 'khor kyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa brgyal gnas pa rnaMs khrod cing / se dge slong ma seng ge rnaM bar sgyings pas/ 
73b2(1): ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo sgrib pa myed pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yang dag par snyan pa mthong ngo // 'khor kyi snyan pa la ya la ni laka na rdo rje'i 'khod kyi dkyil 'khor 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi rna ye shes rdo rje mdun
73b3(1): byu da pa ci snyed cig bza' shing gi ra ba der 'ongs shing 'khor gyi stan la so sor 'khod pa/ bas pa pa dad pa/ mos bgyi rmugs pa masam pa shin tu rgos yang gyur da pa dad pa'i ro rnams chen mo dang ldan pa rnams sa/ dge slong ma seng de
73b4(1): na ba skyengs pa pa ci nas kyang thams cad bran myed pa yang dag par rdzogs bu'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung ba// de lta de ltar rjem ston pa mngon dang / dkyi kyi zhen de ni dge slong sa sed ge rnam par skyes pa des canaH/ 
73b5(1): lta ba'i btang snyoms dang ldan pa la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi/ chos thos cad shin tu snyan pa la sogs pa dang / chos kyi dbyings rgya gzhi' tha dad pa sa thogs pa dang / sgrib pa'i dkyis 'khor thams cad rnam/ 
73b6(1): bar thong ba la sogs pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i sems ya dag par 'gyur ba la sogs pa dang / khyad par yod pa'i rgyun la bsogs pa dang / chags pa skyen pa'i tshul gyi snying po yang sogs pa dang / cho spu dbyings kyi
73b7(1): dkyil 'khor las bsogs pa dang / sems kyi mngon sa sog pa dang / kun tu mos pa'i mngon par bsgrub pa'i snying po 'chog pa shes dang kyis ro la tu byend pa'i no brgya stong blangs byed pa'i phyir te/ gza zhing gi pa nyi ma ze mdog des/ 
73b8(1): byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ sems can gzhan ji snyed cig dge slong ma seng ge rnam par skyengs pa la lta ba dang / chos nyan pa'i phyir 'ong ba de dag thams cad kyang / sngon dge slong ma seng ge na bar skyings pas /  dge ba'i chos ya
73b9(1): ngan par spang ba la shin tu bkod pa nas/ bra na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog pa'i bar du byas pa sha stag go// / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis dge slong ma ser ge rno bar sgyings pa'i brtse
74a1(1): zhi sa su da/ [] gas / nas ga[]/ pa nga/ sa spyod ba chogs pa sa ra na / 
74a2(1): sa dang / 'khor gyi kyis 'od kun gsum tshogs pa dang / dbang chen po phun gsu tshogs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang rnaMpa 'phrul la phun gsu tshogs pa dang / dbyangs kyi rgyan kun sum tshogs pa na pa de lta bu'i mtho ste/ chos kyi tshul
74a3(1): gyi khyab pa'ang thos nas/ chos gyi smin gi na chen pos sems mngon par dran pa de'i yid la/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par sgyings pas/ bsam parna bar dag pas phun gsu tshogs par byas kyis de ni g.yas phyogs su sbyor ba lan brgya stong
74a4(1): du ma zhig bya'o snyam pa dang / de'i mod la dge slong ma seng ge rnam par sgyings pus/ bza' shing ra ba dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du bcas pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// de ltar phyogasas su
74a5(1): skor ba bya'o ste du bsams nas bskor ba byed pa'i tshe 'khor thams cad na/ 'ang / dge slong ma seng ge rnaM par sgyings pa 'dug pa mthong nas / mdun tu 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags
74a6(1): pa bdag gis blang myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed de ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sa sgri bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba sa nus te/ 'phags sa kyang drun/ 66
74a7(1): ses dpa' rnams kyi spyan dmas ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags ma ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'as byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bas phra bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi bdag la bgang du
74a8(1): gsol// des smras pa// rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par tha rad pa rlom sems thams cad yongs su bcom pa zhes bya ba thob pa'o// smras pa 'phags ma/ byang chub sems dpa'i rna bar tha rad pa rlom sems thams cad yongs su bcom pa/ 
74a9(1): de'i yul ci b+ha bu zhig mchis/  smras pa rigs kyi bu de ni le shes snang ba ste/ rgyas gsu tu 'byung ba'i brgyan sems gad gcig gi chags la nas par dmyigs pa'i rang bzhen no// smras pa 'bags pa le shes spang ba de'i brag pa nga rta bu zhig pacis
74a10(1): sprus pa rigs kyi bu kho mo e shes snang ba 'di la sgrub pa dang / yongs su sgrub pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad rab tu 'thad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin skyes te/ de ting nge 'dzin de thos ma lag tu yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus kyis phyog su thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi
74b1(1): khams thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i sku gcig gis thogs pa/ dga' ldan gyi pho brang na bzhugs pa/ thams cad re re la yang lus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i rdub shin tu phra ba bsnyed kyis mchod pa/ rnam pa tha dad pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod
74b2(1): du byed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mchod pa sbyang ba'i phyir 'gro ste/ 'di ltar sna'i lus dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lA ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang /  lho bye chen po dang / myi dang / myi dang ma yin pa'i dab po'i lus
74b3(1): me tog gi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / spos kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / bdug sos kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / 'breng ba'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / byug pa'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / bye ma'i sprin yongs su 'dzind pa dang / 
74b4(1): na bza'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / gdugs kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rgyas mtshan gyi srin long su 'dzin pa dang / ba dan gyi sbyin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i ldab sgrub kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i dra ba'i brgyan gyi/ 
74b5(1): srin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i gnas yol gyi rgyan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i brgyan rnam par phye ba'i sprin yongs su 'dzid pa dang / rin po che'i sgron ma'i rgyan kyi srin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i gdon gyi/ 6
74b6(1): brgyad gyi bsrin yongs su 'dzin pa mang pos mchod pa spyang pa'i phyir 'gro'o// dag san gyi gnas na bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub seMm 'ad ba' su cig gis thogs pa rjes la mchod 'du bya ba'i byed ji ltar po de bzhin du/ 
74b7(1): srab kyi skur gshegs pa dang / lham pa dang / btsun mo'i 'khor kyi nang na bzhug ba dang ni / mngon par 'byung ba dang / snying po byang chub tu gshegs par dang / bla ni myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas kyi
74b8(1): shing snying po byang chub la zhugs pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo spor ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / de bzhin du lha'i gnas na bzhugs pa dang / gru dang gnod sbyin dang / 'dri ma dang / sna ma 'ad dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'ab ci dang / Do byi red/ 
74b9(1): po dang / myi dang gyi ma yin pa'i gnas na bzhugs pa nas/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang bsam pa yongs su tshim par mdzad nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba zhi pa de dag thams cad la'ang yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus rnam pa de lta bu bdag gis
74b10(1): nab pa de lta bu'i mchod pa byed cing / de bzhin gshegs bu thams cad kyi drung du 'gro'o//  sems can gang gis kho mo sangs rgyas mchod pa dang / rim 'gro byed pa'i lus 'di shes par gyuran pa de dag thams cad kyang bla myed pa dbang dag par
75a1(1): rdzogs pa'i byang chub nges par 'gyur ro// sems can gang kho ma'i drung du 'ong ba de dag thams cad la'ang kho mo ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa 'di nyid ston to// rigs kyi bu lo mo ye zhes
75a2(1): kyi dbyig gis sems can thams cad la lha yang sems can gyi 'du shes kyang myi skyed la/ rlom sems kyang myi byed do// 'gro ba thams cad kyi skang rgya mtsho yang nyan te/ tshig gi lam thams cad la mngon par zhen par myed pas rlob sems su byed
75a3(1): ba myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mthong ste/ chos kyi lus du yongs su shes pas rlom sems su byed pa'ang byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su 'dzin kyang chos kyi rang bzhin khong du chud pas
75a4(1): rlom sems su bye ba myed do// sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings thams cud rgyas par 'gebs kyang chos nyid sgyu ma'i rang bzhin khong du chud pas rlom sems su byed pa myed do// rigs kyi kho mos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rna bar
75a5(1): ba dad pa rlom sems thams cad yongs su bcom pa 'di shes par 'ad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dpur myed/ pa la zhugs pa/ chos thams cad la rlom sems myong por gnas kyang
75a6(1): rdzu 'phrul thams cad 'byung zhing rtsub pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du byed pa'i yang brjod du myed pa ba spu'i nyag ma cig gis skams shing mngon par 'phen pa/ rang gi ba spu'i bu gar 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du byed pa'i du
75a7(1): ba dang / 'jig pa'i skal pa yongs su stond pa/ skad cig cig la skal pa brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed par gnas pa/ ma nye ba nyid kyis yang dag par 'dzud pa/ skad cig cig gis brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du byed pa'i bskalang bar 'a'or
75a8(1): ba de dag gi 'byod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re rkan/ sod rigs kyi bu sgo phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi u ga 'grod dka' ba na/ grong khyer rin po che'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen zhes bya ba 'dug
75a9(1): gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltang byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltad nan tad du bya ba dris shig// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor ba 'das kyis/ dge slong ma seng ge rna bar sgyings pa'i na/ 
75b1(1): sa / dge slong ma me gen pa par skyes pa chog 'grod byams dan thong ba 'a she pa pa snyam 'durnam pa'o// ngas na na na
75b2(1): shes rab kyi sdang ba chen pos des sems snang bar gyud pa de thams cad ma byed pa'i me zhes snang ba de la ni sems/ chos nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi goms snang ba de la ni sang dag par rjes su lta/ sems pan thams cad kyi ga rnam rtsigs pa'i
75b3(1): mdzod kyi gzungs kyi tshub de ni brtan par byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khol lo yang dag par 'dzind pa'i gzungs kyi tshul de ni shin tu rgya che bar byed/ snying rje chen po 'gro ba thams cad kyi skyabs su 'gyur ba'i stobs de ni nye rton/ 
75b4(1): chos thams cad kyi tshul sdang ba'i go nas yang dag par 'byung ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs de la ni rab tu rtog/ chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor rgyas par 'gengs pa'i smon lam yongs su dag pa de'i rjes su ni 'brang / chos thams cad
75b5(1): kyi phyogs snang bar byed pa'i ye shes kyi 'od de ni shin tu gsal par byed/ chos thams cad kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye bas rgyas par 'gengs pa'i mngon par shes pa'i stobs de ni mngon par sgrub/ byang chub sems dpa'
75b6(1): bas dang dra pa tham sa nye bar blangs pas/ brtsams pas par na byung ba'i smon lam de ni yongs su rdzogs par byed cing / mthang kyi/ gdu 'gro bka' ba'i grong khyer dad po che'i rkyen gang na yar de byin te/ brjog/ cwa
75b7(1): ba ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma yongs su chol chos pa// de la bcom pa ma kwa'i bshes gnyen gi yon tan mngon par myi shes la/ ye shes kyi su da yul gyi tshul la myi mkhas pa'i phyi ji snyed pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ 
75b8(1): mye 'di de lta bzhi zhing dul ba'i dbang po dang ldan ya/ de ltar shes bzhin dang ldan te/ de ltar khrul pa myed cing / de ltar yid bzhin 'khrul ba myed la de ltar gnya' shing tsam du lnga ste/ de ltar smos myi tshugs shing de ltar mtshan
75b9(1): mang myi 'dzin la/ gzugs kyi rnaM ma thes cad la g.ye ba skyed pa'i dbyig dang ldan ste/ yid la 'brel ba myed cing bsam pa zab la/ mngon par mdzes te/ rgya mtshor ltar 'dug cing sems myi tam/ byi khrug pa de la/ bcom pa
75b10(1): ma lha'i bshes gnyen mos ko rje zhig bya/ 'di lta bu dag ni 'dod chags pa dga' ba myed la/ sems phyi ci log dang ldan yang myi srid do// 'di lta bu dag la ni sdig cing bcad pa'i 'du shes yongs su rgyu ba myed de
76a1(1): 'di ga bu dag ni 'dod pas ga'os kyang kyi brid do/ 'di lta bu dag ni bud byed kyi dbar tu gyur da pa byed de/ 'di rAg ni bdud kyi khyod yul la khyod kyang gyi srid do// 'di lta bu 'di dag ni btad kyi yul la chags pa myed de/ 
76a2(1): ka 8/ 'di lta bu dag ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du 'bying phyi srid do// 'di lta bu dag ni bdud kyi zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ba myed de/ myi gos pa byed kyang kyi srid do snyam mo// rdzaka gar yang bcom pa ma khwa'i bzhes gnyen ma'i son tan gyi khyad par mngon
76a3(1): par shes shing ye shes kyi khyod yul mngon du gyur pa de dag de 'di skad ces zer te/ rigs kyi bu khyod de ltar bcom pa sa lha'i bshes gnyen ma sa yongs su na pang dri bar sems dpa' ni/ khyod kyang thob par bya phra/ legs par thob pa ste/

76a7(1): der byin nas de'i khyim che zhing yangs sa rin po che'i ra ba rim pa bcus sor bA/ rin po che ta la'i 'phreng ba brgyas bkun nas bskor ba/ 'obs spos rgyas gang ba/ sna rdzas kyi rin po che'i pad mo dang / ud pa ba dang / ku mu ta dang
76a8(1): brun tA rigs chus yongs su khyebs pa yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang ba/ reg zhi gsed kyi phye ma bdal ba/ blos yid du stong pa ding 'dres pa'i chu dri zhim glang ba/ rin po che'i gsas pa mar pos shin tu brgyan pa/ 
76a9(1): rim pa bcus kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che thams cad las byas bI khang pa dang / gzha' myed khang dang / khang pa legs pas rnam par dkrigs bshing ba gam dang / rta babs dang / skad krung gi shar bu dang zla gam se ge'i shing / 
76a10(1): rta dang / bsnang ba'i rgyag mtshan las tshogs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od kyis 'brang ba du ba rin po rje sna tshogs grangs myed pa'i 'byung gnas kyis rgyan pa// rin po che'i dag bye ru tas sbas pa'i gzhi dang ldan pa/ sA rdza kyi
76b1(1): nasanas bsas byas 'dod dmas na sa gdug pa shi ga sa pa ma gcanas pa mtshan kyi gcas sa kyis drizhes par 'dugs pa/ chos kyi byas smras spya tu byug pa/ nab cin nogs kyi na hU~Ms sa / 
76b2(1): tog gi spri mi'ams kun tugs pas/ rin po che'i me tog brgyan dang ldan pa/ rin po nis tshogs thams cad kyi rgyas mtshan sbed pas/ stogan tu rgyan pa dang bu rin po che sna tshogs cig kyi dre bsnang ga/ su myed pa rjo sa/ 
76b3(1): dadzan po che bye ru'i sdong po dang / rdo rje dang / man shes la sogs pa'i gter brgya stong kun gyis shes pa/ phun gsu tshogs pas mdzod byi zad pa dang ldan pa bza' shing gi ra ba chen po bcus brgyan pa mthong ste/ den brtse zi' dum
