76b7(1): rin po 'i bye du rgya'i phred pa la do gzungs derje rin po che sna tshogs dang / no bu rid pa che seng ge mdzes pa sa tshogs bkye ba/ 'gul na thogs pa/ dge ba'i sa pa byad pa la rnam pa yun pa dang / ljong cig cin pa'i 'ams sa
77a1(1): oM mang po gzhan gyis myi byed cing yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po'i gter gyi zad pa'i mdzod dang ldan pa cug pa mthong ste/ des khyim de dag pas cad dang / rin po re'i gnapa dang / 
77a2(1): gzhal myed khang gi brgyan de de dag thams cad kyang rang gi lus 'byung ba'i 'od dga' bar byed pa/ lus dang bde' ba dang tshim pa skyed pa/ sems khong nas dga' bar byed pas gsal zhing snang bar byas pa mthong ngo // de dag chod
77a3(1): dpon gyi bu bla zangs kyis/ bcom pa ma lnga'i bshes gnyen ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mdun tu 'dugs nas thas mo sbyar te/ 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags su bdag gis bla na myed pa yang dag par
77a4(1): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i myong ba la slab par bgyi pa dang // ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma tshal te/ 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
77a5(1): ba gdams ngag dang / rjes su tan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i dpyod pa la/ bslab par bgyi pa dang / ji lta nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags mas bdug
77a6(1): can drugs/ des la/ sa kyi pas byad sems pa'i rnam pa pa 'ad lags myal pa'i lang gyi zhes byab rol te/ rigs kyi dasas ma rnarnams ma
77a7(1): gzugs dang / kha dog dang dbyibs dang / chu zheng las kyang lhag par kha dog gsal ba dang / rnam par dag pas cig yos pa bzhin du snang bar byed do// de bzhin du klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkhan
77a8(1): lding dang / byi 'ab ci dang / so phye chen po dang / myi dang / phyi ma yin pa rnams la yang bud myed kyi gzugs dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / chu zheng lhag par 'od gsal zhing rnaM par dag pas mi sol pa bzhin du snang bar byed do// 
77a9(1): sems can gang 'dod chags kyis kun nas 'khor pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag kho mo'i drang du 'ongs na yang de dag thams cad la kho mo ni 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i phyir chos ston te/ de dag gis chos de thos nas kyang 'dod chags dang brel ba thob par 'gyur
77a10(1): ro// byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chags pa myed pa zhes bya ba yang rab tu thob bo// la la ni kho mo mthong ma thag tu 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dga' ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yang rab tu thob bo// 
77b1(1): bya ni gtam byas pa mam kyis 'dod chags dang bral pa thob par gyur te/ byang nab sems dpa'i 'i de 'dzin nagapa sa byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' skyed pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba yang rab tu thob bo// las ni laganas bzang beces byis 'do ga rdzags dang brab pa/ 
77b2(1): rdob par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rjes su 'gro zhing gnas pa zhes bya ba yang rab tu thob bo/ la la ni gcig tu 'grogs pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral bar thob par gyur da te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting / 
77b3(1): nge 'dzin bral bas snang ba zhes bya ba yang rab tu thob bo//  la ni ltas pa btsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba log par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu zhi ba'i rnam pa'i rgyad ces bya ba yang rab tu thob bo// lA la ni bral btsam gyi/ 
77b4(1): 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin kyi rgol ba rnam par thor ba zhes bya ba yang rab tu thob bo// li la ni dmyig btsums pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i
77b5(1): ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi yul snang ba zhes bya ba 'ang rab tu thob bo// dz+wal la ni khang du khyud pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad yongs su sdud cing mye rtong ni/ 
77b6(1): snying po zhes bya ba rab tu thob bo// la 'di'o byas pabs gyis 'do / chags dang bras pa thob par byur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge// 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad bsod rnams kyi mngod pa reg par byed pa zhes bya ba ma
77b7(1): rab tu thob bo// de ltar kho mo ni sems can gang ci snyed cig kho mo'i drung du 'ongab de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam yang tha rad pa 'dod chas dang bras ba'i mthar phyin pa mas cad mkhyen ta'i chags pa myed pa la mngon tu
77b8(1): gyuran pa 'di nyid la rab tu 'god do// smras pa 'phags ma khyod de lta bu'i phun su tshogs pa dang ldan pa khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba ni gang tu skyed/ phrin las ni ji lta bu zhig brtsegs/ smras pa rigs kyi bu kho mos dran na 'das pa'i dus shig na de bzhin
77b9(1): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa bla na myed par skyes bu 'dul bu kha lo sgyur ba lha dang myi'i ston pa sangs rgyas bcom sngon 'das shin tu mtho' bar
77b10(1): gshegs pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ste// de bzhin gshegs bzhin tu mtho'i 'ang gshegs pa de sems can rnams la thugs rtse ba'i sku don tu rgyal po'i gnas sgo bzang po zhes bya bar gshegs nas/ sgo'i bem pa la zhabs kyis non pa'i rtse/ 
78a1(1): grong khyer de thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos nas yangs shing rgya chel rin po che du ma lus byas par yongs su grub par 'gyur te/ steng gi bar snang la yang rin po che mang po'i 'od kyis rnam par brgyad pa dang / rin po che'i me tog sna rodas
78a2(1): kyis yongs su gang ba dang / rdzas kyi rol lo snga rogs kyi snga rab tu 'byung ba dang / lha'i lus kyi sprin tsha byed par rgyas pas khebs par gyur te/ rigs kyi bu lo mo yang de'i tshe / tshong dpon gyi chung ma zhig tu zhab gyur te/ grogs
78a3(1): zhes bya'o// de nas kho mo cho 'phrul gyis yang dag par skul nas khyim thab dang lhan cig dong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa grong par gyi srang du gshegs pa la dad pa chen po skyes te/ kho mos rin po che'i dril bu cig cig phul lo// de'i tshe 'jam dpa' gzhon nung
78a4(1): gyur pa yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mtho bang gshegs yang bu'i zham 'bring na 'dug ste/ des kho mo bla na myed pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i
78a5(1): ba dras pa shigs dang thas pa'i sa ba bzhi pa gas/ chos kyang chus 'ams sa 'byas dang 'ishes sam ya mas pa sod sa bya dang las pa mdo na pa
78a6(1): leshes kyi yul la drag pa byed pa de dag gi khyod bshes pa 'bar yon tam brjod par nus ren / song rigs kyi bu phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid grong khyer dgel ba'i tshul rog tu byed pa zhes bya ba yod de/ der khyim bdan
78a7(1): don lugs shezhes bye ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten can dan gyi khri pang can la mchod pa byed pa zhig 'dug gis de'i gang du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan na bya ba rjes
78a8(1): shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis bcom pa ma khA'i bshes gnyen ma'i rkang pa gnyis la grI bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma la lan brgya stong yum g.yas phyogs su spong ba byas nas gang de 'ang
78a9(1): ltas te// bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis grong khyer dge' ba'i pha rol tu phyind par khyim bdag nan lugs kyi phyim ga na be der phyi nad nas/ khyim bdag nan zhugs
78a10(1): kyi rkang pa gnyis spyi bos phyag chal te/ bdun tu 'dugs nas thal mo spyang te/ 'di skad ces smras so// 9/ 'phags pa de dag gis bla ni myed pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed du// ji ltar byang chub sems rabs byang chub sem
78b1(1): dpa'i dpyod pa la srab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gnams ngag dang rjes su snyan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems
78b2(1): dpa'i pyod pa la slab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol/ des smras pa rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnaM par tha dad pa yong su myi zad pa thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu kho ca na
78b3(1): sems kyi rgyud las ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas kyang sems can 'dul ba'i dbang du mdzad pa de ma rtogs par 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas kyang shin tu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su bya
78b4(1): ngan las 'das pa myed do// yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba myed do// yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba myed do// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod brten btsan dan gyi khri phang gi sgo 'byed pa te/ 
78b5(1): sa na gyi tho bye byed pas byang chub sems sa 'byi byas rgyas kyi gas bya 'a pa'i rgyu #sa 9 kA she nyas pa sa / 
78b6(1): sems kyi sas bas da sags kyang ba byin pa du sa rab tu san/  te// blas pa dgas pa kyid nge 'dzin de'i shAng de / mu zhig dis rnam pa rigs kyi bumapa nyid 'dzin de la ston yang bzun pa / 
78b7(1): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi drud dang / sangs rgyas gcig nas cig tu byung ba bsod sbubs la gtogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa bams dang dang / gser chub dang /  ga par dang sel dang / bas par mnga' pa dang / 
78b8(1): gtsug tor dang / rnam par gzigs dang / rgyal dang / rdzogs mdzad dang / grang mchog dang / thad mo'i bla la gartogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa mas cad kyang sangs rgyas 'thong ba'i mtshams 'brel pas sangs rgyas gcig nas cig tu
78b9(1): rgyud pa/ rgyun gyi chad pa'i tshul kyis mngon gsuM du mthong ste/ sems kyi skad cig cig la sangs rgyas rgya'ang mthong ngo // de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas sor yang mthong ngo // de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas brgya phrag yong
78b10(1): yang mthong ngo // de bzhin du sangs rgyas bye ba dang / ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag rgya dang / sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong dang chu sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dang / sangs rgyas bye ba dung phyur dang / sangs rgyas bye ba thams khams dang / 
79a1(1): ga/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrigs khrig pa dang / de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas 'byud gcig rlig tu brgyad pa brjod du byed pa'i yang brjod du byed pa dag kyang mthong ngo // de'i ldog pa'i sems kyis na bzhin shin nas
79a2(1): ba 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdus shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ngo // de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i brjod du byed pa'i bar gyi rdul shin tu phra ga nyid kyang mthong ster de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis
79a3(1): thugs dang po bskyed pa'i tshogs cig nas cig tu brgyud pa la 'jug go// lugs dang po bskyed pas thob pa'i rnaM par 'phrul pa la'ang 'jug go// smon lam rnaM pa pa dad pa'i mngon par sgrub pa rnam yar dag pa la'ang 'jug go// khyod pa nas
79a4(1): bang dag pala'ang 'dun go// maro tu byed panas par rdzogs par ma na pa sa pa 'jug go// byang chub sem pa'i sebams pa da las su sbyab drasa'ang 'dug ko/ da pa paskyes pa rnams dan papa 'ang 'an na/ 
79a5(1): bad kyi skyugs par mthang ba'i numachog gis bu byung ba la'ang lun pa te to/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyal ba'i rnam par 'gyu ro/ brgyan pa'ang 'drig po// sa rgyab tu ni ma ngas par pan
79a6(1): brnaM ba 'a pa 'jug / sem can pa su sbyin na badzinapa pa pa dang da pa'ang 'dug pa/ 'khor dang nga ldananas
79a7(1): 'ang 'jug go/ chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu'i 'byung ba la 'as 'jug go// sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / rno bar 'phrul ba dang / cho 'phrul la par 'jug go/ de bzhin bshegs pa de dag gis chos pastan pa yang
79a8(1): shin tu rnam par gapas pa dang / ma 'dres par drang ste/ yang dag par 'dzin to// drad pas yongs su bcangs so// rigs pa me ba shes par byed do// tho gros kyis shin turna par 'byed do// zlas rtogs par byed do// 
79a9(1): shes rab kyis bsnang bar byed do// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas cig tu rgyud pa byams pa la sosogs pa dag kyang mthong zhing shes te/ sems kyi skad cig cig gis sangs rgyas rgya yang mthong ngo // de'i 'og ma'i sos
79a10(1): kyis sangs rgyas stong sang mthong nas/ de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du byed pa/ yang brjod du myed pa'i rdul zhinang tu phra ba snyed dag kyang mthod te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gisazhugs
79b1(1): dang po skyed pa'i tshogs cig nas cig tu brgyud pa la'ang 'jug go// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis chos bstan pa yang shin tu bsal ba dang ma 'dres par rjes su dran te/ yang dag par 'dzin te/ dran pas yongs su bcangs so// 
79b2(1): rigs pas shin tu shes par byed do// blo gros kyis rnam par 'byed do// blos rtogs par byed do// shes rab kyis snang bar byed do// ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'di sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i babang rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas gcin
79b3(1): nas cig tu chud pa mthong zhing zhes pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'das pa dang / sa 'ongs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du byed pa snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa cig nas cig tu brgyad
79b4(1): ba thams can kyang shes ning mdzang/ de bzhi gshe'al ba de dag ni thugs dang bskyed pa'i tshogs gcig nas gcig tu brgyad pa yang 'dun no// sang sargyas cig nas cig ba rgyud pa de lang / rgyan gyi na pa dang / bye gad pa dang / 
79b5(1): dang bas zhes par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i brtson thub dang / da zhe nan pas khor du drud par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bag bdu rgyas kyi zhugs na pa 'phel bar byed pa dang / 'jig rted pams pa dang / 
79b6(1): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams pa dang / de'i sralasas sus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams ca kyis bye 'a thogs pa zhesashing khong du dud par byed do// nab par snang bdud rdzogs su gyur
79b7(1): byu ma 'ang bzhin gshenas pa byogs bcu'i 'jig rnyed kyilams ni btsun bgan sa cig rgyang pa lams da kyang yang gang nes te/ sem med kyi ga pheg pa yang rgyas rgya'ang mdzang ni shes so/ 'a'asod
79b8(1): rabs kyis sangs rgyas song yang mthong ba das de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis de bzhi gshegs pas sangs rgya kyi nang bad du byed pa'i sang brjod du med pa'i mya ba zhin tum pasnyed kyi bar du ba mthod to/ nas da de bden bshe
79b9(1): gang gi nas su bar dga' ba de'i tshe yang de bzhin du mthong te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi phan pa dang / mun pa mdzad pa dang / bsten par 'gyur ba de dag pas cad kyang zam mo/ mthos nas kyang 'dzin to// dran pas yos
79b10(1): sa bcangs so// rigs pas shing tu zhes par byed do// gro rnaMs kyis rna par 'byed do// zlas rtongs par byed do// shes rab kyi sa spang par byed do/ rigs kyi bu kho gas ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'dad pa 'arjes su thu dang
80a1(1): kyi'ang yang bye pagags da nga/ mas byang chub semapa 'dus sum pada~M /  nan pa
80a2(1): pa'i nyi ma a 'byung ba/ rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin rjes su rtogs pa bdag dang sems can dang / sangs rgyas myi gnyis par dpyod pa/ 
80a3(1): rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal pa'i chos kyi brgyan gyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi 'khrul 'khod kyis 'jig rten gyi dra ba 'grengs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa brgya mtsho' thams cad dang / myi 'gal par rnam par spyod pa
80a4(1): chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rnam par rtogs par byed pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos nyan pa rnam bur rig par byed pa'i ye shes kyi lus can de dag gi dpyod pa shes pa
80a5(1): ya yang dang badrad 'ang du da/ 'a des kyi /  kyi rgyang 'a nyid da bla 'dzi byab ya dang / reng sa cus bas kyad dam gshegs kyin pang bzhes bya brgyad ni ni
80a6(1): gan du song nya ji ltar byang chub sems dpal byang chub sems dang rje pyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji lta ba dang tam du bya ba dris zhin ces nas/ de'i tsherims su bcang pa 'di nyid gas so// song zhig
80a7(1): nor bzangs rabs kyi mu rgyal dpung zhig na// mkhas pa rnams kyi mi rgyal gru marjid mdzes pa yod/ rin chen rgyas byas shing dang nagasu tshal me tog mang / bza' shing ra ba rdzi dang chu 'phrin 'brab pa ldan/ 
80a8(1): ri mchog de la brtan pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang / 'gro ba rnams phan pa'i don tu rnam par pyod pa/ de gan song dang nor bzangs khyod la mgon po'i yon tan dang // rgya chen tshul la 'jug pa ton par byed// de nas cho
80a9(1): dpon gyi bu nor bzas kyis/ khyim bdag nas khugs kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag tshal nas/ khyim bdag nan khugs la/ lan brgya stong bya mar g.yas phyogs su skor ba byas nas yang dang yang ltas nas khyim
80a10(1): bdag nan khugs kyi drung nas song ngo // / 'phags pa sangs rgyas phal po zhes bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo'// dum bu bzhi pa bam po bdun pa'o// / de nas tshob dpon gyis
80b1(1): nisapas/ khyim bdag zhugs kyi ma pas pa des su sem nod/ byang chub sem sa dpa mas pa'i mno mams par byed/ byang chub sems rapa rje lanan pa btsung pa rjes canan pa tsa/ 
80b2(1): kyi tshul ci gnas cig tu byung pa'i thabs ni yang dag par 'dzin/ sangs rgyas ciganas ceg tu rgyun pa'i marnams ni yod du chung bar byed/ nam thos pa'i sangs rgyab kyi ban de dag ni rjes su 'ad / phas rgyas kyi chos spyan
80b3(1): baba'i chus de dang ni mun par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi yang dag pab sgrub pa'i rgyan de ni khong du chud par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu' phyung ba'i des ni yid ches par byed/ de bzhin gnas
80b4(1): pa'i phrin las pasaM gyis myi khyab pa de ni mngon tu byed cing / mthar kyis ri gru 'dzin gang na ba der 'ongs nas/ ri gru 'dzin gyi steng du phyin te/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dang po yongs su chen cing tshol tshol ba las
80b5(1): nub phyogs logs kyi ri'i sman ljong mcho' dang / mtshe'u dang / 'bab rang chu dang mdzes par gyurd pa/ bye du s+ya sngon po'i dkyil 'khor ltar sngo zhing 'jam pa gzhon pa'i spar/ nags tshas chen po'i mthongs na
80b6(1): dug 'ar/  ma ca pa da pa kyi zungs na ga/  'tshams la/ 
80b7(1): cing chos bston te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsrung ba'i yul byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'i sgo bas la par ston pa zhes bya bar yang dag par ston cing 'dug pa mthong ngo // 
80b8(1): mthong nas kyang dga' rangs te/ mgu' zhing nyams bde ba la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ dga' bas brgyas shing myi 'dzums pa'i myig gis thal mo sbyar nas dge' ba'i bshes gnyen la dad pa'i shugs dang ldan pas sems kyi khrug pa/ 
80b9(1): dge' ba'i bshes gnyen mthong na/ sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'dzin pa dang / dge' ba'i bshes gnyen las 'byung ba'i chos kyi sprin thams cad yang dag par bzud pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa / yon tan dang nan tan thams cad
80b10(1): dge' ba'i bshes gnyen la rag lus pa'i 'du shes can/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa shin tu dga' bar sems dpa'/ dge' pa'i bshes gnyen las stobs bcu'i ye shes rin po che 'byung zhing thob par 'byung ba'i 'dus shes dang
81a1(1): stan pa/ dgeb pa'i bshes gnyen las ye shes snang ba myi zad pa'i 'byung ba'i 'du shes dang ga dgeb pa'i bshes gnyen gyi rten gyis bsod nams kyi rgyun rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i 'du shes dang ldan par/  dge ba pa'i bzhes/ 
81a2(1): gnyen ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo yang dag par bton pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ bge' ba'i bshes gnyen ni ye shes kyi rgya mtsho'i chen po la 'jug pa yongs su stond par 'du shes pa/ dge' ba'i bshes gnyen ni thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
81a3(1): tshogs yang dag par 'dus pa yongs su skyed pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa de/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po gang na ba der phyin to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos/ tshong dpod kyi bu na/ 
81a4(1): bzangs ring zhig nas tshur 'ong ba mthong nas/ spras pa tshur shog dpe' myed pa'i theg pa chen po yangs shing bsam gyis myi khyab pa la zhugs pa/ skye ba las byung ba'i sdug sngal sna tshogs kyis gces shing skyabs myed par gyuran pa'i 'gro ba thams
81a5(1): cad yongs su sgrub pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thos/ da mngon gsu du gyur pa 'jig rten thams cad las 'das te/ dbel na myed pa tshad myed pa la mngon par mos pa'i snying rje chen pos byin gyis rlabs
81a6(1): phrin yongs su bzung bar mos pa/ dge ba'i pha ba bsags pas ngoms myi shes pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams dag la yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'jam dpas kyi ye shes rgya mchong las byung ba'i yon tan gyi 'brul
81a7(1): gnas sangs rgyas kyi bying rlabs thob par bya ba la mngon tu ltas pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba dang / thugs rab tu thog pa sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char yang dag par bzung ba la mngon par mos pa'i sems dang ldad pa/ sangs kyi
81a8(1): bathong bar dga' ba dang mos pa'i shugs kyis yid rab tu bde' bar gyur pa/ legs par 'apyod pa nyid myed cing bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i shugs kyis mngon par brlan pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ yon tan yanan tan du bya ba'i shugs kyis rnam pan
81a9(1): dag pa'i bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi mdzod bdag la mngon tu gyur pa/ thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i lam gyi shugs gzhan la bstan pa'i bsam pa can/ snying rje can po'i shugs ma nyams pa'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa
81b1(1): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bsnang ba'i shugs yang dag par gzung ba'i blo gros cad/ khyod 'ongs pa legs so// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nir bzangs// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po gang na ba der song nas/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras
81b2(1): gzigs kyi dbang po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshas te/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs ya tra/ lan brgya song du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas mdun tu 'dugs sde/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// baphags pa bdag gis bla na
81b3(1): byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas slab par babyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / 
81b4(1): rjes su brtan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par dbyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags las/ bdag la bshad du gsol// de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras
81b5(1): gzigs kyi dbang pos/ mdog 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi kha dog du 'dug pa 'od kyi dra baM rnaM ba sna tshogs tshad myed pa 'gro ba'i rgyan gyi srin rab tu 'gyed pa'i lag padagayas pa brkyang ste/ mtshan dang / dpe' byed bzang po las 'byung ba'i 'od zer/ 
81b6(1): sna tshogs dri ma byed pa/ lus dang / sems kyi bde ra ba tshad myed pa/ rab tu/ skyed pa'i tshogs kyis shin tu rgyas pa'i lag pa tshong dpon gyi bu rdo bzangs kyi spyi bo khal bzhag ste/ 'di skad ces smras tho// rigs kyi
81b7(1): bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu semapa skyed pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i byad ce sgo snying rje chen po'i sgo bogs pa skyed pa zhes bya ba shes te/ rigs kyi bu pa'i
81b8(1): byang chub sems dpa'i pyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po'i snod/ thogs pa myed pa de ni 'gro ba thams cad la dbye ba myed par sems nan yongs su sbyin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba la zhugs pa sgo kun nas thos shing rnam par rig par 'byung bas// sems
81b9(1): can yongs su bsdu ba dang / gdul ba la nye bar gnas pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltang nga'i byang chub sems bu'i spyod pa'i sngo/ snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa myed pa la gnas pa pa rlag pa de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'ams da
81b10(1): kyi zhabs gyi byung nas kyang myi g.yo' ya sems can thams cad kyi dgos pa la 'das gon du gnas te/ sbyin pas kyang sems can yongs su sdud do// ngag snyan pa dang / don bya ba dang / don mthun pas kyang sems can yongs su sdud do// gzugs/ 
82a1(1): kyi lus rnam par nyan pas kyang sems can yongs su sbyin par byed do// kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / gzugs bsam gyis myi khyab par tan te/ rnam par dbyigs par bya ba dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba 'byed pas kyang sems can
82a2(1): rab tu sim par byed cing / yongs su sbyin par byed do// bsam pa ji ste bzhin du dbyangs brjod pa dang / ci lnga dga' ba'i daspyod lam yongs su bstan pa dang / mos pa sna tshogs dang / tshul mthun par chos bstan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul
82a3(1): ba n+de pa sna tshogs dang / dge ba'i chos bsasags pang bag myi byed pa'i sems can gyi sems yongs su bskus pa dang / bsam pa dang mthum pa ni sprul pa sna tshogs nan byed pa yongs su ba sta nad pa dang /  rigs su tshogs su skyes pa'i sems can rnams dang ska
82a4(1): pa mthun pa'i gzugs yongs su snyan pa dang / gnas gcig tu 'grogs pas kyang sems can yongs su sbyin par byed do// rigs kyi bu de ltar ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po'i sgo bogs pa byed pa 'di yongs su dbyangs pas sa 'gro ba
82a5(1): thams cad rab tu brten pa'i smom kham bskyed de/ 'di ltar sems can thaHnas cad kyi gsang sa'i 'jigs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi rgyud kyi 'jigs pazhi par bya ba dang / sems can gyi makor mongs pa'i 'jigs pa rnag
82a6(1): par klog pa dang / sems can thams cad bcings pa'i 'jigs pa yod/ su bcad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi srog sa bab par myi bdel/ pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par zlog pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi yo byad kyis/ 
82a7(1): 'phongs pa'i 'jigs pa gsal ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi mchol pa byed pa'i 'jigs pazhi par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi grags pa skyed pa'i 'jigs pa las yongs su bzla' ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa
82a8(1): rab tu na par bya ba dang / sems cad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad dkyi 'khong du bag ca ba'i 'jigs pa skyed par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'chi ba'i 'jims pa las rnam par badz+ra ba dang / sems cad sems pa/ 
82a9(1): kyi ngan song gi 'jigs pa rnam par zlog pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sam mun pas nyam ngab phyir myi ldog pa'i snang bas gsal bar bya ba dang // sems can thams cad kyi bska yad pa myi mnyam ga dang / 'grogs pa'i 'jigs
82a10(1): pa shin tu bsal ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sdug pa dang bral po'i 'jigs pa dgag par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi myi sdug pa dang 'grogs pa'i 'jigs pa myed par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad lus la myi ba del ba'i
82b1(1): rab tu brten pa'i sbron pam mngon par sgrub pa 'di byas po/ sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa rnas par zhes bya ba'i phyir ming bag ted darjes su dra pa'i sgo byed kyis bams po// sems can bams pa 'jigs pa dang bra ba rgya gabyes
82b2(1): rang sa kyang gil bas ya 'di rten byernam par byeg la bya pa/ rgyab ba pad tu 'grobs rnam par bya babyer/ 'gros mam cad byinas pa'i bye brag ma 'alas pa dang salda pa mas kyang kyi kyi ban sa/ 
82b3(1): bu de skang nga ni rabs 'dis sems can mams ca 'jigs pa las yongs su makrol zhing / sangs rgyas kyims thamasas log par bya ba'i phyir na byed pa sang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya dru tu sems paskyed cing byin thog par byed pa mas kyi byang
82b4(1): sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po na sgo thogs pa byed pa 'di thob 'a bdang/ dngas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu pazang po rnams/ sangs rgyas kyi ston me pas gyi dkyil 'khongs nas pa dag pa byang chub sems dpa' kun tu dbang po'i 6tra
82b5(1): gyung pa 'ong bachung bar rtogs/  per sa chom mdzad par rgya brgyad kying pa'i drud dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems da ste 'dzi pas na kyi byung ba rta ta gnyas par banas pa ban pang rnamams can tu gdapa ni sa
82b6(1): las phyir phyi ldog pa'i rgyud dang lda pa dus gtsu thams cad kyi nub rjes su rtogs pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gro yongs su 'khyim pa'i rgyung la mkhas pa// sems can thams cad kyi phyi dge ba'i sems rnam par zhi bar / 
82b7(1): byed pa'i rgyud dang ldadra ba/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i sems songs su 'phel ba'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i rgyun lag phyir myi ldog par byed pa'i rgyud dang / ldang pa de ma ni spyong pa shes pa'am/ son tad brjod
82b8(1): yang nus re rkan// de la 'di skad ces bya'o// gas phyogs sor ba byas te gus par kur bsod nas// nod bzangs shin tu dral ba sgo phyogs rgyud du song / dbyan rang gzigs dbang drang srong snying rje rnams 'apyod pa/ rin cer ri'i su
82b9(1): na gnas pa des kyang mthong / rin cer sna tshogs rdo rje'i ri'i sman sdong nga/ pad mo'i snying po'i seng ge'i zhi la brtan pa 'dug/ lha dang lha byin klu dang srin po myi 'am chi// rgyal ba'i sras kyis bskor cing des chos kyang ston// / mthong nas rdo/ 
83a1(1): na pa sa ga pa can byed kyis pa gyur// nyed ge song kyad rgya batsho nam phyag tshas das/ zims tan kyi khyod pa 'ang gags sopa 'gyu pa//  pags pa sa thags rje skyed de nga pa ni garnam pa gto/ 
83a2(1): bsod nams brgyas pas brgyan pa'i dri myed lag rkang ste/ 'od sprin dra ba rgya chen bzang po rab bton nas/ nor bzangs spyi bor zhag ste/ sems can rnam dag pa// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po mkhas pas tshig 'di smras// sangs rgyas
83a3(1): srab po nga ni rnam par cig sgo shes// ye shes snying po rgyal pa kun gyi thugs rjes brtags// 'gro ba thams cad bskyab cing yongs su bsku phyir 'byung / kun tu bdag nyid rang la byams pa bzhin du rgyu/ 'gro ba mang po thams cad stug sdel
83a4(1): kun las skyob/ gang rnams dam du bcings shing dgra lag phyin pa dang / lus la zer cing de bzhin btson dang btsud pa yang // nga'i mying thos bcings shing gzung ba zad par 'gyur// rgyal po dag la nyes pa'i yon tan byas
83a5(1): gsang spangs pa/ de tshe de dag nga'i mying ni dran gyur dan/ mda' 'phangs/ de'i lus la phog par myi 'gyur te/ mtshon rdos btab kyang de dgamyi 'jug rgal bar 'gyur// dbang po'i 'khor du phyin dang gang rnams/ 
83a6(1): btsod gyur pa/ dgra' rnams kun las rgya 'thur grags pa zol bar 'gyur grags dang grogs dang rigs dang nor nas 'phel bar 'gyur// nga'i bye drang de dag grub pa byed par 'gyu'o// gang gis nga'i byeng ni rjes su dran byas/ 
83a7(1): ba// de dag rkun thos 'jigs dogs da grags 'jigs nags phyin te/ seng ge dom gzig bcan gzhan g.yag rgod sprul gang yang // sgra rnams kumasas rgyal zhing 'jigs pa myed par 'gyur/ gang rnaMs la yas pa'i mying zhig dran byas
83a8(1): na// sdang ba'i sems kyis ri chen stongs su bor gyur tam/ sol mdag kyi kye rab tu 'bar ba por kyad kyang // skye rnams pa mos gang pa'i chu'i brted du 'gyur/ 'i phying ni gad 'ga' sad pas rjes canan// rgya mtsho yum 'ang/ 
83a9(1): nang du 'ang gyi 'gyur/ mu thos kyi khyer byo'i dbus su cig kyi 'gyur/ dod byed kun tu kyi 'byungar do rnams srab par 'gyur / nang ldog pa dbyig bcim phyag sgrog de bzhin gru brlabs dang / bcus shing khyad pasang de bzhin bring cing 'akra
83a10(1): ba dang / byos shing bsdigs te gshe dang sma phab rnam pa las/ ra'i myi ba tsam dran par byas na tha rad pa thob / gang rnams shar gnyer sna tshogs glags lta ci snyed dang / gang rnams rtag tu zhe sdar myi snyan brjod pa'i rnams
83b1(1): nga'i myed thos drad byas snyan par brjod par 'byung / mthong ba bcas kyis mod 'a byams pa'i sems kyang rtse/  pa'i snying garnam pasas dran byas na// gnod pa'i don tumo yangam sngags dang byang byed pa'i/ dmanas nag na po da kyi
83b2(1): nodad par 'gyur// ma lus drug gis de'i lus ras kyi tshugs so// a la gang gris nga'i phying btsam tan byas ni// klu dbang srin tshogs ma kho'i lding sham thams cad dang / grul bub srul po 'tshe byed gtum pa'i sems ldan dang / 
83b3(1): mdangs 'phrog 'jigs byed kyi lam 'ong ba zhi par 'gyur/ nga'i mying ni skad cig srang tsam dran byas kyang // pa dang sa dang gnyen bzhes badra' ba kun btang yang / 'bral bar myi 'byung snang dang 'grogs par de bzhin byin/ nos
83b4(1): kyi 'byung 'phongs pa'i dngos bu myi 'gyur ro// nga'i mying gi rjes su dran byed na/ 'di nas shi 'phos mnar myed sems dmyal myi 'gro ste/ byol songs skye gnas yi dgas myi khom gnas su phyin/ sems can dag pa myi dang lha'i gnas
83b5(1): bu skye/ nga'i byi ga ni la la gang gis dran byas na/ dmun song nang na ba 'on bu 'a bor myi 'gyur te// seng po song bar myi 'gyur gsas sa nga sus 'gyur/ bskalang ba bye ba mang po kun ldan 'gyung// la la gang zhes
83b6(1): nga'i phyir ni rjes dran na/ sems can dag pa 'di nas shi 'phos phyogabacu'i// 'jig rten gsuM du sangs rgyas mngon gsum skye b.ra'agyur// sangs rgyas mthong 'gyur de dag chos kyang zos par 'gyur/ 
83b7(1): 'di dang de bzhin gzhan dag thabs med rje snyed kyis// 'gro bar sems cad pa 'dul gzhal dang zad myi nus// sangs rgyas sras po ngas ni rnam thas cig bsgoms te/ yon tan can gyi son tan thams cad ras kyi shes/ 
83b8(1): de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du myi 'gro ba zhes bya ba shar phyogs nas nam mkha'i dbyings las 'ongs te/ myi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor yug gi rtse mor 'dug go// byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du myi 'gro bas kyi
83b9(1): brjed kyi sa rten gyi 'das kyi 'khor gsug gi com sa dang pa gnyis thongs rag tu kyi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dinas pa drugatugams te pache pa ri bzhin du kun nas gangs par gyud to// byang chub sems sa
83b10(1): gzhan tsani 'gro ba des nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od thams cad zil kyis nod pa dang / lha dang / phye ngang / gnod sbyid dang / dri ba dang / rnam yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / gyi 'am ci dang / sgo kyi rir po dang / rba byin dang / rangs sa
84a1(1): 'jig rten gyi mgon po dang / mye dang / rin po che dang / glog dang / skar ma'i 'od kyang zi lad kyis non pa de lta bu'i 'od lus las bkye' ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po dag kyang bsnang bar byasabyol song gi skye gnas dang / 
84a2(1): gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thibs po thams cad kyang bsdang bar byasta te/ ngan song gi sdug sngal thams cad kyang rje ma thag tu zhi'o// sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa 'ang nyams su myi gnod par gyurd to// mya ngan gi gtsug du dang / sug
84a3(1): sngal sna tshogs kyang che zhil par gyu rad to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di dag thams cad du'ang rin po che'i sprin gyi 'chang phab te/ mye tog dang / spos dang / bdug pa dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / nam bka' dang / gzugs dang / 
84a4(1): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs kyi srin gyi char/ yang mngon par phab ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ngo // de'i lus de'i gzugs brnyan ni sems can thams cad kyi gnas su bsdar ba he/ 
84a5(1): bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sim par byed pa la mngon par gzhol pa sa nyi mu mdzin des byang chub sems dpa' spyan das gzigs kyi dbang por drung du yang byin par snang ngo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgyan ras da kyi
84a6(1): thanas kyi dra byang chub sems rapa' gzhin du gyi 'gro ba'i gan du song la/ ji ltar bya chub sems pa'as byang chu ba sems rapa'i 'byod pa la bslab par babye ba dang / ji ltar nang tan du b+ha ba rjes shis nga ga den pa zong don gyi phun pa ladas kyis
84a7(1): byang chub sems dpa' myar ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i gang pa gnyis sa gyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sun ras gzigs kyi dbang pos snyan bamyang tod du mngag las phyogs su bsgom pa byas nas tha byang chub sems dpa' spyan sa
84a8(1): b.ri zhabs kyi dbang po'i drung nas song ngo // tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ byang chub sems dpa' s+yam ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i sde shes kyi gting mi rnyed pa'i sems kyis/ 'argyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po lta bas kyang ma ngoms bzhin du bslob
84a9(1): dang gyi bzla bar byang chub sems dpa' ga'an du gyi 'gro ba gang na ba de mong te/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du gyu 'gro ba'i rkam pa gnyis sa phyigs phyag 'tshal nas rta mdun tu 'dug nyel la mo sbyang nas 'di ga khyim mo// 'phags pa da / 
84b1(1): gis zla byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa lab srab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shes / 'a phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams pa
84b2(1): karam sa ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes/ bdag gis thos nal ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems rapa'i dpyod pa la bslab par bgyin dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags pa la btag la bsha gsopa
84b3(1): des spras pa rigs kyi bu nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i rna bar thar pa sgo kun tu 'gro ba thob pa'o// smras pa 'phags pa khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi zhabs kyi drung nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo kun tu 'gro ba zhes bgyi ba/ 
84b4(1): 'di ba rnyes 'ji rten gyi khams de ni 'di nas ji srid cig na mchis/ 'jig rten gi khams de nas bzhud nas ci srid cig mchis/ smras pa rigs kyi bu gnas 'di ni A dang / myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/ dge' sbyong dang / 
84b5(1): bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgus kyang shes par dka' ste/ nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i mthu' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bson grus kyi ldog pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bye 'phrogs pa'i yul te/ de ni rigs kyi bu dge ba'i bang+ge
84b6(1): rnams kyis thos pa 'bad yongs su bzung ba 'am ga yid ces pa ma khod du drud par bya bar gyi nus so// ga smras pa sangs rgyab kyi sasu' dang / dge ba'i bzhes gnyen gyi gzugs kyi sa dang pa dang mos par babyed na babags pa/ 
84b7(1): ga' bgang bya bsa'ang nab smras b.rigs kyi bu digang phyogs rgya 'dzi nyid kyi'ams dpas kyi snying po dang 'das/ de bzhin gshegs par dang bathad nas yangs par 'byung ba bsas rgyas kyi zhi sa 'a mas te/ de ban / 
84b8(1): sa bye pami dri byung zhes sus she can brnyed shes te/ bskan sresa'i rid pang gos sa las chu budang mad byed pa ga sas pa nyid dbangs ma she thas cad dang
85a1(1): tu byed pa'i tshum shin tu ga brten gyis ngas rgyas kyi zhing 'das te sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan pa bzhes te/ sang sa rgyas bcom ldas 'das de dag sams
85a2(1): 'a re gdad shesas pa pa la kyi pa ni chos nyi pa ba lan da pa rgya# #
85a3(1): rten gyi khams de dan na/ sems can gyi khams rgya mamod ni snyed pa de dag 'ams cad kyang gathong te/ de dag tham pa cad kyi sems rgyas so 'ang 'ong bachud do// de dag pas kyi bang tha 'a the yongs sun sa
85a4(1): bsam pa dang / mos paci lta ba bzhin du gzugs kyi sus yongs su bstan te/ chos kyi dbyings rab tu bsgrags so// 'od kyi kyis ma tha yongs su babyen/ yo byad sna tshogs phun sram tshogs pas kyang
85a5(1): nye bar bsur do/ rang gi lus kyang de dag la byin gyis rla gas te/ de ni yongs su sbyin par bya ba dang / gdul pa'i sbyor brgyun N+yachang ba'i phyir ro// shar phyogs nas ci ltar 'ongs pa de bzhin du lko b+h+yo// hraH
85a6(1): de chub byos dang / byang phyog pa dang / bya gar rdzi zug na 'i phyogs sa /  su kyang byangs 'ams dang / ga nga zhe gyis
85a7(1): bachos kyi dbying sa rnams pa gra byas rnam me pa da pa sems can sa kyi rnamam pa dang ma gcig pa bsnyen du brdzun pam gying zhing 'am la dalus kyis rgyas pang 'jes pa/ 
85a8(1): kyi rgyad kyi ches su song ba dus kasu rgyud mnyam pa nyid du gyu pa// chos kyi phyogs kyi rgyud dang mnyam pa nyid du myung pa'i lus dang ldan pa bgro ba'i brgyad lams cang durnam par spang ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i
85a9(1): ru dpa' 'das dang rtog pa byed pa chags pa byed pa'i rgyud pam sa cang 'ong dudrung dri// gsun bye pa'i drud pa rla tu gnas pa dag spyod bshes su la/ yon tan brjod pa dus yang nas
85b1(1): ma chags kyi pu ga phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong byer sgo dang ldang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de dag cher ba zhes bya ba'i lnga 'dug gis de'i gab tu song la/ ji ltang byang chub sems dpa'as byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bzlas par bya ba sa
85b2(1): ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpos kyi bu no bya 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du gyi 'gro ba'i rkang pa gnyis la gyi chos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan tu gyi 'gro ba la lan brgya sa
85b3(1): g.yas khyogs su skor ba byas nas// yang dang yang ltas te// byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du myi 'gro ba'i drung nas song ngo // tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mamo chen po'i rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ 
85b4(1): byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du gyi 'gro ba'i ye shes kyi spyod yul 'dod pa'i ngang tshul can mngon par shes pa chen po mngon par bsgrub pa'i yul la yon tan gyi khyad par du lta ba/ brtson grus brtan pa'i go tsa rab tu dga' ba'i khyad par thob pa/ 
85b5(1): kyis la de rab tu gnas par byed/ spon las kyis sa'i 'dug par byed nye/ b.rang ba yang dag 'a shes pa'i sa sa ni rjes su bslob/  stoms kyis sa ni yongs su bsgrub cing mthar kyis thong byed sgo dang dra
85b6(1): ba gang na pa rer song ste/ lha lha chen po kun tu dris pa dang / de la 'gro ba ma pos stan pa/ rigs kyi bu de re lha lnga chen po'i grong khyer gyi lam gyi sa ni mdo' na/ bdag nyid shin tu che bas sems can rnams sa chos ston cig
85b7(1): 'dug go// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nod pa 'das/ lA lnga chen po gang na ba der sor te/ lha ga chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la kyi bos phyag 'tshal nas mdun tu 'dug te thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa lanas ng+ge/ 
85b8(1): blan myed pa yang rag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i yod pa la bsrab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan tu dbyi ba ma 'anas te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dgu'
85b9(1): rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su snyan pa mdzad do zhes/ bdag gis thos na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags pas bdag la bshang du gas pa
86a1(1): de nas lnga lnga chen pos lag pa bzhi phyogs bzhir brkyang ste/ rgya mtsho'i chen po bzhi las shin tu byur pa'i shugs kyis chu blangs te/ bdag gis gdong bkrus nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la gser gyi me ton gi
86a2(1): gtor te/ 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni mnong par shin tu dkar ste/ thos pa sang rab tu ko/  skyes bu mchog gi me cog bran da rig ni 'jig ted gyi bul du bya ba yin pas ngo marjod can du byung ba yin te/ 
86a3(1): 'jig rten gyi gnas su gyur pa'o// 'gro ba'i brten du gyur pa'o// sems can rnams la bsnang ba chen po 'byin pa'o// lam rmongs pa rnams pa lam bde' ba son pa'o// chos kyi tshul tu gzung ma la mgon tu gyur pa'o// thams cad
86a4(1): mkhyen pa'i grong khyer du phyin par bya ba la ded dpon chen po gyur da ba se/ de la kho bo 'di snyam du sems so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi myir ni sems dri ma myed pa rnams la rang gi lus kyi gzugs brnyan ston
86a5(1): cing lus rnam par dag par rnaMs la mngon par snang ba dang / ngag gi nyes pa spangs pa rnams dbyangs kyi snang ba yongs su gnod par byed pa dang / bsam pade dag pa rnams la dus thams cad du mngon gsum du gyur da par gnas par
86a6(1): su ba ngan sa 'dabs pa dzin par bas par ma rigs kyi phu la po ni byang chub pa'i rnas par zad pa smin byid bathob pa'o/ smras pa 'phag pa byang dub sem sa dpa'i rnas par tha pa'i yin byed pa po'i pa
86a7(1): ci lta bu zhig mchis/ de nas lnga lnga chen pos/ tshong dpon bye bu nor bzangs kyi mdun tu/ ri chen po btsam ki gser gyi phung po dang / rangul gyi phung po dang / bye du r+ya'i phung po dang / gshel gyi phung po dang / mus sa rags pa'i phung po dang / 
86a8(1): a sma gar ba'i phung po dang / nor bu rin po che rang gis sdar ba'i phung po dang / nor bu rin po che dri ma myed pa'i snying po'i phung po dang // nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i phung po/ nor bu rin po che phyogs kun tu mngon pa'i phung po dang / gtsug
86a9(1): gnong bu ring gi che btsong par gyi phung po dang / nong bu na po che sna tshogs kyi se mo ra'i phung po dang / dpung rgyad kyi phung po dang / na ci'i brgyad kyi phung po dang / gtung gu'i phung po dang / garags kyi phung po dang / dang gnub kyi phung po dang / 
86a10(1): bu tig dmarang po'i drala'i phung po dang / nong bu ring ba che ga tshigs kyi phung po dang / sanas ga dang / nyan lag thams cad kyi rgyan gyi phung po dang / nor bur rnam sa 'de bzhin gyi rgyal po'i phung po dang / megag lams sa dang / 
86b1(1): thos thams cad dang / btug pa labs par dang / 'greng ba bams dang / thug pa mas can dang / phye ma thams cad dang / gos khams cad dang / gdugs pa pas cad dang / rgyas sa tshan pams can dang / gA pa ngan thams cad dang / 
86b2(1): rol lo brdung ba thams cad dang / rol mo dathos pa thams cad dang / 'dod pa'i yul thams cad dang / bu mo bye ba brgya dong grangs byed pa dag kyang nye bar san nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu 'di/ 
86b3(1): dam las khyeng la sbyin pa zang po ni byin cig/ bsod nams zang po na gyis shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni mchod cig/ sems can mang po ni sbyin pas bsdu pa'i dngos sngos yongs su bsu ba'i dngos pas yongs su bsdus te/ 
86b4(1): gtong ba'i pha ros du tu byind pa la 'khod cig/ 'jig rten gyi sbyin pa la baspobs shig/ btang par dka' ba yongs su gtong ba ni banyon cig/ rigs kyi nga bu khyod pa kho bos ji ltar yo byad kyi rnam pas bsrud la/ de bzhin du sbyin/ 1
86b5(1): pa'i bsapa pa dang / ma bral ba'i sems can cad myed pa'i dag gebs pa da pa'i rgyud kyang gtong bas yongs su bzlo ba byed do// sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge bdud dang / byang chub sems dang dang / dge ba'i skye
86b6(1): gnyen namams ya dges pa'i sa pa bskyed cing lud byed pa yang dag par ba'i byang chub tu stsal pa byed do// rigs kyi bu gzhanasapa'o bo ni sems can 'dod pa'i dga'i pas byos pan sus kyi mang su sa bam
86b7(1): ba canas sa rnams la/ sus de dag kyi skrag par byed gyi 'bas za// mdzan pa dang bral zhi dade/ rgyag ga gas pa dang / rlom pa cha ba nas gyu nasapa dus 'ang / rin bgar gyi rtag pa/ 
86b8(1): bsan da ca tha la su sad pa ldan te/ chos pang rnams pas gyug pa des lams ca dan pa kyad // mababar pa rnas pa semam pananams gyid/ sa tus pa dang / kun pa dang / dad
86b9(1): 'jigs pa sangs su ba cing ba skyob par byas te/ brtson zlas bcom pa la 'anod bar byed de/ de ltar rabs de ga gis pa nos sa byed pa tha pa kyi phyogs dang / kye bzud pa rab tu gnas pa dang / mchongs byed dus kyi
86b10(1): gyi chom sa masags pa dang / sgrib pa'o ma mangs ma'i las thams cad las yang dag par brla ba dang / sgrib pa skyed pa'i chos pa gzung pa'i phyir/ byi dge ba thams cad sa nam par bzlog pa ste/ dge ba ma'a' ba
87a1(1): chogs pa la yang dag par 'god pa byed do// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'dod pa smin bying ba 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' dbang po ltar nyon mongs pa'i lham yin mas/ 
87a2(1): tu 'jom pan chu lud 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug sngal kyi kye'i phung po zhe gar byed pa/ mye'i phung po ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi sred pa'i chu skyems pa/ rlung khyer 'dzin pa'i mngon par chags pa thams cad kyi rirnam par 'thor ba/ rdo rje ltang
87a3(1): bdag gi 'du shes sra ba'i brag rab tu brnyil pa/ de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skam/ song rig kyi bu 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid kyi yul ma ga ta'i snying po byang chub sa'i lha mo brtan pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ 
87a4(1): de'i gam du 'ong la ci ltar byang chub sems dpa'as/ byang chub sems tha ba'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor ba zangs kyis/ lnga lnga chen po'i nang pa gnyis sa
87a5(1): spyi bos phyag 'tshas te/ sngag chen po sa len brgya stong du mar dmas ge phyogs su bskor ba byas nas sabar dang yang lhas te/ sA lnga che/  na po'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor ba btam ma bad kyis
87a6(1): ga ba tu 'i tun gnas ga 'a bab da /  nab yin pa pa mong grag bcu badzin pasacis 'dren suto// bab sa sa kyi shes rdzun bde da ca
87a7(1): de bzhi gshegs pa'i snying bcad/ sems can thams cad kyis rig pa'i sgo da'i srubs 'dras bar 'byung bzhig ni 'di nas chung 'ong ngo // chos kyi rtsub po'i dgag sa byung ba chags pa byed ci dri ba byed pa'i chos kyi rgyal ba'i gabang dam pa tho pa
87a8(1): 'byur ba zhig ni 'di nas tshur 'dor ye shes kyi thu bo che rdo rje'i mtshon cha can dpa' bo gas kyi rgol pa'i 'khor thams cad rab tu 'dul ba zhig ni 'di nas tshur 'ong ngo zhes nas/ de'i mod la lA mo brtan ma la bsogs pa/ sa'i lha mo
87a9(1): brgya stong phrag bcus sa chen po rab tu spyod de/ 'brug spa zab mo lta bu'i sgra chen po brag par byas nas/ songad gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'od chen pos snang bar byas te/ bus rin po che'i brgyan dang lngab sbub thams cad/ 
87a10(1): kyis zhin tu brgyad nas/ klog gi 'phreng ba'i tshogs nas mkha'i dbyings rgyu zhing snang ba lta bu gzhag lta bu byas te/ zhing thams cad kyi myu gu ni skye bar byed/ me tog gi zhing thams cad ni la 'bru bar byed/ chu krung gi rgyud ram cad de 'a'ang/ 
87b1(1): ba byed pa 'a dang / gras khams pa dang 'dus par byed/ sa chu ba ni ma tha sa par byed/ ga pa ying pa la du pa ni 'ang bar byed/  la can gyi 'a nyin rgyag sa sa
87b2(1): ra byedapa rna rdzas kyi g.yal phyed khang dang / rgyan gyi tshogs mang po ni rab tu 'khros par byed/ ba glang dang / khyu mchog dang / glang po dang / cag dang / ri dgas kyi dbang po ni rab tu sgra 'byin par byed/ k+Sha dang lha ma yin
87b3(1): rangal gru dang 'byung po'i dbang po rnams ni 'brug sba 'byin par byed/ ri'i dbang po chen po rnams ni phan tshun 'dug par byed/ gted kyi tshogs bye ba brgya song ni mngon tu 'byung bar byed cing sa'i 'og nas thon no// de nas
87b4(1): sa'i lha mo brtan mas ka jong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs yi 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod 'dir 'ongs pa sdigs so// sa'i phyogs 'di ni sngon khyod kyi gnas su gyur te/ kho mo mngon gsum du dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed
87b5(1): pa yin/ de'i rnam par sbyind pa'i phyogs 'ga' tsam lta par 'dod dam/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs se'i snga mo brtan ma lalan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ sa'i
87b6(1): tho brtan ma'i mdun tu 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'dis ces smras so// 'phags ma phya bra 'tshas so// de nas pa'iso brtan mas smyung ba'i this gyis pa chen po la brdebs te/ rim
87b7(1): che'i gter bye ba brgya stong grangs myed pas rab tu brgyan pa bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu rin po che'i gter bye ba khrag khrig brgya song 'di dag kyang khyod kyis rjes su 'brang ba'o// khyod kyi sngon du 'gro/ 
87b8(1): ra khyod kyis ci dgang 'apyod ba'o// khyod kyi bsod napas kyi rnam par spyor pa las 'byung ba'o// khyod kyi bsod nams kyi stobs kyis bsrungs pa'o// 'di las spongs te khyod kyis ci dmos pa de dag kyis shig/ 
87b9(1): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par tha rad pa ye shes thub par dga' ba'i snying po can thob pa ste/ de ltar kho mo byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par tha dad pa 'di dang ldan pas/ 
87b10(1): de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad tshun chad du/ byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su 'brang zhing rtag tu bsrung ba la zhugs pa ste/ de tshun chad du kho mo ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi spyod pa la rno bar spyod do// 
88a1(1): se shes kyi yul la 'jug go// smon sas kyi dkyis 'khor du chud par byed do// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa rjes su rtogs par byed do// ti nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyal kyi rjes su na/ 
88a2(1): byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thams cad dang / sems rgya chen pos rgyas par 'gengs so// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi stobs dbang po sgyur ba dang / zhing 'i dra ba thams cad rgyas par gang ba dang / de bzhi gan/ 
88a3(1): pa thams cad kyis lung bstan pa yang dag par mdod pa dang / dus thams cad du mngon par 'tshang brgya pa yang dag par snyan pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor pa'i tshul thams cad dang / mdo' sde yang dag par brjod pa'i chos kyi sprin
88a4(1): gyi tshul thams cad dang / chos snang ba chen pos snang bar bya ba'i tshul dang / sems can thams cad yongs su sbyin dpar bya ba'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi rno bar 'phrul pa thams cad yang dag pang sa nang pa'i tshul
88a5(1): yang rjes su rtogs par byed do// yang dag par 'dzind 'dzin to// yang / dag par nod do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i rnam bA/ thar da pa ye shes thub par dka' ba'i snying po can 'di yang skal da ba
88a6(1): ri rab kyi rtsu ba shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rob de'i yang pha rol cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar skayad pa sdang bar brgyan pa la// de bzhin gshegs pa byan bzang po las thob pa ste/ rigs kyi/ 
88a7(1): bu de ltar khos// byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'ard ba ye shes thub par dka' ba'i snying po can 'di la yongs su spyod khyod/ rnam pang spyod yod/ shin tu spyod pyod/ yang dag par 'phel bar byed byed de/ shin tu rgyas par byed byed/ 
88a8(1): phas rgal pa bzang po la thug gi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang ma bral mo// de srid kyi bar gyis kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du byed pa'i sang/ 
88a9(1): brjod du byed pa'i rdul shin tu ma bsnyed cig bsnyen bskur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad snying po byang chub tu gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'di mthong ste/ 'o ma ni de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i ma / 
88a10(1): mngon gsum tu mthong ba'o// rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par tha dad pa ye shes rngug par dka' ba'i snying po can 'di shes par 'dan/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' de bzhi gshegs pa phams cad kyi/ 
88b1(1): cig kyang sa dang / ngas rgyas bam na kyi sung gangs de bzhin legs pa'i shes 'dru 'a ba sa tu ses kyig ga gi sa kyi kyi
88b2(1): ba'i zhugs dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa dang / mnyam pa nyid du gyung ba de'i lus dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa drim byed pa'i snying por byu pa/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba 'ams can tog tu mngon pa bsgya / 
88b3(1): pa/ sangs rgyas kyi phrin las pa myi dad pa'i pho nyar gyur pa/ de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re rkan// song rigs kyi bu'i gling 'di nyid kye yu la sa ka ta zhes bya ba na/ grong khyer ser skya'i gnas zhes bya ba
88b4(1): yod de de na mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song sa/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i 'apyoskyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpan
88b5(1): gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ pa'i lA mo brtan ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ sa'i lA mo brtan ma la yan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang nang yang ltas te/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i drung nas song
88b6(1): nga de nas tshong dpor gyi bu nong bzangs / sa'i lha mo brtan pa'i gdas / dag rjes su dran par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'dang / nye ba'i leshes grub pa dga' ba'i snying po can de'i rjes su dran par bya dang / 
88b7(1): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom pa de rab tu goms par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi tshul de'i rjes bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par ma bdad pas rnam par rtse ba de la rnaM bar spyad pa dang / 
88b8(1): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par tha rad pa ye shes shin tu phra ba de la rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par tha dad pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho'i de la 'jug par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par tha dad pa'i ye shes tha dad pa de la yid
88b9(1): ches par bya ba dang /  byang chub sems dpa'i rnam yang 'arang pa'i ye shes shin tu srung ba dre/ rjes su rtogs par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i nas par 'dad pa'i ye shes rgya mthor de la 'bab par bya ba byed cing / grong khyed gser skya'i gnas/ 
88b10(1): gang na ba deng byin te grong khyer chen go gser skya'i gnas la g.yas phyogs su bskod nas/ shar phyogs logs kyi grong khyer gyi snonas song nye nyi ma nug nas ring po ma lon pa zhig tu zong khyer kyi sum mdo'i dbus zhig na/ 
89a1(1): byang chub sems dpa'i gdams ngag mthun par len pa de mtshad mo'i snga mo dpyid dang ldan par mthong bar 'dod dge ba'i bshes gnyen yod na/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thob par 'gyur bar nges pa'i blo gros dang ldan/ 
89a2(1): pa/ ye shes kyi dmyi ba kun tu lta ba'i yul gyi rang bzhin gyi byin rlabs dang ldan pa/ phyogs thams cad du mngon par gzhol zhing / dge ba'i bshes gshen lta ba'i sems kyis mos pa dang / ye shes chen po snying por gyur pa'i 'du shes kyi som
89a3(1): dang ldan pa/ dmyigs pa thams cad la rab tu zhugs pa'i ye shes kyi myig dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad du ye shes rgya mtsho' 'byam klas pas brgyas par 'gengs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi myig gis phyogs thams cad du
89a4(1): shes bya'i rgya mtshor ba rnam par lta ba/ ye shes chen po'i dmyig thob par bya ba dang la rab tu gzhol zhing / bsam pa mi gcig tu bzhag nas 'dug 'dug pa dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa de/ grong khyer ser skya'i gnas kyi rnyed/ 
89a5(1): gyi nam mkha'i dbyings pa/ nong bu rin po che sna chogs dpe byed bu'i khang brtsegs bzhin na/ rin po che'i seng ge'i gri chen po sos zhin tho mas cad kyi pad mo'i snying po can zhig la lus kyi mdog gsed gyi la dog tu
89a6(1): 'dun pa smra pa zhing 'jas sa payon ted du 'dun par byeg dgang nan byed de/ gathugs nang zhin tu mdzes pa/ sna thus pa sum brgyan dang 'ab slob thams cad kyi chu shing lhan pa/ 'dos sna mnas 'ayo pa tshas
89a7(1): gtsug tor gyi chod pan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor byis brgya nad pa thogs pa/ lus la rgyu skar dang bza' dang / skad zhen dang skad ma'i tshogs thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan bsdang bar gyur da pa 'dug par mthong ngo // des sems can gyi khams yangs par gyi
89a8(1): ma pa dang / dang po dang / na 'grongs thog pa nga bdas sems pa ci byed ci ga songs sra btsal pa de dag pas cad kyang deb ga sla'i sbubs suchu pa mdza/ srid cig sa ro ris kyi ga rked du 'dod pa dang / lo snyed tun thom da/ 
89a9(1): rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sbyin par byas pa/ de dag thams cad kyang do'i baspu'i sbubs su chud par mthong ngo // sus mngon par bsgrub pa dang / gzugs mngon par bsgrub pa dang / 'dog bangon par bsnu ba'i/ 
89b1(1): sbyin par byas pa de dag kyang de'i ba spu'i sgo nas rjes su brjod pa thos so// dus mngon par bsgrub pa dang / bsam pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dpyod pa dang / byang chub
89b2(1): sems dpa'i rno ba gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog gi mthu 'a byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su
89b3(1): b+ha ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par smra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rna bar 'phrul ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyes bu seng ge chen po'i rnam par sgyings pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rna bar 'dad pas na bar rtse ba/ 
89b4(1): cishi byeg gipa'is sems cad yongs su phyin par byasmra bdedag pa de'i bsu'i lungs su chud pa mdzad // des papas ma chogs dang than pa tsas kyici rgyas so gas pang ni mthos das dmas ci
89b5(1): bskor ba byas nas mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa'i mdun tu 'dug cebal mo spyad nas 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu mo bdag gis bu na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed de/ de ltar bdan/ 
89b6(1): gis ge nigs nyed kyi byed mas kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi 'a 'byung yang dag par ba dge zheg gnyen kyi byag rgya sayar ba legs da/ 'grochus das na tu chub sems pa
89b7(1): stobs bcu'i bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i shugs pa dag la bshad du gsol/ de skad ces smrasmra pa dang / mtsham ma'i lnga mo byed dang ldan pas/ rdzod dpon gyi bu nod pa 'das sa 'di skad ces smras so// 
89b8(1): rigs kyi bu de ltang khyod dag pa'i bzhes gnyen gyi byin kyis non te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig mnyan par 'dod pa dang / dag pa'i bzhes gnyen gyi gdams dag sa nan tan byed pa legs ma legs pa// rigs kyi bu khyod de de ltan
89b9(1): dge pa'i bzhes gnyen gyi gdapas dag pa rad dad byed pas/ gdod phyim par phra byed pa yang dag par thugs pa'i byeng dus tunye par 'gyur ga dgas kyi bu ma mo kyang chub sems dpa'i rnam par rin pa sems pa
90a1(1): na kyi byed pa nas par me pa sa kyi rdzas 'grob rnabapa yu ba'inas pa te/ las bgyi bsdu pa dang ldan pa'i sems can nalapa 'byabs pa'i semapa dang dran pa'o/ byed de sa sa byasapa na/ 
90a2(1): gnams la snyi rje'i sems dang na pa rdzogs dge pa'i las kyis pa la zugs pa rnams bdaga' pa'i sems dang ldan pa na pa sem pa mnyam pa dang kyi mnyam par ldan pa'i sems cad rnam la phyiganyis parnamams dang ldan tsan kunas
90a3(1): mongs pa'i rnams la rnam par sbyang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'o// nyam nga bar gyur pa rnams la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o// dma' ba la mos pa rnams la yangs pa la mos pa yongs su bskyed pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o// 
90a4(1): dbang pos zhum pa rnams la brtson grus chen po'i shugs rnam par spel banyi sems dang ldan pa'o// 'khor ba sa mngon par mos pa rnams la da'akhor ba'i rgyud kyi 'khor lo las rnam par zlog pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o// 
90a5(1): gad nas pa las rgyas bams pa mngo pa tsa pa'i sems napas pa lam pa 'byen pa srid kyil sa da ga gis ba 'das sa yi rnam pa ga nga khra'i seb pa dang she ca
90a6(1): khang ldan sa ga byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par bdad pa sems can thams cad kyi mun pa'i rnam par sesad pa'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba rno bar 'dul ba'i sgra 'od dang yang ldan pas sems can gang ci snyed cig mun dag smag tu gyur da pa'i rnam pa/ 
90a7(1): kyi ni nyas yang gyur nas 'byung po'i tshogs ni rgyu bar 'gyur/ kun chos mang pos ni rgyas par gyur// sems can gyi srun pa'i tshul can ni phyogs su rtsu bar gyur/ sIn stug po nag pos kun tu byebs par gyur da/ dud pa dang rgyas kyi tshogs kyis ni kun nas

90a9(1): ri la spyod dam/ nags tshal gzhan la dpyod dam/ yul gzhan la dpyod dam/ gror gzhan la dpyod dam/ phyogs gzhan la spyod dam/ phyogs mtshams gzhan la dpyod dam/ lam gzhan la spyod kyang rung ste/ rgya mtsho la spyod pyod pa las gru thub par
90a10(1): gyur da pa 'am thang la spyod dpyod pa las nyam nyes pa 'am/ ri la dpyod pyod pa las g.yang sa chen por ltung bar gyur pa 'am/ 'brog mgon pa las dpyod spyod pa las kha zas kyis 'phongs par gyur pa 'am/ nags tshal thibs bor spa'i zang zing

90b2(1): sa 'brog skyes pa 'am phyogs gla ldan na myod yod pa las mgo' rmongs pa'am da 'am gzhan la 'byud myod ba las nyes zhong rgyud kyang cung ste/ rigs kyi bu lo mo ni sems can de lta bu dag la labs sna tshogs kyi sgonas sbya

94a10(1): sems can gdul dka' shin tu 'dul/ kho mo'i bsod nams rnam yangs yongs su dag/ kun tu rkyen byed zad pa myed pa'i mdzod// des ni rgyal ba rnams la mchod par byed// 'gro ba thams cad nye bar ma tshol ba hrIn/
