181b2(1): sral na byed cin sbyong ba ma lus par/ 'jig rnye pal cha gzhond du gtang bar gdung / rgyal pa des kyang de yang gan gyun nas/ rin na sa dang skyen pa yongs su gtung / zla ba byed du na pa ched skye bya das// ba sa
181b3(1): bar rtsoms par gyung ba'o// dpas pa grub pa gang rnams kyi 'dod pa// de la byed 'chi bar mgon gnas/ rgyal po'i gdas de 'gro ba mang po dang// tshering du ning kun kya zhus par gyu nga/ byang chub gi drung bded cen
181b4(1): deg/ gang mchos dbyang sa tshog smod pa'i rgya bregs pa pa// 'gro ba'i dbang po sbyin pa thugs chung nas/ mchod srung nga 'bugs rje rkyen tha byor// de bzhi gshegs pa'i rnas 'phrul bye bas/ ro'i 'thar du de la
181b5(1): bshegs byed gyur ras// chos kyi sgron ma'i srin gyi sgra bsgogs pa'i na mdo'i sde'i rgyal po bde bas bshad// 'gro ba mtha' dang dbu dbyed rnam btul nas// de na byang chub mchog rtsa lung yang bstanan/ !n+da
181b6(1): rgyal po'i sras po rnam par rgyal ba yang / shin tu mkhas pas byang chub mchog tu zhugs// bde gshegs bsnyen bkur mchod pa rnam yang/ sa pas// de la mchod byas dga' bar smras pa ni// 'gro ba rdo
181b7(1): 'dul skyabs su bdag 'gyur bgyi// mgon dang gnas dang dpung du'ang de bzhin shes// rgyal ba'i zham rim thar par zhugs// yang dag byang chub lam ni yongs 'chol zhing // chos kyi rang bzhin rab tu brtag byas pas// 
181b8(1): der gnas bskal pa brgya phrag mang du spyad/ bsug snga la rgya mchod lhung zheng mdongs gyurang pa'i// 'gro ba 'gon myed kun la snying pa rtse bse/ yang dag byang chub lam la yongs bsgoms nas/ de'i tshe de'i sa rnam
181b9(1): ra 'di thob po/ bskalang ba de la bde gshegs gang byung ba// de dag kun la'ang dga' bas bsnyen bkur nas// de dag kun la mchod pa chen po byas// chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bzung bar gyur/ 
181b10(1): de'i 'og tu bskal pa rgya mtsho'i rnams// zhing mar rgya mtsho'i rtul bsnyed kun la yang // rgyal ba ji snyed skyes par gyur da pa dag/ rab tu mchod de de dag bsnyen bkur byas// rnam par rgyal zhes bya ba kho mo yin// 
182a1(1): nyamang bcon du gnas pa'i brtson mthod nas/ de dag dbros phyir lus kyang yongs su gtung/ nas par 'di yang de ma thob par gyud// zhing rnams rgyam tsho'i drus sran rab bzungs pan
182a2(1): banas das rgya ma chob srang pong sgom pa byas// rjes sams pa' yas dpung skyed mnyam byed pas// srang ces de de dag su rnam par spo/ grub pa'i bdan pa ji snyed pa yod skye pa/ dedag spyang drung sar ma
182a3(1): no// rtswa rgyal rnam pa gzha dang ga'ang dganon/ de dag gis ni nam rang 'di sa bstan// de dganam thar mdod pasas las la// than yang bgyi ba sang bya mos ba sa ba rgyas pa byinan ma thong
182a4(1): blang ba/ de dag mchos srid pas cig cang 'thung phyogs bcu kun kyi ni rnams mams cang du/ grags pa byed pa sras kyis rgyas pang rang 'gengs/ skad cig re res ni rgyud bas pa 'das pa'i cus gsum
182a5(1): rgyu rnamamasa'ang rab tu 'dug dus gsum stsal la rgya mcholas sum pa/ de de ku la'ang ma dod tu ba ste/ de dag sus kyi gzugs partan rgyas pas sred du b+h+yargya pa nams kya phya sngang 'dres/ 
182a6(1): phyonas rnams bud tu nye bar byin 'do zhing / rgyal pa'i spyan sngar 'do pa skabs shin tu mdzes// rgya rnams ma lus mngon par char tsha 'bebs shing / rgyal ba rnams sa de dag mchod pa byed/ sangs rgyas
182a7(1): rgya ma mo tshal rnam yangs pa'i ra/ zhub mtha' yas kun kyang zhu ba yang byed/ rgyal pa'i chos gasrin mngon par 'char 'bab pa// kun kyang ma lus stongs su 'dzin pa byed/ phyogs bcu ma gus kun bu de dag 'dog
182a8(1): rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor kun gyi spyad sngar 'bab// / gzugs par rnam pa sna tshogs bstan gnas shing // nam 'phrul sna tshogs nye bar bston pa byed// kha dog mtha' yas rang gi lus gzugs kyis ke phyogs rnams
182a9(1): thams cad rnapa pa stong du 'gengs de dag lus cig las kyang gzugs kyi rnams dzum tha' dang dbu byed rna par bskur pa byed/ pa s+phu re re'i sgo nas grangs byed pa'i// 'od cem mang po rgya mtsho de da
182a10(1): 'gyed// skye dgu nyom mongs mye'i gdung ba dag/ sna tshogs thabs kyis rab tu zhi bar byed// 'di la gnas paM lus srul srin mang byA sma re re'i sgo nas 'gyed byed cing // ngo mtshar rmad kyis phyogs kun rgyas bkang
182b1(1): dgacho chu'i chang kyis sems ca dzes pa sus rgya 'dun 'dod pas kyis kyi khyab gzugs rgyas sras kun kyi gnas su 'gyur ba ste/ de ba gan shi kyi ba bag sa ya / nang rnapas su
182b2(1): pa rab tu pyod/ bsam pa rje bzhid chos rnams bston byed cing / de dag su pa'i dras nas par zlon ngam tho ris bye dngan 'das la sems can 'god/ thams can ma byed pa'i sa yang nas par bston/ 'jig rten
182b3(1): gnas thams cad ma lus par/ kha dog mtha' yas lus mang bsam yas pas/ bsam pa bzhin du chos rnams brjod byed de// de dag sems can kun gyi gzugs brnyan gzugs 'di dang gzhan dag chad las 'das pa'i// 
182b4(1): yon tan rgya mtsho'i rdul phran rab brnyed bsam gyis myi khyab pa// rnam yang zhi ba 'di ldan thob par 'gyur// rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par zab pa sems can thams cad yongs su sbyin par byabs bsam pa
182b5(1): ji lta ba gzhin tu dag pa'i bas pa la yang dag par 'phrul pa'adashes pa yadan bdun/ mthos byang chub sems dpa' 'dzig ted thams cad kyi lhas kyi rgyad las 'das pa/ 'jig rted gyi skye gangs rab bar du ga zun brnyan rab tu
182b6(1): 'byung ba/ 'jig rted gyi shes pa thams cad las dag par 'das pa/ zhes bya'i sgrib sa thams cad kyi rnam par meng pa la brtso pa/ chos 'gas can gyi rang banyid dang mtshan nyid ras rgya rtogs pa/ nyod thos
182b7(1): pa'i sgrib gdang / mun pa thams can rnam par gses pa la banon pa dang /  chos thams cad rab tu skyed pas mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa me bdag myed pa'i chos mngod du gyur ba / sems can thams can yongs su
182b8(1): da par bya ba dang / 'dus brgyar gyi dod pa dang / sa kyi byings kyi rdul gnyis su byed par rab tu rtogs pa ngag gi sa kyi chus rgya mtsho thams can kyi nges su 'brang ba'i sgo dang spang pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'amar
182b9(1): yon tan byas mo la 'jug pa 'ab/ ye shes kyis rnam par gdod pa gongs su shes par bya ba 'am/ sems kyi gnas khong du chud par bya ba 'am ting nge 'dird sa dbar sbyar ba rtogs par bya ba 'am
182b10(1): rnam par tha dad pas rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su shes par bya ba nus re nang// sor rigs kyi bu 'dzem bu srings de nyid kyi lus bri ni'i nag 'tshal gyi lha mo gzi' brjid kyi dkyil 'khor pa nur pos dga' la'i dpal
183a1(1): zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du songs ji skad na byang chub sems dpa' de ba zhing gshegs pa'i rigs su 'byung ba yin pa dang / ji ltar 'jig rten rnams la snang bar byed par 'gyur ba dang / ji skad dukyi
183a2(1): pa'i sa pa'i bas sa pa'i bur thug par byang chub sems dpa'i byung ba srung bas kyi skyobar 'gyur ba drimasas/ de tho dman kyi bu nang pa'adas kyis bam thol namo 'gro tha masas cad 'azung ba'i nod lams bzod mnan
183a3(1): rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mtshan mo'i lha mo 'gro ba thams cad bsrung ba'i smon lam la brtson pa'i 'od la/ lan brgya skyong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ rnal mo sbyar te byi lta zhing mtshan pa'i
183a4(1): mo 'gro ba thams cad bsrung ba'i smon lam la bcom pa'i 'od kyi drung nas song ngo // dum bu bzhi pa/ bam po bso lnga pa'o// / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ mtshan mo'i lha mo 'adz+ra
183a5(1): pa thams cad bsrung ba'i spong lam la brtso pa'i 'od kyi gdams ngag de rjes su drang bar byed cing // byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems cad na thams cad yongs su sbyin par bya bas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba'i
183a6(1): su bskong ba byas nas sum bi ne'i nags ras gyi lAm pa'i brji byed kyil 'khor bamang pos dga' ba'i dpal yus pa ni'i nags ces na ri pa rgya'i la la ga lam sa cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi khyim brtsegs pa zhig na
183a7(1): mer de'i khri ring po che'i mang mo'i snying po ca zhig la 'dug cing chags tshal gyi lha mo khrag khrig brgya stong phrag nyi shu'i 'khongs kyis kun nas bskongs te/ mdun du byas nas chos bston to// byang chub sems dpa'i thams pa / 
183a8(1): kyi skye ba rgya mtsho shing tu bsta dang pa zhes bya ba'i mdo'o sde yongs su bston cing de bzhin gshegs pa 'i rigs kyi rgyud du rigs dang ldan par skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yon tan rgyamatho'i shugs rnam par 'phel
183a9(1): byed cing 'dug pa mthong nas/ yul pa ni'i nags cas rgya nA mo gzi brjid kyi dkyi 'khor bamang pos dga' ba'i ras lha gang na ba der song ste phyir mas sum po mo'i dag sa tshal gyi lha mo ga'i brjid byed kyil 'khod pabang por/ 
183b1(1): dga' ba dasas skyen pa pa gnyis la rgya thos byam 'tshal nas/ mnung tu jug ste mal mo spya nas 'di gad ces smras so// 'ba' mas bdag gis bran byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tha sems bsres
183b2(1): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'byung ba lags pa'ang ma 'jalang / ji ltar na byang chub sems rapa' rnams dmyong ba la skyon cing sems can rnams la sdang ba 'byin par 'gyur ba 'jam 'a
183b3(1): tog re skad ces spras pa dang / yum bi ni'i nags 'tshal gyi lha mo gzi' brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpas gyis/ tshong dpor gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu bcu po 'di dag ni byang chu
183b4(1): sems dpa' rnams kyi skye ba bste/ de dag dang ldanan byang chub sems dpa'i rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skyes pa yin no// de dag sa byu bar byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems kyi skad ces re re la dang / byang chub
183b5(1): sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par 'phel bar gyur te thogs pa da myed pa dang / zhum pa myed pa dang / phyeng ldog pa myed pa dang / rgyar gcod pa skyed pa dang / yongs su bskyob byed pa dang / sgyid lug par 'gyur ba myed pa dang / 
183b6(1): nyams pang 'byung ba byed pa dang / nyas sa par 'gyur ba byed pas yongs pa 'i na par 'byung ba skyed pa dang / chun 'a par 'gyur brtsod gdang / rnams pa babyed pa te tu thogs kyi rjes sras sa ##
183b7(1): 'byung ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la yongs su gzhol par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu yongs su sbyin pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa shin tu yangs par 'gyur ba dang / 
183b8(1): pha rol tu phyind pa thams cad kyis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad las rnam par ldog par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sar yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / ye shes
183b9(1): kyis mngod par shes pa shin du byang par 'byung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos mngon pa 'gyur ba dang /  thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyas byido pa dang ldan par 'byung ba dang / bcu ga de sa di ga byed/ sangs rgyas khams da
183b10(1): bsnyed bkur ba'i smon lam gyil spyor pa'i snying po zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba dang 'a'o//  byang chub kyi sems kyi yam lag yongs su grub par 'gyur ba 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba gcis
184a1(1): chos kyin pa des par gartogs pa'i banag pa'i sbyong ba'i phul sangod tu rgyas pa 'byung ba'i snying po'is bya ba ni byang chub ses pa bu'i skye ga gsum pa'o/  mas sna ba bya
184a2(1): bsam parnam par dag pa'i snying po zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba bzhi pa'o// kun nas sdang ba'i 'od kyi snying po zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba lnga pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rgyud tu 'byung pa'i snying po/ 
184a3(1): zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba drug pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs kyi 'od bsnang ba'i brgyad gyi snying po zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba btsun pa'o// ye shes kyi sgo kun nas rnam par spyad
184a4(1): bas yongs su grub pa 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba brgyad pa'o// chos kyi dbyings sku med pas brgyan pa byed pa'i snying po zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba dgu' pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
184a5(1): sa yongs su gnon pa'i shugs drag po'i snying po zhes bya ba ni byang chubasems dpa'i skye ba bcu pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba dang po// sangs rgyas thams cad la bsnyen bkur ba'i
184a6(1): bkur sti dang / hi sAng dang / mchod pa byed cing bsnyed bkur byed der dgyes par byed la/  zugs 'byung bar myi byed pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal lba pas myi ngoms pa/ sangs rgyas la rim 'gro gyur btsun pa/ sa
184a7(1): rgyam la dga' ba'i shugs kyis rnam par yel ba'i shugs dang ldan pa/ de bzhir gshegs pa mthong bas yos pa'i shugs drag po yongs su bskyes pa de phyen gyi ldog pa'i dad pas bsod nams yos su bsnung ba'i tshe/ de bzhin
184a8(1): gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i tshogs yongs su bsdu ba la bcom zhing sbyor ba rgyun gyi gcor pa yin te/ na/ rigs kyi bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skye ba dang po sangs rgyas thams cad la bsnyen bkur ba'i smon lam gyis
184a9(1): sa'i snying po zhis byab ste/  mams cang ma byed pa nyid phyi chogs dge pa ma pa yongs su 'gyum nga dag par bla par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu la byang chub sem pa pa'i skye ba gnyis pa bya ma kyi sa tsam gyi
184b1(1): lag yongs su grub pa 'gyur ba 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad
184b2(1): yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir/ snying rje chen po'i sems dang / shin tu dgyes par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad bsnyen bkur ba'i sems dang / dngos po thams cad la phangs par myi lci ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
184b3(1): thams cad yongs su bcal pa'i sems dang / thams cad mkhyend pa nyid mngoran tu 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir bshams pa chen po'i sems dang / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i sbyor bas rgyas par gang ba'i phyir byams pa chen po'i sems
184b4(1): rab/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go cha brtan par bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad yongs su myi gtor ba'i sems dang / yeng dag pa ji lta ba bzhi mdu shes pa'i sdang ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir g.yo ladas su myed pa'i sems dang / 
184b5(1): byang chub sems dpa'i lam la nan tan bya ba'i phyir kha 'og tu lus gagrus pa'i sems dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad kyi smong sam dang / ba dkyi 'gas par bya bya'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad sa sku bsku ba byed sems
184b6(1): pa byang chub kyi sems kyi yan lag gi tshogs de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyu shin tu phra ba bsnyed kyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skyes pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ni byang
184b7(1): chub sems dpa'i skye ba gnyis pa byang chub kyi sems kyi yan lag yongs su grub par 'gyur ba 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba gsum brjon
184b8(1): kyi chug nges par bzhag pa 'asbyong ba'i rgyal mdo gyur pa 'byung ba ma rnying ro zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la bya chub sems dpa' chos thams cad kyi tshul rgyam tsha me do co gro nges bar brnogs pas padang/ 
184b9(1): rkyem sa pa dang lda pa thams cad pa byed pa'i las byirnas pa yongs su rdzo 'a bar bya bas sa ngong du bya ga gcigatums pa dang 'i sems dang ldan ga'aras tho ba sbed pa'i las la dag par kun par sesas dpa'i
185a1(1): dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzind kyi tshul rgya mtshor thams cad yongs su dgu par bya bas mngon tu bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan thams can la nan tad bya bas yongs
185a2(1): su grub par bya ba'i sems dang ldad pa// byang chub sems dpa'i lab kyi rgyud thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i sems dang spa ba/ rnams cad pa khye dang pa nyid du dmyigs pa'i chogs kyi chen pa yongs su bsgrub pa yan sa
185a3(1): the 'bar bas kyang rgyur gyi gcod par bzon par bya ba'i sems dang lda pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su spyod par bya ba dang / 'dul bar bya ba la rab tu zhugs pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i dpyod pa kun tu bzang tho 'i 'on par bsgrub pa'i
185a4(1): sems dang ldan pa/ yongs su dmyang ba'i tshul thams cad pa rab tu zhugs pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i yon tad yongs su rdzogs pur bya ba la dngos po thams cung nam par bsgom pas dngos po skyed pa'i rgyal gyungs pa'i sems dang ldan
185a5(1): yir te/ rigs kyi bu 'don byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba gsum pa rlos kyi chus pa sa par shogs pas gzhag pa'i spyod pa'i tshul pa na gyung dpa 'argyang sa sbyin mo zhes bya// dgas kyi su largya
185a6(1): mya ngan pasan/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la sdang pa rab tu thob pa med byang chub sems dpa'i chub rgya ma tshol pa rab tu zhugs pa med/ bas pa btang ba rdo rje'i khams sna bum yongs su zin pa'i sems dang 'anapas
185a7(1): shi du brtan pa yin sred pa'i las kye rgyud du skye ba las phyir phyogs su phyogs pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cadan kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su grub par bya ba la mngor bar gyus pa 'di/ byang chub sems dam
185a8(1): dbang po rnam par spes pa la khyad par du 'bogs pa rab tu thob pa yin na skrag pa'i bsam pa shin tu 'od gsal bar bya ba'i phyir sems shim tu dge ba yin/ smon lam brtan zhing rgya che ba rnam par 'phel bar 'bya ba sa myi gson
185a9(1): ba 'ang/ sgrib pa thams can kyi rnam pa ngan tong ba'i byer de ba'i gshegs pa'i sems dan gyis sang dag par dgongos pa medan/ 'tsho ba bams cad kyi ba ma dza las don rgyas gas kyims
185b1(1): sems rnam pa rnams kyi / byang chub sems rapa'i skye ba ba zhe bcus gsum bsdad par bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i mtsho bas mgon du gyur pa yin te/ rinas kyi bu 'didi byang chub sems dpa' na mas
185b2(1): byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba bzhi pa dus gsum bsdang bar bye ba'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba lnga pa kun nas bslar ba
185b3(1): 'od kyi snying po zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba la rab tu zhugs pas spyod pa phun gsum tshogs pa yin/ sbyin pa skrag par gtong
185b4(1): pas dngos po'i 'du shes thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa yin/ tshul khrims ma thal yas pas mtha' las rgas par rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la bzod pa'i sdang ba rab tu thob las de bzhin gshegs pa'i
185b5(1): sul pa gnas pa'i bzod pa dang lda pa yin thams can mkhyer duni nyid du yadas par 'byung ba la zhugs pas brtson 'phrus chen po dang snang ba yin zho ku du lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyis shes kyi bye yor nas
185b6(1): par dag pas bsam gtan la rab tu brtsod pa yin/ chos bsdang ba thams tshang rab tu thob las shes rab kyi mthu'i 'od dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas lta ba'i rgya mtsho'i rnam par dmyigs par bya ba la zhugs pas thog
185b7(1): babyed pa'i dbyig dang ldan pa yin/ 'jig rten thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pas chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid la dbar sgyur bas spros pa yin/ chos kyi tshul yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du thob par bya ba la rab tu brtsod pa
185b8(1): yin te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba lnga pa kun nas snang ba'i 'od kyi snying po zhes bya ba'o// rims kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i
185b9(1): skye ba drug pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rgyud du 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'byung ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud skyes pa
185b10(1): yin/ tshul gyi sgo thams cad la shin tu grub pa yin/ 'das pa dang ma byod pa dang / da ltar byung pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi smon las chen po la rnam par dag pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i sa pa
186a1(1): ba la rang bzhin gcig pa'i dge la'i cha bar gyur pa yin/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang lus gcig tu gyur pa yin/ chos dkar pos 'jig rten gzhan du 'gro ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi byin rlabs yongs su/ 
186a2(1): kA bstan ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bdag nyid che ba'i chos kyis rnam par 'apyod pa yin/ dus la hUM ltar 'bab pa bzhin du sems can rnam par dag par bya ba'i chos la zhugs pa yin sangs rgyas kyi chom yongs su dris lal spobs pa'i rgyas
186a3(1): myi chad pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba drug pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rgyud du 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'
186a4(1): rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba bdun pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs kyi 'od bsnang ba'i rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba gang zhe na// rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi stobs
186a5(1): la 'jug pa'i bsnang bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba las phyir myi ldog go/ byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rgya mtshol las phyiramyi 'gyur ro// chos thams cad sgru ba'i rnam pa ltar yang dag pa rje tu
186a6(1): lta ba bzhin du shes par bya ba la gnas pas yongs su yi chad par myi 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad rmyi lam lta bur rab tu rtogs pa ra byed de/ yagazugs su rnam par dmyigs pa'i gnas thams ca
186a7(1): gzugs brnyar lta bur mdong bar bsgrub do// mngon par shes sos rnam par 'phrul pa sru lang pa lta bus dbang rab tu thob par byed do// srid pa thams cad du skye ba'i sgrib ma lta bur gdong rab tu bston to/ de bzhen
186a8(1): bshegs pa thams cad kyi ros kyi 'tshe lo sgra brtan lta bur rab tu shes so// thabs kyi tshul don sna tshogs dang ldan pa la rab tu brtson pas chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rab tu bstan pa la pha rol tu phyind pa dam bu thob pa yin te/ 
186a9(1): rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba btsun pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs kyi 'od bsnang ba'i rgyad kyi snying po zhes bya ba'o// rigs kyi bu des byang chub sems dpal
186a10(1): rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba brgyad pa ye shes kyi sgo kun nas rnam par pyad pas yongs su grub par 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba gang zhe dang / rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nur gyur cing / byang chub sems
186b1(1): raba'i rnab par 'god pa la rnam par gnas pa yin te/ de la gnas nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kye rus la rnam par 'apyod de// ye shes kyi grub kyi sgo res 'ang byang chub sems rapa'i khyod yul chad myed par yongs su
186b2(1): stong nga pas/ bskalang ba tshad myed pa zad par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzidang thams cad la 'ang pha rolas tu phyir pa'i dam pas dbang sbyar te/ sems kyi skad ceg re re zhing sems kyi skad ceg thams cad la'
186b3(1): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod byed pa rab na bzhugs pa'i de bzhi gshegs pa rnams kyi zhabs kyi drung du skyes te/ dbyims pa la myi dad pas/ mtha' myi dang pa ting nge 'arjid pa snyoms par 'jug no// la mye dad pa'i chos
186b4(1): rnamams ma dang pa'i senas kyang ba ma 'ongs su btsud to// dbyigs nga bu 'dzod du byed pa dag kyang bsgrib pa byed pa'i dbyis su yongs su mngon par byeste/ dmyeg pa pa rgyang+yas bya mipa 'alas par bstad pa'i sa ma nga
186b5(1): su 'ju go/ chos nyid tshad byed pa'ang chung 'am che bar khong du chud par med ge byed do// 'jig rten thams cad kyang rnam par dmyigs pa dang / mnyam par rab srung rtogs par byed do// chos kyi dmyigs pa thams cad dang / rnam par
186b6(1): shem pa'i rgyud thams cad bsgom pas khong du chud myangar byed de/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba brgyad pa yongs kyi sgo kun nas rnam par byang bam yongs su chum
186b7(1): ba 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba dgu pa chos kyi dbyings stsald pas brgyan pa byed pa'i snying po zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang
186b8(1): chub sems dpa' sems kyi skad cig thams cad la rgyan snga tshogs dang / rgyan du mar ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing byin gyis rlob ste/ skul pa thams cad la myi 'jigs pa'i pha ros tu phyin pa'i dam pa thob pa yin/ 
186b9(1): sangs rgyas kyi rdul ba thams cad la shin tu mkhas par byung ba yid/ chos kyi skulang ba sa kyi 'jigs pa rnam yar dag pa yin chos kyi dbyings das pa chags pa byed pa'i khyod yul dang ldan pa zhing / bsam brgya/ 
186b10(1): sta ba bzhin cu sems cad kye lus rnam par dmyigs par bya ba'i byin gyi rlabs pa la mkham pa yin/ sems can 'dul ba la mkhas pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang ldan pa yin/ dmyong ba sna tshogs kyis mthong bar bached
187a1(1): ga ga brgyab yongs su bstond pa yin/ byamams cad mkhyed pa nyid kyi lam bsgrib pa skyed pa mngon patha sgrub pas mkhas pa yin da/ de tud rgyaza ba bye tharas rgyab kyi 'khor po rnor pa
187a2(1): mkhas pa yongs su bstod pa yin/ sems can mtha' dang dpung byed pa gdul ba'i thabs mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa yin/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi ye shes kyi dbyig rtsa bya ba'i mdzod dang ldan pas/ sems can
187a3(1): 'dul ba'i dus la ba brda/ rtag tu dang gon tu gnas pa yin te// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye bar gu pa chos kyi dbyings sprul pas brkyang ba byed pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'o// 
187a4(1): rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba bcu pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa yongasu gnod pa'ishugs drag po'i snying po zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub
187a5(1): sems dpa' phu gsum gi de bzhir gshegs pa thams cad dang rang bzhin gcig pa'i lus la dbang skur ba yin te/ 'jig rtenakyi khams thams cad 'dab chags pa'i yul gA 'jug pa yin/ 
187a6(1): sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang / phye ma'i mtha'i mchi 'pho dang / skye ba'i sems rgyud 'chags par 'byung ba 'ang rab tu shes so/  byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye shes 'ad
187a7(1): chags pa'i yul yang rab tu shes so// 'das pa dang ma byor dang / rad ltar 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya pa 'dab chags pa'ang rab tu shes so// chos thams cad kyi rlung
187a8(1): 'dab 'chags pa la mkhas par bya ba yang rab tu shes so// bskasad pa 'jigs pa dang 'bye ba thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / ra ltar 'byung ba rnams kyang mying dang bcas sa tshigs
187a9(1): dang bcas par 'dab chags par rab tu shes so// sems cad dang tshul ji lta bur yongs su sbyin par byas pa dang / rus la gang tu bab pa rnams la mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya pa'i rgyan dang / rnam par 'chang brgyabs/ 
187a10(1): gdul bar bya ba yongs su bstand pa'i byin kyi rlabs kyi ye shes kyang mngon par bsgrub bo// sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad mngon par 'chang brgya pa'i drung du nye bar 'gro zhing / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la mkhas
187b1(1): pa'i chug bdab chags pa'ang sems nyid kyi khams mtha' dang dbung byed pa 'dul ba'i thags mngon par bsgrub pa mkhas pas yongs su bstond to//  k+She / rigs kyi bu 'di'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye sa bcudapa
187b2(1): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa yongs su gdod pa'i thugs drag po'i snying po zhes bya ba'o// rigs kyi bu de dag de byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba bcu rnams te/ de dag gis byang chub sems dra ba'i rnams skye ba
187b3(1): 'byung ba'o// 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o// yang dag par bsgrub par byed pa'o// yang dag par 'phel par byed pa'o// rab tu rdzogs par byed pa'o// yongs su sus par byed pa'o// zhims sus pa thams cad yong du drud par bya ba'i rkye
187b4(1): rgyu can po lda sdub kyi myed nas pa sna'ogs byed kyi rlob / sems cad kye 'das 'dus brgyan byegs ba'i byer byi ma'i ma ba'i bags pa'i bu dazhug par byed kyis rlams kyis rgyur ca bskyed pa'o// rtsas kyi bye mtsho bams pa
187b5(1): kyi dbyigs pa sna tshogs dang / shim tu bstar bcig nas gcig turgyud pa lnga tshogs byas rnas pa pa dad pa dang / chos mtha' yas pa gcig dang dus gcig tu byung ba'i rgyun mngon bar 'tshang brgya bar byed pa'o/ #
187b6(1): kyi khyu mchog gi mthu 'byung ba bsam gyis myi khyab pa chos kyi dbyings kyis bkras pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas tugs pa yongs su de bston pa'o// sems cam tshad byed pa 'apyod pa rgya mtshol sna chog pa dang / 
187b7(1): sngar bar yongs su spyo rang bar bya ba dang / 'dul pas yongs su 'dus po rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo bskong ba yongs su bstod pa'o// sems tshar gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang kyi 'bral bar byin gyis
187b8(1): rlob pa'o// chos thams cad kyi stem dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho brjod du byed pas rnam par bdag par myigs pa thams cad las rab tu 'byung ba rnam par byed do/ tshad myed par rnam par myod pa la bsgribs pa byed par rtogs pa
187b9(1): rdzing du chung pa'i rnam pa chos yid du 'ong ba'i rgyad thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil/ 'khor bsam pa dang mos pa gang dang ldan pa'i rdul bzhin du sems cang rnams su yongs su bston pa'o// sangs rgyas kyis tshang / 
187b10(1): byed pa'i rjes su song ba'i rnams/ 'jig rten thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa'i don du/ chos kyi mdzod mtha' dang dpung myed pa rab tu bstond pa'o// de nas sum bi ni'i nags tshal gyi lha mo gzil brjid kyi dkyis 'khor bzang pos
188a1(1): dmal pa'i dpal nis ri'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi dong 'di nyid pasas par 'arjod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin kyi rlabs kyis phyogs brgyar rnam par bskas te chong dpon gyi bu nong bcas
188a2(1): khatsigs su bcan de smras pa/ skrag pa'i bsam pa bri myed rnyog pa byed pa'i na/ sapa rnams rgyal ba'i lta bas rang yang gyi ngogs shing / rgyal ba gud kyi phyi ma'i mtha'i rgyar phrin ka smod pa'i mnyam pa re dan bye ba'i zin/ 
188a3(1): ma ras/ tus gsum 'byung ba mi 'jig rtenas lus kun bkang pa ste// zhing dang sems cad de pa ni chos ra sangs rgyas rnam pa// sems can dkrol phying spon sam 'debs pas brgyad pa'i sem sa nga // de ni thasam
188a4(1): gyis phyi khyab rnams kyi skye ba gnyis// gang nas chos kyi srin 'thun nam yang maphyi ngoms shing // nges par rtogs pa'i yid kyis chus s+ho buM chags byed sus/ mkha' dbyings dri byed mnyam myed sems kyi ru
188a5(1): dang ldan pa/ mtshungs pa myed pa de ni de dag skye ba gsuM// A ga pI bsam pa re rab rdo rje mtshungs brtan pas// thams cad mkhyen tshul rgya mtshor rnam par 'jum byed cing / gab rnams snying rje chen po'i gang chen
188a6(1): mtshor 'jug pa/ de ni skyes bu lha mchog rnams kyi skye ba bzhi/ gang rnams byams pas phyogs bcu rgyas par yongs bkang zhing/ pha rol bye dad pa dri myed rgya mtsho mngor bsgrubs te/ chos kyi 'od 'byed 'gro / 
188a7(1): yongs su sbyin byed pa/ de ni skyes bu chen po de dag skye ba lnga// chos kyi rang bzhin rab tu rtogs pas 'chags myer sems/ byas gsum dbe' zla myed pa'i sangs rgyas rigs 'byung zhing // gapa rnams chos dbyings rgya mtsho'i tshu/ 
188a8(1): 'jug byed pa/ 'di mi mkhas pa de dag skye ba yangs pa drug/ gang rnams chos lus yongs dag chags pa myed pa'i sems// zhing rnams ma lus rang gi lus kyis dgar byas shing sangs rgyas bstobs rnams ma lus khong / 
188a9(1): rgya chung rtogs pa// de ni mkhas pa rnams kyi byas pa yas brgyang / yang rnams ye shes rgya mtsho'i rgyal la dbang ldan zhing // thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgo tshul rnam par dpyod byed pa/ ting nge 'dzin kun tshul gang chen mcho la yon
188a10(1): 'jug pa/ de ni de bzhin nyid brten rnams kyi skye ba brgyad// gas rnams zhing kun 'byams klas yongs su spyod byed cing // sems can thams cad yongs su spyid byed 'dus rab bcoms sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrur
188b1(1): ba'i rgyad rnams ram stor pa// de sa grags pa chen po rnams kyi skye ba dkur// gang rnams rgyas pa'i goms rnam mji bzhi sa bzhugs te// thams ca sa phyin pa'i thugapa drag yangs pa nas spes zhing / gnams/ 
188b2(1): chos dbyis pa ni tshul ba dang chags byed pa/ de tu sras rnams kyi skye babacu yin no// rigs kyi bu bskye ba bcu po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skye'o// de ltar na 'jig ce tham
188b3(1): chud la bsdang bar byed pa yin no// rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/ ska lad pa tshad skyed par dbyigs pa thams cad tu/ byang chub sems dpa'i skye bas rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su stond pa thob pa'o// smras pa 'ang na
188b4(1): pa byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par tha rad pa bskald pa tshad myed par dmyigs pa/ thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i skye bas rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston pa 'di'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis// smras pa rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub
188b5(1): sems dpa'i thams cad kyi skye ba yongs su lta zhing nye bar 'gro ba'i spom/ lam yongs su grub pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi skye ba rgya mtshol shi na tu yangs pa la 'jug cing khong du/ 
188b6(1): chung ba ste/ 'di sa stong gisgyus gyi sto cher ba'i 'as ted kyi khamasa'adi bye du ba sems dpa'i skye ga'od chung bar byed bring ban nashegs pa dang lda ba'i 'ad mtha'i gling 'di'i/ sul po dag pa rangatu/ 
188b7(1): byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba yongs su lta ba'i don tu sngon gyi smon lam gyis skyes te/ de ltar kho mo 'di na byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba'i rjes su dran kha sgom zhing rnam par spyod do// de ltar kho mo 'di na gnas te dbyin chad
188b8(1): 'o brgyan/ bcom ldan ldan 'das dpa' ldan gyi 'pho brang nas 'pho bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tsheyum po ni'i nags tshal 'dir sngon gyi bltas bcu byung bar gyur te/ bcu gar zhe na 'di ltar sum bi ni'i nags chas 'di
188b9(1): thams cad mthon man byed la/ ngam grog dang / g.yangs byed cing mnyam par gnas par gyur pa'i 'di ni sngoran gyi lhas dang po 'byung ba'o// yang yul bi ni'i nags tshal 'di thams cad gsemam dang gyo mo myed pa/ sdod tum dang
188b10(1): cher ma dang bral to/ sa'i gzhi rdo rje las grub par gyur da nas/ rin po che mang pos yongs su gang lang gnas par gyur da pa 'di ni sngon gyi bltas gnyis pa 'gyur ba'o// yang yum bi ne'i nags tshab 'di 'ams cad/ ring po che bams cad/ 
189a1(1): kyi shing dang / pa la dang / ta ma'i phreng bas rnam pade 'grigs pas yongs su brgya par kun nas gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni sngon gyi bltas gsum pa 'byung ba'o// yang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'di thams cad rdzun
189a2(1): las kyang 'das pa'i spos kyi myig gu kun nas mthon pa dang / phye ma thams cad kyi mdzod kun nas 'thon pa dang / rgyas mtshan thams cad kyi srin dang / dbun yongs su 'byung ba dang / spos kyi rin po che'i gzugs kyi sa zhing chung kun nas 'khor te/ rgyan pa / 
189a3(1): du sbyang sa pang dur nas gnas yar byung ba 'di ni sngon gyi bskus pazhi ba 'byung ba'o// yang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'di thams cad lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / phreng ba dang / snab grub sna tshogs kyi mdzod rnam pazas macu yongag su rgyas pa dang ldar bar ku
189a4(1): nas gnas par gyur ra pa 'di ni sngon gyi bltas lnga pa 'byung ba'o// yang kum po ri'i nags tshal 'di thams cad kyi shed thams cad la nong bu ring po che'i dam pa'i mdzod mdong bar grub par gyur pa 'dir sngon gyi bsus drug pa'o/ yang bum bi ni'i
189a5(1): rags chub 'di thams cad kyi pad mo'i tshal thams cad du chu las skyes pa'o me tog thams cad kyang khu 'bus te/ sa gzhi las 'thon nas chu lasta yang mngon par 'phags par gnas pa 'di ni bsngon gyi sgras bcun ga 'byung ba'o// 
189a6(1): yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'da'i 'dod pa pa spyod pa dang / gzugs myod pa'i sa'i burnams dang / sku bangag dod byin dang / dris dang / lham yi dang / gyi 'am chi dang / lto byi chen po dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po la ba
189a7(1): 'gro ba'i dbang po ci snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad yang yum pa ni'i dgas tshal 'dim pa la mo spyad cing 'khod par gyud te/ 'dini bsngor gyi bltas brgyad pa 'byung ba'o// yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi 'jig rten gyi khams 'de'i ldan
189a8(1): bu mo 'am/ klu'i bu po 'am/ gnod spyid dang / dri za dang / ska ma yid dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto bye chen po'i bu mo ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang rab tu dgra' ba'i yid kyis/ mchod pa'i rnam
189a9(1): pa tham sa cad lag thogs shing dablag sha'i yal ga la mngon tu ltas te 'dud cing phyag 'tshal bar 'khod pa gyu da pa 'di ni bsngon gyi bltas dgu' pa/ 'byung ba'o// yang phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i lte ba'i dkyil ladz+ra
189a10(1): dag zhes byang chub sems dpa'i skye bas rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i 'od zed dmar po mthon te/ yum bi ni'i nags 'tshal 'di thams cad snang bar byas nas gnas par gyur te/ 'od zer gyi sgo'i dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad
189b1(1): 'ang de ba 'i gshegs pa dedas thams cad kyi skye bas nas par 'phrul pa gzugs d+had bgyu par bzung ba dang / thegs snyam pa'i rnam ya zhus pa dang mas par byang chum sems dpa' yod ta sa sas kyang / 
189b2(1): sa ma tha bye pa phe byasas dpa / ma pa ma yas su lus
189b3(1): spang ba gyur te/ sa ba seMrnas pa ma po sa /  ya gru tu/  se ma pa' ma sa skyes
189b4(1): bcab cad kya bum mo ni 'dags rtsa ning snang ba byal te/ ngo na ho// phyongs bdu byang chu sems dpa 'a rnams/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams nasab cu do pa'i 'angs pa bung na 'o/ 
189b5(1): bdas kyang ma pa bad pa // byags bcu byang chu sems dpa' dmas pa ro gyis sa ga ngas su bsgru 'i zhes song chud pa'i snang ba'i 'ang bas kyi yod pa kya na
189b6(1): 'dir 'byung bar gyur to// phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams spod lam thams cad la dbang spyad pa'i ye shes snang ba'i 'od ci snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang chu po 'i mnams 'dir 'byung bar gyu tu/ phyogs rgya
189b7(1): sems dpa' rnams smon las rgya cheran po mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes sdang ba'i 'od ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang lum bi ni nags tshal 'dir 'byung bar gyur to// phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba
190a1(1): dang / 'dul ba byed pa'i ye shes snang ba'i 'od ci snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang yum bi ni'i nags tshal 'dir 'byung bar gyu dad to// phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyi
190a2(1): A ni ye shes khong du chud pa'i snang ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang sum bi ni'i nags tshal 'dir 'byung bar gyur to// phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul ba dang / skye ba dang mngon par 'byung ba dang
190a3(1): byang chub tu 'tshang brgya pa dang / ye shes thugs su chud par mdzad pa'i 'od ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'dir 'byung bar gyur to// sngon gyi bltas bsnur ba chen po bcu po de dag rab tu 'byung bar gyur na te/ de dag gi sems can
190a4(1): mtha' dang dbur myed pa'i sems dang / bsam pa'i mun pa'i thibs po thams cad kyang rab tu snang bar byas so// rigs kyi bu re la lha mo sgyu ma shing blag sha'i nags dang su phyin pa'i tshe sa 'jig rten gyi dbang po 'argyas pa thams cad dang / 'dod
190a5(1): ba'i khams kyi lha'i bu'i lha mo'i tshogs dang / lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas te 'dus pa thams cad dang / gzugs kyi dpyod pa'i lha'i bu dri ra ba myedagrwa nye ba thams cad dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / 'dre za dang / lha ma yin dang / 
190a6(1): nam ya bar ldeng dang / gyi 'am ce dang sngo phye chen po'i 'khor dang bcas sa// tshogs pa byang chub sems dpa' la mchod par bcon pa thams cad kyi 'dus dang / mchod pa'i tshogs thams cad kyang lha mo smra ma'i 'chi brjid dang
190a7(1): ras sA/ kha dog dang / gzugs kyis rab tu snang bar byas so/ stong gsu gyi god chen po la 'jig rted gyi khams 'din 'od gang ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang zil tu drag par gyur da te/ ris kyis mnan to//  mo sgyu ma'i ba spu'i rno
190a8(1): cad nas 'byung ba'i 'od dang / snang ba dag ni 'od gzhan gyis nyams par gyur pa myed bsgribs par gyur da myed/ chod pa gyur pa myed/ thogs par gyur dpa myed de/ des phyogs thams cad rgyas par bkang nas/ sems can dmyal
190a9(1): pa'i sdug sngang mas cad dang byol song gi skye bam kyi bsdug sAl thaM sa nan rA/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug sngal thams cad dang / srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud du rtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi bsdug bsngal thams cad dang / nyon mongs
190a10(1): pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byas te/ lhan ne/ sA sa me/ skang der gnas par gyur to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba'i rnam par 'phral pa sum bi ni'i nags tshal du byung ba dang po'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gang
190b1(1): ni yi mo smra ba'i lum bu da nga gsum gyi rko na po'i 'jig rten gyi 'ams 'di rung cing gzugs brtan 'byung ba snang bar byangadapa de'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rted gyi khams kyi sring bzhi pa'i 'jig tod gyi khams bye ba phrag da/ 
190b2(1): 'jas bu'i gling thams cad kyi rgyam po'i gnas kyang lnga tshogs dang ldan bshasag dang / nags 'das phying snga chogs dang lda pa ga stag dang / shing drung rnam pa pa dang pa ga stag bu'ang sgo sgom phyin cing 'jig rten gyi dbang po tham sad kyis
190b3(1): yongs su bskorang te byang chub sems dpa' skye ba la ste gong du sdod cing / byang chub sems dpa'i yus gyi ye shes kyi rnam par 'phrul bsam gyis kyi khyab pas rnam pa 'di bzhin du snang bar gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di byang / 
190b4(1): chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul ba u bo ri'i dgas chas du 'byung ba gnyis pa'o// 5// rigs kyi bu gzhanas pa na mo sgyu ma'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad / ba spu'i sgo re re la 'ang sngon byang chub sems raba'i pyod pa mangs
190b5(1): sasas kyi na na te/  tho sa ma ba sa sos sa s+ho// 
190b6(1): de bzhi gshegs pa den mamatsho ba'i snyed kyis bstad pa de dag mam kyang / baspu'i bu ga dengs dang/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung gisan rnamapa sa skyes gdang lda bar phran par gyur te/ dbyed chu bong su su du 'am/ 
190b7(1): daser gyi chul tshwa mo 'am/  khye long gid dkyis 'khor shi matugs sa pa 'am/ mya shin tu dang pas nas ma' 'ad kyil 'khor nyi zla dang / ga'a'agar gyi mtshogs kyis rab tu brgyar ba dang / 'phrin gyi tshogs 'breg sgamab po 'byed / 
190b8(1): bcam 'ang gzugs brnyam du gyurang bar bsdar ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du lha mo sgyu ma'i ba su'i sgo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la'ang sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba rnams kyang yongs su bsdang / chosas bstun pa'i sgra thams
190b9(1): da kyang grag par byung te// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyo ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa sum bi ni'i rags tshal du 'byung ba gsum pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang snam sgyu ma'i lus zam pa cad dang ba spu'i rnam
190b10(1): dkyil 'khor thams cad las bcu'i sgong deras kyang zhing ji rnyed cig dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ji snyed cig dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam bzlas pa ci snyed cig dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gyur/ 
191a1(1): / ci snyed cig dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi myir du bya ba ci snyed cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyis pasngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad de/ zhing kye gzhi ci lta bu zhig dang ldan par gyu rad pa dang / dbyibs ni
191a2(1): se 'dra ba dang / rgya rje lta bu zhig dang ldan par gyu pa dang / sun ni ji lta bu zhig dang ldan par byudad pa dang / ri'i rgyan je lta bu dag cig yod par gyu dad pa dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / yul dang / grong rdas kyi rgyan ni ji lta budan
191a3(1): cig gnas pa dang / bza' shing zhir ba dang / mcho dang / su mdang rgya mtsho'i rkyen ni ji lta bu zhig dang ldan par gyu rad pa dang / nam mkha' dang / 'phrin gyi gyad no rje lta bu zhig dang ldan par gyu da pa dang / sems can gyi gnas ni ji lta bu
191a4(1): zhig yod par gyur pa dang / theg pa bstan pa ni gang dang ldan par gyur pa dang / bskald pa'i mying dang / grangs mi ce snyed cig ces bya bar gyu dad pa dang / sangs rgyas skye ba ni ci snyed ceg byung bar gyur pa dang / rnam par dag pa ni gang tu 'du
191a5(1): bar gyung pa dang / sems cad gyi tshe'i chang ritsa bzhig dang ldan par gyur pa dang /  'jig rten gyi skye sanas ni ga tu skyes par gyur pa dang / sems cad naM/ ji lta bu zhig dang 'phrogs 'grogs pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnan/ 
191a6(1): ring rta thamig nyer dang / dag 'ji tu gshegapa ma / phyid byed cingacho gyur da bu men gongs / bya ba sel myo pa khyod stong sas kyi byin/ 
191a7(1): ri dag thams cad yongs su bsnang bar gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byed sbyi ldog pa'i gnas brnyed nas/ sngon sku ni ji snyed cig rnam par myod pa rjes bu zhig/ cha byad ni ji lta bu zhig/ longs spyod ni ci dang ldan
191a8(1): bde' ba dang bsdug snga la ni rje sa bu zhig sku nyams su bzhes/ spu'i tshe'i rgyud ni ji lta bu zhig dang ldan par gyur te/ sngor byang chub sems dpa'i myong ba spyad par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas yongs su bsdar pan
191a9(1): gyur tor sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyi skye gnas de dang de dag tu ga po sgyu ma / byang chub sems dpa'i yum du gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sku de dag thams cad kyang spra mo sgyu ma'i ba su'i sgo thams cad du rnam pa
191a10(1): 'phrul pa'i gzugs brnyan 'byung bar gyur te// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba'i rnaM pA 'phrul ba sum bi ni'i nags tshal du 'byung ba bzhi pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sgor sku re ji snyed
191b1(1): cig gis byang chub sems dpa'i myod pa daskyed pa dang / kha dog ni ngas bu zhigadabyibs ni ci 'dra ba zhig/ rma byad de ji lta bu zhig/ da rod de ji lta bu zhig/ yo nA pyod na ci dang ldan/ bde rab tu sdug bsngal ni ji lta bu zhig
191b2(1): sku nyams su bzhes/ sku tshe'i rgyud ni ji lta bu zhig dang ldar par gyu rang pa de dag thams cad kyang / zhwa mo sgyu ma'i lus kyis ba spu'i sgo thams cad kyang/ lha mo sgyu ma'i lus kyi ba spu'i lus kyi ba spu'i sgo thams cad la gzugs bcung
191b3(1): rtsa snang bar gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' skye ba rnam par 'phrul pa yum li ni'i nags tshal du byung ba lnga pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das sngor byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe/

191b5(1): pa 'am sha dang khrag yongs su btang ba 'am/ rus pa dang rkang yongs desu btang ba dang / mkhal ma dang / thugs yongs su bta ba 'a ba pangs pa dang / pri yongs su btang ba 'am/ byi nang /

191b7(1): rang / byi ru dang / gser dang / dngul yongs su btang ba 'am/ rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs yongs su gtang ba 'am/ ma la ca yongs su gtang ba 'am/ khar pa dang gzhal myed khang yongs su gtang ba'am/ yo byad yongs
191b8(1): su gtang ba dang / re ltar gtor ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i sku gzugs dang / rnam pa ji lta bur yongs su gyu da pa dang / spen pa de dag kyang rnam pa ji lta bu sa sem par gyur nga ba dang / sbyir pa'i dngos po rnam pa ji lta bu dang
191b9(1): yongs su gtang bar gyur pa dang / yul gyi phyogs ga padag tu yongs su gtang bar gyur pa dang / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor du gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang lha mo sgyu ma'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad las gzugs brnyan du
192a1(1): snang bar gyur rtso/ spongs po pa'i sgra de dag kyang grag par gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di'i byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa sum 'i mi'i dgas chal tu 'byung ba drug pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzham
192a2(1): yang sdong gyis pa'i drung tu 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sum gyi sunas bsam par gyu dang pa de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyad dang / sngab sbub ci snyed cig 'byung yar gyur pa dang / sems cad kye rgyan rnam par bye ba dang / 
192a3(1): gza' shing gi brgyad rngam par phye ba dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang // phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / nam bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi rgya rnam par bye ba dang /

192a5(1): pa'i tshe/ yum bi ni'i chags tshal 'dir yongs su 'byung bar gyurd to// mngon par bskyes so// 'gro bas rnam par dmyigs su yod par 'byung khar gyur te// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dbu skye ba'i rnam par
192a6(1): 'phrul pa/ sum bi ni'i nag sa tsha du 'byung ba brtan pa'o// / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod lha'i dbang po thams cad kyi rgyan gyi longs spyod las yongs su 'das pa dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / 
192a7(1): mang sa kyang dang / rang ma tho rgyal pa'i gnas ngan 'das spyod du/ ra ma tha rgyal pa 'jas yongs spyod dang / napa byung mo 'acu pos myongasan pa gyu 'ang rna rgya

192b1(1): lus las byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya pa stong gi rdus shin du phra ba snyed/ bcom ldan 'das rngam par sngar mdzad dang / sku gzugs dang sku mdog dang / dbyibs 'dra ba mtshan dang / dpel

192b4(1): kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bsnyam par gyur pa'i dus la zab pa dang / lha so sgyu ma lemadun tu 'og gi rdo rje'i gzhir yas sa chen po mngon par brtol te/ rim po che'i rgyal po'i pang mo chen po'i ring po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyi
192b5(1): das pa zhes bya ba chub rin po che'i rgyal po gzhan gyis mye thub pa'i rdo rje chenapo las grub pa ring po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i nang rim dpa rdzun pa/ ze' ma'i che so ring po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyis brgyad pa/ 
192b6(1): 'dab ma'i phreng ba sangs rgyas kyi zheng bcu'i rtsa lazhi na thu pra pa snyed kyis brgyan cing shin tu rnam par bya ba la// mo'i dkyi 'khor ring po che'i rgyus po sna tshogs kyis byas pa snying po mengs pa/ ring po che'i ming ba ning
192b7(1): kyis rnam par dag pa dang sdang ba/ ze ba'i phreng ba rnam par bye ba ring po che thams cad kyi kha dogs tshad byed pa dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po grangs myed pa'i dra ba'i rgyan dang ldan pas yongs su yog pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po rdo rje/ 
192b8(1): mthu'o ches myi shigs pas snyun kun nas bkab pa/ lha'i rigs thams cad kyis thams cad kyis kun nas bskord pa/ klu'i dbang po thams cad kyis spos chu'i sprin gyi mngon par 'dabab pa/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po thams cad kyis kun nas
192b9(1): bsgo rang cing lha rdzas kyi me tog snyim pa nas gtor ba/ dri za'i dbang po thams cad kyis sngon gyi sangs rgyas la rim 'gror byas pa'i glu'i dbyangs bsnyen cing yid du 'ong ba'i ra ro dang sbyar te/ bstod pa'i sprin gyis mngon par stong pa
192b10(1): lha la yin gyi dbang po thams cad kyis nga rgyal dang / rlom pa dang / dregs pa thams cad btang zhing shin tu btud de phyag bya ba/ nam mkha' lding gyi dbang po thams cad kyis rim po che'i snga ma bu kun tu sbyangs te/ nas mkha' kun nas
