195b1(1): ses pa dang nga byung pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'thung ba'irnas par 'grub pa rnams kyang mngar du gyur par ka'o// de bani gshegs par byad nas kyang yon pa byed de/ de bzhi gshegs par da mis kyang tshos bska sa byon to/ 
195b2(1): chol la yang mnyer pa'i chos kyis nan tad du byed do// de nas sum pi ni'i nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi'i brjid kyi dkyis 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal gyis de'i cha byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par tha rad pa bskal patshad byed par
195b3(1): dmyigs pa thams cad du/ byang chub sems dpa'i skye bas rnas par 'phrul pa yongs su stond pa 'di bas la bar ba stand pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi thabs kyis phyog pa jung rnam par bskas te/  tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
195b4(1): smrab po// rim 'phro bskyed cing nga sa gang 'dri ba// de dag bdag las rgyal pa'i sras nyon cig/ rgyal pa'i khyod yul lha dka' bzhi pa ste// rgyu dang rkyen kye tshul gyis rnam par bstan// zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul dran rab bstod kyi/ 
195b5(1): brjod kyi bskal la bsam kyis myi khyab dran// bskal pa'i myid ni sa phyi mnyam zhes bya// de la rgyab pa bye ba brgyad bcu byung // bskasang nga pa'i dang por de bzhin gshegs byung ba/ dbang phyug yon tad rgyas mchan ro// 
195b6(1): dam pa'i 'od/ 'jig rten dbang pos bdag gi dbang du bzhag// gang zag dam pa par du bzhag mtshol yang / de'i skye mug nges par rtse nus te/ bas ma yas de la g.yas dang g.yon du yang a ltas shing mtha' rnyed mthong
195b7(1): b.ram gyurd to// mtshang rab bzang po des ni yongs su brgyan// dri phyed sku ba ldan rab sdug ste/ rim cer gzugs 'dra ba dag gipa mthor gyuras nas dga' ba'i thugs dras mtshung pa myed rnam par 'phel// de'i mam
195b8(1): tan dpag yas sems sems nas/ kho mo'i bsod nams rgya mtsho la dpag myed 'phel// de'i rnam 'phrul rgya mtsho' mthong gyur nas// rgya chen byang chub sems kyang skyes par gyur// rgyal pa'i legs pa'i rgya mtshol
195b9(1): dga' smon nas// smon lam rgya mtshol bdag gis rab tu bskyed// 'byas kAl zhing rnams thams cad rnam par sbyangs/ ngan song las nga rnams kun kyang rnam par zlog/ zhing rnams 'byes bkras kun gyi bde'i gshegs
196a1(1): nams// su byon bsam gyis myi khyab mchod pa dang // sems can sdug sAl rnam par grol ba'i phyir// smon sam rgya mtsho 'a kho mos btab par gyur // mgon po de dag las bdag gis
196a2(1): cho thos nas// rnas pa dang dam pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di yang thob// bskal pa zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul snyen du// pyad pa spyad de de yang rnam par sbyangs// de la 'dzin po che snyed byar gyur pa// re rag sa sras bdag ste/ 
196a3(1): kun kyang mchod// rnam zar rgya mtsho la 'di ni spyod byed cing // de dag bstan pa kho mas yongs su bzung // zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul phran rab bsnyed kyi// stobs bcul mnga' ba ci snyed 'das 'byung ba// de dag chos
196a4(1): kyi thong mams 'azung // nas yad kyis ni thong di yang rab tu bsgoms// sangs rgyas zhing gi dras phrang ji srid pa// rdul che 'byab klas kun sa rnam par 'ayod// chus srang de pa 'ang rgyas tsha zhing / sla tu
196a5(1): ba byas pa pe tu mdong // 'a rnams khyab 'gras de dag sud kyas mgong po thas brgya cig la bsam yas pa'i// nas gas las pa yongs su sto nga mdza ces nanas mas mtshan / 
196a6(1): 'khrungs kyu nga bdag gis mthong // rgyas pa la la zhing rnams sa byang chub dam par 'tshang rgya rmugs dgongs shing // dga' lda 'jig rten nyid na 'azhugs pa yang // zhing rnabs bye ba lasaH/ ##
196a7(1): gyis kye khyab bo// zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i dbyings su rnam 'phrul ba // shi nang tu yangs pa skye ba yang bdag gis mthong // ma byed dam pa'i tshogs kyi dbus bzhugs zhing // mgon po chos rnams paston
196a8(1): ba'ang de bzhin mthong // ni rnams bye ba'i rgyal tham rab snyed kyi// sa' bo sems kyi skad cig me so// mngong bar byung zhing shing rgyas tu gshegs pa dang / sangs rgyas khyod yul 'das paskor pa mthong // ni / 
196a9(1): rgyal la bams kyis bye khyab par// yul rnams gzhan dang gzhang dag bston mdzad pas// 'gro rgyud sems cad bsug sngal 'grol mdzodzan cing / byigasonas pang 'tshang rgya bdag gis mthong / rgyas dran dede'i ni
196a10(1): sa byi zad pa'i/ rab 'byung 'khor lo rab tu bskor mdzad cing // dbyangs rnams rgya mtshor myi zad sgrog mdzad pas// chos sprin rgya chen nar 'bebs mdzad pa mthong / 'gro ba kun la rnam pa tu mar yang // skad cika re re
196b1(1): bya nas 'thongad pa// 'a dgas bye ba'i byu grang dab bskyed kyi// sangs rgyas gargya la bdag gis mdong // chu cig bsgras kyang zhing rnams rgya mtsho dang / byalab 'byu ba ci nyid ku kyang mthong chems
196b2(1): kung du sus mar thag khrig gis// / de dag mchod pa'i dod du nye bar byin// zhing tshul rgya mtsho 'basam byis ma sgrub pa'i// / 'gro rgyud kyi bad ji snyed yod pa'i// 'gro ba kun la mngon tu kho mo me// / chos sbed yangs pa'i ba
196b3(1): chang yang rab tu 'bebs// rgya lasras kho mos bsam gyis gyi khyab pa'i// rnam thar dkyil 'khor dam pa 'di shes kyi// / bska la pa bye ba khrag khrig pas ma yas su// thams cad bstan par lo mos nus re rkan/ 
196b4(1): rigs kyi bu kha mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par sa bad pa yas lad char byed par dmyigs pa thams cad du byang chub sems rapa'i skye bas rnam par 'phrul ba yongs su bsto pa 'di shes par ba dang // kho mos byang
196b5(1): chub sems dpa' sems kyi skad cig re res bska lad pa thams cad du gzhugs pa'i dmal nas yongs su 'byung ba'i sems dang / ldan pas chos kyi tshul thams cad ris par rtogs pa'i skye ba rab tu bston pa'o// 
196b6(1): de bzhing gnags pa thams cad mchod pa'i smod lam byis bsam pam mu bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chom thams cad mngon par 'tshar bya bar bya bas par du zlos pa/ sems cad thams cad kyi rigs pa/ 
196b7(1): rgyud kyi lam yongs su bstanang pa la gzugs brnyan lta bur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas pad mo'i nang nas skyenas skye ba 'gro ba thams cad yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i dus la mkhas pa/ 
196b8(1): sems dan thams cad 'dus pa la ma na par mos shing cher skyebs rnas par 'phrul pa yongs su bston pa/ zhing 'byam tham sa thams cad tu rnam par 'phrul ba'i srin yongs su ba stonang po// 'gro ba thams cad kyi sa
196b9(1): gyi rgyud du skye ba dang // rigs su gzugs brnyadan 'byung bar gyur pa/ de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am// yon tan brjod par nus re rkan// / sor rigs kyi bu grong khyer chen po gser skya'i gnas 'din// shag t+ya
196b10(1): bu mo go ba zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan tu mong la/ ji ltar byang chub sems rabs sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i phyir 'khor pa na 'khor bar bya ba dris shig// / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis sum gyi
197a1(1): // ni'i nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ sum bi ni'i nags tshal gyi lha mo ga b+hI kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i rang
197a2(1): la lan brgya bstong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas na sa yang dang ang balhas te lum bi ni'i nags tshal gyi lA mo gzi'i brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal gyi drung nas song ngo // 
197a3(1): tum bu bzhi pa// bam po bcu drug pa'o// / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis / lum bi ni'i nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi'i brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang
197a4(1): bos dga' ba'i dpal gyi drung nas mong se/ grong khyer chen po / ser skya'i gnas gang na ba ded phye nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thadad pa sa bang pa tshad myed par dmyigs pa thams cad cu // byang chub sems dpan/ 
197a5(1): skye bas rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su bson pa de nyid bsgom pa dang / khong du chud par bya ba dang / rgya cher bya ba dang / nan tan du bya ba dang dang / shin tu sbyangs pa dang / yongs su bsam pa dang / rnam byar byed cing / 
197a6(1): byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'gro ba'i khang pa chos kyi dbyingasarab tu bsdang ba'i 'od ga ma pa der song ngo // / deng 'gro gA che/ byang chub sems dpa' yongs su 'gro ba'i khang pa'i lha mo rgya
197a7(1): rang byed pa'i dpal zhes bya ba khyim gyi lha mo stong phrag bcu dang bcas pas bsus nas/ tshong dpor gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// / skyes bu chen po shes rab dang // ye shes cher pos rngam par gnon pa/ 
197a8(1): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par mtha dad pa bsam gyis kyi khyab pa bsgom pa la lhag par dmyigs pa'i smon lam gyis sems dang ldan pa// chos yangs pa'i gzhal myed khang gi khyod yul la spyod pa/ chos kyi grong khyer du mngon par
197a9(1): zhos pa/ byang chub sems rapa'i thabs kyi tshul mtha' yas pas sems cad 'dul pa la 'jug brgyad gyi gcod pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tar rgya mtsho la snang ba rab tu 'bor bar 'thob thams cad rnam par 'dus pa ya rab tu snang pa'i
197a10(1): spobs pa dang / ye shes mngon du gyur pa/ sems cad thams cad kyi baspyod pa shes pa'i lus kyis 'gro zhing rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i spyod pa la mdor du gyur pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems kyi dga' ba rgyasam
197b1(1): 'ashugs rnam yang 'phes pa'i spom lab dang ldan pa bzhi gshegs pa mams cad kyi cho ba 'odang du chung bar bya ba'i 'am du zhugs gakhyod byod pa legs so// dbyen byed blar pa byed pa dang / spyod pa las bab cing na yangar dag pa'i gyad sus can myong ba ba
197b2(1): khyod ni ring por myi thogs par de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / gsung dang // thugs kyi rgyan rnam par dag pa bla ma myed par rab tu thob ste/ mtshan dang dpe' byang ba mang pos rab tu rgyad pa'i lus dang / bstobs bcu'i ye shes bsnang bas brgyan
197b3(1): ba'i sems kyis 'jig rten dra nam par bskyod par gyur to// / khyod kyi bsor 'grus dang / rnam par gnon pasas bltas na khyod na ring por byi thogs par dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa mdor du gyur par mthong b.rang ldang zhing
197b4(1): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yongs su 'dzinang pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsdam gtan dang / rnam par ma ba dad pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rung / snyoms par 'jug pa'i chos bzhi dang ldan pa'i gzhal myed khang gi dag
197b5(1): pa byod pa dang / nga sangs rgyas kyi rngam par mas pa zab bor chud par 'gyur ro// de'ang de ltar khyod dge ba'i bzhes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / lta ba dang / snyen bkur ba dang / gdams ngag ma nong bar blang ba dang / de'i yor tan/ nyadra
197b6(1): kha ran tad du bya ba'i tshul btsong bar byed pas yongs su myi sgo phyir gyi ldo sgyid sdug par myi 'gyur te/ khyod la bgegs bsam/ bar bye gcod pa 'am/ sgrib pa gang gis kyang myi tshugs te/ bdung ngam/ 
197b7(1): brgyad kyi ris su rtogs pa'i lha rnams kyang mdun gangs pa byed pas / 'i phyir khyod ni ring por gyi logs par sems cam thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// de gad ces smras pa dang / tshong dpor gyi bu rong ba bangs kyis
197b8(1): byung chub sems dpa yongs su 'gro ba'i khang ba'i su mo bya ngang byed pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// /  mo khyod kyis 'di gad du smras pa de ltang 'gyur bar / lhamo mo mo ni// sems ca thams cad bya nyon mongs ma
197b9(1): 'byung ba rnam pa'i bas dga' bar gyur te/ sems cad thams cad kyilas nyam pa'i rnam par smid pa'i phyir ldog pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bde ba grub pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi ba nam 'ob byed/ 
197b10(1): ba'i las la rngan tang tu byed pas dga' ba dam pa nyams su tshor bar 'gyur ro// nam sems can de dag las dang nyon mongs pa rnam pa sna tshogs myi bde' ba'i spyod pas sems rnam 'khrugs shing ngan song du ltur bar gyu dang / 
198a1(1): pa 'am/ bde ba'i rgyud na garas kyang lus dang sems kyi bsdug sngal dang yid myi bde ba sna tshogs nyams su myong par gyur cing / phyi dga' bar gnas pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam
198a2(1): kyang zhing du med bye bde bar 'gyur ro// smra mo 'di lta na ste/ dpe na gyi shir du dang gis byams gzhigs bu cig pa bsdug cing yid du 'ong ba zhig bdog par gyur pa/ de'i san lag dang nyid lagasad pa zhig mthong na shi
198a3(1): rang gis byams pa'i phyir rab tu yid byi zhing myi dga' bar gyur to// lha mo de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'// byang chub sems dpa'i dpyod pa dpyod pa'i tshe yang sems can rnams las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis ngan song
198a4(1): gsum gyi rgyud du srung ba zhig mthong na rab tu myi dgal la/ shin du nyams myi bde' bar 'gyur ro// / gang gi tshe sems can rnams la lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis legs par spyad pa yang dag par len pa'i rgyus sus zhig nas// 
198a5(1): bde ba'i rgyud mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar gyur dbang / sA dang kyi de'i lam gyi rgyud du lus dang sems kyi mde' ba nyams su myong ba zhig tu gyung dan/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ba de ba dang ldan zhing nyams
198a6(1): da bya su sa dang / tug pa nga/ snrums nga nga bang gyur/ sa byung chu pa sems rangs de bdag dong kyi myong thab das bye pa ny-i chug song #
198a7(1): ba ma ming te/  'khor ba'i dga' ba dang / bdeb snga chob mnyams su myong bar bya ba'i phyir ma yon no// 'dod pa'i khams su rtogs pa'i dga' ba rnam pa kaM tha dang bsna tshogs dong shu gnyer bas ma yin/ 'du shes dang / sems dang / 
198a8(1): su ba phyir ci log du gyur pa'i dbang gis ma yid/ kun tu spyod ba dang // 'ching ba dang / ba mA la nyas pa dang / kun ras 'khodod pa'i dbar du gyu dang pas ma yin/ sred pa dang / lta ba'i dbang du gyur pas ma ring / sems cad rdzu
198a9(1): chog pa dang 'du zhing 'dzid pa'i 'du shes kyis sems rnam par 'phel bas mu yin bsam gtan gi dga' ba dang / bde' ba dang / myang ba la yongs su chags pas ma yin/ bsgrib pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs shing 'azhong
198a10(1): mchu dang rje rdzom pa mi byen ma byang chub sems dang das ni pa pa 'thong ba'i rgyan mo da na kyang bsdug sngal ra shi byed papa zhi da ngas dang pa rnams pa nyid chen po skye 'brag mams pacwo
198b1(1): bsdu ba'i smon lam chen po mdor bar bsgrubs te/ de dag ni snying rje chen pos smor lam mngor bar bsgrub pa'i shugs kyis sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba la bzod zhing 'khor ba na byang chub sems dpa'i spyad
198b2(1): pa byong par bsdang ngo // de dag ni sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i don tu/ thams cad mkhyend pa'i e shes sgrib pa myed pa yongs su tshol zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa dang / 
198b3(1): bsnyen bkur ba'i smon las mngon par bsgrub bo// de dag de bzhin gshegs pa mchod cing rim 'gror bya ba'i las smon lam gyi dbang gi sa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas yongs su skyo ba myed de// de dag kyang / 
198b4(1): byang chub sems dpa'i bapyad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i zhing mthong na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub bo// kun nas nyon mongs pa'i zhing yongs su sbyor zhing / 
198b5(1): sems cad thams cad kyi skye mched sna tshogs mthong bar gyurd pa'i tshe/ chos kyi sku tha dad pa myed pa 'ang / bla na myed pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir smon lam mngon par bsgrub bo// sems can rnams kyi sus dang / ngag dang / 
198b6(1): nas kyang bas pa dang ma sa dang / ma da bas// yongs sus ldan sa pan sra sa gru #
198b7(1): dang / sems can yongs su ma dan pa mthong na/ sems cad thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa yongs su spyod zhing byang chub sems dpar spyod pas yongs su skyo ba myed do// lnga po de sbyar byang chub sems dpa' nas
198b8(1): me yongs su skyo ba byed pa'i sems kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' dang dpung myed pa la 'byod de de ltar spyod pa ni lha dang / mye'i phun gsum tshogs pa yongs su bskyed pas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rgyad du gyur pa yid
198b9(1): byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la rab tu 'god pa'i phyin pa dang mar gyud pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam du 'dzug pas ma a lta bur gyur pa yin/ rang song gi ga yang sa'i 'jigs pa las bskur ba'i phyir lhan gcig skyes pa'i lnga
198b10(1): rtag tu bya ba zhin 'brang ba lta bu dbyu nga pa yid/ 'bar ba'i rgya mtshol las smos pa'i phyir mnyang pa chen po lta bur gyu pa yid/ bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad nas par bzlog pa'i phyir skyabs su gyur pa ya
199a1(1): shing du 'asis pa'i dang ba zhid nye bar sogs mas gangs su byas pa yid/ sangs rgyas bya mno thams cad du 'jug par byed pas su lems su gyur pa yid/ chos rid po che'i gling du skyel bam sago byed pa
199a2(1): byang ba bang / sangs rgyas kyi yor tang thams cad kyi me tog gi sems yongs su rgyas par byed pas me tog tu gyud pa yid/ bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi 'od yangs parab tu 'byed pas rgyan du byung pa yin/ kun nas mdzes
199a3(1): thas dga' ba dang / bda' ba dab pa byed pa yin/ Sha ram tho ba myed pa'i las pa dan tad du byed pas srung na legs pa yid/ yang la gdas pa rnas pa thams can bu yongs su chan pa'i yul dang ldan pas kun tu bamangs
199a4(1): yin/ bltar myi bathun pa myed pas btang myi bra ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa yin/ ye shes kyi 'od gzer rab tu 'gyed pa'i phyir 'od byed pa yin/ chos kyi sgror ma 'dzi dad pa'i phyir snang pa byed pa yid/ byang chub kyi bsam
199a5(1): ba yongs su dag par byed pa'i phying gsal bar byed pa yid/ bdud kyi las rnam par zlog pa'i phyir dmag dpor du gyu ra pa yin/ shes rab kyi 'od/ mer gyi dra ba rab tu snang ba 'gyed pa'i phyir nyi mar gyur pa yin
199a6(1): chos kyi ma mkha' la blo'i zla ba 'chang bar byed pas zla bar gas zhin/ 'grol khams cad du chos kyi srimachen pa'i / lags smin tu byu pa yi te// rnam de thar bta du rgya can ma
199a7(1): byang chub sems dpa' rnams ri sems can thams cad kyi yi tu'o/ ba yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' yongs su 'gro ba'i khang pa'i dz+nyA mo mya ngan myed pa'i dpal/ byib kye lngazo stong phrag bcu dang pabs/ 
199a8(1): bas tshor dban kyi bu nong babs la lda rdzas pas kyang 'das pa'i me tog dang phreng ba dang / khyim dang / bdug smos das/ byug pa dang / rin maci'i byar gyi chod yid kyi dang pa ning mdod par mipa ste/ 
199a9(1): bskor cing rjes su 'brangs nas// byang chub sems dpa'i bar par 'gro ba'i che// tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par spyod do// byang chub sogs pa thugs pa skyed cing / sems cad kun bzugs pa
199a10(1): rgyal ba'i ye shes nyi ma'i rnamapa / bar dga' zhig ma 'jig rten 'byung // gab sa bye srang pos kyang / khyod kyi 'anas mthong shin tu dka la/ 'jig rten ma rig mdongs pas// khyod kyi ye shes te chen 'di/ 
199a11(1): myi shes rab rib bsgribs pa'i// 'jig rten phyin ci log gzigs nas// thugs rje chen po rab bskyed de/ khyod ni rang 'byung nyid du bzhugs// khyod kyi dgongs pa nas dag pas// sangs rgyas byang chub don tu
199b1(1): bcom/ dge ba zhes bsnyen bkur ma snyen mdzad cing / lus srog 'phangs par mdzad myi mngal/ khyod de 'jig rten gyi mnga'/ 'dra 'dzi phyi mnga' gnas kyi mnga'/ 'dres pa ma mchil phyi ba rte pas/ 
199b2(1): dgongs pa thogs byed nam mkha' bzhis// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod mdzad cing/ bsod nams dkyil 'khor lod bzang bas/ e shes bsgom ma rab 'byed pa/ 'jig rten dz+nyAd kun tu 'char// 'jig rten nas kyang 'phags
199b3(1): myi mjed/ sa 'dzin rten chos kyis yongs myi 'ge// chags pa myed par 'jim rten bskyod/ kha la ser bu ci bzhin no// bska yad pa'i skye 'bar mye bzhin du// rtag tu 'bang bas rab tu bsod/ mye lta bu'i brtson 'grus
199b4(1): kyis/ byang chub byung bar myod bar mdzad/ seng ge bdang na kya / bsod yus rnam pa dor bta//  sa rnam pa ga dang dang / gnad gyis thub bskyed bar pyod// ngas dgyis rgyamatsho bas sa
199b5(1): chu brdzam pa ji snyed pa/ 'des yang dge bshes snyen bkur bas// dpa'o ra khyod mi 'jug par 'gyur// de ras byang chub sems dpa' yongs su 'gro ba'i khang pa'i lha mo mya ngang byed pa'i dasal byas/ tshong dpor gyi nor bamangs la
199b6(1): rab tu bsnung ba'i 'od du phyir te/ nang du so ngas shag kya'i bu mo go ba mthod par 'dod de/ kun tu bltas na shag kya'i bu mo goH/ byang chub semasas dpa' yongs su 'gro ba'i khang pa chos kyi dbyings rab tu snang ba'i dbus
199b7(1): na/ bsan rin po che/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gnas snang bar byed pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi par mo'i snying po can zhig la bud myed rgyal po'i rigs su byung ba/ sngon byang chub sems dpa'i dpyod pa la dge' ba'i
199b8(1): rje bskas pa mnyam pa/ sngor sbyin pa'i yongs su bsrubs shin du bsdus pas/ tshi 'bastan cing 'jam par smra pa'i ngang tshus dang ldad pa/ thams cad ma khyer dpa nyid du do mngo du bya las/ shi du bsdus pa/ 
199b9(1): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par bsgrub pa la don mthun pas shi nang tu bzung ba snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas bu dang / bu mo yongs su bzung ba chus bcangs pa/ byams pa chen po rab ldan pa'i
200a1(1): rang gi khyim btub kyis rjes su 'brang ba gongs su dan par byas pa bsngon byang chub sems dpa'i babs mthas pa bas sa kyis kyi byab pas yongs su sbyin pa byas pa stong drag brgyad 'phru ma bani 'i bod kyis su
200a2(1): nas bskor cing 'jug pa mthong ngo // bud myed stong phrag brgyad bcu 'cha bzhi po de dag kyang / snga na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyidang pa'i tshul la zhugs pa/ byang chub
200a3(1): sems dpa'i slab pa la gzhan gyi dring gyi 'jog pa chags pa thams cad dang bral ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'khor ba'i dga' ba thams cad kyis skyo ba'i yid dang ldang ba/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul chags pa skyed pas yongs su dag pa thams cad pa byed dang / 
200a4(1): nyid mngon tu bya ba'i sems kyi shugs dang ldan pa/ bsgrib pa dang / bar/ tu gcod pa'i dra ba dang bral ba/ chags pa'i lam thams cad las shin du 'das pa/ chos kyi skul legs par skul bas rnam par spyod pa/ 'jig rten thams cad yongs su
200a5(1): spyi par bya ba dang / 'gyul ba la mngon par phyogs pa/ bsod namapa rgya mtsho dri ma myed pas yongs su 'byung ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub semasarapa kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / spod kyis shin tu byung ba/ byang chub/ 
200a6(1): sobs nga'i bstob kyi thugs langs pam mi zhes nyi ma dkyi 'a'o kyib sems gra snga ba yang dag par bskyed pa gsug go// de nas kyi 'bor kyi nga ba sa gas kya dum go gang per dbyar dang / #
200a7(1): nan bya'i rnga tho go ba dang pa gnyis sa spyi bos phyag 'das te/ langs nas bdun du 'atugs te/ bal mo spyad sa 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags ma bdag gis bla byed pa pang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma
200a8(1): mamyed pa/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'o rnams 'khor ba na yongs su 'khor yang 'khor ba'i skyon gyis myi gos pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rang bzhin la khong du chun la/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la'ang byi gnas
200a9(1): brje yangs rgyas kyi chom sdang ga'ang rab tu thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyon pa 'ang rgyum gyi gcod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la'ang rab tu gnas la/ de bzhi gshegs pa'i yul yang yongs su sto dab
200a10(1): 'jig rten rgya'i byung thams cad du'ang nye bar spyod pa dang / chos kyi bus yongs su mub pa dang rnang yang / gzugs kyi skus 'dog mtha' yas pa 'ang mngon par sgrub pa dang / mtshan byed pa'i chos kyi skul 'amarab tu gzhol pa// 
200b1(1): 'gro ba thams cad kyi mdog dang / dbyibs kyi lus kyang bskon pa dang / chos thams can brjod dus ma chis 'das ngaras tu brtogs bya/ ngag gi lam dang / des pa'i tshig rnams cad 'arjod pas kyang / sems par rnams pa chos bkod
200b2(1): bdang / sems samathams cad sems cad byed pa pa yang rab tu shes pa/ sems can gyi khams 'dul ba'i chul las kyang myi ldog pa dang / chos thams cad pa skyes pa dang / ma 'gags par yang 'ong du chung pa pade bzhi gshegs
200b3(1): bya thams cadas mchod cing rim 'gror bya ba'i spyod pa las kyang phyir myi ldog pa dang / chos thams cad ga las dang / rnam par sbyin pa ma mchis par yang rtogs la/ dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba'i spyod pa las kyang phyir gyi ldon
200b4(1): pham 'chalang ngo to// de skad ces smras pa dang / shag kya'i bu mo go bas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor ba mangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i pyod pa'i chos nyid ni bai de lta bu dri bar sems pa
200b5(1): yod ma ba mig pas/ rjeba'adzid pa naras kyang kya tubab na rjod langs/ gyod pal ma da mgyung dpa chenaka/  kyi ra byede smra bas legs pa ton pa 'di gas ga dang sas ca
200b6(1): kyi pas sa kyil/  ma rgya chu ses di/ rgya ma sems pa'i khyod 'bab di cu gyi cu zhi
200b7(1): ye shes kyi 'od kun du 'byur bas yongs su rdzogs par byed do// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bzhes gnyen rlabs po che la brten pa dang / mos pa rgya chen po rab tu thob pa dang / dge ba'i bsam pa rlabs po che rnam
200b8(1): par dag pa dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la yangs pas rab tu brtan pa'i sems dang / sangs rgyas skye ba 'byung ba'i chos bstan pa' chen po thos pa rab tu thob pa dang / dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa la mos pa'i chos
200b9(1): kyis 'anas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'o myod ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad mnyam pa'i khong tu chung ba dang / de bdeng gshegs pa thams cad kyi byed kyi dbus rab tu thob pa dang / rang ba'i gyi ni brjechen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rna
200b10(1): bar dag pa dang / 'khor ba'i 'khor lo thams cad rab tu bcad pa'i sems kyi stobs shugs drag po dang ldan pa rab tu thob ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
201a1(1): nas pa 'di lta bu byig 'phrul gyi gzhi'i dpe' dang 'dra ba/ 'od kun tu 'byung ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rigs kyi bu de la brtson 'grus phyir myi ldog pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ 
201a2(1): chos de dag thob par gyur ras kyang kyi med pa'i tshul du mngon par bsgrub cing bsgom pa dang / shim tu skye che bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bzhes gnyen da zhing rnam pa bangs mdod par dag byed do// bcu ga zhe na 'di lta ste sus dang srog pa ba
201a3(1): par byiche ba dang / 'khod ba'os byed don du gnyer ba dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhi mnyam pa nyid 'ong du chud pa dang / thams cad ma byed pa'i smon lam las phyir myi ldog pa dang / chol kyi byings kyi tshul thams cad pa rnam par sdupa/ 
201a4(1): dang / srid pa'i rgya mtshor thams cad las gyedan du 'phags pa'i ming dang / gnas myed pa'i chos kyi nam mkha'as phyi gnas kyi brten pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam la bsgribs pa myed pa dang / zhing rgya mtshor
201a5(1): bsnyen bkur zhing mngong par dga' ba byed do// dengs pas kya bu ma gabs dong de nyid yongs su bskrad par phye ba'i phyid/ sangs rgyas kyi byid kyis phyogs brkyang bstas te/ detshoms su bcan pa 'di na
201a6(1): smras so// rlabs cen dri myed blo ldan gzhan gyi don zhugs shing / dge ba des dam ma bsnyen pa phon g.yo' dang sgyu myed pa// stond pa'i 'du shes thob cing skyo myed brtson 'grus can// de dag spyod pa 'jig rten phyig 'phrul 'dra 'di yin// 
201a7(1): gang rnams mos pa rlabs chen mkha' dang 'dra ldan zhing / de'i yongs su dus gsum 'jig rten chud pa dang // zhing dang sems cad chos dang sangs rgyas de bzhin pa// ye shes 'od byed de dag spyod pa 'di yin no// gang rnams bsam pa ma
201a8(1): 'dra mtha' dbang dpung myed med kun nas nyod mongs dri mas ma gos rab dag cing // de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi yon tan 'byur gyur na pa// de dag myod pa myig 'phrul gzhi'i rnam pa 'dra// kun mkhyen ye shes rnam yangs tshad byed
201a9(1): kha sam yas dang / yon tan rgya mchos yid bsal ldan pa gnyer brtan pa// de dag bsod nams rgya mtsho'i lus dag snying po ste// 'jig rten spyod kyang 'jig rten dri mas gos myi 'gyur// rgyal ba'i gsung gi yan lag sgra
201b1(1): snang chub ku kyis/ chos kyi 'thug sgra nyan kyang gang rnams kyi ngoms zhing// chos tshul rjes su stegs pa'i zhes dang 'o bya spron// de dag 'gro bar 'dogs la byed pa'i spyod pa 'di yin/ gang rnams phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa tsha rkye
201b2(1): ga/ gzhan dang ga'ang dag sems kyi skad cig kun sems gyid// bde gshegs rgya mtshor thams cad lha zhing shes byed pa// sangs rgyam sems ldan de dag myed yul 'di yin no// rgyas pa rnams kyi rnam par langs pa'i 'khod 'thong zhing / 
201b3(1): de dag ting nge 'dzin tshul rgya mtsho la mang po dang // smon lam rgya mtsho mtha' dang dpung myed pa la 'jug pa// dmyig 'phrul lta bu de dag spyod pa 'di yin no// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba ma lus kun gyis byin rlabs te/ phyi ma'i bskalangs/ 
201b4(1): 'apyod byed kun tu bzang po'i rnams/ zhing rnams bya bas zas kun tu gzugs brtan 'thur byu dang ba/ chos khrod byed pa de dag pyor pa 'di yin no// gang rnams ye shes nyis snying rje'i dkyis 'khor can / 'gro ba tab nyes
201b5(1): ma pan tshas 'od snang bas// 'gro ba'i mun pa pas 'a ci brtas 'thus// nyims bu de dag spyod pa ni yin no// khyed pa rmi da pa rji pa zhe rdzog mar byud nas/  'dags pa 'thor pa srid
201b6(1): phyir zlog rab gnas shing / chos kyi 'khor lo kun nas yongs su bsgrub byed pa/ spyod ma kun bgang dam ka'i blo can rab tu pyod/ tshug 'dir bslabs pa de dag mtha' dang pur skyed pa'i// lus rnams can
201b7(1): bci bzhin 'gro bar nye bar bstand te/ gzugs brnyan dmyin yong 'dra ba'i rang lus tshad myed pas// srid pa'i rgya mtsho dag na 'gro mang longs sbyin byed/ byams tshul shin tu yangs pas 'gro mang rgyas bkang ste// mos pa sna tshog
201b8(1): b.rab pa rgya rnas / rdzab lam brnams kyim zhes shing// bstan byang du ba dan du sem pa pas / de ga na mags pa mas na med do zhe
201b9(1): tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu kho mos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par ba dad pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzings rgya mtsho'i tshul thams cad la rnam par lta ba'i yul thob tham
201b10(1): nor bzangs kyis smras pa/ 'phags ma byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par mtha da pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i tshul la rnam par lta ba'i yul de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ spras pa rigs kyi bu 'i mo
202a1(1): byang chub sem sa dpa'i rna par thadad pa 'di sa snyoms par rnags na/ 'jig rten gyi 'ams 'di'i bsas dpa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod pa myed pa'i chu bzhin tu sram pasnyed mthong zhing thong btu no// lanas das
202a2(1): 'dan gsemasacad ras kyi chung bags par du gtogs pade rnyed ci yod pa des kyang sa turnam sa/ sems cad de na ni ni 'am dang / skyer 'bras snyed me 'ang sa dedas kyang she so/ Sha 'ong sar zlas pa na ci bdag
202a3(1): dang / sam mdzad par 'du byed pa yongs su bsgrub pa ci snyed byin yod pa dang / las rnam par skyes pa snga ldags kyi snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so// de dag gisam yongs su grangs pa dge sa sas tushes mon gyi dge bangs 'byung
202a4(1): rang ka khyi 'byung ba dang / nges pa dang / mnges pa dang / log par nges pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang bcas pa dang bag la nyal pa myed pa dang / dge' ba'i za ba phun gsum tshogs pa dang // dge ba'i rtsa brgud par gyur pa dang / dge ba'i
202a5(1): tha ba yongs su mid pa dang / myi dge ba'i sa pa yongs su zi nad pa dang /  dge pa dang phyi dge la yongs su zin pa dang / de dag gi dge ba'i chos mang yongs su 'dus pa dang / sdig to'i chos yongs su 'dus pa'i las yongs su
202a6(1): khyong du chung ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis thugs dang po bskyed pa rgya mtsho'i 'ang rab tu shes so// thams cad mkhyed pa nyid du zhugs pa'i tshul rgya mtsho 'ang rab tu shes so// smon lam rgya mtsho
202a7(1): cing mngon par bsgrub pa yang rab tu shes so// sngod gyi sangs rgyas byung rnams kyi drub tu gshegs pa rgya mtsho 'ang rab tu shes so// sngon gyi sangs rgyas la mchod cing ris 'gror mdzad pa'i spyod ba rgya mamor 'ang rab tu shes so/ 
202a8(1): gos byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa rgya mtsho'ang rab tu shes so// 'byung ba'i rgyad rgya mtshol 'as rab tu shes so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sems can yongs su sbyid par
202a9(1): mdzad pa dang / 'dul ba rgya mtho 'as tu shes so// mngon par 'char rgya bar mdzad pa sum tshola'ang rab tu shem pa'i chos kyi 'khod lo bskor ba'i zhu mchog gis su 'dang da bar grul pa 'angadas tu she
202b1(1): byas yang su brgya mosalas byangs tsun mam/ margyab bas dam dus dang gan 'das kya kying langs pa bye da/ rgya rtsanam sa mams kyi kyis sa sa nam / 
202b2(1): 'a'ad ba re ngag ni 'byung ba'i tshul yang rab tuzhes so// ldan gyi dge pa'i sa pa ngadu du shes so// sas bsgom pa sna tshogasas parab tuzhes pa ye shes thob par bya bar bya bsun gsum tshogs pa'i rnam par dag pang / 
202b3(1): bya ba'i gyi brag kyang rab tu zhes so// de bzhing gshegs pa de dag gyis sems can gyi snyed cig rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la bkod pa de dag kyang rab tu nam mo// rab sangs rgyas de dag gi sngong gi dge ba'i ma pa ji snyed cis yod
202b4(1): dpa de dag kyang rab cha chu shes so// rang sangs rgyas de dag gis rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub khong du chud pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so// bang rab sangs rgyas de dag gi zhi ba'i rnam par skyod pa la/ rnam par rtse ba'i rdo/ 
202b5(1): pa ma pa dang pa'i sgo ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so//  nang sangs rgyas de dag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul ba ji snyed cig 'ad pa/ de dag kyang rab tu shes so// rang sangs rgyas kyi dag gis sems can
202b6(1): cig yongs su smyind par byas pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so// rang sangasargyas de dag gis chos bstond pa ji snyed brjod pa de dag kyang rab tu shes po/ rang sangs rgyas de dag ting nge 'dzin dmapa' yas pa sa rnam par spyod cing
202b7(1): rnam par ma tha dad pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rnas par de ba rtsi snyed cig yod pazad pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ci snyed pa de dag kyang rab tu shes so// sangs
202b8(1): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag 'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khod kyi dkyil 'khod rgya mtsho ji rnyed pa de dag kyang rab tu shes mo// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis phogs dge ba'i sa pa bskyed pa dag kyang rab tu shes so// 
202b9(1): chog ma sems bskyed pa'i smon lam dag kyang rab tu shes so// smod las rnam pa pa dang pa dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dnga'i khyod pas 'byung ba'i rgya thams cad pad pa bsgrub pa rnam za dang pa nga / 
202b10(1): tu shes so// pa ro sa su phyin pa'i lam gyi yan lag gi tshogs nas par dag par bya ba rnam pa tha dad pa yang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i lam sa nan tan tu bya ba'i rkyen rna pa tha dad pa 'ang rab tu shes so// 
203a1(1): byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnod pa'i tshogs rnam pa ga dad pa 'di rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnon pa'i shug su drag po nas la ba dad pa'as rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i sa
203a2(1): sa bcos pa'i mthu dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyi dkyis 'khor nam pa thang pa 'baras tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnod pas rnam par se ba dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dbu'i ma yongs su gnod pa'i rnams spyod pa
203a3(1): bdag kyang rab tu zhes so// byang chub sems dpo'is la rab tu gnas pa dag kyang rab tu shes so//  byang chub sems dpa'i sa bsgom pa'i rgyud dag kyang rab tu shes so// / byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su sbyar ba'i tshul dag kya rab tu
203a4(1): zhes so/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa la yang dag par gnas par bya ba da pa kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i mtshan ma dag kyang rab tu shes son/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i da bar dag kyang rab tu shes so/ byang chub
203a5(1): them sa ba'i sanas sang 'bar ba'i ye shes kya btuzhes so// byang sems pa'i ma yongs su 'asdu ba'i ye shes ngag kya ba tu shes pa/ byang chub sems pa'is yongs su skyes par bya ba'i legs dag kyangs tsam
203a6(1): shes po/ bya chub sems dpa'i sarnam pa de dgad pa la yang dag par gang bar bya ba yang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i bye tshar te 'khor gyi rgya'angarab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i khyod pa'i rnabang
203a7(1): dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par tha rad pa'i tshul rgya mtshol dag kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i de dag sems kyi skad cig re re la ting nge
203a8(1): 'dzin rgya mtsho'i sna tshogs thob par byed pa dag kyang rab tu shes so// thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi snal ba'i tshul thob par byed pa dag kyang rab tu shes so// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi glog gi sdang ba'i srin dag kyang rab tu shes so// 
203a9(1): bya rgya sam pa'i zhi la sa na pa la//  kyi da du jug pa'i skyes ba ga padag cas sa kyi/ bya shA sa 'a ni
203a10(1): ba byed paras kyang ra drushes so// tshab rgyam rtsi chul la 'jug padas kya dngag tushes so// sems rgya ma tsha mchen nyid pa dang bdag kyang sa tu zhes so// byang chub sems pa das thar myod pa rgya lan padi
203b1(1): na las kyang btuzhes so// thong sa kyitshus snyochoms rtses pa das kyang margyanapa pa/ du cus kyirnam par gyul pa chogs kyi bya mcho rnams pa dang sangs kyang tu zhem / 'ams kyi / 
203b2(1): 'thang thang bu bad kyi 'jig rten gyi 'bas 'di das padas pan byung ba'i gas pa nachog pa rgya mtshol bzhugs te/ yang bachu pa de bzhin du/ khyi ma'i mtha gcig nas g.yes rgyad de rgyan gyin pams 'dam pam
203b3(1): na pang brtsa ma tsha dag kyang rab tu shes so// khyi mchen gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa yang pa rgya mtsho 'ji ltar shes pa de bzhin cu gyi mched kyi 'dzig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ga nas padag tu byung sa/ 
203b4(1): zhi na/ rgya rjod kyi 'jig ced gyi 'bas kyi rtsa zhin du pa'i 'ongags pa chun pa'i 'jig rten gyi 'ams gcig nas gag tu brgyud pa mams na kyi ga 'a ba rgya mtsho dag kyang ras sushes so// rkye mchen kyi 'gro
203b5(1): rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin da tu phra ba'i khongs su chud pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad kyi bskayad pa rgya ma tshe'arnaMs ji ltar shes pa de bzhin tu/ myi mched kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
203b6(1): phyogs bcur 'dab chags su gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so// myi mched kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcur 'dab chags su gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khas
203b7(1): tham sa cad kyi bskalang pa rgya mtshor nas ji skar shes pa de bzhin du/ phyi mched kyi 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcud 'dab chags su gnas pa gcig nas gcig tugyur pa dag ma gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams pam bad / 
203b8(1): bska 'ad pa rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu shes so// mye mched kyi 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcungar 'dab chags gcig nas gcig tu spyad pa dgar gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi laska lang brgya mtshor rje kyi ltar zhes
203b9(1): ba de bzhir du phyogs kun tu 'od rnam par bsdang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud cu gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi saska lang pa rgya mtsho dag kya rab tu shes so// phyogs kun tu 'od dam par snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi
204a1(1): khams kyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskald pa rgyal cho ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du/ phyogs kun tu 'od rdo par sdud pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi brgyud phyogs bcung 'dab chags su gcig nas gcig
204a2(1): b+ba tu brgyad pa dag la gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi labs rgyud gcig nas gcig tu bcud pa rnams kyi 'gas pa rgyam tsho dag kya rab tu shes so// phyogs kun tu 'od ni na gyur pa'i 'jig rten gyi 'ams kyi rdzun rtsonas na drags shenas dpa na'i
204a3(1): tu brgyud pa dag pa gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bskal pa rgya mtshol rnams rab tu shes pa de bzhin du gzhi snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol 'dir gtog pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byas bsas
204a4(1): pa rnams kyis gas ba byas mo ngag kyang rab tu shes so// de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams tshul du bya ba rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor lo rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dkyil 'khor rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi'amam
204a5(1): TAb+hA bye brag rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams chu klung rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams glong rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'khyild pa pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su
204a6(1): dang / 'dzi nyid kyi 'bas padag das log ted kyi' ba dang / jig rted gyi 'bas ta bag pa dang / 'dzi phyi bya ba bsakyig sa rgya mchos khya khyen pa so
204a7(1): nyen gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang / snying po me tog gi brgyand kyis brgyan pa 'di ji ltar shes par gyur pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu myed pa'i 'jig gi khams rgya mtsho chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas bdug
