268b5(1): dper na myi snang ba zhes bya ba'i tshe yod de/ de bcangs na myi dang myi ma yin pa thams cad kyis myi mthong ngo // de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems kyi mi myi snang ba ro 'gyur ba bcangs te 'dres par rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'/ 
268b6(1): bdud kyi yul thams cad tu mye snang ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho 'i chen po'i nang na nor bu rin po che'i rgyul po chen po rin po che thams cad yongs su bsdud pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du ma 'phos na/ rgya mtshor
268b7(1): chen po las bskal pas tshig pa'i mye thams cad kyis kyang ta la tsam yang bskam pa'i gnas skyed sa/ skabs myed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du sems bskyed pa/ nong bu rin po che thams cad yongs su bsdud pa'i/ 
268b8(1): nong du min pa tshi'i rgyal po mas pa dang / sems kyi rgyud ga sod pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rnapa 'am ya ma byen pa nyid du bsngos pa 'igs ni gnas pa chud bad bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas myod / man pas myed de/ der gyi med de/ bsas
269a1(1): rkyen pa kyad tul pas bskyed pa krIs sa na gsacang shA gyu/ na
269a2(1): byas yod de/ de mgul du btags na nong bu rin mi tshe'i rgya thams cad kyang this kyis dod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin byang chub kyi sems 'od thams cad yongs su 'dus pa'irin po che chen po bsas pa'i rgyan tu logs pa'i byang chub sems
269a3(1): yang nyan thos dang / nab sangs rgyas bu sems bskyed pa'i rin po che'i rgyan thams cad zilab kyis non to// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na nor bu rin po che chen po chu 'angang zhes bya ba yod de/ de chur 'jug na 'das dang brnyog pa thams cad/ 
269a4(1): rab tu dang bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems chu 'ang gi nor bu rin po che yang nyon mongs pa'i 'dab ma rnyog pa thams cad rab tu dad par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nor bu rin po che chen po chu dab 'grogs pa zhes
269a5(1): bya ba thogs pa'i nya ba ni chur myi mchi'o// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi sems chu dang 'grogs pa'i nor po tsho chen po thogs pa'i byang chubasems dpal yang 'khor ba'i rgya mtshol thams cad du myi mchi'o// 
269a6(1): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na nor bu rin po che klu'i nor bu'i go cha zhes bya ba yod de/ de lag na 'dug ma nya pa la btsogs pa chu las 'tsho ba rnams/ klu'i ge nas thams cad du 'dod yang klu'i sprul thams cad kyis myi tshugs so// 
269a7(1): de bzhin du thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i ye shes klu'i go ma 'chad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ang 'dod pa'i gnas kyi khams thams cad su 'gro yas nyams par myi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nor bu rin po che rgya byin
269a8(1): mngon par 'chags pa thogs pa'i lha'i dbang po brgya byin ni lha'i tshogs thams cad zi lad kyis non to// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi sems brgya byin mngon par 'chags pa'i nor po che'i rgyal po chen po smon lam gyi cod pan la thogs pa'i byang
269a9(1): 'chu sem pa dmams sa khams 'asum pathams cadams kyi nan to// rims kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na nor burin porje rjernam yi bzhin gyi rgyal po thogs pa 'argyan 'das pa thams cad kyis skyo 'jims so// de ba'in rna thams cad pa byed
269a10(1): pa na tshul ga thag rgyang chu ma na khyo na ma pad kyi rgya nan pa/  kyi ger sum pa gyis sa
269b1(1): nyi ma la bstan na mye 'byung ngo // de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa nyi mas mdzes pa'i nor bu rin po che yang shes rab kyi 'od zer gyis phog ma ye shes kyi mye 'byin du to// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na nor bu rin po che zla bas
269b2(1): mdzes pa zhes bya ba la zla ba'i 'od kyis phog na chu'i rgyun 'byin to// de bzhin du byang chub tu sems bskyed pa zla bas mdzes pa'i rin po che chen po yang dge' ba'i brgya pa yongs su bsngos pa'i zla ba'i 'od kyis phog na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams ca
269b3(1): smon las kyi chu'i rgyur 'byid to// rigs kyi bu 'di sa ste per no bu ri po che 'de bzhin gyi rgyal ze 'don par 'ogs pa'i bu'i rgyal po chen po rnams la gzhan gyis gnod par bya ba'i 'jig pa bskyed do// de bzhid du byang chus kyi sem
269b4(1): snying rje cher po'i dor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po thags pa'i byang chub sems dpal rnams la'ang ngan song dang / ngan 'gros gnod par bya ba'i 'jigs pa myed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na ra/ nor bu rin po che chen po
269b5(1): 'i chu dras ba zhes bya ba ni sems can bams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pas nem yang byang byud kyi 'gyur ro// de bzhin dbyang chum du sems paskyed pa 'grol mas can kyi rgyan gyi dam pa'i ma
269b6(1): rir po che chen po yang sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / byang chub sems da smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byabs nas yang byang bar myi 'gyur / 'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na rgyal po 'khor los spyad ba'i na cu
269b7(1): rin po che chen po mun pa thams cad yongs su sel cing 'gro ste khyim gyi nang na gnas na yang rab tu snang bar byed do// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du sems bskyed pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po yang / ma rig pa'i
269b8(1): gyur pa thams cad selar cing 'gro ba'i rgyud thams cad du 'gro ba 'dod pa'i khams na gnas na ye shes kyi sdang ba chen po rab tu 'byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na gar gyi yang dung be nor nu rin po che chen po na 'dra ni la'i 'od kyis phog pa
269b9(1): de dag thams cad ni nor bu ring gA chen po med pA Ni la'i khodog tu 'gyur ro// de bzhin du thams cad ma byed de pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i rdong bu rin po che chen po men dra ni la yang chos gang dang gang la nas pa myang pa dang / yongs su gdang ba dang / 
269b10(1): dge ba'i rtsa ba gar gyi yang rung ste thams cad mkhyend pa nyid tu sems skyed pas yongs su bsngos pa de dag thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi nor bu ring po che chen po'i kha dog tu 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na nor bu rin po che
270a1(1): mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i nor bu rin po che bye tshur+ya yang bska lang brgya phrag tong zhig tu 'dod pa'i khams thams cad tu gnas kyang 'dod pa'i khams kyi skyon thams cad kyis kun nas nyon mongs par myi 'gyur te/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin
270a2(1): mdzar bzhing duni dra dag pa ga sa'o// rigs kyi bu 'dig se me na/ na churin po'i chen po nyis myod pas rnam pa dag de 'od ces bya ba ni ri pa rje'i 'byung ba sa bams ca kyi kyis bad na// de bar du
270a3(1): ces pa nyi tha sa yang bskyed papa na mam tsha sa rjes bye papa rnas par das pa 'o kyang / bza cu ma nga mtha bar byam pa padang / rangasangs rgyam mams cad payo das pa'i srung 'das /  ma
270a4(1): 'di skyed da nga su dzin pa kyi da //  bdigacig zugs pa na ma nas pa di dums yas da brji sa ni
270a5(1): mtsha dza ba cig pu yang tshul bzhi yi la byabs kyi pa'i bra pa mas sa rnam pa se ya to// rigs kyi bu / shA ste dbenan rgyas po cher po sa rgyas bu ma ba'i na na pa rna nga6
270a6(1): byed pa zang pa'i lagatus sa par stong khyed byed dang bu 'i bu brgyam yo yang 'dog da gis kyis kyis ma dngag// de ba'i dus pa'i rgya cher po dgangs kya dmas pang sabye pa nyid tu sem pa byed pa sa
270a7(1): dad che mor lo 'ong bar byed pa spod las kyi gru bcug pa byang chub sems dpal sem sa dang po bskyed pa ni phrag pa'i bsam pani rgyum la 'jugs te/ thams cad ma byed pa'i thod byed dum byin kyang rnam par grol chab blang byed du byi na// 
270a8(1): na mos rang rang sangs rgyas dong bu 'ching du lu bu thams cad kyi lad kyis gnod do// rigs bu bu 'di lta de dper na nor bu ring po che chen po rabang gi rgyas po zhes bya ba yod de/ de ni 'dim bu'i glib gnas kyang yag chad gong phrag bani btsun/ 
270a9(1): gnas pa'i nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyim gyi gzhal myed khang gi gzugs brnyan gyi rgyan yongs su bston to// de bzhim du som tan thams cad kyis yongs su spangs pa'i thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po dang / 
270b1(1): ma gyi rgya za bab 'khor ba'i gnas sa 'jug bzhin du/ chos kyi dbyings kyi nam mkha'i spyod yul las rgyu ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i nyi zla dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi dkying 'khor thams cad kyi gzugs brtan yongs su spyonang // 
270b2(1): rigs kyi bu 'di lnga ste/ dper na ji snyed du nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor 'od kyis snang bar byed pa de srid tu nor dang 'bru dang / rim po che'i rnam pa dang / gser dbang tul dang / mye tog dang / spos dpa' phreng ba dang / gos dang longs spyod kar ci snyed pa de dag
270b3(1): thamam cad gyis no nu ring po chechen po dbang gi rgyal po'i ring du phyi mchon no// de bzhin du ji srid dus gsum kha thams cam ma khyen pa'i ye shes kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi yul snang par mdzad pa de srid du/ wA rang gyi dang / nyan pos dang / rang
270b4(1): rgyas bams cad kyi dge ba'i phab 'as bu sod pa 'am/ zag pa skyed pa gang ci snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang byang chu du sems skyed pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po bang gi rgyam ma dzin du phyimachon go// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste per nor bu / 
270b5(1): po che chen po rgya mtsho'i rgyas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de ni rgya mtshom rgyan thams cad yongs su bsonod do// de bzhin du byang chub tu sems skyed pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po rgya mtsho'i rgyan gyidam pa yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i me t+yahra tu
270b6(1): shes kyi su rgya mtsho'i rgyad thams par 'ongs su bsnod // rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na nom bu rin pa cherten pa 'a gzhin gyi rgyal ma nogs par rnardzas kyi 'dzas su su krung gi ser las ldog pang 'phags pag
270b7(1): yang myed do// de bzhin thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes nong bu rim po che chen po yid bzhin gyi rgyal po ma rtogs par byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i lha rdzas kyi 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi gser las lhag pas khyad par 'phags pa'i
270b8(1): ng+yas kya nga/  garigs kyi sa 'dis gar bdang / kwa'i tshigs sgrub par 'gyu pa'i yus 'dus pa ni chu dang yul thams cad ya nga snar // dang bzhing du thams 'das byes sa nyid du semapa byed pa na kyi sa
270b9(1): chu ba'i byang chub semapa rnam sa nacan na mongs pa'i gra dang spru pam sad par smra / rigs kyi 'dris pe bu 'olag ca nga sa pa ni dbul lams kyi drugs pa
270b10(1): sa nang sabyen pa nyid du sems paskyed pa'i lags dang ngan pa'i byang chub sems dpa 'a thams cad kya ma ma pa'i dmya'i dkyi 'khor thams cad kyi thun pa ro// / rigs kyi su 'di sa snyed per na dmas kyis da su
271a1(1): kyi snying po'i kye ma srang cig gis ni so gi 'jig rten gyi khams dri zhim pos rgyas par 'gengs ste/ de bzhin cig tsas la yang song gsum gyi da chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin ba rgyas yongs su gapa pas ring tu N+Dimam/ 
271a2(1): go// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du sems bskyed pa lha rdzas kyi tsan d+ha na sprul gyi snying po lhag pa'i bsam pa cig la mchis pa'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings thams cad yon tan gyi dri zhim pos rgyas par 'gengs te/ slob pa dang myi
271a3(1): slob pa dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems kyang zi lad kyis gnon to// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper ma tsan d+hang rin po che chen po kha ba'i tsan dam zhes bya ba ni gtung ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed de/ lus thams cad kyang rab tu gsil bar byed
271a4(1): ro/ de bzhin thams cad mkhye nang pa nyid tu sems bskyed pa'i kha ba'i tsam dang rin po che yang nyon mongs pa kun tu rtog pa dang / 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi gdung ba thams cad kyang rab tu se yad to//  ye shes kyi sras kyang rab tu tshim
271a5(1): byed// rigs kyi bu 'di sa me per na mi'i rnal po rirab kyi drang ci snyed ciganye bdu 'do de dag tham par gser gyil dog cig tu 'gyur ro// 'di 'dzi dag su 'ang drang ste/ thams cad ma khyen pa nyid du sems byed pa
271a6(1): ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i drung du nye bar lom pa de dag pam pa cad kyang thabs ca mkhyen pa nyid kyi la do gcig par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di sti pe na zhing sus kyang kyi rmugs par ba kun nas 'dra ba'i kun paras kyi na na
271a7(1): dri zhim po 'byung ba de lta bu ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi me tog par shi ka dang / me tog dza ti ka dang / me tog sum ma la rtogs pa me tog gi rnam pa thams cad la'ang/ myed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems
271a8(1): bskyed pa'is yong+ga de las byung ba'i smon lam gyi shing gi me tog dang / ye shes kyi shun pags kyi dri zhim po'i ngang 'byung ba de lta bu ni dge ba'i rtsa ba dmyal ba dang ldan pa thams cad dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi me tog par shi ka dang / me to// 
271a9(1): dz+wa ti ka dang / me tog sum na'i tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba zag pa myed pa dang ldan pa bam ba cad la'ang byed do// / rigs kyi bu 'di lta sted dper na shing sus kyang kyi
271a10(1): zhub pa dang / kun nas 'bus par gyur da na/ me tog stong phrag mang po'i 'byung gnas su gyur da par shes par bya'o// de bzhin du thams cad mu khyend pa nyid du sems skyed pa'i shing kun nas du ma dge ba'i cha ba bas kha 'bus par gyur da na/ 
271b1(1): lha dang myi grangs myed pa'i byang chub kyi me tog zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa myed pa'i gnas su 'gyur bar shes par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na shing kun nas 'du ba'i me tog gis nyi ma cig tu bgos pa'i gos sam/ ti la mar dri zhim po'i ngang / 
271b2(1): 'byung ba de lta bu yang me tog ces pa ka dang / me tog sum nas nyi ma brgya phrag stong du bgos pa'i gos sam/ til mar las kyang myi 'byung ngo // de bzhin du thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi sems kyi rgyud mo/ gcig du/ khongs su bsgoms pa'i byang
271b3(1): chub sems dpa'i yon tan dang ye shes kyi dri zhim po'i rang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhabs kyi drung ma ldang pa de lta bu ni bskal pa brgya phrag stong du bsgoms pa'i nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems las kyang bag pa myed pa'i dge gi
271b4(1): tha ba dang / rlos kyis shes kyi dri zhim po gyi 'thung ngo // rigs kyi bu 'din ste byer da shing gi rigs ma li ke ni zhes phye ba ba rgya mtsho gnod pa dang bral ba nas skye ba 'od de/ de'i tha bas cad me tog zhi bar tu la nus bams ca tu ba
271b5(1): sems can rnams kyi nye nye bar mtsho bar myi 'gyung ba byed do// de bzhin du ning rje chen po dang smon las kyis pa 'ang dag par skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpan/ pa thog thathams cad mabye pa nyid du sems bskyed pa ras nye ba nga can
271b6(1): bgyi chad dpa pa'i chos gnas pa'i mthar thug gi bar du nam ang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi nye bar mtsho bar myi 'gyur ba byed do// rigs kyi dra 'di lta ste dper na dngul chu'i rigs gser du snang ba zhes bya ba yod pa
271b7(1): de'i srang byin gis kyang zhugs blang myong ga'ir du sbyang ngo/ chu chusang byig po de ni lugs srang phung ma 'isasad par bya bsam/ grags su sbyar gyi nus so// de bzhin du thams cad sa byed pa nyid du sem sa sred pa'i ma
271b8(1): dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasasu sngos pa'i ye shes kyis bzung ba ni las rang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i lcags thams cad zad par byas te/ chos thams cad thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi kha dog tu byed kyang / thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du sems
271b9(1): bskyed pa'i ngo re 'ams gcig po de ni las dang nyon mongs pa'i lubs thams cad kyis kyang kun nas nyon mongs par bya ba 'am 'ang par myi nus so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dpe rang / mya ni ji tsas cu chung chu zin kyang / rkye mji tsam dang phrang
271b10(1): tha de bcam gyi skye lce yongs su byed do// de bzhin du thams cad sa bye rang pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i rtse ji tsam chung ngu mind kyang dmyigs pa rgya chen pos tshogs kyi rkyem dzin sa dang phrad pa de tsam du ye shes kyi 'o phro ba rab tu bkye bas rnam pa'i
272a1(1): nyid rje sems basbe ba'i rtse ma tsag las 'apa dang / ma myong pa dang / dkar 'gru di bzhin gshegs pa mas ca kyi thams sadas khyen pa'i nyid du zhugs bskyed pa'i phyis pa po ma ya mas cad babyen pa
272a2(1): chu sems skyed pa'i bye mar gcig pa de ning rnyed kyi thams cad kyi thams cadas byed da pa nyid tu sems bskyed pa'i mang me 'byung bas kyi bdengam par thug pa skyed do// rjegs kyi bu 'den myed per na the gang gi TIn sbyim 'ams
272a3(1): zur cug kyang rung te bcug sa phyag tu/ song srong du ba rtags pagachags pa'i mun pa yang rnam yang me'ad cir sdang bar byed do// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa cig kyang / sems kyi bsam banyis pan
272a4(1): ma rig pa'i srung ba dang ldan pa ji lta bu yang rung ste/ de'i rgyud du phyin na de phyim ma thag tu bas yad pa brgya stong brjod du myed par bsacags pa'i las dang nyor mo ngas/ pa'i sgrib pa dang / mun pa thams cad rnam par sel cing ye shes kyi
272a5(1): sdang ba yongs su bskyed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ me mar ni snying po ji tsam pa de'i rkyen tsam tu sdang bar byed do// mar gyi chog ci srid du gnas pa de srid du 'bar ro// de bzhin du thams cad bye
272a6(1): ba nyid du sems bskyed pa'i me mar yang byang chub sems dpa'i smon la sa rgya snying po'i khyad par ci 'dra ba de lta bur chos kyi dbyings yongs su sdud par byed de de snying rje chen pos 'apyod pa'i mar gyi tshogs ci srid du gnas/ 
272a7(1): pa de srid tu sems can 'dul ba dang zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku mngon par bsgrub pa la yongs su 'bar bar gnas so// dum bu bzhi pa// / bam po nyi shu rtsa gnyis/ 
272a8(1): rims kyi bu 'di lnga steng dpe dang / yardzas kyi chu klung gi gser gyi rgyan lnga'i rgyal po dab bsgyur gyi mgol ma thogs pa ni/ 'dod pa la myod pa'i zhwa'i bu thams cad kyis myi 'phrogs so// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
272a9(1): sems bskyed pa rnardzas kyi 'angs su chu klung gi gser kyi rgyan nan tan dang yon tan la rab tu gnas pa byang chub sems dpa'i phyir myi ldog pa rnams kyi smon lam chen po 'i mgo la thogs pa ni byis pa pa dad pa'i skye bo dang / 
272a10(1): slob pa dang myi slob pa dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis myi 'phrogs so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ mi dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge'i ra ros ni seng ge'i 'phrug gu skyes nas ring por ma lon pa 'ang nyams su
272b1(1): bde' zhir rta'i/ ri dgas thams cad ni kun tu 'byer bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu seng ge chen po'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nga ro byang chub kyi sems yongs su brjod pa 'byung bas ni las dang mo ba'i
272b2(1): byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i phrug gu rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis nyams su bde gang rta'i/ dmyigasu pa la gnas pa'i sems can thams cad ni kun du 'byer ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na seng ge'i rgyus pa las
272b3(1): rgyud du byas pa'i byi bang gi sgras ni byi bang thams cad kyi rgyud yongs su 'tshod do// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i pha rol tu phyi nang pa'i sku mnga' ba'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i rgyas pa'i yon tan brjod pa'i rnas
272b4(1): 'dod pa'i rgyud kyi dga' ba'i byi bang thams cad kyi rgyud yongs su 'chad par 'gyur ro// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa dang / yon tan gyi gtam thams cad kyang 'gag par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ 
272b5(1): rgya mtsho'i chen po pA dang / mA he dang / ra'i 'o mas yongs su ga /  pa'i nang du/ seng ge'i 'o mthigs ma cig blugs pas 'o mde dag thams cad 'gyes par 'gyur ro// bdun gyi btub bo// de bzhin du
272b6(1): bskal da brgya phrag stong du ba mchags pa'i nyon mongs pa'i kun gyi 'o ma'i phyiramatshor yang de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu'i seng ge chen po'i thams cadamakhyend pa nyid du sems skyed pa'i 'o ba'i thigs pa cig thugs pas
272b7(1): thams na sa lus par 'dabar gyur te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par sa padang sa rnams kyang kyi gnas myi 'dra'o// rigs smin 'di lta ste por na/ phyag pa bying ba'i 'byug du nas
272b8(1): nga'i sbugs nas ma 'byung ba la ra ro'i mthu'i khyad par yod pa de lta bu ni gangs kyi ri la gnas pa'i bya'i tshogs mthu' dang shugs thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa thams cad la 'ang myed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa
272b9(1): gal byid ka'i 'brug gu las dang po pa 'khor ba'i sgo ra'i sbubs ma 'dug pa la snying rje chen po dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi ro'i mthu'i khyad par yod pa de lta bu ri nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad pa myed do// 
272b10(1): tshigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' lding chen po'i phru gu skyes nas ring por ma lon pa la gshog pa rlung gi stobs dang mthu' yod pa dang / dmyig yongs su dag pa'i yon tan yod pa de ya bu ni de ma yin pa'i bya
273a1(1): dang ma bskyed pa 'a thams cad ma khyed pa nyid du sems paskyed pa'i gzhog pa'i rlung mi stobs dang bugs padog pa dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i ba ma pa'i byin lo ga dan pam son tan yod pa can pos dang mas rgyas na
273a2(1): tshad byed pas byung ba thams cad la byed do// rigs kyi bu 'dis se yed na skyes bu chen po'i lam nas spyad pa'i mde bu thung gis ni go ji cag tu sra yang rtom to/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtan po dang ldang ba'i / 
273a3(1): ras kyang ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tu sems bskyed pa'i med bu zung gis kyang lha bya nga brag rgyal ba'i gos bams cad gyi rol pa byed do// rigs kyi bu su skye pe nga/ mtshul t+yecher po thos turab pa'i 'bras ba 'byong du
273a4(1): slong du gangs par srid d+ha/ de byed 'das bu'i gling gi phyi bam cad kyis kyi/  kyi grib bo// de bzhin du byang chub sems pa/  mthu gyi/ ched po snying rje cher pos dam pa'i sdug pa'i thabs pa
273a5(1): bu 'di sa ste dper na/ 'thong gi slob gi mchan bus byang ba/ 'phong gi thabs la ma goms pa sa thong gi gnas dang / mams kyis bu 'dang byad par 'dod pa de lta bu ni bams cad la byar yang 'bor gyi zhes pa rnams la byed do// de brjid / 
273a6(1): du byang chub sems dpa' chang shes las dang po pa thams can pa byed na pa nyid kyis la ma goms pa la ston las kyi shes dang / mos pas spyod pa'i mapa'i byud par gyi bdog pa de lta buni/ byabachub tu sems pa skyed pa'i sems
273a7(1): rnams cad dang / slob pa dang bye thob pa dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la'ang byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dben na/ 'thong bathoza pa'i 'phor gi rgyus thams can yin dang zer gang pa'i sangs la goms par bya
273a8(1): sdong du 'gro ba'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyis la slob pas/ sangs rgyab kyi chos thams cad yong du chud par bya la yang dang por thams cad martsond pa nyid tu sems rlo
273b1(1): mngon par sgrub pa byas nas/ grub par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i yul dang rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yong su stong pa'i sangs rgyas rang / byang chub sems dpa'i yul thams cad le'am dang por sems
273b2(1): skyed pa'i snyoms ma mngon par sgrub pa ni yongs su bsgrub pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i sngags dang rigs sngags thams cad ni gzugs myed la bstan du myed pa yin yang sems bskyed pas sgyu ma'i
273b3(1): mUlang ba dang / gzugs kyi rnam pa thams cad yongs su ston to// de bzhin tu thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du sems bskyed pa yang gzugs myed la bstan du myed de chos kyi dbyings thams cad skyed sa bskyed pa la dbang sprad pa tsam gyis/ 
273b4(1): rdzas kyi dbyings thams cad yon tan gyi rgya rnam par phye ba thams cad kyis rnam par sgrub bo// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na byi lha'i dmyig gis lha ba dkyis/ byi ga thams cad kun du 'byor ro// de bzhin du byang chub // 
273b5(1): cad thams cad kyid kyis 'dod do// de bzhing tu byang rgyu sesas s+yA byu rnyan gyi sos su 'jam busugang gigs rgyun nas pas nyan thos dang / rang sangan rgyas thams cad kyi rgyang kyi rgyun cid kyis ma tu/ rmi du
273b6(1): par byed ro// rigs kyi bu 'ang lta ste dger na/ rdzog 'am yong gi rgyas pa'i khams ci tsam cu cur 'ang srams snon ba thams cad zhigs par byed do// da byasbyin du skyes tha bya nas bskyed pa'i thathams cadas byen pa nyid tu sems byed/ 
273b7(1): 'ju ngas pa'i dasgra la 'ang mad dang / slongamags bsas cad nigs pa byed/ rigs kyibu 'di yin ge bang / ngo'i ba ga' bas pang dasas bdag pa shesas
273b8(1): thams cad 'gyes shing kyi gnas la myi 'du'o// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du sems bskyed pa ni khams kyang las sam/ nyon mongs pa'i ma/ nyan thos dngar ba sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba gang dang gang tu 'byung bya de
274a1(1): dang de dag gi lus rang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / nyan pos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par mtha rang pa thams cad kyang 'byer zhing kyi 'khor gyi 'du'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ chu srin gyi tshil gyi then
274a2(1): ma cig bos pa'i nya ba ni/ chu'i srog chags thams cad kyi 'jigs pa dang bral ba yin te/ chu srin gyi sos btab kyang lus la myi tshug so// de bzhin ru lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub kyi sems kyi cha cig zos pa'i byang chub sems
274a3(1): dpa' yang 'khor pa'i las dpa'akhor pa'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba yin te/ nyan thos dang dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mngon par khong du chud par bya ba'i nang na 'jug kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon tu bya ba'i lam gol bar
274a4(1): ltung bas gnod par myi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ bdud rtsi'i chu thungs pa'i skyes bu ni gzhan gyis gnod par bya bar thams can kyis myi mchi'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyend
274a5(1): pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i bcud rtsi'i chu thungs pa 'ang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa thams cad kyi sar myi mchil/ byang chub/ sems dpa'i snying rje chen po'i smon lam las kyang rgyun chad par myi
274a6(1): 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sku ba grub pa'i skyes khu ni myi'i gnas thams cad rnam par spyod kyang myi kun gyis myi mdzes ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskye
274a7(1): pa'i shes rab dang / smon lam gyis nye bar brtan pa/ bcud kyi yul thams cad la rnam par bapyod kyang bdud thams cad kyis myi mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na// rgyal po chen po la brten pa'i skyes bu ni skye bo ram
274a8(1): rabs thams cad kyis kyi 'jigs so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid du sems bskyed pa/ chos kyi rgyal po chen po la brten pa yang sgrib dang / bar chad dang / ngan song thams cad kyis myi 'jig
274a9(1): so// rigs bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sa phug gi khyim na gnas na sa'i gseb thams cad brlan gyis yongs su gang bas mye'i 'jigs pa myed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi rgyud byang chub kyi sems
274a10(1): kyi dge ba'i rtsakhas mngon par brlan ka la yang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam pan grol ba'i ye shes kyi mes 'jigs pa myed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ dpa' bo la brter ba'i myi ni dgra thams cad
274b1(1): kyis kyi 'jigs so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du sems bskyed pa dpa' bo la brten pa la yang myod pa ngan pa'i dgra thams cad kyis myi 'jigs so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ lha'i dbang / 
274b2(1): po rgya byin rdo rje'i lag ca thogs pa de lha ma yin gyi tshogs thams cad rab tu 'jom mo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid du sems bskyed pa brtan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rdo rje'i lag cha thogs pa yang
274b3(1): bcud dang phas kyi rgol ba'i lha ma yin gyi tshogs thams cad rab su 'jom mo/ rigs kyi sku 'di lta ste dper na/ rtsi ro'i bcud thungs pa'i skyes bu ni che shin tu ring bar gnas so// nyams chung bar myi 'gyur ro// rga bar myi 'gyur
274b4(1): ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i po bcud kyi tshogs 'thungs pa yang bskalang pa grangs byed par 'khor pa na 'khor yang yongs su skyo ba byed la 'khor ba'i skyon kyis myi gos so// 
274b5(1): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na// sman gyi ro spyang po mchog thams cad chu ni sngon du 'gro ba ste/ gang la yang skyon du myi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang smon lam gyi tshogs spyar ba thams cad
274b6(1): rtsa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa ni sngon du 'grod/ gapal yang skyon tu myi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di sa na dpe nga/ bya thub thams cad 'dzi/ srog ga nga ba shA/ cam
274b7(1): rtsa 'gro'o// de bzhin tu byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par blang ba la yang byang chub kyi sems sngon du'agro'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu srog gi dbang po
274b8(1): thams cad dang bral ba ni las thams cad la mthu 'a myed pas/ pha ma dang gnyes pa shes kyi tshogs kyis kyang nye bar mtsho bar byar myed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du sems bskyed pa dang bra le la
274b9(1): sangs rgyas gyi ye shes thob par bya ba la mthu' myed pas/ sems can thams cad kyis kyang thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi yon tan gyis nye bar mtshol bar byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta se dper na rgya mtsho la chen po ni dug
274b10(1): thams cad kyis 'dug par myi nus so// de bzhin du thas cad mkhyend pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i rgya mtsho chen po yang las dang nyon mongs pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su sems bskyed pa'i dug thams cad kyis 'acug par
275a1(1): par myi nus so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/  nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni skar ma thams cad kyi 'od kyis thub par myi nus so// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ya/ 
275a2(1): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi skad ma thams cad kyi yon tan zag pa myed pa'i 'od kyis myi thub bo// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal po'i bu skyes nas yun ting du ma lon pa yang / blon po mchog tu bya ba nas rgan pa
275a3(1): thams cad rigs dang ldan par skyes pa dang / dbang gis zi lad kyis gnond to// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed nas ring por ma lon pa/ chos kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skyes pa las
275a4(1): dang po yang yun ring po chas tshangs par dpyod gyod pa'i nyan thos nas rgan pa thams cad byang chub kyi sems kyi snying rje chen po'i dbang zhes zi lad kyis gnon to// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ blon po ci tsam du nas nam shA kyang rgyal
275a5(1): bu gzhon nu ci tsam tu chung ba la'ang phyag bya rgos so// rgyal po'i bus/ kyang blon po rgan po la rim 'gror myi bya ba mya yin no// de bzhin du nyan pos rlang sangs rgyas kyi tsam du rkang pas ci tsam du tshangs pa'i myod pa ring du myod
275a6(1): spyod pa rnams kyis kyang bya bachub sems dpa' las dang po la 'dud par bya'o// byang chub sems dpas kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad ris 'gror myed par bya ba ma yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta te dper nga / tra tsa
275a7(1): rgyal po'i bu khams kyis myi gos par bya ba zhig na'ang / rgyal po'i mtshan dang ldan na rigs kyis btsun pas rgyal po'i blom po dam par bya ba thams cad dang yor myi mnyam mo// de bzhin du bya chub sems dpa' yas dang po la/ las dang nyon
275a8(1): nya mongs pa'i nye bar le nang pa thams cad kyis non pa yang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyod pa'i mtshan dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs btsun zhing che bas nyar thos rab rang sangs rgyas mchog tu phyin pa thams cad dang yang myi mnyam// 
275a9(1): rigs kyi bu 'di lha ste/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che yongs su dag pa ni myig la rab rib kyi skyon yod na yongs su ma dag par snang ngo // de bzhin du thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du sems bskyed pa rin po che rang bzhin gyis slob
275a10(1): su dag pasa'ang / sems can ride pa'i dbyig myi shes pa ling ba rib kyi skyon dang ldan pa rnams la yongs su ma dag par snang ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na rtsi'i gatshungs sngags dang rtsi thams cad bsdus te byas pa ni/ 
275b1(1): reg gam mthong ngam 'grogs na yang sems can gyi nad rab tu zhi bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub kyi smon lam dang ye shes kyi las dge ba'i rtsa ba'i cho gas/ dang shes rab dang thabs kyi sngags dang rtsi thams cad las bsgrubs pa byang chub kyi sems dang
275b2(1): ldar ba ni/ mthos sram mthong ngam/ 'grogs sam rjes su dran pa'i tshul gyis kyang sems can gyi nyon mongs pa'i nang rab tu zhi bar byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ gos dang ba'i mtshan nyid cen ni 'das kyi
275b3(1): nyes pa thams cad kyis myi gos so// de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems kyi gos dang pa'i mtshan nyid can mi 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa'i 'dam gyi skyon thams cad kyis kun nas nyon mongs par myi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta
275b4(1): dper ma shing gi gzugs mgo gzer gyis btab pa ni yongs su 'gyes par myi 'gyur te bya ba thams cad kyang byed do// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du smon pa'i ye shes kyi lus kyi spyi bor byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i smon lam
275b5(1): kyi 'od zer gyis btab pa yang byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba thams cad la mthul yod de/ rnams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi smon lam gyi ye shes las sus re su sgrub pa yin pas yongs su 'gyes par myi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi
275b6(1): lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / myi ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i yan lan gi tshogs de nyid yin yang sangs rgyas kyi chos bsgrub pa la mthumyed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i
275b7(1): rgyal po la rin po che'i ma ga ru nag po glang po'i snying po zhes bya yor pa des btugs ma thag tu rgyal po 'khoram los sbyar ba'i yas lag bzhi 'i dpung gi tshogs thams cad kyang nam mkha' la gnas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen
275b8(1): pa nyid tu sems bskyed pa'i A ka rus btugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang khams gsum thams cad las rnam par 'das te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes nam mkha'i spyod yul 'dus ma byas pa thams cad kyi
275b9(1): mthar thug par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rdo rje ni rin po che ma rabs kyi 'byung kud nas kyi 'byung gi/ rdo rje'i 'byung kung ngam/ gser gyi 'byung kur nas 'byung ngo // de bzhin tu thams cad mkhyend pa nyid tu sems
276a1(1): bskyed pa re rje lta'u'ang sems cad kyi bsas pa'i dge ba'i mkham rabs kyi rin po che'i 'byung gnas nas kyi skye he/ gzhan du na sems can yongs su skyob pa'i rdo rje chen po'i rdo rje'i 'byung grang ngam/ thams cad pa byed pa'i
276a2(1): ye shes lhag par dmyigs pa'i gser gyi 'byung kur chen po nas 'byung ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ shing gi rigs rtsa ba myed pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i tha ba mang thug par myi dmyigs mod kyi shing rnams yas lag dang lo ma dang / me tog shing
276a3(1): rgyas pa 'dra ba lta bur gyur da pa 'ang snang ngo // de bzhin tu thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i rtsa ba'i mthar thug pa 'ang myi dmyigs mod kyi 'jig rten gyi skye gnas thams cad du yang / thams cad mkhyer pa nyid kyi bsod nams dang / ye shesapa
276a4(1): mngon par shes pa mi mye tog shin tu rgyas pa smon lam chen po'i dra bar gyur pa 'ang yongs su snang ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di lta de dper na/ rdo rje'i sdod ran pa'i gzhil 'dug nga nu mdzes par gyi snang ngo // snod ma rdol pa ma gtogs par sna rdo rnom pa dang tu
276a5(1): ka can gyis gzung bar myi nus so// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dusems bskyed pa'i rdo rje chen po yang sems can mos pa zhan pa'i sdod dang / gser sna can nas/ tshul khrims ngam bcad nam/ gnod sems can nam/ 
276a6(1): pa'i snod kyis kyang gzung bar myi nus so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rdo rje ni rin po che thams cad 'bus so// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyend pa nyid rgyu sems bskyed pa rdo rje ar sangs rgyas kyi chos rin po che thams cad phugs par khong du chud par byed
276a7(1): do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta med dper na/ rdo rje ni brag thams cad shigs par 'joms so// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du sems bskyed pa rdo rje yang lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad kyi brag shigs par 'jom mo// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na
276a8(1): rdo rje ni rin po che ni chag kyang las cad las khyad par 'phags pa'i gser gyi rgyan zi lar kyis gnon to// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du sems bskyed pa rdo rje rin po che bsam pa log pam zhugs pam chag par gyur kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
276a9(1): thams cad kyi yon tan gyi gser gyi rgyan zild kyis gnon to// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rdo rje rim po che ni chag kyang phongs pa thams cad rnam par sel ra to// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyend pa nyid tu sems bskyed pa rdo rje rin po che nan tan myed
276b1(1): bsacag par byu kyang 'thong ma 'phongs pa bams cad nas par mes do// rigs kyi bu 'di ga ste me dang/ ro rje 'ikhams da sa su rung sa nor bu dang do bsas padag cog pa'amam cad do// de bzhi tu byigs pa ci rdung ba 'azhugs byam
276b2(1): cams byend pa nyid du sems bskyed pa rdo rje'i 'am ma ni myi shes pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa'i mtshan nyid do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na rdo rje rin po che ni skye bo ma rabs kyi lag tu phyin par myi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du sems
276b3(1): bskyed pa rdo rje ring po che yang ma rabs kyi bsam pa dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i ma ya ngan ngos can gyi lha dang myi'i lag tu phyind par gyi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rin po che yongs su rtag pa la myi mkhas pa'i skyes bu ni ri rje rin la rgyo'i yon tan gyi
276b4(1): pas de'i yon tan nyams su myong bar myi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du shes rab 'chal pa'i rang tshul dang ldan pa'i skyes bu gang zag byang chub kyi sems rdo rje rin po che chen po'i yon tan la gyi mkhas pas kyang de'i yon tan gyi khyar bar nyams su nyo bar myi 'gyur ro// 
276b5(1): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rdo rje ni zhu bar myi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgyur gyur pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rdo rje sang zhum par myi nus so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rdo rje'i lag ca chen po ni gzham
276b6(1): tungs thu'i che chen po'i tobs skar byed par du laphags pa'i mthu 'gobasakyi shugs drag pos rtogs par gabs po ze chen mo kyang gzung bar myi nus so// rkyen de bzhi du bams cadas khyed pa nyid du sems paskyed pam rje'i lag sa chen po dang / 
276b7(1): gzhan du na byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid kyi rgyu'i stobs kyis brtan pa/ dge ba'i rtsa mtshar myed pa'i mthu 'o che chen po'i/ stobs ltar phyar bar du 'phags pa/ stobs kyi shugs chen po rab tu thob pa
276b8(1): ma rtogs par nyan thos dang pa rang sangs rgyas stobs po che thams cad kyis kyang yongs su gzung bar myi nus so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ mtshon cha thams cad kyis myi tshugs pa gar tu yang rdo rjes myi tshugs pa myed de/ kha myi 'bab po/ 
276b9(1): de bzhin du sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang 'dul ba 'am dus gsum kyi bskal par myang ba'i sdug sngal dang 'grogs par bya ba gang tu nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi smon lam dang / ye shes kyi mtshon chas rdugs pa de gang la yang thas cad
276b10(1): mkhyen du pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i rdo rje'i mtshon cha chen po thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yongs su skyo la'i yid myed pas ni myi bzod pa myed de/ kha myi 'bab bo// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rdo rje ni gzhan rtsa na rdo rje nyid las gyu rang ba'i gzhin
277a1(1): na sa dang mangs rgyas 'am kyi zus kyi rdus pa/ rigs kyi dig rgyam natha sno da ji ga zhi sa zhing gshes byed sa rnags kyi 'dag par kyi byung ro// de bzhin tu sum ses pa dpa'i dge pas kyang
277a2(1): rdo rje gseb myed pa yongs su bsngos pa'i gzhica na la gnas pa yang srid par skye ba thams cad kyis 'ad par myi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di ga ste dper na rdo rje'i gzhi la brten pa'i sa chen po mi 'jigs par myi 'gyur ro// dpa' bar gyi 'gyur ro
277a3(1): de bzhin du byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rdo rje ma pa'i gzhi la rten pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i smon las rnams kyang khams gsuM thams cad tu 'jigs par gyi 'gyur ro// dma' bar gyi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di sa byed per na/ rdo rje margyas
277a4(1): yangs pa 'ang/ rgyas par phyi gyu / de bzhin byang chu sabyed rje 'a las dang nyon thongs pa rnams pa kyi nga bag la gas kyang ma ma kyi 'byu ro// ba bang kyi chu // ris rkyen 'di kyi sa na/ 
277a5(1): dodzini mas kyid kyi kyang rig par kyi 'gyur ro//  dung ba kyi'agyur/ de bzhi rna mams pas dargya/ bskyed pa rje 'dul #
277a6(1): myi tshig go/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi mye'i gdung bas gdung bar myi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snying po byang chub la bzhugs shing bcud rgol tu
277a7(1): bcugs pa ma nga sa dang / bcas pa babyed pa nyi dus 'ardzogs pa lan rgya ba rnas kyi gdang ni ga ma su mngon su sug se tham jig rten gyi ma kya rdo'i ma rdzas mazhes nonas dang / 'byag sa das
277a8(1): gzung bar myi nus so// de bzhin tu byang chub sems dpa' bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa dang / s+yad la dpyod pa dang / pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / bzod pa la 'jug pa dang / sa thob par byed

283a4(1): rkye 'ag rten gyi khams kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dbyanas par dbyigs pa dang / la yang ni snre la gzhi'i mi garten gyi 'ams kyi gzugs brtan rnam par dmyigs pa dang / la yang ni khye'u tshugs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gzugs brnyan nam 'as
283a5(1): khams kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmyigs pa dang / sa la ni wAdang byi sa gang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gzugs brtag rnam par dmyigs// deb mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'chags pa de dag dang / gnas de dag dang / bsan de da/

283a7(1): dzig za tha dang / ma lang ni mu ka lag gi tshul sna tshogs 'jig rten gyi don du 'gyung ba bsgrub pa dang / la la ni lung nod pa dang / la yang ni kha ton byed pa dang / la lar ni yi ger 'dri ba dang / la la ni dri ba yongs su 'dri ba dang / la la ni zung thog cu
283b1(1): mi la se 'dzin da bu klung gi gseng ge kha dog dang / la la las ni 'od thams cad du snang ba'i / mdag dang / lus dang sems kyi bde ba bskyed pa dang / bsnyen mchog tu mchog tu mdzes pa mthong bar gyurd to// langs bu ru krung gi gser gyi chu
283b2(1): ke ka ba de dag dang / rin po tshe thams cad kyi gzugs de dag kyang lag nas me tog gi 'phrin mngon par myong ba ma bong he/ lag nas 'phreng ba'i lnga ldi dang / sag nas gos dang / laganas bdug pa dang / rgyas 'tshan dang / bdan dang / bganas 'o
283b3(1): gdun thob dang / byug pa dang / yanan da bu che'i dra ba dang / lag nas ri sa tsa ma cogs dang / gseng gi lug bod lnga chogs dang / laganas su stegs kyis mo rko dang / lag nas rin po che sa tshogs kyis mo do mngon par myong ba dang / ban

285a1(1): byim pa'i gsola'ang byed pa dang / sa la las lam thong pa la lam ldad pa dang / la la las ni mabyam par byud te chu krung gi rgyud mabru 'dong ba dang / sa brtsal sa ni rgyam ba gzas kyis zlob nga/

285a3(1): sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi sam la dgang pa dang / ya la las ni mun par gyur ten pa'i gso'i sman byin pa dang / la la las ni pha ma la phu rung byed pa dang / la la lam ni dge ba'i bzhes gnyid

289a1(1): ca ci sru byed du sa gnarnam pa'i 'di che dpa/ phrad pamal bas pa dang / ge sbyo nga/ rnas khe mas pa'i rtse bu yin mams can byung ba la cad kyi nulas pa

289a3(1): ma rten gyi skye gnas thams cad du smad pa skyed pa yin te/ srid pa'i skye gnas thams cad hru 'ad pa lta phung yongs su shes nas srid pa'i las gyi rgyud du phye zhing gnas pa thams cad kyis lus nas nyon mo ngam par myi 'gyur ro/ chob thams cad la bdag byed pa
289a4(1): 'dza du chud pas sems car thams cad yongs su sbyin par bya ba dang / 'dul bas yongs su phyi rgyur/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rjechen po'i lus dang ldan pa'i phyir sems ca thams cad la yan btags pas ngal par gyi 'gyur ro// 'khor pa sa
289a5(1): ci skyil ma lta bur 'ongs su rtogs pas bsha lad pa thams cad du gnasadapas sgyid lug par gyi 'gyur ro// phung po thams cad sgyu ma la phur sor su shes pas/ skye ba dang mchi 'pho dang / 'chi ba yongs su bstan pa thams cad kyis nub
289a6(1): dga' ba thams cad kyis myos par myi 'gyur ro// sgyu ma lta bu'i chos tham sa nad la rnam par rtse bas bcud kyi yul thams cad kyis myi gos so// chos kyi lus su byung nyon mo d+has pa thams can la smos su byed do// skye ba la dbang rab
289a7(1): thob pas 'gro ba'i rgyu mi pa rtogs par 'ad chud pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar nang ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi skye gnas kyi yongs su chud pa'i yus nga/ rlos thamam sa kyi gsun pa dang mnyam pa mi ma chog 'i khyed

294a6(1): ma rgyags kyi snying ma sa dzad pa ma te/ ma kyi gyisanams sa gyis kyi mas pas pa mas cad can da sog byas nas/ brgyan ma'o// mamra tsunas la da ni sa can gas sa
294a7(1): phrin dang phreng ba tshogs kyi yin dang / sra tig sa tshogs kyi khri dang / rang 'an ma che 'di bzhid kyi srid kyi rangasangs rgyas kyi drug shing tun panyid bangon par mthon sa/ dab zhi gshegs pa thams sa rgya 'bar byed kyis 'thor byam par
294a8(1): snyed mngon pa mngon te/ chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i mthas tham pa thams cad ba rgyas par bkang das/ rin po che'i zhing las rin po che'i mdzod rnam par 'gro ba'i byad kyis brgyad par byas te/ de bani na gshegs pa thas da kyil gyi rgyas ma / 
294b1(1): rag tu rin po che'i char chen po mngon par 'bab par byed pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang gzugs kyi khams kyi lha'i ris kyi srin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par mthon nas/ byang chub
294b2(1): rnams dpa' la yang dag par byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gangs pa mthangs bku'i bu gams cad pang/ baspu'i na ri re nas kyang rnam pa'i rgyun tu rtogs pa'i lha'i ris thams cad tu sku la pa'i srin ma tham na par
294b3(1): mi thar te ga mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol pa 'degs par mthong ngo // ba sru'i bu ga thams cad kyi ba su'i sgo ri re nas kyang 'dod pa'i khams thams cad du rtogs pa'i lha'i dbang po'i lus kyi srin
294b4(1): mngar po mngon par mthon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo mang po ang dag par 'dzind par mthong ngo // ba spu'i bu ga thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang sems kyi skad cig re re la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi srin du sa gas
294b5(1): rgya rtonas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang 'drab/ sangs rgyu kyi ning mams cad kyi nul shin tu zla bsnyen mngon par mthon nas/  kyidabyings nam ma pa'i mams bras pa thams cad gyur bar dang nye/ sems tham
294b6(1): can gnas myed pa dang / skyabs myed pa dang / rten myed pa rnams kyi gnas dang / skyabs dang rten du gyurd par mthong ngo // ba spu'i bu ga thams cad kyib spu'i sgo re re nas kyang sems kyi skad cig re re la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
294b7(1): su dag pa sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'gyod gyi dkyil 'khor bams cad kyis yongs su gang ba'i srin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad cu la nin tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thor das/ chos kyi gyi gnam pa ma

400a1(1): ga sa ma na/  thong ga g+sa/ bye sa / grang du dang grang nga /

400a3(1): ze zur ba digabasasangs rgyas kyi 'ang brjod du med pa'i yang brjid du med pa'i rdum shin tu bri bsnyed kyi bar du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu babang po'i bsnga'i bug re mangs kyim gyi 'ong bya mchog ci
400a4(1): byung ba sang bal mas kyid kyigan cigagis pastsu bug sasu shA ma
400a5(1): ga sa pa 'arjod bye ba'i mabud byeng pa ma na bzed pa zhin pa bye ma ba'i su ga pa sa pa kyis 'dasas las rte gyi
400a6(1): nas yongs su dzub pa dang 'a ma 'jig panod rgya marnam par bye da yangs kyis byung rgyam cag nas gcisasu da padang / yangs kyi bya
400a7(1): sangs rgyas byang ba rgyamatshe sangs su bsdu ba dang snangs rgyam byung ba rgyam yongs su byung ba dang/ ngas rgyas ba rgya 'jug pa dang / byang chu
400a8(1): pa'i byung chub se nas byed kyis yon gyi mchog cags N+Di k+Sha dang nga phyis pa'i yor byed kyil la
400a9(1): sa byang chubasams dpa' lakhor byo kyil 'khor rgyam tsha'i bye brag dang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgyam tshe yongs su bsdub dang / byang chub sems
400b1(1): dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho yongs su 'byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho 'jig pa dang / sems can gyi khams la 'jug pa dang sems kyi skad cig re res
400b2(1): sems can gyi dbang po shes pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya zhing gdul ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa/ 
400b3(1): zab mo la rnam par gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnon pa rgya mtsho'i mthar phyin par ma gyur te/ de zhing la lar ni bskal par rnam par spyad par gyur to// zhing la lar ni bskal ba
400b4(1): sangs rgyas kyi ning brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du spyad par gyurazhing de dganas kyang gsos pa med do/ sems kyi skad cig de re la yang zhing rgya mtsho mtha' dang dpung mer
400b5(1): med pas 'du sems can dmas kying bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu mongs su na pa byed 'gyur to// des sa pas kyis byang chung shesas dpa gam 'azang pa'i spyon pad ca
400b6(1): smon lam rgya mtsho mnyam pa nyid kyi bar du'ang ma thob par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid dang zhing thams cad lus kyis rgyas par dgang ba mnyam pa nyid dang
400b7(1): spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pas rgyas par dgang ba mnyam pa nyid dang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su bstan pas rgyas par dgang ba mnyam pa nyid dang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mnyam
400b8(1): nyid dang tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang dbyangs brjod pa mnyam pa nyid dang dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sbyor ba mnyam pa nyid dang / 
400b9(1): mi 'jigs pa mnyam pa nyid dang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa mnyam pa nyid dang byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po mnyam pa nyid dang byang chub sems dpa'i
400b10(1): rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa mnyam pa nyid kyang rjes su thob par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos bskal pa dang / bskal pa 'byas klas pa
401a1(1): dang 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na gcig tu brgyud pa sangs rgyas kyi nong brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag brnan te/ mngon par brjod pa'i byo tshogs su bcas pa'i dbyangs kyi
401a2(1): smon lam btab pa rnga snyed su dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtenan/ dus gsum gshegs pa mi yi seng ge kun/ bdag gi ma lus de dag rnams cad la/ lus dang ngag yid dang bas phyag gyi'o// 
401a3(1): bzang po spyod par smon lam stobs dag gis// rgyal ba thams cad mod kyi mngon sum du// zhing gi rdul snyed lus dab btud pa yis// rgyal ba kun la rab tu phyag 'tshal lo// rdul gcig stong na rdus snyed
401a4(1): sangs rgyas rnams// sangs rgyas sras kyi dbus na bzhugs pa dag/ de ltar chos kyi dbyings rnams ma lus pa// thas sa rgya ba gisags de pa'i mang rgyam tshon/ rgya kyi ga rdzon su cig// rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan rab brjod cing / 
401a5(1): bar gshegs pa thams cad bdag gi bstod// me tog dam pa 'phreng ba dam pa dang // sil snyan rnams dang byug pa gdugs mchog dang / mar me'i mchog dang bdug pa de pa yis// rgyal ba de dag la ni mchod par
401a6(1): napapa 'das parnams dzimachog dang / bye ma'i bung sa mam mnyam pa/ byed par gyi rgya rdzog papa rdul bdedag ldan tsha pa / brjod pa klung sas zla ba rgyag/ 
401a7(1): sa 'das sa ma/ nga ba spyod pa dngo byangs rdzunas/ rgyal bdus phyaga'ajam ma chod par / 'dod gapa mang mug ga na// sus dang gdu ma mi ##
401a8(1): sdig pa bdag gis bgyis pa ci mchis pa// / de dag thams cad bdag gi so sor bshags/ phyogs bcu'i rgyal bkun dang sangs rgyas sras/ rang rgyal rnams dang slob dang mi slob dang / 'gro ba rnams kyi bsod nams gang la
401a9(1): yang / de dag kun gyi rjes su bdag yi rang // gang rnams phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sngon ma dag/ byang chub rim par sangs rgyas ma chags ba rnyes// mgon po de dag bdag gis thams cad la// 'khor mo bla na med pa
401a10(1): bskor bar bskul/ mya ngan 'da' ston gang bzhed de dag la/ 'gro ba kun la phan ning bde ba'i phyir/ bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed bzhugs par yang / bdag gis thal mo rab sbyar gsol bar bgyi// phyag 'tshal ba
401b1(1): dang mchod cing bshags pa dang // rjes su mi rang bskul 'ang gsol nas// dge ba chung zad bdag gis kyi bsags pa// thams cad bdag gi byang chub phyir brdze'o// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang phyogs bcu sa/ 
401b2(1): 'jig rten dag na gang bzhugs mchod par gyur// gang yang ma byon de dag rab myur bar// bsam rdzogs byang chub rim par sangs rgyas skyon// phyogs bcug le'i zhing rnams ji snyed pa// de dag rgya cher yongs su dag pa
401b3(1): 'gyur/ byang chub shing dbang drung gshegs rgyal ba dang // sangs rgyas sras kyis rab tu gang bar shog/ phyogs bcu'i sems can gang rnams ji snyed pa// de dag rtag tu nad med bde bar gyur// 'gro ba kun gyi
401b4(1): chos kyi don rnams ni// mthun par gyur cing re ba'ang grub par shog/ byang chub spyod pa dag ni bdag spyod cing // 'gro ba kun du skye ba dran par gyur// tshe rabs kun tu shi 'pho skye ba na// rtag tu bdag ni rab tu byung
401b5(1): bar to// rgyal bkun gyi rjes su slo bgyur te/ bzang ba spyod pa yongasas rdzogs byed cing / tshul khrims spyod ba dri ma yongs dag par/ rtag tu mi nyam mo byon med spyod par shog/ lha'i na dang klu dang/ thaja
401b6(1): gnod sbyin skad// grul bum dag dang mi yi skad rnams dang // 'gro ba kun gyi sgra rnams ji tsam par// thams cad skad du bdag gis chos bstan to// des shing pho rol phyin la rab brtson te/ byang chub sems ni
401b7(1): nams kyang brjed ma gyur// sdig pa gang rnams sgrib par 'gyur ba dag/ de dag ma lus yongs su byang bar shog/ las dang nyon mongs bdud kyi las rnams las// grol zhing 'jig rten 'gro ba rnams su yang // ji ltar
401b8(1): pad+mo chus mi chags pa bzhin// nyi zla nam mkhar thogs pa med ltar spyad// zhing go khyon dang phyogs rnams ji tsam par/ ngan song sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed// bde ba dag la 'gro ba kun 'god cing // 'gro ba
401b9(1): thams cad la ni phan par spyad// byang chub spyod pa yongs su rdzogs byed cing // sems can dag gi spyod dang 'thun par 'jugabazang po spyod pa dag ni rab ston cing // ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu spyod pa gyur/ 
401b10(1): bdag gi spyod dang mtshungs par gang spyod pa// de dag dang ni rtag tu 'grogs par shog/ lus ngag rnams dang ni sems kyis kyang / spyod pa dag dang smon lam gcig tu spyad/ bdags phan par 'dod pa'i grogs
402a1(1): po dag/ bzang po spyod pa rab tu ston pa rnams// de dag dang yang rtag tu phrad par shog/ de dag bdag gis nams kyang yid mi dbyung // sangs rgyas sras kyis bskor ba'i mgon po rnams/ 
402a2(1): mngon sum rtag tu bdag gis rgyal ba blta// ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu myi skyo bar// de dag la yang mchod pa rgya cher bgyi// rgyal ba rnams kyi dam pa'i chos 'dzin cing / byang chub spyod pa kun tu snang bar byed// bzang po
402a3(1): spyod pa rnam par spyod pa yang // ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu spyad par bgyi// srid pa thams cad du yang 'khor ba na// bsod nams ye shes dag ni mi zad rnyed// thabs dang shes rab ting 'dzin rnam thar dang // yon tan kun
402a4(1): gyi mi zad mdzod du gyur// rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed zhing rnams te// zhing der bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas rnams// sangs rgyas sras kyi dbus na bzhugs pa la// byang chub spyad pa spyod cing blta bar bgyi// de ltar
402a5(1): ma lus thams cad phyogs su yang // skra tsam khyon la dus gsum tshad snyed kyi// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho zhing rnams rgya mtsho dang // bskal brgya mtshor spyod cing rab tu 'jug/ gsung gcig yan lag rgya mtsho'i sgra skad kyis// rgyal ba
402a6(1): kun byung ba 'an la ga rnams dgapa/ 'gro bkun gyi bsam mjo ba'in dbyangs/ sangs rgyas gsungam rtag tu 'jug par bgyi// dus gsug shegs pa rgyal bathams ca da// 'khor lo chur mas no pas// tha
402a7(1): de dag gi yang gsung dbyangs mi zad la/ blo'i stobs kyis bdag kyang rab tu 'jug/ ma 'ongs bskal pa thams cad 'jug par yang // skad cig gcig gis bdag kyang 'jug par bgyi// gang yang bskal pa dus gsum
402a8(1): tshad de dag/ skad cig cha shas kyis ni zhugs par spyad// dus gsum gshegs pa mi yi se ng+ge dag/ de dag skad cig gcig la bdag gis blta/ rtag tu de dag gon spyod yus sa// spyusar gyur ba'i rnam thar stobs kyis 'jug/ 
402a9(1): gang 'ang da gzus gag nang rkyen// de dag dus cig byed du nga ba zlog/ des pas sus skyog rnas ma med du//  ma kyinang rgyan pa du// gangs khyon tan rjon nas// de dag ma
402a10(1): 'ang rgyal thong ma 'ano myang nga 'das par 'atu'irabar rtsod// mgani ba kun ci chung du bdag tshe'o// kur myur ba'i chu 'brus stong sa rnams dang / kunas ske'i theg pa stong padag dang / bkun tu mon tan spyod da
402b1(1): stongs rnams dang / kun du byu babyams pa dag gi stobs/ kun tu dge ba'i bsod nams stongs rnams dang // chags pa med par gyur pa'i ye ges slobs// shes rab thabs dang ting 'dzin stobs dgags/ 
402b2(1): rlub stobs rnams yang dag sgrub par byed/ las kyi skyobs rnams yongs su dag byed cing / nyon mngam stobs rnams kun tu 'jos par byed// 'dud kyi stongs rnams stobs pad par byed cing // babang po spyod pa ma / 
402b3(1): na rdzogs par bgyi/ zhi rnams rgya mtshornam par dag byed cing / sems can rgya mcho dag ni rnam par 'grol/ tsha rnams rgyam tsharab tu mthong byed cing // se gas rgya mtshor ba tu rtog pa byed/ spyod brgya mngonam par
402b4(1): dag byed cing / smon lam rgya mtsho yong su rdzogs byed cing / sangs rgyas rgya mtshor ba tu mchad byed cing // bskal ba rgya mtshor mi skyo spyad par bgyi/ gang yang dus gsum gshegs pa rgyal bas/ byang chub spyod pan
402b5(1): smon lam bye brag rnams/ bzang ba spyod pa'i byang chub sangs rgyas rnams// de kun bdag gis ma lus rdzogs par bgyi/ rgyal bkun gyi sras kyi thu bob// gang gi mong ni kun tu bzang zhes bya// mkhas pa da kyi
402b6(1): mardung sa pa spyad par byed/ dpe 'di dag pa sa 'a sa s+ho// sum dang gdang sa kyang mdag cag/ spyod pan padag 'i sas thos dag dang / batho babang pos 'as pa drag/ de dru gang / #
402b7(1): kyang de dang 'phrus banan pa das ba babyung ba sbyin pa'i byer// lam dngas rgyan gro sa byung pa sa'ong sa sus ma myob/ da byang dum rdzogs par bya// myong bdag nang so

402b10(1): babs// gang shes balnga 'i khyim pa 'dams // byang chub chog gi rjes su bam pa shing // lan gyis kyang dad pa bskyed pa ni// bamaud sasadas pa'i ma tshig par 'gyur ro// gang gis pa dang spyod sngon lam 'dis gag
403a1(1): @des ni ngan song thams cad spangs par 'gyur// des ni grogs po ngan pa spangs pa yin// snang ba mthara' yas de yang des myur mthong // de dag rnyed phra rab rnyed bde bar 'tsho// mi tshe 'dir yang de dag legs par 'ongs// kun
403a2(1): tu bzang po de yang ci 'dra bar// de dag ring por mi thogs de bzhin 'gyur// mtshams med lnga po dag gi sdig pa dmas// gang gi mi shes dbang gis byas pa dag/ de yis bzang po'i spyod pa 'di brjod na// myur du ma lus yongs su byang bar 'gyur// 
403a3(1): ye shes dang ni gzugs dang mtshan rnams dang // rigs dang kha dog rnams dang ldan par 'gyur// bdud dang mu stegs mang po de mi thub// 'jig rten gsuM po kun na'ang mchod par 'gyur// byang chub shing dbang drung du de myur 'gro// song nas sems can phan phyir
403a4(1): de 'dug ste/ byang chub sangs rgyas 'khor lo rab tu skor// bdud rnams sde dang bcas pa thams cad btul// gang yang bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam 'di// 'chang ba dang ni ston tam klog pa yi// de yi rnam par smin pa sangs rgyas mkhyen// byang chub mchog
403a5(1): la som nyi ma byed cig/ 'jam dpal ji ltar mkhyen cing dpa' ba dang // kun tu bzang po de yang de bzhin te// de dag gi rdo rjes su slob cing // dge ba 'di dag thams cad rab tu bsngo// dus gsum gshegs pa rgyal ba thams cad kyis// bsngo ba gang la
403a6(1): zhing der rab tu 'gro/ der song nas ni smon lam 'di dag kyang // thams cad ma lus bdag gis yongasu bskang // 'jig rten ji srid sems can phan par bgyi// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bzang zhing dga' ba der// pad+mo dam pa shin tu mdzes la skyes// snang ba mtha'
403a7(1): yas rgyal bas mngon sum du// lung bstan pa yang bdag gis der thob shog/ der ni bdag gi lung bstan rab thob nas// sprul pa mang po bye ba phrag brgya yis// blo'i stobs kyis phyogs bcu rnam su yang // sems can rnams la phan pa mang po bgyi// shin
403a8(1): tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi nang nas/ sdong po brgyan pa zhes bya ba/ chos kyi rnam grangs chen po las/ nor bzangs kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur ba'i spyod pa phyogs gcig pa ste/ 
403a9(1): ji snyed pa rdzogs so// / lo tsA ba bai ro tsa na rak+Shi tas zhu chen bgyis te/ gtan la phab pa'o// bkra shis/
